Chinese: 然而，对于复发性或难治性 AML 患者，米哚妥林和来他替尼作为单一药物均未带来持久的临床益处。 13,14,20

English: sorafenib showed clinical activity in patients with AML that was positive for the FLT3 ITD mutation , but data from randomized trials that support its use in that context are scarce.16
Chinese: 索拉非尼在 FLT3 ITD 突变呈阳性的 AML 患者中显示出临床活性，但支持其在这种情况下使用的随机试验数据很少。 16

English: similar resistance is seen with sorafenib.23
Chinese: 类似的耐药性见于索拉非尼。23

English: gilteritinib also inhibits the tyrosine kinase AXL , which is implicated in FLT3 inhibitor resistance.26,27
Chinese: gilteritinib 还抑制酪氨酸激酶 AXL，这与 FLT3 抑制剂耐药性有关。 26,27

English: the randomized , phase 3 ADMIRAL trial was conducted at 107 centers in 14 countries and was sponsored by Astellas Pharma .
Chinese: 这项随机的 3 期 ADMIRAL 试验在 14 个国家的 107 个中心进行，由 Astellas Pharma 赞助。

English: the trial was reviewed and approved by the institutional review board or ethics committee at each participating center and was conducted in accordance with the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki .
Chinese: 该试验由每个参与中心的机构审查委员会或伦理委员会审查和批准，并根据赫尔辛基宣言的原则进行。

English: all the patients provided written informed consent at enrollment .
Chinese: 所有患者在入组时均提供了书面知情同意书。

English: two authors who were employees of the sponsor designed the trial in collaboration with four academic authors .
Chinese: 作为申办者雇员的两位作者与四位学术作者合作设计了该试验。

English: all the authors had access to the trial data and were involved in data interpretation .
Chinese: 所有作者都可以访问试验数据并参与数据解释。

English: the authors and the sponsor vouch for the completeness and accuracy of the data and for the fidelity of the trial to the protocol ( available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org ) .
Chinese: 作者和申办方保证数据的完整性和准确性，以及试验对方案的忠实度（与本文全文可在 NEJM.org 获取）。

English: the first and last authors wrote the manuscript , with additional writing and editorial assistance provided by medical writers who were funded by the sponsor .
Chinese: 第一作者和最后一位作者撰写了手稿，由申办者资助的医学作家提供额外的写作和编辑协助。

English: enrollment on the basis of local testing for the FLT3 mutation was permitted for patients with rapidly proliferative disease .
Chinese: 对于患有快速增殖性疾病的患者，允许根据对 FLT3 突变的本地检测进行登记。

English: FLT3 MUTATIONS
Chinese: FLT3 突变

English: patients were required to have FLT3 ITD or TKD D835 or I836 mutations .
Chinese: 要求患者具有 FLT3 ITD 或 TKD D835 或 I836 突变。

English: the median FLT3 ITD allelic ratio was established at 0.77 , with a high FLT3 ITD allelic ratio defined as 0.77 or greater and a low ratio as less than 0.77 .
Chinese: 中位 FLT3 ITD 等位基因比率确定为 0.77，高 FLT3 ITD 等位基因比率定义为 0.77 或更高，低比率定义为小于 0.77。

English: no crossover between treatment groups was permitted .
Chinese: 治疗组之间不允许交叉。

English: complete remission with full or partial hematologic recovery was evaluated in an interim analysis in the gilteritinib group only and was summarized in the final analysis for both treatment groups .
Chinese: 完全缓解和完全或部分血液学恢复仅在 gilteritinib 组的中期分析中进行评估，并在两个治疗组的最终分析中进行总结。

English: best response was noted at any postbaseline visit .
Chinese: 在任何基线后访视中记录了最佳反应。

English: treatment response was assessed with the use of modified International Working Group criteria ( Table S1 in the Supplementary Appendix , available at NEJM.org ) .31
Chinese: 使用修改后的国际工作组标准（补充附录中的表 S1，可在 NEJM.org 获取）评估治疗反应。31

English: minimal residual disease was not assessed .
Chinese: 未评估微小残留病。

English: safety was assessed by evaluating the incidence of adverse events , including evaluation of vital signs , and results from clinical laboratory tests , electrocardiograms , and ophthalmologic examinations .
Chinese: 安全性是通过评估不良事件的发生率来评估的，包括评估生命体征，以及临床实验室测试、心电图和眼科检查的结果。

English: expression of AXL ( a receptor tyrosine kinase associated with drug resistance ) was analyzed by means of flow cytometry .
Chinese: 采用流式细胞术分析AXL（一种与耐药相关的受体酪氨酸激酶）的表达。

English: the first planned interim analysis - to evaluate the primary end point of the percentage of patients who had complete remission with full or partial hematologic recovery - occurred when approximately 141 patients in the gilteritinib group reached the time point of at least 112 days ( four treatment cycles ) after the receipt of first dose or after randomization ; the interim evaluation of complete remission with full or partial hematologic recovery rate had no effect on trial conduct .
Chinese: 第一个计划的中期分析——评估完全缓解且血液学完全或部分恢复的患者百分比的主要终点——发生在 gilteritinib 组约 141 名患者达到至少 112 天（四个治疗周期）的时间点时) 接受第一剂后或随机化后；具有完全或部分血液学恢复率的完全缓解的中期评估对试验的进行没有影响。

English: the planned final analysis was performed when approximately 258 deaths had occurred .
Chinese: 计划的最终分析是在大约 258 人死亡时进行的。

English: the statistical analysis plan excluded provisions for multiplicity correction in the evaluation of secondary and other outcomes .
Chinese: 统计分析计划排除了在评估次要结果和其他结果时进行多重校正的规定。

English: these results are reported as point estimates and 95 % confidence intervals without adjustment for multiplicity and should not be used to infer definitive treatment effects .
Chinese: 这些结果报告为点估计值和 95% 置信区间，未对多重性进行调整，不应用于推断确定的治疗效果。

English: from October 20 , 2015 , to February 20 , 2018 , a total of 625 patients entered screening .
Chinese: 2015年10月20日至2018年2月20日，共有625名患者进入筛查。

English: the event cutoff of 258 deaths , which triggered the final analysis , occurred on September 17 , 2018 ; the database was locked on October 19 , 2018 .
Chinese: 最终分析触发的258人死亡事件截止发生在2018年9月17日；该数据库于 2018 年 10 月 19 日被锁定。

English: a total of 371 eligible patients underwent randomization ; 247 were assigned to the gilteritinib group and 124 to the chemotherapy group ( Figure 1 and Table 1 ) .
Chinese: 共有 371 名符合条件的患者接受了随机分组； 247 人被分配到 gilteritinib 组，124 人被分配到化疗组（图 1 和表 1）。

English: overall , 60.6 % of the patients had relapsed AML ( median duration of first remission , 6.0 months ; range , 0.3 to 60.0 ) , and 39.4 % had primary refractory disease .
Chinese: 总体而言，60.6% 的患者患有复发性 AML（首次缓解的中位持续时间为 6.0 个月；范围为 0.3 至 60.0 个月），39.4% 的患者患有原发性难治性疾病。

English: most patients ( 83.8 % ) had received previous induction therapy with anthracyclines but not FLT3 inhibitors ( 87.6 % ) ; 21 patients ( 5.7 % ) had received the FLT3 inhibitor midostaurin .
Chinese: 大多数患者 (83.8%) 之前接受过蒽环类药物诱导治疗，但未接受 FLT3 抑制剂 (87.6%)； 21 名患者 (5.7%) 接受了 FLT3 抑制剂米哚妥林。

English: the median number of cycles of gilteritinib therapy received was 5 ( range , 1 to 33 ) .
Chinese: 接受的 gilteritinib 治疗周期的中位数为 5（范围，1 至 33）。

English: at the time of this analysis , 110 patients remained alive and 38 were continuing therapy with gilteritinib .
Chinese: 在进行此项分析时，有 110 名患者还活着，其中 38 名患者继续使用吉替替尼进行治疗。

English: common reasons for the discontinuation of gilteritinib were relapse , progression , or lack of efficacy ( 50.2 % ) , death ( 14.6 % ) , and adverse events ( 11.3 % ) .
Chinese: 停用 gilteritinib 的常见原因是复发、进展或缺乏疗效 (50.2%)、死亡 (14.6%) 和不良事件 (11.3%)。

English: common reasons for the discontinuation of chemotherapy were relapse , progression , or lack of efficacy ( 39.5 % ) , withdrawal by the patient ( 8.1 % ) , physician decision ( 8.9 % ) , and death ( 8.1 % ) .
Chinese: 停止化疗的常见原因是复发、进展或缺乏疗效 (39.5%)、患者退出 (8.1%)、医生决定 (8.9%) 和死亡 (8.1%)。

English: the percentages of patients who were alive at 1 year were 37.1 % in the gilteritinib group and 16.7 % in the chemotherapy group .
Chinese: gilteritinib 组 1 年时存活的患者百分比为 37.1%，化疗组为 16.7%。

English: among patients with primary refractory AML , the median overall survival was 10.4 months in the gilteritinib group and 6.9 months in the chemotherapy group ( hazard ratio for death , 0.99 ; 95 % CI , 0.63 to 1.55 ) ( Table S3 ) .
Chinese: 在原发性难治性 AML 患者中，gilteritinib 组的中位总生存期为 10.4 个月，化疗组为 6.9 个月（死亡风险比，0.99；95% CI，0.63 至 1.55）（表 S3）。

English: the percentage of patients who had complete remission with full or partial hematologic recovery was 34.0 % in the gilteritinib group and 15.3 % in the chemotherapy group ( risk difference , 18.6 percentage points ; 95 % CI , 9.8 to 27.4 ) ; the percentages of patients with complete remission were 21.1 % and 10.5 % , respectively ( risk difference , 10.6 percentage points ; 95 % CI , 2.8 to 18.4 ) ( Table 2 ) .
Chinese: 完全缓解且血液学完全或部分恢复的患者百分比在吉尔特替尼组为 34.0%，在化疗组为 15.3%（风险差异，18.6 个百分点；95% CI，9.8 至 27.4）；完全缓解患者的百分比分别为 21.1% 和 10.5%（风险差异，10.6 个百分点；95% CI，2.8 至 18.4）（表 2）。

English: the median duration of complete remission with full or partial hematologic recovery was 11.0 months in the gilteritinib group but could not be evaluated in the chemotherapy group because of censoring .
Chinese: gilteritinib 组完全缓解和血液学部分恢复的中位持续时间为 11.0 个月，但由于删失，无法在化疗组中进行评估。

English: the percentages of patients who had remission after an increase in the dose of gilteritinib ( 78 patients ) or a decrease in the dose ( 58 patients ) are shown in Table S5 .
Chinese: 在增加 gilteritinib 剂量（78 名患者）或减少剂量（58 名患者）后获得缓解的患者百分比显示在表 S5 中。

English: when we excluded remissions that occurred after transplantation during the trial , the percentage of patients who had complete remission with full or partial hematologic recovery was 26.3 % in the gilteritinib group and 15.3 % in the chemotherapy group ( risk difference , 10.9 percentage points ; 95 % CI , 2.4 to 19.5 ) .
Chinese: 当我们在试验期间排除移植后出现的缓解时，完全缓解且血液学完全或部分恢复的患者百分比在 gilteritinib 组中为 26.3 % ，在化疗组中为 15.3 % （风险差异， 10.9 个百分点； 95 % ） CI，2.4 至 19.5）。

English: among patients with primary refractory AML , the percentage of patients who had complete remission with full or partial hematologic recovery was 32 % ( 31 of 98 patients ) in the gilteritinib group and 21 % ( 10 of 48 patients ) in the chemotherapy group ( Table S3 ) .
Chinese: 在原发难治性 AML 患者中，完全缓解且血液学完全或部分恢复的患者百分比在吉特替尼组为 32 %（98 名患者中的 31 名），在化疗组中为 21 %（48 名患者中的 10 名）（表 S3） ) 。

English: the percentages of patients with a remission according to chemotherapy intensity and receipt or nonreceipt of previous transplantation are presented in Table S4 .
Chinese: 根据化疗强度和接受或未接受既往移植获得缓解的患者百分比见表 S4。

English: among patients with FLT3 ITD mutations who had been randomly assigned to the gilteritinib group , 20.5 % had a complete remission ; among those who had been randomly assigned to chemotherapy , 9.7 % had a complete remission ( Table S6 ) .
Chinese: 在随机分配到吉替尼组的 FLT3 ITD 突变患者中，20.5% 的患者获得完全缓解；在被随机分配接受化疗的患者中，9.7% 的患者获得完全缓解（表 S6）。

English: although the percentages of patients with complete remission were similar across the treatment groups among patients with FLT3 TKD mutations , gilteritinib therapy resulted in similar percentages of complete remission among patients with FLT3 TKD mutations alone ( 19.0 % ) and among those with FLT3 ITD mutations alone ( 20.5 % ) ( Table S6 ) .
Chinese: 尽管完全缓解患者的百分比在具有 FLT3 TKD 突变的患者中在整个治疗组中相似，但吉利替尼治疗在仅具有 FLT3 TKD 突变的患者 (19.0%) 和仅具有 FLT3 ITD 突变的患者中导致完全缓解的百分比相似 ( 20.5%）（表 S6）。

English: among patients treated with gilteritinib , the median overall survival was similar among those with FLT3 ITD mutations alone ( 9.3 months ) and those with FLT3 TKD mutations alone ( 8.0 months ) .
Chinese: 在接受 gilteritinib 治疗的患者中，仅具有 FLT3 ITD 突变的患者（9.3 个月）和仅具有 FLT3 TKD 突变的患者（8.0 个月）的中位总生存期相似。

English: similar results were observed regarding adverse events that occurred during the first 30 days of treatment , except for elevations of the liver aminotransferase levels . ( details are provided in Tables S7 and S8 . )
Chinese: 除了肝脏转氨酶水平升高外，在治疗的前 30 天内发生的不良事件也观察到了类似的结果。 （详情见表 S7 和 S8。）

English: common adverse events of grade 3 or higher in the gilteritinib group were febrile neutropenia ( 45.9 % ) , anemia ( 40.7 % ) , and thrombocytopenia ( 22.8 % ) ( Table 3 and Table S9 ) ; these were also the most common adverse events of grade 3 or higher that were considered by the investigators to be related to gilteritinib therapy ( Table S10 ) .
Chinese: gilteritinib 组中 3 级或更高级别的常见不良事件为发热性中性粒细胞减少症 (45.9%)、贫血 (40.7%) 和血小板减少症 (22.8%)（表 3 和表 S9）；这些也是研究人员认为与 gilteritinib 治疗相关的最常见的 3 级或更高级别不良事件（表 S10）。

English: adverse events of grade 3 or higher that occurred during the first 30 days of treatment are presented in Table S8 .
Chinese: 表 S8 列出了治疗前 30 天内发生的 3 级或更高级别的不良事件。

English: dose reductions occurred in 6 patients who had a mean change from the baseline QTcF interval of more than 60 msec .
Chinese: 6 名患者发生剂量减少，其 QTcF 间期相对于基线的平均变化超过 60 毫秒。

English: there were 251 deaths in the safety population of 355 patients , including 170 deaths among 246 patients ( 69.1 % ) in the gilteritinib group and 81 deaths among 109 patients ( 74.3 % ) in the chemotherapy group .
Chinese: 355例患者的安全人群中有251例死亡，其中gilteritinib组246例患者中有170例死亡（69.1%），化疗组109例患者中有81例死亡（74.3%）。

English: we found that in this population of patients , gilteritinib resulted in superior overall survival and percentages of remission as compared with salvage chemotherapy .
Chinese: 我们发现，在这一患者群体中，与挽救性化疗相比，gilteritinib 的总生存期和缓解率更高。

English: the present trial enrolled patients with FLT3 ITD or FLT3 TKD mutations .
Chinese: 本试验纳入了具有 FLT3 ITD 或 FLT3 TKD 突变的患者。

English: although FLT3 TKD mutations are uncommon at disease recurrence , they consistently and rapidly emerge during FLT3 inhibitor therapy to confer secondary resistance.22,34
Chinese: 尽管 FLT3 TKD 突变在疾病复发时并不常见，但它们在 FLT3 抑制剂治疗期间持续且迅速地出现并赋予继发性耐药性。 22,34

English: gilteritinib had clinical activity in all studied FLT3 mutation types .
Chinese: gilteritinib 在所有研究的 FLT3 突变类型中均具有临床活性。

English: not only were the percentages of patients with complete remission similar in the FLT3 TKD and ITD cohorts , but the median overall survival in these two cohorts was also similar .
Chinese: 不仅完全缓解的患者百分比在 FLT3 TKD 和 ITD 队列中相似，而且这两个队列的中位总生存期也相似。

English: overall , gilteritinib showed a consistent survival benefit across many subgroups .
Chinese: 总体而言，gilteritinib 在许多亚组中显示出一致的生存益处。

English: although gilteritinib therapy resulted in 63 patients being able to undergo transplantation , the contribution of the transplantation to the survival benefit from gilteritinib is difficult to assess .
Chinese: 尽管 gilteritinib 治疗使 63 名患者能够接受移植，但移植对 gilteritinib 生存获益的贡献难以评估。

English: the main toxic effect was myelosuppression .
Chinese: 主要毒性作用为骨髓抑制。

English: a small signal regarding hepatic toxic effects bears attention in future studies .
Chinese: 关于肝毒性作用的一个小信号在未来的研究中值得关注。

English: the primary outcome was the percentage of time that the blood glucose level was within the target range of 70 to 180 mg per deciliter ( 3.9 to 10.0 mmol per liter ) , as measured by continuous glucose monitoring .
Chinese: 主要结果是血糖水平在 70 到 180 毫克每分升（3.9 到 10.0 毫摩尔每升）目标范围内的时间百分比，这是通过连续血糖监测测量的。

English: the age range of the patients was 14 to 71 years , and the glycated hemoglobin level ranged from 5.4 to 10.6 % .
Chinese: 患者年龄范围为14～71岁，糖化血红蛋白水平为5.4～10.6%。

English: all 168 patients completed the trial .
Chinese: 全部 168 名患者完成了试验。

English: the mean adjusted difference in glycated hemoglobin level after 6 months was − 0.33 percentage points ( 95 % CI , − 0.53 to − 0.13 ; P = 0.001 ) .
Chinese: 6 个月后糖化血红蛋白水平的平均调整差异为 − 0.33 个百分点（95% CI，− 0.53 至 − 0.13；P = 0.001）。

English: despite advances in care , attaining good glycemic outcomes in patients with type 1 diabetes remains challenging ; the targets set by the American Diabetes Association are met in only a minority of patients.1,2
Chinese: 尽管在护理方面取得了进步，但要使 1 型糖尿病患者获得良好的血糖结果仍然具有挑战性；只有少数患者达到了美国糖尿病协会设定的目标。 1,2

English: an investigational device exemption was approved by the Food and Drug Administration .
Chinese: 一项试验性器械豁免获得了食品和药物管理局的批准。

English: an independent data and safety monitoring board provided trial oversight .
Chinese: 一个独立的数据和安全监督委员会提供试验监督。

English: the first , second , and last authors vouch for the completeness and accuracy of the data and for the fidelity of the trial to the protocol .
Chinese: 第一、第二和最后一位作者保证数据的完整性和准确性以及试验对方案的忠实度。

English: funding was provided by the National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases .
Chinese: 资金由国家糖尿病、消化和肾脏疾病研究所提供。

English: tandem Diabetes Care reviewed the manuscript but was not otherwise involved in the trial design , conduct , data analysis , or manuscript preparation .
Chinese: tandem Diabetes Care 审阅了手稿，但未参与试验设计、实施、数据分析或手稿准备。

English: to be included in the trial , patients had to be at least 14 years old and have a clinical diagnosis of type 1 diabetes ; they also had to have been treated with insulin for at least 1 year by means of a pump or multiple daily injections , without a restriction on the glycated hemoglobin level ( complete eligibility criteria are described in Table S1 in the Supplementary Appendix , available at NEJM.org ) .
Chinese: 被纳入试验的患者必须至少年满 14 岁，并且有 1 型糖尿病的临床诊断；他们还必须通过胰岛素泵或每日多次注射接受胰岛素治疗至少 1 年，且糖化血红蛋白水平不受限制（完整的资格标准见补充附录表 S1，补充附录可在 NEJM 获取。组织）。

English: patients in the control group received a continuous glucose monitor ; patients who had used a pump before participating in the trial used their personal pumps .
Chinese: 对照组患者接受连续血糖监测；在参与试验前使用过泵的患者使用了他们的个人泵。

English: data from the devices were downloaded and reviewed at each visit and during telephone contacts .
Chinese: 每次访问和电话联系时，都会下载和审查来自设备的数据。

English: glycated hemoglobin also was measured at randomization and after 13 and 26 weeks at a central laboratory at the University of Minnesota Advanced Research and Diagnostic Laboratory .
Chinese: 还在明尼苏达大学高级研究与诊断实验室的中心实验室随机化以及 13 周和 26 周后测量了糖化血红蛋白。

English: reporting of adverse events was solicited throughout the trial .
Chinese: 在整个试验过程中征求不良事件的报告。

English: reportable adverse events included serious adverse events , adverse events occurring in association with a trial device or procedure , severe hypoglycemia ( defined as hypoglycemia leading to the need for assistance because of altered consciousness ) , diabetic ketoacidosis as defined by the Diabetes Control and Complications Trial , 11 or hyperglycemia with ketonemia for which a health care provider was contacted .
Chinese: 可报告的不良事件包括严重不良事件、与试验装置或程序相关的不良事件、严重低血糖（定义为因意识改变而导致需要帮助的低血糖）、糖尿病控制和并发症试验定义的糖尿病酮症酸中毒、 11 或高血糖伴酮血症，为此联系了医疗保健提供者。

English: the primary outcome was the percentage of time that the glucose level , as measured by the continuous glucose monitor , was in the target range of 70 to 180 mg per deciliter ( 3.9 to 10.0 mmol per liter ) .
Chinese: 主要结果是连续血糖监测仪测量的血糖水平处于 70 至 180 毫克/分升（3.9 至 10.0 毫摩尔/升）目标范围内的时间百分比。

English: the main secondary outcomes , which were tested in a hierarchical fashion to maintain a type I error rate of 5 % , were the percentage of time that the glucose level was greater than 180 mg per deciliter , the mean glucose concentration , the glycated hemoglobin level at 26 weeks , the percentage of time that the glucose level was less than 70 mg per deciliter , and the percentage of time that the glucose level was less than 54 mg per deciliter ( 3.0 mmol per liter ) .
Chinese: 主要的次要结局是血糖水平高于 180 mg/dL 的时间百分比、平均血糖浓度、糖化血红蛋白水平26 周时，血糖水平低于 70 毫克/分升的时间百分比，以及血糖水平低于 54 毫克/分升（3.0 毫摩尔/升）的时间百分比。

English: additional secondary outcomes , for which the type I error was controlled with the use of the false discovery rate , are listed in the statistical analysis plan .
Chinese: 使用错误发现率控制 I 类错误的其他次要结果列在统计分析计划中。

English: safety outcomes included the frequency of severe hypoglycemia , diabetic ketoacidosis , and other serious adverse events .
Chinese: 安全性结果包括严重低血糖、糖尿病酮症酸中毒和其他严重不良事件的发生率。

English: modification of the treatment effect according to baseline variables was assessed by including an interaction term in the models described above .
Chinese: 根据基线变量对治疗效果的修改是通过在上述模型中包含一个交互项来评估的。

English: the analyses of the data at 13 weeks paralleled those of the data at 26 weeks .
Chinese: 13 周时的数据分析与 26 周时的数据分析平行。

English: descriptive statistics include means with standard deviations and medians with interquartile ranges , depending on the distribution of data .
Chinese: 描述性统计包括具有标准差的均值和具有四分位数间距的中位数，具体取决于数据的分布。

English: analyses were performed with SAS software , version 9.4 ( SAS Institute ) .
Chinese: 使用 SAS 软件 9.4 版（SAS Institute）进行分析。

English: insulin pumps were used by 133 patients ( 79 % ) , and multiple daily insulin injections were used by 35 ( 21 % ) ; 118 ( 70 % ) were using continuous glucose monitoring , and 102 ( 86 % ) of these were using pumps .
Chinese: 133 名患者 (79%) 使用了胰岛素泵，35 名患者 (21%) 使用了每日多次胰岛素注射； 118 人 (70%) 使用连续血糖监测，其中 102 人 (86%) 使用泵。

English: the treatment effect was evident in the first month and was consistent over the 6 months ( Figure 1A ) .
Chinese: 治疗效果在第一个月就很明显，并且在 6 个月内保持一致（图 1A）。

English: this diurnal pattern , shown in Figure 1B , is a result of the increased aggressiveness of the algorithm to meet a lower glucose target during the second half of the night .
Chinese: 如图 1B 所示，这种昼夜模式是算法在后半夜为满足较低葡萄糖目标而增加攻击性的结果。

English: there was no significant difference between the groups in the daily insulin amount ( P = 0.83 ) or in weight change ( P = 0.83 ) ( Table S8 ) .
Chinese: 每日胰岛素用量 (P = 0.83) 或体重变化 (P = 0.83) 组间无显着差异（表 S8）。

English: system USE
Chinese: 系统使用

English: severe hypoglycemia did not occur in either group .
Chinese: 两组均未发生严重低血糖。

English: no severe hypoglycemic events occurred in either group .
Chinese: 两组均未发生严重低血糖事件。

English: in our trial , 70 % of the patients were using a continuous glucose monitor and 79 % were using an insulin pump at the time of enrollment , percentages that are substantially higher than the reported usage in the general population of patients with type 1 diabetes.2
Chinese: 在我们的试验中，70 % 的患者在入组时使用连续血糖监测仪，而 79 % 的患者在使用胰岛素泵，这些百分比大大高于报告的 1 型糖尿病患者一般人群的使用率。 2

English: however , our results appeared to be similar in patients who were not using a pump or a continuous glucose monitor before the trial .
Chinese: 然而，在试验前未使用泵或连续血糖监测仪的患者中，我们的结果似乎相似。

English: strengths of the present trial include the inclusion of patients across a wide range of baseline characteristics , 100 % patient retention , and a high level of adherence to the use of the assigned devices in both treatment groups .
Chinese: 本试验的优势包括纳入具有广泛基线特征的患者、100% 的患者保留率以及两个治疗组对指定设备使用的高度依从性。

English: continuous glucose monitoring was used by both groups , with minimal reliance on blood glucose measurements .
Chinese: 两组均使用连续血糖监测，对血糖测量的依赖最小。

English: our trial also had certain limitations .
Chinese: 我们的试验也有一定的局限性。

English: outcomes were similar in a randomized comparison of these approaches .
Chinese: 这些方法的随机比较结果相似。

English: hemiarthroplasty ( replacement of only the femoral head ) and total hip arthroplasty ( replacement of both the femoral head and acetabulum ) are both options for patients with displaced fractures of the femoral neck ; each approach has certain advantages and disadvantages .
Chinese: 半髋关节置换术（仅置换股骨头）和全髋关节置换术（置换股骨头和髋臼）都是股骨颈移位骨折患者的选择；每种方法都有一定的优点和缺点。

English: in this international randomized trial , researchers compared the two procedures in 1495 patients .
Chinese: 在这项国际随机试验中，研究人员对 1495 名患者的两种手术进行了比较。

English: the primary endpoint - another hip procedure required and performed within 24 months - occurred in 8 % of patients in both groups .
Chinese: 主要终点——在 24 个月内需要并进行的另一次髋关节手术——发生在两组中 8% 的患者中。

English: conversely , some measures of pain and function favored total hip arthroplasty compared with hemiarthroplasty , but differences were small and did not meet standard thresholds for clinical importance .
Chinese: 相反，与股骨头置换术相比，一些疼痛和功能指标有利于全髋关节置换术，但差异很小，不符合临床重要性的标准阈值。

English: most children received breast milk , alone or with formula ; only 70 received formula alone .
Chinese: 大多数儿童单独或与配方奶粉一起吃母乳；只有 70 人收到了配方奶粉。

English: median gestational age was 29 weeks .
Chinese: 中位孕龄为 29 周。

English: approximately 95 % of participants in each group survived to 24 months ( corrected for gestational age ) .
Chinese: 每组中大约 95% 的参与者存活到 24 个月（校正胎龄）。

English: few adverse events occurred .
Chinese: 很少发生不良事件。

English: although this important study does not help define a preferred feeding protocol for very premature infants , it offers reassurance that careful feeding with daily increases of either 30 or 18 mL / kg has comparable outcomes .
Chinese: 尽管这项重要的研究无助于为极早产儿确定首选的喂养方案，但它提供了保证，每天增加 30 或 18 mL/kg 的小心喂养具有可比的结果。

English: dupilumab now is approved for patients with chronic sinusitis and polyps , asthma , and eczema .
Chinese: dupilumab 现在被批准用于患有慢性鼻窦炎和息肉、哮喘和湿疹的患者。

English: researchers examined whether dupilumab ( Dupixent ) , a monoclonal antibody that targets interleukin ( IL ) -4 and 13 and is approved for asthma and eczema , is effective for CRSwNP .
Chinese: 研究人员检查了 dupilumab (Dupixent)，一种靶向白细胞介素 (IL) -4 和 13 的单克隆抗体，被批准用于治疗哮喘和湿疹，是否对 CRSwNP 有效。

English: dupilumab generally was well tolerated .
Chinese: dupilumab 通常耐受性良好。

English: patients with CRSwNP tend to have poor quality of life .
Chinese: CRSwNP 患者的生活质量往往较差。

English: treatment is suboptimal , consisting of nasal corticosteroids and saline rinses , frequent bursts of systemic corticosteroids , and sinus surgery .
Chinese: 治疗效果欠佳，包括鼻皮质类固醇和生理盐水冲洗、全身性皮质类固醇的频繁爆发和鼻窦手术。

English: dupilumab already has gained FDA approval for managing CRSwNP but probably will be prescribed only by otolaryngologists , allergists , and pulmonologists .
Chinese: dupilumab 已获得 FDA 批准用于管理 CRSwNP，但可能只会由耳鼻喉科医生、过敏症科医生和肺科医生开处方。

English: and at a cost of US $ 43,000 annually , the drug could be a hard sell , especially when symptoms return after therapy stops .
Chinese: 并且每年花费 43,000 美元，这种药物可能很难销售，尤其是当治疗停止后症状再次出现时。

English: hemorrhage remains a leading cause of death after trauma , and resuscitation strategies continue to evolve .
Chinese: 出血仍然是创伤后死亡的主要原因，复苏策略也在不断发展。

English: using a French trauma registry , researchers retrospectively compared outcomes between patients who received at least two units of FFP for every three units of PRBC and patients who received a lower ratio of FFP to PRBC .
Chinese: 使用法国创伤登记，研究人员回顾性地比较了每三个单位的 PRBC 接受至少两个单位的 FFP 的患者与接受较低的 FFP 与 PRBC 比率的患者之间的结果。

English: of 897 patients , 34 % died within 30 days ( the primary outcome ) .
Chinese: 在 897 名患者中，34% 的患者在 30 天内死亡（主要结果）。

English: an exsanguinating patient is losing whole blood , so resuscitation strategies resembling whole blood replacement have face validity .
Chinese: 失血的病人正在失去全血，因此像全血置换这样的复苏策略具有表面有效性。

English: however , this study should not be used as part of the evidence supporting ( or refuting ) any transfusion strategy .
Chinese: 然而，这项研究不应被用作支持（或反驳）任何输血策略的证据的一部分。

English: until better evidence is available , clinicians should continue to provide care tailored for each patient encounter .
Chinese: 在获得更好的证据之前，临床医生应继续为每位患者提供量身定制的护理。

English: ticagrelor monotherapy was associated with less bleeding at 1 year than continued dual antiplatelet therapy and no higher risks for death , myocardial infarction , or stroke .
Chinese: 与持续的双重抗血小板治疗相比，替格瑞洛单药治疗与 1 年时的出血较少相关，并且死亡、心肌梗死或中风的风险没有增加。

English: at 3 months , 7119 patients underwent randomization ( mean age , 65 ; diabetes , 37 % ; PCI for acute coronary syndrome , 65 % ) to continue this regimen or to receive ticagrelor alone .
Chinese: 在 3 个月时，7119 名患者被随机分组（平均年龄 65 岁；糖尿病，37%；急性冠状动脉综合征行 PCI，65%）以继续该方案或单独接受替格瑞洛。

English: ischemic events were similar between groups , including a composite endpoint of death , nonfatal myocardial infarction , and nonfatal stroke ( 4 % in both ) .
Chinese: 各组间的缺血事件相似，包括死亡、非致死性心肌梗塞和非致死性中风的复合终点（均为 4%）。

English: stent thrombosis was nonsignificantly different between groups ( ticagrelor alone , 0.4 % ; ticagrelor plus aspirin , 0.6 % ) .
Chinese: 支架内血栓形成在各组之间无显着差异（单独替格瑞洛，0.4%；替格瑞洛联合阿司匹林，0.6%）。

English: in the search for ways to reduce bleeding risks without increasing ischemic events after PCI with a DES , the drug regimen of ticagrelor plus aspirin for 3 months followed by ticagrelor alone appears to be a winner .
Chinese: 在使用 DES 进行 PCI 后寻找降低出血风险而不增加缺血事件的方法时，替格瑞洛加阿司匹林 3 个月然后单独替格瑞洛的药物治疗方案似乎是赢家。

English: as the authors note , these findings differ from the GLOBAL LEADERS trial ( NEJM JW Cardiol Oct 2018 and Lancet 2018 ; 392 : 940 ) , which failed to demonstrate a bleeding benefit with early discontinuation of aspirin , possibly due to differences in patients and study design .
Chinese: 正如作者所指出的，这些发现不同于 GLOBAL LEADERS 试验（ NEJM JW Cardiol Oct 2018 和 Lancet 2018 ； 392 : 940 ），后者未能证明早期停用阿司匹林对出血有益，这可能是由于患者和研究设计的差异.

English: in contrast , approaches using clopidogrel have demonstrated benefits , but these studies were underpowered for ischemic endpoints .
Chinese: 相比之下，使用氯吡格雷的方法已显示出益处，但这些研究对缺血终点的效力不足。

English: further studies are needed to compare agents , timing , and different risk populations .
Chinese: 需要进一步的研究来比较药物、时间和不同的风险人群。

English: in the meantime , stopping aspirin after 3 months of dual antiplatelet therapy with ticagrelor in patients at risk for bleeding seems reasonable .
Chinese: 与此同时，有出血风险的患者在使用替格瑞洛进行双重抗血小板治疗 3 个月后停用阿司匹林似乎是合理的。

English: a similar number of grade 3 or greater adverse events occurred in the cabazitaxel and abiraterone / enzalutamide groups ( 56 % and 52 % , respectively ) .
Chinese: 卡巴他赛组和阿比特龙/恩杂鲁胺组发生了相似数量的 3 级或更高级别的不良事件（分别为 56% 和 52%）。

English: patients with stable coronary artery disease and diabetes mellitus who have not had a myocardial infarction or stroke are at high risk for cardiovascular events .
Chinese: 没有心肌梗死或中风的稳定性冠状动脉疾病和糖尿病患者发生心血管事件的风险很高。

English: whether adding ticagrelor to aspirin improves outcomes in this population is unclear .
Chinese: 在阿司匹林中加入替格瑞洛是否能改善这一人群的结局尚不清楚。

English: patients with previous myocardial infarction or stroke were excluded .
Chinese: 既往有心肌梗塞或中风的患者被排除在外。

English: the primary efficacy outcome was a composite of cardiovascular death , myocardial infarction , or stroke .
Chinese: 主要疗效结果是心血管死亡、心肌梗死或中风的复合结果。

English: the primary safety outcome was major bleeding as defined by the Thrombolysis in Myocardial Infarction ( TIMI ) criteria .
Chinese: 主要安全性结果是心肌梗死溶栓 (TIMI) 标准定义的大出血。

English: permanent treatment discontinuation was more frequent with ticagrelor than placebo ( 34.5 % vs. 25.4 % ) .
Chinese: 与安慰剂组相比，替格瑞洛组永久性停药的发生率更高（34.5% 对 25.4%）。

English: there was no significant difference in the incidence of fatal bleeding ( 0.2 % vs. 0.1 % ; hazard ratio , 1.90 ; 95 % CI , 0.87 to 4.15 ; P = 0.11 ) .

the incidence of an exploratory composite outcome of irreversible harm ( death from any cause , myocardial infarction , stroke , fatal bleeding , or intracranial hemorrhage ) was similar in the ticagrelor group and the placebo group ( 10.1 % vs. 10.8 % ; hazard ratio , 0.93 ; 95 % CI , 0.86 to 1.02 ) .
Chinese: 不可逆伤害（全因死亡、心肌梗死、卒中、致命性出血或颅内出血）的探索性复合结局的发生率在替格瑞洛组和安慰剂组中相似（10.1 % 对 10.8 % ；风险比 0.93 ） ；95% CI，0.86 至 1.02）。

English: in patients with stable coronary artery disease and diabetes without a history of myocardial infarction or stroke , those who received ticagrelor plus aspirin had a lower incidence of ischemic cardiovascular events but a higher incidence of major bleeding than those who received placebo plus aspirin . ( Funded by AstraZeneca ; THEMIS ClinicalTrials.gov number , NCT01991795 . )
Chinese: 在没有心肌梗死或中风病史的稳定型冠状动脉疾病和糖尿病患者中，接受替格瑞洛联合阿司匹林治疗的患者与接受安慰剂联合阿司匹林治疗的患者相比，缺血性心血管事件发生率较低，但大出血发生率较高。 （由阿斯利康资助；THEMIS ClinicalTrials.gov 编号，NCT01991795。）

English: therefore , aspirin alone , the standard therapy in this population , may not provide fully effective antithrombotic protection .
Chinese: 因此，单独使用阿司匹林作为这一人群的标准疗法，可能无法提供完全有效的抗血栓形成保护。

English: ticagrelor , a reversible antagonist of the platelet P2Y12 receptor , has been shown to provide more consistent platelet inhibition than aspirin or clopidogrel.6
Chinese: 替格瑞洛是一种可逆的血小板 P2Y12 受体拮抗剂，已被证明可提供比阿司匹林或氯吡格雷更一致的血小板抑制作用。 6

English: the relative benefit of ticagrelor in these patients has been consistent regardless of the presence of diabetes .
Chinese: 无论是否存在糖尿病，替格瑞洛对这些患者的相对益处都是一致的。

English: however , since patients with diabetes are at high baseline risk , they have had a large absolute benefit from the addition of ticagrelor to aspirin.9,10
Chinese: 然而，由于糖尿病患者的基线风险很高，他们从阿司匹林中加入替格瑞洛获得了很大的绝对益处。 9,10

English: whether patients with stable coronary artery disease and diabetes who do not have a history of myocardial infarction or stroke also derive benefit from dual antiplatelet therapy with ticagrelor plus aspirin is unclear .
Chinese: 没有心肌梗死或卒中病史的稳定型冠状动脉疾病和糖尿病患者是否也能从替格瑞洛联合阿司匹林的双重抗血小板治疗中获益尚不清楚。

English: the Effect of Ticagrelor on Health Outcomes in Diabetes Mellitus Patients Intervention Study ( THEMIS ) was designed to test the efficacy and safety of ticagrelor , as compared with placebo , in addition to aspirin in this population .
Chinese: 在糖尿病患者干预研究 (THEMIS) 中，替格瑞洛对健康结果的影响旨在测试替格瑞洛与安慰剂以及阿司匹林在该人群中的疗效和安全性。

English: AstraZeneca funded the trial , which was designed and overseen by an academic executive committee .
Chinese: 阿斯利康资助了该试验，该试验由学术执行委员会设计和监督。

English: all the trial centers obtained ethical approval according to local regulations .
Chinese: 所有试验中心均按当地法规获得伦理批准。

English: site selection was conducted jointly by the national lead investigators and representatives of AstraZeneca , who performed site monitoring and supervision and handled the collection , storage , and analysis of the data .
Chinese: 选址由国家首席调查员和阿斯利康代表共同进行，他们负责现场监测和监督，并处理数据的收集、存储和分析。

English: the Baim Clinical Research Institute independently validated all the data that are reported , with funding from AstraZeneca .
Chinese: Baim 临床研究所在阿斯利康的资助下独立验证了所有报告的数据。

English: all the authors contributed to the writing of the manuscript and made the decision to submit the manuscript for publication .
Chinese: 所有作者都对文稿的撰写做出了贡献，并做出了投稿发表的决定。

English: the authors vouch for the completeness and accuracy of the data and the analyses and for the fidelity of the trial to the protocol .
Chinese: 作者保证数据和分析的完整性和准确性，并保证试验对方案的忠实度。

English: the trial population consisted of patients who were 50 years of age or older and who had stable coronary artery disease and type 2 diabetes mellitus .
Chinese: 试验人群包括年龄在 50 岁或以上且患有稳定性冠状动脉疾病和 2 型糖尿病的患者。

English: the presence of type 2 diabetes mellitus was determined by the receipt of an antihyperglycemic medication for at least 6 months .
Chinese: 2 型糖尿病的存在是通过接受抗高血糖药物治疗至少 6 个月来确定的。

English: patients with known history of myocardial infarction or stroke were excluded , as were patients who were receiving dual antiplatelet therapy .
Chinese: 已知有心肌梗塞或中风病史的患者被排除在外，接受双重抗血小板治疗的患者也被排除在外。

English: randomization AND TREATMENT GROUPS
Chinese: 随机化和治疗组

English: patients were initially assigned to receive ticagrelor at a dose of 90 mg twice daily or matching placebo .
Chinese: 患者最初被分配接受每日两次 90 毫克剂量的替格瑞洛或匹配的安慰剂。

English: secondary efficacy outcomes were tested hierarchically according to the following sequence : cardiovascular death , myocardial infarction , ischemic stroke , and death from any cause .
Chinese: 次要疗效结果按照以下顺序进行分层测试：心血管死亡、心肌梗死、缺血性卒中和全因死亡。

English: the primary safety outcome was major bleeding , which was defined according to the TIMI classification .
Chinese: 主要安全性结果是大出血，这是根据 TIMI 分类定义的。

English: an exploratory outcome of net irreversible harm was prespecified as a composite of death from any cause , myocardial infarction , stroke , fatal bleeding , or intracranial hemorrhage .
Chinese: 净不可逆伤害的探索性结果被预先指定为全因死亡、心肌梗死、中风、致命性出血或颅内出血的复合结果。

English: the definitions of all trial outcomes are provided in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录中提供了所有试验结果的定义。

English: we estimated that the annual event rate in the placebo group would be 2.5 % .
Chinese: 我们估计安慰剂组的年事件发生率为 2.5%。

English: we determined that the occurrence of 1385 primary outcome events would provide the trial with a power of 90 % , assuming a 16 % lower risk of a primary outcome event in the ticagrelor group than in the placebo group.11
Chinese: 我们确定 1385 次主要结果事件的发生将为试验提供 90 % 的功效，假设替格瑞洛组中主要结果事件的风险比安慰剂组低 16 % 11。

English: safety analyses were performed in the safety analysis set , which included all the patients who had received at least one dose of ticagrelor or placebo , with patients evaluated according to the one they actually received .
Chinese: 安全性分析在安全性分析集中进行，其中包括接受过至少一剂替格瑞洛或安慰剂的所有患者，并根据实际接受的剂量对患者进行评估。

English: confidence intervals for secondary and exploratory efficacy end points have not been adjusted for multiple comparisons , so inferences drawn from these intervals may not be reproducible .
Chinese: 次要和探索性疗效终点的置信区间尚未针对多重比较进行调整，因此从这些区间得出的推论可能无法重现。

English: to assess possible effects of missing data in the ticagrelor group , the event rate in the placebo group was used to estimate the intensity of a Poisson process .
Chinese: 为了评估替格瑞洛组缺失数据的可能影响，安慰剂组的事件发生率用于估计泊松过程的强度。

English: the comparison between ticagrelor and placebo was recalculated with these additional events .
Chinese: 替格瑞洛和安慰剂之间的比较是根据这些额外的事件重新计算的。

English: to estimate the interaction between the trial group and prespecified subgroups , we added to the model the trial group , subgroup , and interaction term between trial group and subgroup .
Chinese: 为了估计试验组和预先指定的亚组之间的相互作用，我们在模型中添加了试验组、亚组以及试验组和亚组之间的相互作用项。

English: specific analyses were also prespecified to test the consistency of effect for the two doses of ticagrelor .
Chinese: 还预先指定了具体分析，以测试两种替格瑞洛剂量的效果一致性。

English: primary efficacy and safety analyses were repeated in the subgroup of patients who had undergone randomization after the reduction in the dose of ticagrelor .
Chinese: 在替格瑞洛剂量减少后接受随机分组的患者亚组中重复了主要疗效和安全性分析。

English: from February 10 , 2014 , to May 24 , 2016 , a total of 20,108 patients were enrolled .
of these patients , 19,271 underwent randomization at 1315 sites in 42 countries in North America , South America , Asia , Africa , Australia , and Europe .
Chinese: 在这些患者中，有 19,271 人在北美、南美、亚洲、非洲、澳大利亚和欧洲 42 个国家的 1315 个地点接受了随机分组。

English: one site that had enrolled 51 patients was closed by the sponsor before unblinding owing to inadequate adherence to good clinical practice in a different trial.11
Chinese: 由于在另一项试验中未能充分遵守良好的临床实践，一个已招募 51 名患者的研究中心在揭盲前被申办者关闭。 11

English: the last visit with a trial patient was conducted on January 25 , 2019 .
Chinese: 对试验患者的最后一次访问是在 2019 年 1 月 25 日进行的。

English: the censoring date for the efficacy analyses was October 29 , 2018 .
Chinese: 疗效分析的审查日期为 2018 年 10 月 29 日。

English: the characteristics of the patients were well balanced between the two groups ( Table 1 ) .
Chinese: 两组患者的特征均衡（表1）。

English: the median age was 66 years , and 31.4 % of the patients were women .
Chinese: 中位年龄为 66 岁，31.4% 的患者为女性。

English: a total of 58.0 % of the patients had undergone PCI ( with or without stent placement ) , 21.8 % had undergone CABG but not PCI , and 7.0 % had undergone both PCI and CABG ; 20.2 % had no history of coronary revascularization and had received only medical treatment .
Chinese: 共有58.0%的患者接受了PCI（有或没有放置支架），21.8%的患者接受了CABG但未接受PCI，7.0%的患者同时接受了PCI和CABG。 20.2% 没有冠状动脉血运重建史，只接受过药物治疗。

English: patients had received a diagnosis of diabetes a median of 10.0 years before randomization .
Chinese: 患者在随机分组前被诊断为糖尿病的时间中位数为 10.0 年。

English: most of the patients were receiving two or more antihyperglycemic medications ( Table S2 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 大多数患者正在接受两种或更多种降糖药（补充附录表 S2）。

English: more than half the patients were taking metformin , and more than 20 % were receiving insulin .
Chinese: 超过一半的患者服用二甲双胍，超过 20% 的患者服用胰岛素。

English: efficacy outcomes are summarized in Table 2 .
Chinese: 表 2 总结了疗效结果。

English: the number of patients who would need to be treated to prevent one primary event at 36 months was 138 .
Chinese: 在 36 个月时需要接受治疗以预防一次主要事件的患者人数为 138 人。

English: the lower frequency of the primary composite outcome in the ticagrelor group was driven by lower incidences of myocardial infarction and stroke than in the placebo group .
Chinese: 与安慰剂组相比，替格瑞洛组主要复合结局发生率较低是由于心肌梗死和中风的发生率较低。

English: secondary efficacy outcomes were analyzed according to a prespecified hierarchy that started with cardiovascular death .
Chinese: 根据从心血管死亡开始的预设等级分析次要疗效结局。

English: additional secondary efficacy outcomes are presented in Table 2 ; there were fewer myocardial infarctions and fewer ischemic strokes in the ticagrelor group than in the placebo group .
Chinese: 其他次要疗效结果见表 2；与安慰剂组相比，替格瑞洛组的心肌梗死和缺血性卒中发生率更低。

English: adjudicated causes of death are provided in Table S3 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录表 S3 提供了裁定死因。

English: fatal myocardial infarction and fatal strokes accounted for 51 and 52 deaths , respectively , out of a total 1166 deaths .
Chinese: 在 1166 例死亡病例中，致命性心肌梗死和致命性中风分别占 51 例和 52 例。

English: in a prespecified exploratory analysis , the number of events of the composite of acute limb ischemia or major amputation was lower with ticagrelor than with placebo ( hazard ratio , 0.45 ; 95 % CI , 0.23 to 0.86 ) .
Chinese: 在预先指定的探索性分析中，替格瑞洛组的急性肢体缺血或重大截肢复合事件的数量低于安慰剂组（风险比，0.45；95% CI，0.23 至 0.86）。

English: we conducted a prespecified sensitivity analysis of the primary outcome to account for the reduction in the ticagrelor dose during the trial ; the results were consistent with those of the primary analysis ( Table S4 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 我们对主要结局进行了预先指定的敏感性分析，以说明试验期间替格瑞洛剂量的减少；结果与主要分析的结果一致（补充附录表S4）。

English: in a sensitivity analysis performed to assess the possible effects of missing data , it was estimated that 757 primary outcome events ( 7.9 % ) would have occurred in the ticagrelor group , resulting in a hazard ratio of 0.93 ( 95 % CI , 0.84 to 1.02 ) .
Chinese: 在为评估缺失数据的可能影响而进行的敏感性分析中，估计替格瑞洛组会发生 757 次主要结果事件 ( 7.9 % ) ，导致风险比为 0.93 （ 95 % CI ， 0.84 至 1.02 ） .

English: selected prespecified subgroup analyses for the primary efficacy outcome are provided in Figure S4 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 主要疗效结局的选定预设亚组分析见补充附录图 S4。

English: there was a modest variation in treatment benefit according to the date of censoring of events relative to last dose of ticagrelor or placebo ( Table S6 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 根据与替格瑞洛或安慰剂末次剂量相关的事件删失日期，治疗获益略有不同（补充附录表 S6）。

English: serious adverse events were slightly less frequent with ticagrelor than with placebo ( 31.9 % vs. 33.7 % ) .
Chinese: 替格瑞洛组的严重不良事件发生率略低于安慰剂组（31.9% 对 33.7%）。

English: adverse events of interest occurred more frequently with ticagrelor than with placebo , a difference that was driven by a greater frequency of dyspnea in the ticagrelor group ( Table 3 ) .
Chinese: 与安慰剂组相比，替格瑞洛组感兴趣的不良事件发生频率更高，这是由替格瑞洛组呼吸困难频率更高所致（表 3）。

English: results that were consistent with the primary safety analysis were observed for other bleeding definitions .
Chinese: 对于其他出血定义，观察到与主要安全性分析一致的结果。

English: intracranial hemorrhage was more frequent with ticagrelor than with placebo , with 70 events and 46 events , respectively ( 0.7 % vs. 0.5 % ; hazard ratio , 1.71 ; 95 % CI , 1.18 to 2.48 ; P = 0.005 ) .
Chinese: 替格瑞洛组的颅内出血发生率高于安慰剂组，分别为 70 起事件和 46 起事件（0.7% 对 0.5%；风险比，1.71；95% CI，1.18 至 2.48；P = 0.005）。

English: selected prespecified subgroup analyses for the primary safety outcome are presented in Figure S5 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 主要安全性结局的选定预设亚组分析见补充附录图 S5。

English: rates of discontinuation were high in the two groups but were higher in the ticagrelor group , primarily due to an increased risk of bleeding and dyspnea .
Chinese: 两组的停药率都很高，但替格瑞洛组的停药率更高，这主要是由于出血和呼吸困难的风险增加。

English: prespecified analyses that were performed according to dose provided results consistent with those in the primary analysis .
Chinese: 根据剂量进行的预设分析提供的结果与主要分析中的结果一致。

English: however , the prevention of ischemic events did not translate into a lower risk of cardiovascular death , presumably because fatal myocardial infarction and fatal stroke accounted for only a small fraction of all deaths ( 4.4 % and 4.5 % , respectively ) .
Chinese: 然而，预防缺血性事件并未转化为心血管死亡风险的降低，这可能是因为致命性心肌梗死和致命性中风仅占所有死亡的一小部分（分别为 4.4% 和 4.5%）。

English: the observed 10 % lower incidence of ischemic events in the ticagrelor group , although significant , was less than the 16 % lower incidence assumed at the time of the trial design .
Chinese: 在替格瑞洛组观察到的缺血事件发生率降低了 10%，尽管意义重大，但低于试验设计时假定的 16% 发生率。

English: in THEMIS , dual antiplatelet therapy with ticagrelor was associated with a higher frequency of intracranial hemorrhage than placebo .
Chinese: 在 THEMIS 中，与安慰剂相比，使用替格瑞洛的双重抗血小板治疗与更高的颅内出血频率相关。

English: in the past , increases in the incidence of intracranial hemorrhage with dual antiplatelet therapy have been reported with ticagrelor , 7 clopidogrel , 24 and prasugrel.22,25
Chinese: 过去曾有报道称，使用替卡格雷 7 氯吡格雷 24 和普拉格雷 22, 25 进行双重抗血小板治疗会增加颅内出血的发生率。

English: the ongoing TWILIGHT trial is testing a similar strategy.32
Chinese: 正在进行的 TWILIGHT 试验正在测试一种类似的策略。 32

English: in conclusion , in patients with stable coronary artery disease and type 2 diabetes who did not have a history of myocardial infarction or stroke , ticagrelor plus aspirin was associated with a lower incidence of ischemic events than placebo plus aspirin at the expense of a higher incidence of major bleeding , including intracranial hemorrhage .
Chinese: 总之，在没有心肌梗死或中风病史的稳定型冠状动脉疾病和2型糖尿病患者中，替格瑞洛加阿司匹林与安慰剂加阿司匹林相比，缺血事件发生率较低，但代价是缺血事件发生率较高。大出血，包括颅内出血。

English: as a result , there was no significantly lower incidence of the exploratory composite outcome of efficacy and safety with ticagrelor than with placebo .
Chinese: 因此，与安慰剂相比，替格瑞洛的有效性和安全性探索性复合结果的发生率没有显着降低。

English: hypertension is a powerful risk factor for ischemic and hemorrhagic stroke .
Chinese: 高血压是缺血性和出血性中风的重要危险因素。

English: the effects of blood pressure ( BP ) values and trajectories in midlife on subsequent brain morphologic changes are less clear , as is the effect of midlife hypertension on later cognitive decline .
Chinese: 中年时期的血压 (BP) 值和轨迹对随后的大脑形态变化的影响不太清楚，中年高血压对后来认知能力下降的影响也是如此。

English: participants also underwent amyloid PET scanning and cognitive testing .
Chinese: 参与者还接受了淀粉样蛋白 PET 扫描和认知测试。

English: of 465 participants ( mean age , 71 ; 51 % men ) who completed imaging and cognitive testing , 18 % were amyloid positive on PET imaging and 29 % were carriers of the Apo E ℇ4 allele .
Chinese: 在完成成像和认知测试的 465 名参与者（平均年龄 71 岁；51% 为男性）中，18% 的淀粉样蛋白在 PET 成像中呈阳性，29% 是 Apo Eℇ4 等位基因的携带者。

English: at age 69 , mean BP was 132 / 73 mm Hg and 40 % of participants were taking antihypertensive medication .
Chinese: 69 岁时，平均血压为 132 / 73 毫米汞柱，40% 的参与者正在服用抗高血压药物。

English: higher systolic or diastolic BP at age 53 years , and higher BP increases between ages 43 and 53 , were associated with increases in later WMHV .
Chinese: 53 岁时较高的收缩压或舒张压以及 43 岁和 53 岁之间较高的血压增幅与后期 WMHV 的增高有关。

English: for every 10 mm Hg increase in systolic BP at age 53 , subsequent WMHV increased by 7 % ; for comparable increases in diastolic BP , WMHV increased by 15 % .
Chinese: 53 岁时收缩压每增加 10 毫米汞柱，随后的 WMHV 就会增加 7%；对于可比较的舒张压增加，WMHV 增加了 15%。

English: the greater the increase in BP between ages 36 and 43 , the smaller the hippocampal volume at ages 69 to 71 years .
Chinese: 36 岁至 43 岁之间血压升高越大，69 至 71 岁时海马体积越小。

English: absolute BP values or BP changes were not linked with amyloid positivity or overall cognitive scores .
Chinese: 绝对血压值或血压变化与淀粉样蛋白阳性或总体认知评分无关。

English: BP screening and control in early adulthood could have important benefits .
Chinese: 在成年早期筛查和控制血压可能有重要的好处。

English: these lesions are thought to represent small vessel disease , and accumulation of WMLs has been associated with cognitive impairment and gait disorders .
Chinese: 这些病变被认为代表小血管疾病，而 WMLs 的积累与认知障碍和步态障碍有关。

English: the objective of the substudy was to evaluate the effect of different BP treatments on the progression of WMLs of presumed ischemic origin .
Chinese: 该子研究的目的是评估不同 BP 治疗对推测为缺血性起源的 WML 进展的影响。

English: effect on brain volume was a secondary goal .
Chinese: 对脑容量的影响是次要目标。

English: neurologists should support achievement of lower BP targets .
Chinese: 神经科医生应该支持实现较低的血压目标。

English: participants were enrolled at a relatively advanced age ; it would be of interest to know if intensive BP control has greater benefits in midlife .
Chinese: 参加者年龄相对较大；了解强化 BP 控制是否对中年人有更大的益处将很有意义。

English: also , SPRINT excluded patients with diabetes mellitus and those with previous strokes .
Chinese: 此外，SPRINT 还排除了患有糖尿病和既往中风的患者。

English: because BMI does not differentiate between fat and lean body mass , researchers in another Mendelian randomization study have now ascertained whether fat per se is causally associated with depression .
Chinese: 由于 BMI 不能区分脂肪和瘦体重，另一项孟德尔随机研究的研究人员现已确定脂肪本身是否与抑郁症有因果关系。

English: the two data sources shared approximately 6.5 million single nucleotide polymorphisms ( SNPs ) .
Chinese: 这两个数据源共享大约 650 万个单核苷酸多态性 (SNP)。

English: conversely , depression was not a risk factor for any of the anthropometric measures .
Chinese: 相反，抑郁症不是任何人体测量指标的危险因素。

English: SNPs associated with short stature contributed causally but modestly to risk for depression .
Chinese: 与身材矮小相关的 SNP 对抑郁症的风险有一定的因果作用，但影响不大。

English: based on the reasonable assumption that SNPs associated with anthropometric traits are causal for those traits , these findings suggest that body fat mass contributes causally to the risk for depression .
Chinese: 基于与人体测量特征相关的 SNP 是这些特征的因果关系的合理假设，这些发现表明体脂肪量与抑郁症的风险有因果关系。

English: clinicians can be alert to these connections in assessing and managing patients struggling with weight and mood .
Chinese: 临床医生在评估和管理与体重和情绪作斗争的患者时可以警惕这些联系。

English: in the face of preeclampsia , a central clinical decision is when to plan delivery .
Chinese: 面对先兆子痫，一个主要的临床决定是何时计划分娩。

English: to assess delivery strategy , U.K. investigators randomized 900 women with preeclampsia without severe features ( median gestational age at diagnosis , 35.6 weeks ) to immediate delivery or expectant management .
Chinese: 为评估分娩策略，英国研究人员将 900 名没有严重特征（诊断时的中位孕龄为 35.6 周）的先兆子痫妇女随机分为立即分娩或期待治疗。

English: median gestational age at birth was 36.0 weeks ( immediate delivery ) and 36.7 weeks ( expectant management ) , and cesarean delivery rates were 55 % and 61 % , respectively .
Chinese: 出生时的中位胎龄为 36.0 周（立即分娩）和 36.7 周（期待治疗），剖宫产率分别为 55% 和 61%。

English: expectant management is an option if maternal blood pressure and laboratory testing are stable .
Chinese: 如果产妇血压和实验室检查稳定，期待治疗是一种选择。

English: immediate delivery is warranted if the preeclampsia progresses ( e.g. , rising maternal blood pressure , worrisome findings upon maternal or fetal testing ) or at the onset of preeclampsia with severe features .
Chinese: 如果先兆子痫进展（例如，母体血压升高，母体或胎儿检测结果令人担忧）或具有严重特征的先兆子痫发作，则需要立即分娩。

English: based on these results , increasing intake of PUFAs for preventing or treating diabetes is not recommended .
Chinese: 基于这些结果，不建议为了预防或治疗糖尿病而增加多不饱和脂肪酸的摄入量。

English: Obverse differences were noted for sedentary time .
Chinese: 久坐时间存在显着差异。

English: the maximum risk reductions occurred at 375 minutes of light activity and 24 minutes of vigorous activity daily .
Chinese: 最大的风险降低发生在每天 375 分钟的轻度活动和 24 分钟的剧烈活动中。

English: however , some residual confounding ( in which low levels of activity resulted in part from medical conditions that accelerate mortality ) seems likely in this analysis , despite statistical adjustment for some comorbidities .
Chinese: 然而，尽管对一些合并症进行了统计调整，但在该分析中似乎可能存在一些残留混杂因素（其中低水平的活动部分是由加速死亡率的医疗条件导致的）。

English: a retrospective study suggests that we should look at overall cardiovascular risk , regardless of baseline BP .
Chinese: 一项回顾性研究表明，无论基线血压如何，我们都应该关注总体心血管风险。

English: should treatment to lower blood pressure ( BP ) be initiated based on baseline BP , overall cardiovascular ( CV ) risk , or a combination of the two ?
Chinese: 是否应该根据基线血压、总体心血管 (CV) 风险或两者的组合来开始降低血压 (BP) 的治疗？

English: more patients were eligible for treatment based on high BP alone than with any of the other strategies ( 39 % vs. 22 % , 27 % , and 29 % ) .
Chinese: 与任何其他策略相比，更多的患者有资格接受仅基于高血压的治疗（39% 对 22%、27% 和 29%）。

English: these data suggest that treatment to lower BP is most efficient when it is targeted to patients with elevated CV risk , regardless of baseline BP .
Chinese: 这些数据表明，无论基线血压如何，当针对心血管风险升高的患者时，降低血压的治疗最有效。

English: the differences in secondary end points were generally in the same direction as those of the primary end point .
Chinese: 次要终点的差异与主要终点的差异大致相同。

English: there were no serious adverse events .
Chinese: 没有严重的不良事件。

English: Neurosteroids , which are synthesized from cholesterol in the brain , are potent modulators of GABA and glutamate.16
Chinese: 由大脑中的胆固醇合成的神经类固醇是 GABA 和谷氨酸的有效调节剂。 16

English: despite their steroid structure , their target activity and pharmacologic characteristics are distinct from those of glucocorticoids and differ in both genomic and nongenomic effects.17,18
Chinese: 尽管它们具有类固醇结构，但它们的目标活性和药理学特征与糖皮质激素不同，并且在基因组和非基因组效应方面也不同。 17,18

English: preclinical studies have shown that the naturally occurring neurosteroid allopregnanolone is a positive allosteric modulator of synaptic and extrasynaptic GABAA receptors that affects both phasic and tonic inhibition of neurons.16,19
Chinese: 临床前研究表明，天然存在的神经类固醇四氢孕酮是突触和突触外 GABAA 受体的正变构调节剂，可影响神经元的阶段性和强直性抑制。 16,19

English: with experimental chronic stress , however , levels of allopregnanolone in the brain decrease , and behavioral changes normalize after treatments that increase allopregnanolone levels.19,22,23
Chinese: 然而，随着实验性慢性应激，大脑中四氢孕酮的水平会降低，而在提高四氢孕酮水平的治疗后，行为变化会恢复正常。 19,22,23

English: reduced levels of allopregnanolone in the cerebrospinal fluid normalize after successful treatment of depression with antidepressants.24
Chinese: 在用抗抑郁药成功治疗抑郁症后，脑脊液中四氢孕酮水平的降低会恢复正常。 24

English: the results of the pilot trial are provided in the Supplementary Appendix , available at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 试点试验的结果见补充附录，补充附录可在 NEJM.org 获取。

English: this phase 2 trial was conducted at eight sites in the United States from April 2017 through October 2017 .
Chinese: 该 2 期试验于 2017 年 4 月至 2017 年 10 月在美国的八个地点进行。

English: a list of sites and principal investigators is provided in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录中提供了研究中心和主要研究者的列表。

English: approval was obtained from the institutional review board at each site , and written informed consent was obtained from each patient .
Chinese: 获得各研究中心机构审查委员会的批准，并获得每位患者的书面知情同意书。

English: confidentiality agreements exist between the authors and Sage Therapeutics .
Chinese: 作者与 Sage Therapeutics 之间存在保密协议。

English: we recruited patients from outpatient clinics and by using advertising materials approved by the institutional review boards .
Chinese: 我们从门诊诊所招募患者，并使用机构审查委员会批准的广告材料。

English: patients were admitted as inpatients for the first week of the trial to facilitate daily assessments .
Chinese: 患者在试验的第一周作为住院患者入院，以促进日常评估。

English: during the 4 weeks after the treatment period , primary psychiatrists or investigators could adjust the dose of existing antidepressants or prescribe new antidepressants for patients as appropriate .
Chinese: 在治疗期结束后的4周内，初级精神科医生或研究者可酌情调整现有抗抑郁药的剂量或开出新的抗抑郁药给患者。

English: the diagnosis of depression was made with the use of the Structured Clinical Interview for Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders , fifth edition , Axis I disorders.35
Chinese: 抑郁症的诊断是使用《精神疾病诊断和统计手册结构化临床访谈》第五版，Axis I disorders.35

English: patients were eligible to participate if they had been receiving stable doses of antidepressants for at least 30 days or if they were not taking antidepressants .
Chinese: 如果患者已经接受稳定剂量的抗抑郁药至少 30 天，或者如果他们没有服用抗抑郁药，则他们有资格参加。

English: a full list of inclusion and exclusion criteria is provided in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录中提供了包含和排除标准的完整列表。

English: safety was assessed on the basis of the frequency and severity of adverse events , vital signs , changes in clinical laboratory measurements , physical examinations , electrocardiography , the Stanford Sleepiness Scale , and assessment of suicidal ideation and behavior with the use of the Columbia Suicide Severity Rating Scale .
Chinese: 安全性的评估依据是不良事件的频率和严重程度、生命体征、临床实验室测量值的变化、身体检查、心电图、斯坦福嗜睡量表，以及使用哥伦比亚自杀严重程度等级对自杀意念和行为的评估。规模 。

English: continuous variables are reported as means and standard deviations , and categorical variables as numbers and percentages .
Chinese: 连续变量报告为均值和标准差，分类变量报告为数字和百分比。

English: statistical analyses were performed with the use of SAS software , version 9.3 ( SAS Institute ) .
Chinese: 使用 SAS 软件 9.3 版（SAS Institute）进行统计分析。

English: there was no plan for imputation of missing data , but sensitivity analyses were performed to assess the effect of missing data .
Chinese: 没有填补缺失数据的计划，但进行了敏感性分析以评估缺失数据的影响。

English: the statistical analysis plan did not include a provision for correction for multiplicity when the analyses of secondary end points were performed .
Chinese: 统计分析计划不包括在执行次要终点分析时对多重性进行校正的规定。

English: therefore , the results are reported as point estimates and unadjusted 95 % confidence intervals and should not be used to infer treatment effects .
Chinese: 因此，结果报告为点估计值和未调整的 95% 置信区间，不应用于推断治疗效果。

English: a total of 169 patients were screened , of whom 89 were enrolled and underwent randomization .
Chinese: 总共筛选了 169 名患者，其中 89 名被纳入并接受了随机分组。

English: results for secondary end points are shown in Table 2 .
Chinese: 表 2 显示了次要终点的结果。

English: there were no serious adverse events and no deaths during this trial .
Chinese: 在该试验期间没有严重的不良事件，也没有死亡。

English: subjective sleepiness , as assessed with the use of the Stanford Sleepiness Scale , was similar in the two groups .
Chinese: 使用斯坦福嗜睡量表评估的主观嗜睡在两组中相似。

English: no patients in the placebo group had dose reductions .
Chinese: 安慰剂组中没有患者剂量减少。

English: these findings may support a role for GABAA receptors in the pathophysiology of depression.4,38
Chinese: 这些发现可能支持 GABAA 受体在抑郁症病理生理学中的作用。 4,38

English: data were missing for approximately 5 % of patients in each group , but sensitivity analyses suggested that this did not alter the conclusions with respect to the primary end point of the trial .
Chinese: 每组中约有 5% 的患者数据缺失，但敏感性分析表明这不会改变试验主要终点的结论。

English: the current trial did not include an active comparator group , which limits comparison of the results with those of available antidepressants .
Chinese: 目前的试验不包括一个积极的比较组，这限制了结果与现有抗抑郁药的比较。

English: the diagnosis of atrial fibrillation ( AF ) requires an electrocardiogram ( ECG ) during an AF episode although structural atrial changes and grossly abnormal ECG findings such as left atrial enlargement can also point to AF .
Chinese: 心房颤动 (AF) 的诊断需要在 AF 发作期间进行心电图 (ECG)，但结构性心房变化和严重异常的 ECG 结果（如左心房扩大）也可能指向 AF。

English: however , if ECGs in normal sinus rhythm provided clues to the risk for AF , then more individuals could be evaluated closely for AF before the clinical diagnosis and receive treatment .
Chinese: 然而，如果正常窦性心律的 ECG 提供了 AF 风险的线索，那么更多的人可以在临床诊断和接受治疗之前仔细评估 AF。

English: these researchers hypothesized that more subtle ECG findings during normal sinus rhythm are also associated with AF .
Chinese: 这些研究人员假设在正常窦性心律期间更细微的心电图发现也与 AF 相关。

English: in a retrospective ECG database of 180,922 patients with 649,931 ECGs , machine learning through artificial intelligence ( AI ) was used to develop a predictive model for AF from a single , normal sinus rhythm ECG .
Chinese: 在一个包含 180,922 名患者和 649,931 个心电图的回顾性心电图数据库中，通过人工智能 (AI) 进行的机器学习被用于从单个正常窦性心律心电图开发 AF 预测模型。

English: approximately two thirds of ECGs were used for the training set , and the remainder were used for validation and testing .
Chinese: 大约三分之二的心电图用于训练集，其余用于验证和测试。

English: about 8 % of patients in the testing cohort had verified AF diagnoses , based on earlier ECGs .
Chinese: 根据早期的心电图，测试队列中约有 8% 的患者证实了 AF 诊断。

English: the AI algorithm performed quite well .
Chinese: AI算法表现相当不错。

English: the area under the curve of the receiver operating characteristic curve for detecting AF was 0.87 in the derivation and validation sets .
Chinese: 在推导和验证集中，用于检测 AF 的接受者操作特征曲线的曲线下面积为 0.87。

English: when applied to the testing group , the sensitivity was 79.0 % , the specificity was 79.5 % , and the overall accuracy was 79.4 % .
Chinese: 应用于试验组时，灵敏度为79.0%，特异度为79.5%，总准确率为79.4%。

English: AF can be intermittent for many years and is often not diagnosed until patients have progressed to longer episodes .
Chinese: AF 可以间歇性持续多年，并且通常直到患者发展到更长时间的发作时才被诊断出来。

English: diagnosing AF earlier would allow treatment that could reduce the risk for cryptogenic stroke .
Chinese: 早期诊断 AF 将允许进行治疗以降低隐源性中风的风险。

English: the AI algorithm developed here is reasonably accurate .
Chinese: 这里开发的 AI 算法相当准确。

English: certainly , at this time , treatment decisions should not be based on the algorithm , but it would enable more intense ECG monitoring for people predicted to be at heightened AF risk .
Chinese: 当然，在这个时候，治疗决定不应该基于算法，但它可以对预测为 AF 风险增加的人进行更严格的 ECG 监测。

English: cognitive activities throughout the lifespan and social activities in later life were associated with lower risk .
Chinese: 整个生命周期的认知活动和晚年的社会活动都与较低的风险相关。

English: this information , along with years of education , was used to construct a cognitive reserve score .
Chinese: 此信息连同受教育年限被用于构建认知储备分数。

English: after multivariable adjustment , participants in the highest tertile of cognitive reserve scores had a 39 % lower risk for dementia diagnosis than those in the lowest tertile .
Chinese: 多变量调整后，认知储备分数最高三分位数的参与者患痴呆症的风险比最低三分位数的参与者低 39%。

English: the risk reduction was significant even in participants with high Alzheimer disease and vascular pathologies .
Chinese: 即使在患有高阿尔茨海默病和血管病变的参与者中，风险降低也很显着。

English: comment - NEUROLOGY
Chinese: 评论 - 神经病学

English: participating in cognitive and social activities throughout the lifespan may decrease dementia risk , even in the presence of Alzheimer disease and vascular pathologies on autopsy .
Chinese: 在整个生命周期中参与认知和社会活动可能会降低痴呆风险，即使在尸检中存在阿尔茨海默病和血管病变。

English: cognitive activities during nearly the entire lifespan that were queried in the study included reading , writing letters , and visiting the library .
Chinese: 研究中询问的几乎整个生命周期的认知活动包括阅读、写信和访问图书馆。

English: a machine learning technique was noninferior to traditional immunohistochemistry in predicting molecular biomarker expression .
Chinese: 机器学习技术在预测分子生物标志物表达方面不劣于传统的免疫组织化学。

English: the pathological review of tumor samples , even for common molecular biomarkers such as estrogen receptor ( ER ) , progesterone receptor ( PR ) , and human epidermal growth factor receptor 2 ( HER2 ) , is time consuming .
Chinese: 肿瘤样本的病理检查，即使是常见的分子生物标志物，如雌激素受体 (ER)、孕激素受体 (PR) 和人表皮生长因子受体 2 (HER2)，也是非常耗时的。

English: moreover , there is not always concordance between pathologists on the interpretation of samples .
Chinese: 此外，病理学家之间对样本的解释并不总是一致的。

English: for example , it has been estimated that there is a discrepancy of up to 19 % for ER estimation between central laboratories and local pathology laboratories .
Chinese: 例如，据估计，中心实验室和地方病理实验室之间的 ER 估计差异高达 19%。

English: artificial intelligence ( AI ) and machine learning technologies are being applied to address this variation as well as to improve reliability and add efficiency .
Chinese: 人工智能 (AI) 和机器学习技术正被应用于应对这种变化，并提高可靠性和效率。

English: currently , such technology can differentiate between cancerous and noncancerous tissue as well as determine presence of metastases in lymph nodes and perform tumor grading .
Chinese: 目前，这种技术可以区分癌组织和非癌组织，以及确定淋巴结中是否存在转移并进行肿瘤分级。

English: histology and biomarkers were found to be significantly correlated with all 19 assessed biomarkers , including most clinically relevant ER , PR , and HER2 .
Chinese: 发现组织学和生物标志物与所有 19 种评估的生物标志物显着相关，包括大多数临床相关的 ER、PR 和 HER2。

English: for approximately half of the patients , the machine learning technique was able to predict biomarker expression with noninferiority to immunohistochemistry ( IHC ) in two validation cohorts with positive predictive values of 97 % and 98 % .
Chinese: 对于大约一半的患者，机器学习技术能够预测两个验证队列中的生物标志物表达，且不劣于免疫组织化学 (IHC)，阳性预测值为 97% 和 98%。

English: AI and machine learning are emerging technologies that are finding a role in many aspects of modern life , including medicine .
Chinese: 人工智能和机器学习是新兴技术，正在现代生活的许多方面发挥作用，包括医学。

English: these data represent a first effort to utilize a training set to gauge utility for pathological review of samples .
Chinese: 这些数据代表了第一次尝试利用训练集来衡量样本病理检查的效用。

English: large doses of ibuprofen are often used for emergency department ( ED ) patients , despite evidence that doses above 400 mg increase rates of side effects without improving pain control .
Chinese: 大剂量的布洛芬通常用于急诊科 (ED) 患者，尽管有证据表明超过 400 毫克的剂量会增加副作用的发生率而不会改善疼痛控制。

English: to test the hypothesis that the analgesic ceiling of ibuprofen is 400 mg in an ED population , researchers randomized a convenience sample of 225 adults with acute pain to doses of 400 mg , 600 mg , or 800 mg .
Chinese: 为了检验布洛芬在急诊人群中的镇痛上限为 400 毫克的假设，研究人员随机抽取了 225 名患有急性疼痛的成年人的方便样本，分别服用 400 毫克、600 毫克或 800 毫克的剂量。

English: most patients had musculoskeletal or cutaneous pain .
Chinese: 大多数患者有肌肉骨骼或皮肤疼痛。

English: at 60 minutes , mean pain scores and the change from baseline were similar among groups ( mean scores at 60 minutes , 4.4 , 4.5 , and 4.5 , respectively ) .
Chinese: 在 60 分钟时，各组的平均疼痛评分和相对于基线的变化相似（60 分钟时的平均评分分别为 4.4、4.5 和 4.5）。

English: no side effects were reported .
Chinese: 没有副作用的报道。

English: although this study was otherwise well done , patients were followed for only 60 minutes , which minimizes the ability to identify adverse events .
Chinese: 尽管这项研究在其他方面做得很好，但仅对患者进行了 60 分钟的随访，这最大限度地降低了识别不良事件的能力。

English: the authors point out that a single dose of ibuprofen at any of these doses is unlikely to cause harm , but prescriptions for ongoing treatment may be more problematic .
Chinese: 作者指出，任何这些剂量的单剂量布洛芬都不太可能造成伤害，但持续治疗的处方可能会有更多问题。

English: since there is consistent evidence that doses above 400 mg do not provide additional pain control , we should avoid prescribing higher doses of ibuprofen .
Chinese: 由于有一致的证据表明超过 400 毫克的剂量不能提供额外的疼痛控制，我们应该避免开出更高剂量的布洛芬。

English: daily calcium intake averaged 469 mg in the lowest quintile and 1361 mg in the highest quintile and changed only minimally over time .
Chinese: 最低五分位数的每日钙摄入量平均为 469 毫克，最高五分位数的平均每日钙摄入量为 1361 毫克，并且随着时间的推移变化很小。

English: at baseline , BMD was similar across all quintiles of calcium intake .
Chinese: 在基线时，BMD 在钙摄入量的所有五分位数中是相似的。

English: at 6 years , gradual decline in BMD was virtually identical in all quintiles .
Chinese: 在 6 岁时，BMD 的逐渐下降在所有五分位数中几乎是相同的。

English: all analyses were adjusted for numerous potentially confounding variables .
Chinese: 所有分析都针对许多潜在的混杂变量进行了调整。

English: although this study was not a randomized trial of different amounts of dietary calcium , it provides fairly compelling evidence that high intake of dietary calcium does not protect against bone loss in older osteopenic women .
Chinese: 尽管这项研究不是对不同膳食钙含量的随机试验，但它提供了相当有说服力的证据，证明高膳食钙摄入量并不能防止骨质疏松的老年女性骨质流失。

English: researchers evaluated performance of these tools in a retrospective chart review of 380 patients with malignancy at a single oncology emergency department who underwent computed tomographic pulmonary angiography ( CTPA ) .
Chinese: 研究人员在一个肿瘤急诊科对 380 名接受了计算机断层扫描肺血管造影 (CTPA) 的恶性肿瘤患者进行了回顾性图表审查，评估了这些工具的性能。

English: overall , PE was diagnosed in 11 % of patients and ACP guidelines were followed in 56 % of patients .
Chinese: 总体而言，11% 的患者被诊断为 PE，56% 的患者遵循了 ACP 指南。

English: the use of PERC would have resulted in avoidance of further testing in only few patients ( 3.4 % ) .
Chinese: 只有少数患者 (3.4%) 使用 PERC 可以避免进一步检测。

English: only one PE would have been missed had the guidelines been followed ( sensitivity 97 % , negative predictive value 99 % ) .
Chinese: 如果遵循指南（敏感性 97%，阴性预测值 99%），只会漏掉一次 PE。

English: if the association is causal , the absolute incidence is exceedingly rare .
Chinese: 如果关联是因果关系，则绝对发生率极其罕见。

English: patients with diabetes were excluded , given the strong associations between diabetes and both antibiotic use and neuropathy .
Chinese: 糖尿病患者被排除在外，因为糖尿病与抗生素使用和神经病变之间存在密切关联。

English: fluoroquinolone exposure within 30 days was associated with excess risk for incident peripheral neuropathy compared with nonexposure ( rate ratio , 1.47 ) ; risk persisted when the window of exposure was extended to 180 days before diagnosis of neuropathy .
Chinese: 与未接触氟喹诺酮相比，30 天内接触氟喹诺酮类药物与发生周围神经病变的风险增加相关（比率 1.47）；当暴露窗口延长至神经病变诊断前 180 天时，风险仍然存在。

English: analyses were adjusted for alcohol abuse and several diseases and medications known to cause peripheral neuropathy .
Chinese: 分析针对酗酒和已知会导致周围神经病变的几种疾病和药物进行了调整。

English: these findings strengthen the case for an association between fluoroquinolones and neuropathy ; however , limitations include the possibility of residual confounding and inaccurate diagnosis of peripheral neuropathy in this primary care database .
Chinese: 这些发现加强了氟喹诺酮类药物与神经病之间的关联；然而，局限性包括在这个初级保健数据库中可能存在残留混杂和周围神经病变的不准确诊断。

English: if this association is causal , it appears to be a very rare adverse event .
Chinese: 如果这种关联是因果关系，那么这似乎是一种非常罕见的不良事件。

English: in phase 2 studies involving patients with chronic kidney disease , roxadustat increased levels of endogenous erythropoietin to within or near the physiologic range , along with increasing hemoglobin levels and improving iron homeostasis .
Chinese: 在涉及慢性肾病患者的 2 期研究中，roxadustat 将内源性促红细胞生成素水平提高到生理范围内或接近生理范围，同时增加血红蛋白水平并改善铁稳态。

English: additional data are needed regarding the efficacy and safety of roxadustat for the treatment of anemia in patients with chronic kidney disease who are not undergoing dialysis .
Chinese: 需要更多关于罗沙司他治疗未接受透析的慢性肾病患者贫血的疗效和安全性的数据。

English: all the patients had a hemoglobin level of 7.0 to 10.0 g per deciliter at baseline .
Chinese: 所有患者的基线血红蛋白水平均为 7.0 至 10.0 g/dL。

English: the primary end point was the mean change from baseline in the hemoglobin level , averaged over weeks 7 through 9 .
Chinese: 主要终点是血红蛋白水平相对于基线的平均变化，是第 7 周到第 9 周的平均值。

English: the mean reduction from baseline in the hepcidin level ( associated with greater iron availability ) was 56.14 ± 63.40 ng per milliliter in the roxadustat group and 15.10 ± 48.06 ng per milliliter in the placebo group .
Chinese: roxadustat 组铁调素水平（与更高的铁可用性相关）相对于基线的平均降低为 56.14 ± 63.40 ng/mL，安慰剂组为 15.10 ± 48.06 ng/mL。

English: the reduction from baseline in the total cholesterol level was 40.6 mg per deciliter in the roxadustat group and 7.7 mg per deciliter in the placebo group .
Chinese: 罗沙司他组总胆固醇水平较基线降低 40.6 毫克/分升，安慰剂组降低 7.7 毫克/分升。

English: hyperkalemia and metabolic acidosis occurred more frequently in the roxadustat group than in the placebo group .
Chinese: 与安慰剂组相比，罗沙司他组高钾血症和代谢性酸中毒的发生率更高。

English: in Chinese patients with chronic kidney disease who were not undergoing dialysis , those in the roxadustat group had a higher mean hemoglobin level than those in the placebo group after 8 weeks .
Chinese: 在未接受透析的中国慢性肾病患者中，8 周后，roxadustat 组患者的平均血红蛋白水平高于安慰剂组患者。

English: chronic kidney disease is a global public health challenge that affects approximately 10 % of the population worldwide , including 120 million people in China.1
Chinese: 慢性肾病是全球公共卫生挑战，影响全球约 10 % 的人口，其中包括中国的 1.2 亿人。 1

English: in China , this situation is reflected by low hemoglobin levels in patients who initiate dialysis , with mean levels of 7.3 g per deciliter reported in Guangzhou , 8.2 g per deciliter in Beijing , and 7.7 g per deciliter in Shanghai.8,9
Chinese: 在中国，这种情况反映在开始透析的患者血红蛋白水平较低，广州报告的平均水平为每分升 7.3 克，北京为每分升 8.2 克，上海为每分升 7.7 克。 8,9

English: among the patients who initiated dialysis in rural China , those with a mean ( ± SD ) hemoglobin level of 5.9 ± 4.7 g per deciliter had twice the rates of heart failure and death as those living in urban areas , who had a mean level of 8.4 ± 4.5 g per deciliter ; in these two groups , rates of heart failure were 34.4 % and 16.2 % , respectively , and rates of death were 42.9 % and 21.9 % , respectively.10
Chinese: 在中国农村开始透析的患者中，平均 ( ± SD ) 血红蛋白水平为 5.9 ± 4.7 g/dL 的患者的心力衰竭和死亡率是生活在城市地区的患者的两倍，后者的平均水平为 8.4 ± 4.5 克每分升；在这两组中，心衰率分别为 34.4 % 和 16.2 % ，死亡率分别为 42.9 % 和 21.9 % 10。

English: the trial was conducted in accordance with the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki , Chinese Good Clinical Practice , and the International Conference on Harmonization E6 guidelines .
Chinese: 该试验是根据赫尔辛基宣言、中国临床试验质量管理规范和国际协调会议 E6 指南的原则进行的。

English: the first two authors designed the trial in collaboration with representatives of the sponsor , FibroGen ; company representatives were responsible for the collection and analysis of the data .
Chinese: 前两位作者与申办方 FibroGen 的代表合作设计了该试验；公司代表负责数据的收集和分析。

English: all the authors contributed to the analysis and interpretation of the data and to the conduct of the trial , along with having full access to the data and analyses and full review of the manuscript .
Chinese: 所有作者都对数据的分析和解释以及试验的实施做出了贡献，同时能够完全访问数据和分析以及对手稿进行全面审查。

English: all the authors vouch for the completeness and accuracy of the data and for the fidelity of the trial to the protocol ( available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org ) .
Chinese: 所有作者保证数据的完整性和准确性，以及试验对方案的忠实度（与本文全文可在 NEJM.org 获取）。

English: eligible patients were between the ages of 18 and 75 years , had chronic kidney disease of stage 3 to 5 , and were not currently undergoing dialysis .
Chinese: 符合条件的患者年龄在 18 至 75 岁之间，患有 3 至 5 期慢性肾病，目前未接受透析。

English: during screening , the mean of the two most recent hemoglobin values was in the range of 7.0 g per deciliter to less than 10.0 g per deciliter in all the patients . ( details regarding inclusion and exclusion criteria are provided in Table S1 in the Supplementary Appendix , available at NEJM.org. )
Chinese: 在筛选期间，所有患者的两个最近血红蛋白值的平均值在每分升 7.0 克到低于每分升 10.0 克的范围内。 （有关纳入和排除标准的详细信息见补充附录表 S1，补充附录可在 NEJM.org 获取。）

English: the dose of roxadustat was escalated every 4 weeks to maintain a hemoglobin level ranging from 10.0 to 12.0 g per deciliter ( Table S2 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 罗沙司他的剂量每 4 周增加一次，以将血红蛋白水平维持在 10.0 至 12.0 g/dL（补充附录表 S2）。

English: the adjustment of the placebo dose was carried out in the same manner .
Chinese: 安慰剂剂量的调整同法进行。

English: investigators were asked to record abnormal , clinically significant laboratory results , physical examination findings , and electrocardiographic results as adverse events if such findings were deemed to meet the criteria for adverse events .
Chinese: 研究人员被要求将异常的、具有临床意义的实验室结果、体格检查结果和心电图结果记录为不良事件，如果这些发现被认为符合不良事件的标准。

English: we performed an analysis of covariance to estimate and compare the difference between the groups in the change from baseline in the hemoglobin level , with missing data handled with the use of multiple imputations in a sensitivity analysis .
Chinese: 我们进行了协方差分析，以估计和比较各组之间血红蛋白水平相对于基线的变化差异，并在敏感性分析中使用多重插补处理缺失数据。

English: we performed an analysis of covariance to calculate the change from baseline in hepcidin at week 9 .
Chinese: 我们进行了协方差分析，以计算第 9 周铁调素相对于基线的变化。

English: we report the values for the secondary analyses as point estimates and 95 % confidence intervals .
Chinese: 我们将二次分析的值报告为点估计值和 95% 置信区间。

English: the confidence intervals have not been adjusted for multiple comparisons , so inferences drawn from them may not be reproducible .
Chinese: 置信区间未针对多重比较进行调整，因此从中得出的推论可能无法重现。

English: of these patients , 2 did not receive a trial regimen , leaving 152 in the safety population .
Chinese: 在这些患者中，有 2 名未接受试验方案，剩下 152 名在安全人群中。

English: the baseline characteristics were similar in the two groups ( Table 1 ) .
Chinese: 两组的基线特征相似（表 1）。

English: the mean baseline hemoglobin level was 8.9 ± 0.8 g per deciliter in the roxadustat group and 8.9 ± 0.7 g per deciliter in the placebo group .
Chinese: 罗沙司他组的平均基线血红蛋白水平为每分升 8.9 ± 0.8 克，安慰剂组为每分升 8.9 ± 0.7 克。

English: of note , 82 of 152 patients ( 54 % ) had a transferrin saturation of 20 % or more , and 58 patients ( 38 % ) had a ferritin level of 200 μg per liter or more .
Chinese: 值得注意的是，152 名患者中有 82 名 (54%) 的转铁蛋白饱和度为 20% 或更高，58 名患者 (38%) 的铁蛋白水平为 200 μg/L 或更高。

English: randomized PHASE
Chinese: 随机阶段

English: rescue therapy was administered to 3 patients ( 3 % ) in the roxadustat group and 6 patients ( 12 % ) in the placebo group ( hazard ratio , 0.11 ; 95 % CI , 0.02 to 0.51 ) .
Chinese: 对罗沙司他组的 3 名患者 (3%) 和安慰剂组的 6 名患者 (12%) 进行了挽救治疗（风险比，0.11；95% CI，0.02 至 0.51）。

English: hepcidin and Iron Levels
Chinese: 铁调素和铁水平

English: among patients in the roxadustat group , the serum iron level was clinically stable during the randomized phase and did not differ significantly from the level in the placebo group , despite robust erythropoiesis ( Table 2 ) .
Chinese: 在罗沙司他组的患者中，血清铁水平在随机阶段临床稳定，与安慰剂组的水平无显着差异，尽管红细胞生成强劲（表 2）。

English: in the roxadustat group , transferrin levels and total iron binding capacity increased , with a temporary decrease in the transferrin saturation from 20.6 % to 15.6 % at week 9 during a period of increased iron utilization in which the mean increase in hemoglobin was 1.9 g per deciliter .
Chinese: 在roxadustat组中，转铁蛋白水平和总铁结合力增加，转铁蛋白饱和度在第9周从20.6 %暂时下降至15.6 %，期间铁利用增加，血红蛋白平均增加1.9 g/dL。 .

English: in the placebo group , iron levels and related measures on average were stable during the randomized phase .
Chinese: 在安慰剂组中，铁水平和相关指标在随机阶段平均保持稳定。

English: cholesterol Levels
Chinese: 胆固醇水平

English: at baseline , the mean total cholesterol level was 172.8 ± 45.8 mg per deciliter ( 4.5 ± 1.2 mmol per liter ) in the roxadustat group and 181.4 ± 49.0 mg per deciliter ( 4.7 ± 1.3 mmol per liter ) in the placebo group .
Chinese: 基线时，罗沙司他组的平均总胆固醇水平为 172.8 ± 45.8 毫克每分升（4.5 ± 1.2 毫摩尔每升），安慰剂组为 181.4 ± 49.0 毫克每分升（4.7 ± 1.3 毫摩尔每升）。

English: safety and Adverse Events
Chinese: 安全和不良事件

English: one patient in each group discontinued participation in the trial because of hyperkalemia .
Chinese: 每组中有一名患者因高钾血症而停止参与试验。

English: local laboratory values were not collected .
Chinese: 未收集当地实验室值。

English: in the roxadustat group , the percentages of patients with a serum bicarbonate level of 21 mmol per liter or less were 92 % at baseline and 91 % at 9 weeks .
Chinese: 在罗沙司他组中，血清碳酸氢盐水平为 21 毫摩尔/升或更低的患者百分比在基线时为 92%，在 9 周时为 91%。

English: in the placebo group , the percentages were 96 % at baseline and 89 % at 9 weeks ( Table S4 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 在安慰剂组中，该百分比在基线时为 96%，在 9 周时为 89%（补充附录表 S4）。

English: serious adverse events , which were consistent with those generally seen in patients with chronic kidney disease , were reported in 9 patients ( 9 % ) in the roxadustat group and in 6 patients ( 12 % ) in the placebo group ( Table 3 ) .
Chinese: 罗沙司他组 9 名患者 (9%) 和安慰剂组 6 名患者 (12%) 报告了与慢性肾病患者常见的严重不良事件（表 3）。

English: there were no deaths during the randomized phase of the trial .
Chinese: 在试验的随机阶段没有死亡。

English: an increase in the level of alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) or aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) occurred in 2 patients in the roxadustat group and 1 patient in the placebo group ( 2 % in each group ) .
Chinese: 丙氨酸氨基转移酶 (ALT) 或天冬氨酸氨基转移酶 (AST) 水平升高发生在罗沙司他组 2 名患者和安慰剂组 1 名患者（每组 2%）。

English: in the roxadustat group , 1 patient who had a grade 1 elevation in ALT and AST had a spontaneous normalization in the level without any change in the drug regimen ; a second patient had a grade 2 elevation in ALT and AST that was reported 2 days after receipt of the last dose of roxadustat during the trial while the patient was receiving concomitant medications known to be associated with an elevation in liver enzyme levels .
Chinese: 在罗沙司他组中，1 名 ALT 和 AST 出现 1 级升高的患者在药物治疗方案没有任何变化的情况下自发恢复正常；第二名患者的 ALT 和 AST 出现 2 级升高，在试验期间接受最后一剂 roxadustat 后 2 天报告，当时该患者正在接受已知与肝酶水平升高相关的伴随药物治疗。

English: among the patients who had initially received placebo , the mean hemoglobin level increased from baseline by 2.0 ± 1.5 g per deciliter after crossover to receive roxadustat ; 31 of 43 patients ( 72 % ) had a hemoglobin level of more than 11.0 g per deciliter , and 37 ( 86 % ) had a hemoglobin level of 10.0 g per deciliter or more during weeks 23 through 27 .
Chinese: 在最初接受安慰剂的患者中，平均血红蛋白水平在交叉接受罗沙司他后较基线增加了 2.0 ± 1.5 g/dL； 43 名患者中有 31 名 (72%) 的血红蛋白水平超过 11.0 g/dL，37 名 (86%) 在第 23 至 27 周期间血红蛋白水平为 10.0 g/dL 或更高。

English: the primary efficacy analysis showed a significantly larger increase in the hemoglobin level from baseline over weeks 7 to 9 in the roxadustat group than in the placebo group ( an increase of 1.9 ± 1.2 g per deciliter vs. a decrease of 0.4 ± 0.8 g per deciliter ) .
Chinese: 主要疗效分析显示，与安慰剂组相比，在第 7 周至第 9 周期间，罗沙司他组的血红蛋白水平相对于基线的增幅明显更大（增加 1.9 ± 1.2 g/dL 对比减少 0.4 ± 0.8 g/dL ) 。

English: similarly , other hemoglobin end points , such as the percentage of patients who had a hemoglobin response ( i.e. , an increase of ≥ 1.0 g per deciliter from baseline ) or who did not receive rescue therapy , were greater in the roxadustat group than in the placebo group .
Chinese: 类似地，其他血红蛋白终点，例如有血红蛋白反应（即从基线增加≥1.0 g/dL）或未接受挽救治疗的患者百分比，罗沙司他组高于安慰剂组。团体 。

English: in spite of the robust erythropoiesis and the restriction of intravenous administration of iron in the roxadustat group , serum iron levels remained stable .
Chinese: 尽管 roxadustat 组红细胞生成旺盛且静脉注射铁剂受到限制，但血清铁水平仍保持稳定。

English: we found that in addition to the erythropoietic effects of roxadustat , the drug was associated with reduced levels of hepcidin and cholesterol .
