English: eligible participants were previously untreated patients with CLL or the small lymphocytic lymphoma ( SLL ) subtype of CLL who were 70 years of age or younger and who would be appropriate candidates for treatment according to the International Workshop on Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia ( IWCLL ) Working Group criteria ( see the Supplementary Appendix , available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org ) .16
Chinese: 符合条件的参与者是以前未经治疗的 CLL 或小淋巴细胞淋巴瘤 ( SLL ) 亚型 CLL 患者，年龄不超过 70 岁，并且根据国际慢性淋巴细胞白血病研讨会 ( IWCLL ) 工作组标准，他们是合适的治疗候选人（见补充附录，与本文全文可在 NEJM.org 获取）.16

English: comprehensive eligibility criteria are listed in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录中列出了全面的资格标准。

English: the trial protocol ( available at NEJM.org ) was approved by the National Cancer Institute ( NCI ) central institutional review board and local institutional review boards as required by participating institutions .
Chinese: 试验方案（可在 NEJM.org 获取）根据参与机构的要求获得国家癌症研究所 (NCI) 中央机构审查委员会和地方机构审查委员会的批准。

English: the trial was conducted in accordance with the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki .
Chinese: 审判是按照赫尔辛基宣言的原则进行的。

English: the authors reviewed and approved the manuscript for submission for publication and vouch for the accuracy and completeness of the data and for the adherence of the trial to the protocol .
Chinese: 作者审阅并批准投稿发表，并保证数据的准确性和完整性以及试验对方案的依从性。

English: ibrutinib was provided by Pharmacyclics ( a subsidiary of AbbVie ) under a cooperative research and development agreement with the NCI .
Chinese: ibrutinib 由 Pharmacyclics（AbbVie 的子公司）根据与 NCI 的合作研发协议提供。

English: patients who were randomly assigned to the chemoimmunotherapy group received six cycles of intravenous fludarabine ( at a dose of 25 mg per square meter ) and cyclophosphamide ( 250 mg per square meter ) on days 1 through 3 with rituximab ( 50 mg per square meter on day 1 of cycle 1 ; 325 mg per square meter on day 2 of cycle 1 ; and 500 mg per square meter on day 1 of cycles 2 through 6 ) every 28 days .
Chinese: 被随机分配到化学免疫治疗组的患者在第 1 天到第 3 天接受了六个周期的静脉注射氟达拉滨（剂量为每平方米 25 毫克）和环磷酰胺（每平方米 250 毫克）和利妥昔单抗（第 5 天每平方米 50 毫克）第 1 周期第 1 次；第 1 周期第 2 天每平方米 325 毫克；第 2 至第 6 周期第 1 天每平方米 500 毫克）每 28 天一次。

English: full treatment information , including instructions regarding dose delays and modifications , is provided in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录中提供了完整的治疗信息，包括有关剂量延迟和修改的说明。

English: all patients received allopurinol ( 300 mg orally once daily ) on days 1 through 14 of cycle 1 .
Chinese: 所有患者在第 1 周期的第 1 天到第 14 天接受别嘌醇（300 毫克，每天口服一次）。

English: growth factor support was permitted per guidelines of the American Society of Clinical Oncology ( see the Supplementary Appendix ) .18
Chinese: 美国临床肿瘤学会指南允许生长因子支持（见补充附录）.18

English: assessments OF SAFETY AND RESPONSE
Chinese: 安全和响应评估

English: all adverse events were graded according to the NCI Common Toxicity Criteria , version 4 .
Chinese: 所有不良事件均根据 NCI 通用毒性标准第 4 版进行分级。

English: for the purposes of dose modification , adverse events involving platelet count and hemoglobin level were graded according to the IWCLL CLL Working Group grading scale ( see the Supplementary Appendix ) .16
Chinese: 为了调整剂量，涉及血小板计数和血红蛋白水平的不良事件根据 IWCLL CLL 工作组分级量表（见补充附录）进行分级。16

English: responses were graded according to the 2008 IWCLL Working Group criteria that were in effect at the start of the trial16 along with the 2018 modification that included the category of complete response with incomplete bone marrow recovery19 ( see the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 根据 2008 年 IWCLL 工作组标准对反应进行分级，该标准在试验开始时生效 16 以及 2018 年的修改，其中包括完全反应和不完全骨髓恢复的类别 19（见补充附录）。

English: bone marrow biopsies were performed at enrollment and at 12 months to assess response , with central review by an expert hematopathologist ( see the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 骨髓活检在入组时和 12 个月时进行，以评估反应，并由血液病理学家专家进行集中审查（见补充附录）。

English: computed tomographic ( CT ) scans of the chest , abdomen , and pelvis were performed in all patients at enrollment and at the evaluation for response at 12 months .
Chinese: 在入组时和 12 个月时的反应评估时，对所有患者进行了胸部、腹部和骨盆的计算机断层扫描 (CT)。

English: patients alive without documented progression had their data censored at the last disease assessment .
Chinese: 没有记录到进展的存活患者在最后一次疾病评估时对他们的数据进行了审查。

English: futility rules for harm and inefficacy were included ( see the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 伤害和无效的无效规则也包括在内（见补充附录）。

English: patients who were alive had their data censored at the last date of contact .
Chinese: 活着的患者在最后一次联系时的数据会被删减。

English: descriptive statistics were used to summarize the characteristics of the patients .
Chinese: 描述性统计用于总结患者的特征。

English: from March 2014 through June 2016 , the trial enrolled 529 patients ( Table 1 ) .
Chinese: 从 2014 年 3 月到 2016 年 6 月，该试验招募了 529 名患者（表 1）。

English: the mean number of treatment cycles among all the patients in the chemoimmunotherapy group who started therapy was five ; 67.1 % of these patients ( 106 of 158 patients ) received six cycles .
Chinese: 化学免疫治疗组开始治疗的所有患者的平均治疗周期数为五个；这些患者中有 67.1%（158 名患者中的 106 名）接受了六个周期。

English: all adverse events of grade 3 or higher that were reported in more than 2 % of the patients in either group are summarized in Table 2 .
Chinese: 表 2 总结了两组中超过 2% 的患者报告的所有 3 级或更高级别的不良事件。

English: a detailed summary of all adverse events of grade 3 or higher that were attributed by the treating physician to trial treatment is provided in Table S7 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录表 S7 提供了治疗医师归因于试验治疗的所有 3 级或更高级别不良事件的详细总结。

English: causes of death are listed in Table S6 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 死因列于补充附录表 S6。

English: the proportion of patients who had an adverse event of grade 3 or higher was similar in the two groups .
Chinese: 两组发生 3 级或更高级别不良事件的患者比例相似。

English: three previous trials have shown a survival advantage with one therapy over another among patients with previously untreated CLL.1,2,15
Chinese: 之前的三项试验表明，在先前未治疗的 CLL 患者中，一种疗法比另一种疗法具有生存优势。 1,2,15

English: an age of 65 years or older , history of hypertension , and history of atrial fibrillation are risk factors for the development of atrial fibrillation during ibrutinib treatment , 25 which suggests that the lower incidence of cardiac complications in the E1912 trial may be due to the younger patient population ( median age , 58 years ) relative to a pooled analysis of patients participating in other trials ( median age , 67 years ) .25
Chinese: 年龄在 65 岁或以上、高血压病史和房颤病史是依鲁替尼治疗期间发生房颤的危险因素 25 ，这表明 E1912 试验中心脏并发症发生率较低可能是由于年龄较小患者人群（中位年龄，58 岁）相对于参与其他试验的患者（中位年龄，67 岁）的汇总分析 .25

English: unexplained or unwitnessed death , which can be due to cardiac arrhythmias , was observed in only 1 patient in the E1912 trial , as compared with 11 of 361 patients ( 3 % ) treated with ibrutinib in the Alliance 041202 trial.24
Chinese: 在 E1912 试验中仅观察到 1 例患者因心律失常导致不明原因或无人目击的死亡，而在 Alliance 041202 试验中接受依鲁替尼治疗的 361 例患者中有 11 例 ( 3 % )。 24

English: as of the interim analysis , one case of nonfatal cardiac arrest has been observed in the E1912 trial .
Chinese: 截至中期分析，在 E1912 试验中观察到一例非致命性心脏骤停。

English: several possible factors may contribute to these findings .
Chinese: 几个可能的因素可能促成这些发现。

English: first , more efficacious therapy may contribute more to survival prospects in younger patients with CLL with fewer coexisting conditions , who are less likely than older patients to die from unrelated causes .
Chinese: 首先，更有效的治疗可能对伴有较少合并症的年轻 CLL 患者的生存前景有更大贡献，与老年患者相比，他们死于无关原因的可能性更小。

English: it is unclear whether these findings can be extrapolated to patients 70 years of age or younger with previously untreated CLL .
Chinese: 目前尚不清楚这些发现是否可以外推至 70 岁或以下的既往未治疗 CLL 患者。

English: clinicians often prescribe antibiotics to patients with exacerbations of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) - especially those with increased sputum volume and discoloration .
Chinese: 临床医生经常给慢性阻塞性肺疾病 (COPD) 恶化的患者开抗生素处方，尤其是那些痰量增加和变色的患者。

English: however , the evidence supporting antibiotic therapy is mixed .
Chinese: 然而，支持抗生素治疗的证据不一。

English: clinical outcomes such as general health status and eventual need for hospitalization were similar in the two groups .
Chinese: 两组的一般健康状况和最终住院需要等临床结果相似。

English: formal weight loss programs were associated with improved biomarkers for liver disease in patients with NAFLD .
Chinese: 正式的减肥计划与 NAFLD 患者肝病生物标志物的改善有关。

English: as there is no licensed pharmacologic therapy for the treatment of nonalcoholic fatty liver disease ( NAFLD ) , clinical guidelines recommend counseling patients to lose weight through modifying diet and exercise .
Chinese: 由于尚无治疗非酒精性脂肪性肝病 (NAFLD) 的许可药物疗法，临床指南建议建议患者通过调整饮食和锻炼来减轻体重。

English: however , guidelines fall short of recommending any specific weight loss intervention .
Chinese: 然而，指南并未推荐任何具体的减肥干预措施。

English: the median treatment duration was 6 months .
Chinese: 中位治疗持续时间为 6 个月。

English: researchers assessed the intensity of interventions based on the degree of behavioral support , prescribed energy deficit , or pharmacologic dose .
Chinese: 研究人员根据行为支持的程度、规定的能量不足或药物剂量来评估干预的强度。

English: however , weight loss interventions did not improve liver fibrosis .
Chinese: 然而，减肥干预并没有改善肝纤维化。

English: in subgroup analysis , behavioral interventions improved liver steatosis , but pharmacotherapy did not .
Chinese: 在亚组分析中，行为干预改善了肝脂肪变性，但药物治疗没有。

English: estimates were largely unaffected when excluding 12 studies at high risk for bias and 7 at unclear risk .
Chinese: 当排除 12 项高偏倚风险研究和 7 项风险不明研究时，估计值基本未受影响。

English: formal weight loss interventions appear to improve biomarkers for liver disease in patients with NAFLD .
Chinese: 正式的减肥干预措施似乎可以改善 NAFLD 患者肝病的生物标志物。

English: pharmacotherapy alone did not impact liver steatosis , which is in line with current evidence indicating that no pharmacologic therapy appears to be effective in NAFLD .
Chinese: 单独的药物治疗不会影响肝脂肪变性，这与目前的证据一致，表明没有药物治疗似乎对 NAFLD 有效。

English: unfortunately , liver fibrosis did not improve , but this is not surprising given the short treatment duration .
Chinese: 不幸的是，肝纤维化没有改善，但考虑到治疗持续时间短，这并不奇怪。

English: I agree with authors of an accompanying editorial that these results should encourage all clinicians to incorporate formal weight loss programs into their treatment of NAFLD .
Chinese: 我同意随附社论的作者的观点，即这些结果应该鼓励所有临床医生将正式的减肥计划纳入他们对 NAFLD 的治疗。

English: a total of 653 patients underwent randomization .
Chinese: 共有 653 名患者接受了随机分组。

English: primary care providers are responsible for the majority of antibiotic prescriptions , and the highest overall number of such prescriptions are issued by family physicians.1
Chinese: 初级保健提供者负责大部分抗生素处方，而此类处方的总数最多是由家庭医生开出的。 1

English: there is reason to believe that many of these prescriptions could be avoided.2,3
Chinese: 有理由相信其中许多处方是可以避免的。 2,3

English: chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) was the third leading cause of death in the United States in 2014,15 and 6.4 % of Americans reported receiving a diagnosis of the condition.16
Chinese: 慢性阻塞性肺病 (COPD) 是 2014 年美国第三大死亡原因，15 6.4% 的美国人报告被诊断患有此病。 16

English: about 2 % of the adult population in the United Kingdom have a diagnosis of COPD in their primary care medical record.17,18
Chinese: 在英国，大约 2% 的成年人口在他们的初级保健医疗记录中被诊断为 COPD。 17,18

English: each year , approximately half the patients living with COPD have one or more acute exacerbations of the disease that leads to treatment with oral glucocorticoids , antibiotics , or both or hospitalization , and a quarter have two or more acute exacerbations per year.19,20
Chinese: 每年，大约一半的 COPD 患者有一次或多次疾病急性加重，导致口服糖皮质激素、抗生素或两者兼用治疗或住院治疗，四分之一的患者每年有两次或两次以上急性加重。 19,20

English: more than 80 % of these patients receive antibiotic prescriptions in the United States21,22 and in Europe.23
Chinese: 在美国 21、22 和欧洲，超过 80% 的这些患者接受了抗生素处方。 23

English: noninfectious factors were thought to cause approximately 20 % of acute exacerbations of COPD in a hospital study.27
Chinese: 在一项医院研究中，非感染性因素被认为导致了大约 20% 的 COPD 急性加重。 27

English: the guidelines of the Global Initiative for Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease recommend the use of antibiotics in moderately or severely ill patients with acute exacerbations of COPD who have increased cough and sputum purulence.28
Chinese: 慢性阻塞性肺病全球倡议的指南建议对咳嗽和脓痰加重的中度或重度慢性阻塞性肺病急性加重患者使用抗生素。 28

English: recommendations for antibiotic prescribing in primary care practice are generally based on clinical features alone ( e.g. , the Anthonisen criteria , 29 which include increased dyspnea , increased sputum volume , and increased sputum purulence ) , but these features are subjective and insufficiently accurate in predicting which patients can be treated safely without antibiotics.24
Chinese: 初级保健实践中抗生素处方的建议通常仅基于临床特征（例如 Anthonisen 标准， 29 其中包括呼吸困难增加、痰量增加和痰液化脓增加） ，但这些特征是主观的并且在预测哪些患者时不够准确。无需抗生素即可安全治疗。 24

English: a randomized , controlled trial involving patients with acute exacerbations of COPD recruited from primary care practices showed little difference in the rate of clinical cure with either antibiotics or placebo among those who had a CRP level of less than 40 mg per liter.32
Chinese: 一项涉及从初级保健机构招募的慢性阻塞性肺病急性加重患者的随机对照试验显示，在 CRP 水平低于 40 毫克/升的患者中，使用抗生素或安慰剂的临床治愈率几乎没有差异。 32

English: the trial involved patients recruited from 86 general medical practices in the United Kingdom .
Chinese: 该试验涉及从英国 86 家普通医疗机构招募的患者。

English: the Research Ethics Committee for Wales , recognized by the United Kingdom Ethics Committee Authority , approved the trial protocol on September 15 , 2014 , as well as the inclusion of all the recruitment sites in the trial .
Chinese: 由英国伦理委员会管理局认可的威尔士研究伦理委员会于 2014 年 9 月 15 日批准了试验方案，并将所有招募地点纳入试验。

English: health boards and clinical commissioning groups of the National Health Service gave research and development approval to participating sites .
Chinese: 国家卫生服务局的卫生委员会和临床委托小组批准了参与地点的研发。

English: written informed consent was obtained from all the patients by the responsible primary care physician or an appropriately trained staff member .
Chinese: 负责的初级保健医生或经过适当培训的工作人员从所有患者处获得了书面知情同意书。

English: the authors vouch for the accuracy and completeness of the data and for the fidelity of the trial to the protocol .
Chinese: 作者保证数据的准确性和完整性以及试验对方案的忠实度。

English: an independent trial steering committee and a data monitoring and ethics committee provided trial oversight .
Chinese: 一个独立的试验指导委员会和一个数据监测和伦理委员会提供试验监督。

English: the staff members at the general medical practices were trained in the use , care , and calibration of the devices by representatives of Alere ( at no cost to the trial or to the practices ) or by members of the trial team .
Chinese: 一般医疗机构的工作人员接受了 Alere 代表或试验团队成员的设备使用、保养和校准方面的培训（试验或医疗机构无需支付任何费用）。

English: the company had no role in the design of the trial ; in the accrual , analysis , or interpretation of the data ; or in the preparation of the manuscript .
Chinese: 公司未参与试验设计；在数据的累积、分析或解释中；或在准备手稿。

English: two participating practices used their own CRP test device .
Chinese: 两个参与实践使用了他们自己的 CRP 测试设备。

English: patients who were 40 years of age or older were eligible for inclusion if they had a diagnosis of COPD in their primary care clinical record and were presenting with an acute exacerbation of COPD with at least one of the Anthonisen criteria .
Chinese: 年龄在 40 岁或以上的患者如果在其初级保健临床记录中诊断为 COPD 并且出现 COPD 急性加重并至少符合 Anthonisen 标准之一，则符合入选条件。

English: a full list of inclusion and exclusion criteria is provided in Section 1 in the Supplementary Appendix , available at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 补充附录第 1 部分提供了纳入和排除标准的完整列表，补充附录可在 NEJM.org 获取。

English: clinicians recorded their antibiotic prescribing and other management decisions after randomization on a case report form .
Chinese: 临床医生在病例报告表上记录了随机分组后他们的抗生素处方和其他管理决定。

English: additional details regarding trial procedures are provided in Section 2 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录第 2 部分提供了有关试验程序的更多详细信息。

English: all the participating sites were provided with a summary of guidance from the National Institute for Health and Care Excellence and the Global Initiative for Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease .
Chinese: 所有参与地点都收到了国家健康与护理卓越研究所和慢性阻塞性肺病全球倡议的指导摘要。

English: the guidance noted that for patients with a CRP level lower than 20 mg per liter , antibiotics are unlikely to be beneficial and usually should not be prescribed ; for those with a CRP level from 20 to 40 mg per liter , antibiotics may be beneficial , mainly if purulent sputum is present ; and for those with a CRP level higher than 40 mg per liter , antibiotics are likely to be beneficial.24
Chinese: 该指南指出，对于 CRP 水平低于 20 毫克/升的患者，抗生素不太可能有益，通常不应开处方；对于 CRP 水平为 20 至 40 毫克/升的患者，抗生素可能有益，主要是在出现脓性痰时；对于 CRP 水平高于每升 40 毫克的人，抗生素可能是有益的。 24

English: given the noninferiority research question , we were interested in the upper limit of the confidence interval of the adjusted mean difference .
Chinese: 考虑到非劣效性研究问题，我们对调整均值差的置信区间上限感兴趣。

English: additional details on the sample size justification are provided in Section 3 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录第 3 部分提供了关于样本量合理性的更多详细信息。

English: the model was adjusted for the number of Anthonisen criteria present before randomization .
Chinese: 该模型根据随机化前存在的 Anthonisen 标准数量进行了调整。

English: full details of the subgroup analyses are provided in Section 9 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录第 9 部分提供了亚组分析的全部细节。

English: between January 2015 and February 2017 , a total of 653 patients from 86 general medical practices underwent randomization ( Figure 1 ) .
Chinese: 2015 年 1 月至 2017 年 2 月期间，共有来自 86 家普通医疗机构的 653 名患者接受了随机分组（图 1）。

English: the trial groups were well matched at baseline ( Table 1 ) .
Chinese: 试验组在基线时匹配良好（表 1）。

English: the microbiologic features of the sputum samples obtained at baseline are provided in Figure S1 and Table S1 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录图 S1 和表 S1 提供了基线时获得的痰样本的微生物学特征。

English: among these 317 patients , 241 ( 76.0 % ) had CRP values lower than 20 mg per liter ; 38 ( 12.0 % ) had CRP values between 20 and 40 mg per liter , and 38 ( 12.0 % ) had CRP values higher than 40 mg per liter .
Chinese: 在这 317 名患者中，241 名 (76.0%) 的 CRP 值低于 20 mg/L； 38 人 (12.0%) 的 CRP 值在 20 到 40 毫克/升之间，38 人 (12.0%) 的 CRP 值高于 40 毫克/升。

English: the upper limit of the confidence interval for both analyses did not contain the prespecified noninferiority margin of 0.3 .
Chinese: 两项分析的置信区间上限不包含预设的非劣效性界值 0.3。

English: differences in reported antibiotic use were only observed for the patients who had at last two of the Anthonisen criteria ( Figure 2 ) .
Chinese: 仅在至少满足两项 Anthonisen 标准的患者中观察到报告的抗生素使用差异（图 2）。

English: other differential effects of the assigned interventions are described in Section 9 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录第 9 部分描述了指定干预措施的其他不同影响。

English: the prescribed antibiotics are listed in Table S10 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 处方抗生素列于补充附录表 S10 中。

English: we captured data regarding antibiotic prescribing , antibiotic use , and health care utilization to determine whether fewer initial prescriptions might have increased subsequent consulting and antibiotic prescribing and found that it did not .
Chinese: 我们收集了有关抗生素处方、抗生素使用和医疗保健利用的数据，以确定较少的初始处方是否会增加后续咨询和抗生素处方，并发现事实并非如此。

English: a nonrandomized Spanish study showed that the rate of antibiotic overprescribing for acute exacerbations of COPD was lower among primary care clinicians who received training in CRP testing than among those who did not.48
Chinese: 西班牙的一项非随机研究表明，接受过 CRP 检测培训的初级保健临床医生因 COPD 急性加重过度使用抗生素的比例低于未接受培训的初级保健临床医生。 48

English: a recent post hoc comparison indicated that men who were given abiraterone or docetaxel early in the course of treatment had similar outcomes with respect to overall survival.14
Chinese: 最近的一项事后比较表明，在治疗过程早期接受阿比特龙或多西紫杉醇治疗的男性在总生存期方面具有相似的结果。 14

English: testosterone suppression was initiated up to 12 weeks before randomization .
Chinese: 睾酮抑制在随机分组前 12 周开始。

English: previous adjuvant testosterone suppression for up to 24 months was allowed if the treatment had been completed at least 12 months earlier .
Chinese: 如果至少在 12 个月前完成治疗，则允许先前辅助性睾酮抑制长达 24 个月。

English: the trial protocol and Supplementary Appendix are available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 试验方案和补充附录与本文全文可在 NEJM.org 获取。

English: in the two groups , background therapy included continuous testosterone suppression .
Chinese: 在两组中，背景治疗包括持续抑制睾酮。

English: after the enrollment of 88 patients ( mainly from Australia and New Zealand ) , the early administration of docetaxel with testosterone suppression was permitted in protocol version 2 ( as revised on November 2014 ) as a stratification factor before randomization , according to evidence showing improved survival with this approach.1
Chinese: 在纳入 88 名患者（主要来自澳大利亚和新西兰）之后，方案版本 2（2014 年 11 月修订）允许早期给予多西他赛和睾酮抑制作为随机化前的分层因素，证据表明这种方法.1

English: the decision to initiate early treatment with docetaxel was left up to the individual patients and their physicians .
Chinese: 开始使用多西紫杉醇进行早期治疗的决定由患者及其医生决定。

English: up to two cycles of docetaxel were permitted before randomization .
Chinese: 在随机化之前允许最多两个周期的多西紫杉醇。

English: the central randomization system implemented minimization with a random component .
Chinese: 中央随机化系统使用随机成分实现了最小化。

English: the trial was led by the Australian and New Zealand Urogenital and Prostate Cancer Trials Group ( ANZUP ) and the National Health and Medical Research Council ( NHMRC ) Clinical Trials Centre , University of Sydney .
Chinese: 该试验由澳大利亚和新西兰泌尿生殖系统和前列腺癌试验小组 (ANZUP) 以及悉尼大学国家卫生和医学研究委员会 (NHMRC) 临床试验中心牵头。

English: the trial was designed by the ANZUP investigators .
Chinese: 该试验由 ANZUP 研究人员设计。

English: data were collected and analyzed by the NHMRC Clinical Trials Centre .
Chinese: 数据由 NHMRC 临床试验中心收集和分析。

English: the authors were solely responsible for the writing of the manuscript .
Chinese: 作者全权负责手稿的撰写。

English: Astellas Pharma provided enzalutamide and financial support for trial conduct ; representatives of the company reviewed drafts of the protocol and trial report but were not otherwise involved in any aspects of the trial design , data accrual , data analysis , or manuscript preparation .
Chinese: 安斯泰来制药为试验进行提供了恩杂鲁胺和资金支持；公司代表审阅了试验方案和试验报告的草稿，但不参与试验设计、数据收集、数据分析或手稿准备的任何方面。

English: testosterone suppression , standard antiandrogen drugs , docetaxel , and all subsequent treatments were accessed according to local standard practice .
Chinese: 睾酮抑制、标准抗雄激素药物、多西紫杉醇和所有后续治疗均根据当地标准实践进行。

English: the authors vouch for the accuracy and completeness of the reported data and for the fidelity of the trial to the protocol .
Chinese: 作者保证所报告数据的准确性和完整性，以及试验对方案的忠实度。

English: an independent data and safety monitoring committee reviewed the progress and results of the trial .
Chinese: 一个独立的数据和安全监督委员会审查了试验的进展和结果。

English: the trial was conducted in accordance with the principles of Good Clinical Practice guidelines and the Declaration of Helsinki .
Chinese: 该试验是根据良好临床实践指南和赫尔辛基宣言的原则进行的。

English: the protocol was independently reviewed and approved as required at each participating institution .
Chinese: 每个参与机构都根据需要独立审查和批准了该协议。

English: the primary end point of overall survival was measured as the interval from randomization to death from any cause or to the date at which the patient was last known to be alive .
Chinese: 总生存期的主要终点是从随机分组到任何原因死亡或到最后一次知道患者还活着的日期的间隔。

English: imaging by means of CT and bone scanning was recommended to confirm clinical suspicion of progressive disease .
Chinese: 建议通过 CT 和骨扫描进行成像，以确认临床对进展性疾病的怀疑。

English: imaging reports ( but not the images themselves ) were reviewed centrally .
Chinese: 成像报告（但不是图像本身）被集中审查。

English: adverse events were graded according to the National Cancer Institute Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events , version 4.02 .
Chinese: 不良事件根据美国国家癌症研究所不良事件通用术语标准 4.02 版进行分级。

English: protocol version 3 , which was written after external evidence became available for improved overall survival with early abiraterone treatment , 8,9 added interim analyses of overall survival after the occurrence of 50 % and 80 % of the prespecified 470 deaths .
Chinese: 第 3 版方案是在早期阿比特龙治疗改善总生存期的外部证据可用后编写的，8,9 在预先指定的 470 例死亡发生 50% 和 80% 后增加了对总生存期的中期分析。

English: the trial executive committee made these decisions without any knowledge of outcomes in each treatment group .
Chinese: 试验执行委员会在对每个治疗组的结果一无所知的情况下做出了这些决定。

English: patients who had undergone randomization and received a dose of any trial drug were included in analyses of drug exposure and safety .
Chinese: 接受随机分组并接受任何试验药物剂量的患者被纳入药物暴露和安全性分析。

English: we prespecified that the effects of enzalutamide according to the volume of disease and the use of early docetaxel treatment were of particular interest .
Chinese: 我们预先指定，根据疾病的体积和早期多西他赛治疗的使用，恩杂鲁胺的作用特别令人感兴趣。

English: the baseline characteristics of all the patients are summarized in Table 1 and detailed in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 表 1 总结了所有患者的基线特征，并在补充附录中进行了详细说明。

English: overall SURVIVAL
Chinese: 总体生存

English: the first interim analysis of the primary end point occurred on February 28 , 2019 , after the occurrence of 235 deaths .
Chinese: 主要终点的第一次中期分析发生在 2019 年 2 月 28 日，当时发生了 235 例死亡事件。

English: on March 7 , 2019 , the independent data and safety monitoring committee recommended that the unblinded results be provided to the trial executive committee so that plans for definitive analyses could be implemented .
Chinese: 2019 年 3 月 7 日，独立数据和安全监察委员会建议将非盲化结果提供给试验执行委员会，以便实施最终分析计划。

English: the observed P value of 0.0016 met the rejection boundary of 0.0031 for the null hypothesis that was specified for this interim analysis .
Chinese: 观察到的 P 值 0.0016 符合为该中期分析指定的原假设的拒绝边界 0.0031。

English: the results were unaffected by adjustments for geographical region , volume of disease , use of early docetaxel treatment , bone antiresorptive therapy , and coexisting conditions .
Chinese: 结果不受地理区域、疾病体积、早期多西紫杉醇治疗的使用、骨抗吸收治疗和合并症的调整的影响。

English: the median survival time was not yet estimable in either trial group .
Chinese: 两个试验组的中位生存时间均无法估计。

English: after adjustment for multiple comparisons , P values for heterogeneity of the treatment effect of enzalutamide were 0.14 for volume of disease , 0.14 for early docetaxel treatment , and 0.06 for the use of bone antiresorptive therapy .
Chinese: 调整多重比较后，恩杂鲁胺治疗效果的异质性 P 值对于疾病体积为 0.14，对于早期多西他赛治疗为 0.14，对于骨抗吸收治疗的使用为 0.06。

English: we anticipated that the smaller number of deaths would limit the reliability of subgroup analyses of overall survival .
Chinese: 我们预计较小的死亡人数会限制总生存期亚组分析的可靠性。

English: subsequent ANTICANCER THERAPIES
Chinese: 随后的抗癌治疗

English: treatment after progression was initiated at the discretion of the patients and their physicians .
Chinese: 进展后的治疗由患者及其医生决定。

English: treatment DURATION
Chinese: 治疗持续时间

English: discontinuation for reasons other than disease progression occurred in 68 of 563 patients ( 12 % ) and 105 of 558 patients ( 19 % ) in the respective groups .
Chinese: 各组 563 名患者中有 68 名 (12%) 和 558 名患者中有 105 名 (19%) 因疾病进展以外的原因停药。

English: early docetaxel treatment was administered in 227 of 487 patients ( 47 % ) who subsequently had clinical progression and in 91 of 203 ( 45 % ) who died from prostate cancer .
Chinese: 487 名随后出现临床进展的患者中有 227 名 (47%) 接受了早期多西紫杉醇治疗，203 名死于前列腺癌的患者中有 91 名 (45%) 接受了早期多西紫杉醇治疗。

English: the number of patients with febrile neutropenia was similar in the two treatment groups ( 37 with enzalutamide and 32 with standard care ) , and all but 2 of these events ( 67 of 69 ) occurred during early docetaxel treatment .
Chinese: 两个治疗组中出现发热性中性粒细胞减少症的患者人数相似（恩杂鲁胺组 37 人，标准治疗组 32 人），除 2 例（69 例中的 67 例）外，所有这些事件都发生在早期多西他赛治疗期间。

English: seizures occurred more frequently in patients in the enzalutamide group ( 7 vs. 0 ) .
Chinese: enzalutamide 组患者的癫痫发作更频繁（7 次对 0 次）。

English: six patients discontinued enzalutamide because of seizure ; 1 discontinued enzalutamide because of clinical progression before the seizure event .
Chinese: 六名患者因癫痫发作而停用恩杂鲁胺； 1 因癫痫发作前的临床进展而停用恩杂鲁胺。

English: fatigue of any grade was more common with enzalutamide than with standard care ( 465 patients and 363 patients , respectively ) .
Chinese: enzalutamide 组出现任何级别的疲劳比标准治疗组更常见（分别为 465 名患者和 363 名患者）。

English: adverse events that occurred during the first 6 months among the patients who received early docetaxel treatment are shown in Table S8 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 接受早期多西他赛治疗的患者在前 6 个月内发生的不良事件见补充附录表 S8。

English: the larger number of serious adverse events associated with enzalutamide was commensurate with the longer duration of trial treatment .
Chinese: 与恩杂鲁胺相关的大量严重不良事件与较长的试验治疗持续时间相称。

English: all the patients received testosterone suppression , plus the addition of docetaxel when appropriate .
Chinese: 所有患者均接受睾酮抑制，并在适当时加用多西紫杉醇。

English: the control group in this trial was treated with standard antiandrogen therapy to provide a stringent comparator .
Chinese: 该试验中的对照组接受标准抗雄激素治疗以提供严格的比较。

English: the frequency of early docetaxel treatment was similar in the two groups .
Chinese: 两组早期多西他赛治疗的频率相似。

English: thus , the observed benefits of early enzalutamide therapy are not explained by differences in access to or use of subsequent therapies .
Chinese: 因此，观察到的早期恩杂鲁胺治疗的益处不能用获得或使用后续治疗的差异来解释。

English: we found that adding early enzalutamide to testosterone suppression was associated with a higher frequency of toxic effects , especially peripheral neuropathy associated with the concomitant use of docetaxel .
Chinese: 我们发现，在睾酮抑制的基础上早期加入恩杂鲁胺与更高频率的毒性作用相关，尤其是与同时使用多西紫杉醇相关的周围神经病变。

English: patients who were treated with enzalutamide reported more fatigue and more often discontinued therapy before disease progression .
Chinese: 接受恩杂鲁胺治疗的患者报告更容易疲劳，并且更常在疾病进展前停止治疗。

English: seven patients ( 1 % ) in this group had seizures , a known potential side effect of enzalutamide .
Chinese: 该组中有 7 名患者 (1%) 出现癫痫发作，这是 enzalutamide 已知的潜在副作用。

English: the effect of enzalutamide on overall survival appeared to be smaller in the subgroup with early docetaxel treatment .
Chinese: 在接受早期多西他赛治疗的亚组中，恩杂鲁胺对总生存期的影响似乎较小。

English: however , this trial was neither designed nor powered to reliably analyze the results in this subgroup .
Chinese: 然而，该试验既没有设计也没有动力可靠地分析该亚组的结果。

English: our current data support the claim that early enzalutamide prolongs survival within 3 years in the entire trial population but provide limited support that it prolongs overall survival within 3 years in patients who received early docetaxel treatment .
Chinese: 我们目前的数据支持早期恩杂鲁胺可在整个试验人群中延长 3 年内生存期的说法，但对接受早期多西他赛治疗的患者在 3 年内延长总生存期提供的支持有限。

English: the main limitations of this trial are consequences of the detection of evidence of benefit at the first planned interim analysis .
Chinese: 该试验的主要局限性是在第一次计划的中期分析中检测获益证据的结果。

English: this early analysis may have overestimated the eventual treatment benefit.20
Chinese: 这种早期分析可能高估了最终的治疗益处。 20

English: there was no central review of actual imaging , but this factor would have no effect on the rate of death , the primary end point .
Chinese: 没有对实际成像进行集中审查，但这个因素对主要终点死亡率没有影响。

English: however , enzalutamide was associated with some additional toxic effects , including fatigue and a small risk of seizures .
Chinese: 然而，enzalutamide 与一些额外的毒性作用有关，包括疲劳和癫痫发作的小风险。

English: supported by Astellas Scientific and Medical Affairs , a grant ( 704970 ) from the Canadian Cancer Society , the Support for Cancer Clinical Trials Program of Cancer Australia , and a practitioner fellowship ( APP1102604 ) and program grants ( 1037786 and 1150467 ) from the National Health and Medical Research Council of the Australian Government Department of Health .
Chinese: 由 Astellas 科学和医疗事务部、加拿大癌症协会的赠款 ( 704970 ) 、澳大利亚癌症协会的癌症临床试验支持项目以及国家卫生和健康中心的从业者奖学金 ( APP1102604 ) 和项目赠款 ( 1037786 和 1150467 ) 支持澳大利亚政府卫生部医学研究委员会。

English: the primary end points were freedom from pain and freedom from the most bothersome symptom ( other than pain ) identified by the patient , both of which were assessed 2 hours after the dose of rimegepant or placebo was administered .
Chinese: 主要终点是无疼痛和无患者确定的最烦人的症状（疼痛除外），这两项都是在服用 rimegepant 或安慰剂后 2 小时进行评估。

English: a total of 1186 patients were randomly assigned to receive rimegepant ( 594 patients ) or placebo ( 592 patients ) ; of these , 537 patients in the rimegepant group and 535 patients in the placebo group could be evaluated for efficacy .
Chinese: 共有 1186 名患者被随机分配接受 rimegepant（594 名患者）或安慰剂（592 名患者）；其中，rimegepant 组的 537 名患者和安慰剂组的 535 名患者可以评估疗效。

English: the overall mean age of the patients evaluated for efficacy was 40.6 years , and 88.7 % were women .
Chinese: 评估疗效的患者的总体平均年龄为 40.6 岁，88.7% 为女性。

English: the most common adverse events were nausea and urinary tract infection .
Chinese: 最常见的不良事件是恶心和尿路感染。

English: migraine is a common chronic neurologic disease that may affect nearly 1 billion people worldwide.1
Chinese: 偏头痛是一种常见的慢性神经系统疾病，可能影响全球近 10 亿人。 1

English: triptans also are either contraindicated or must be used with caution in an estimated 3.5 million of the 40 million Americans with migraine because of concerns about cardiovascular effects.8,9
Chinese: 由于担心心血管影响，在 4000 万患有偏头痛的美国人中，估计有 350 万人禁忌或必须谨慎使用曲坦类药物。 8,9

English: gepants may be effective in patients whose symptoms do not respond to triptans , owing to their different mechanisms of action .
Chinese: gepants 可能对症状对曲坦类药物无反应的患者有效，因为它们的作用机制不同。

English: unlike triptans , which are contraindicated in patients with cardiovascular disease because of the possibility of vasoconstriction , rimegepant does not have vasoconstrictive effects.16
Chinese: 与曲普坦类药物不同，曲普坦类药物因血管收缩的可能性而禁用于心血管疾病患者，而 rimegepant 不具有血管收缩作用。 16

English: the current phase 3 trial was conducted to evaluate the efficacy and safety of rimegepant ( at an oral dose of 75 mg ) , as compared with placebo , in acute migraine treatment .
Chinese: 目前的 3 期试验旨在评估 rimegepant（口服剂量为 75 毫克）与安慰剂相比在急性偏头痛治疗中的疗效和安全性。

English: men and women 18 years of age or older were recruited by referral from physicians and other health care professionals and by standard methods of recruitment , including enrollment from clinical practices and through advertising .
Chinese: 18 岁或 18 岁以上的男性和女性是通过医生和其他医疗保健专业人员的推荐以及标准招募方法招募的，包括临床实践和广告招募。

English: treatment settings included clinics , institutions , and private office practices .
Chinese: 治疗场所包括诊所、机构和私人诊所。

English: persons who were receiving preventive migraine medication had to be receiving a stable dose for at least 3 months before trial entry .
Chinese: 接受预防性偏头痛药物治疗的人在进入试验前必须接受至少 3 个月的稳定剂量。

English: patients were also excluded if they had received nonbiologic investigational agents within 30 days before the baseline visit or if they had received biologic investigational agents within 90 days before the baseline visit .
Chinese: 如果患者在基线访视前 30 天内接受过非生物研究药物，或者如果他们在基线访视前 90 天内接受过生物研究药物，也被排除在外。

English: complete criteria for participation are listed in the protocol , available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 完整的参与标准列在方案中，方案与本文全文可在 NEJM.org 获取。

English: the trial was conducted in accordance with International Conference on Harmonisation Good Clinical Practice guidelines , the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki , and all applicable local regulations .
Chinese: 该试验是根据国际协调会议良好临床实践指南、赫尔辛基宣言的原则以及所有适用的地方法规进行的。

English: the protocol was approved by an independent ethics committee or institutional review board at each trial center .
Chinese: 该方案由每个试验中心的独立伦理委员会或机构审查委员会批准。

English: all patients provided written informed consent .
Chinese: 所有患者都提供了书面知情同意书。

English: Biohaven Pharmaceuticals sponsored the trial , supplied the trial agents , reviewed the trial design , collected the data , and performed data management and analysis .
Chinese: Biohaven Pharmaceuticals 赞助了该试验，提供了试验药物，审查了试验设计，收集了数据，并进行了数据管理和分析。

English: the manuscript was written with the assistance of a medical writer funded by Biohaven Pharmaceuticals .
Chinese: 该手稿是在一位由 Biohaven Pharmaceuticals 资助的医学作家的协助下撰写的。

English: all the authors have confidentiality agreements with Biohaven Pharmaceuticals , either as a condition of employment or in their role as consultants .
Chinese: 所有作者都与 Biohaven Pharmaceuticals 签订了保密协议，无论是作为雇佣条件还是作为顾问。

English: after providing written informed consent , patients underwent screening procedures as specified in the protocol .
Chinese: 在提供书面知情同意书后，患者按照方案中的规定接受筛查程序。

English: they were given an electronic diary and were instructed on the proper use of the diary before they left the trial center .
Chinese: 他们得到了一本电子日记，并在他们离开试验中心之前得到了正确使用日记的指导。

English: patients completed the electronic diary for up to 48 hours after taking the trial agent .
Chinese: 患者在服用试验药物后最多可在 48 小时内完成电子日记。

English: pain intensity , the presence or absence of associated symptoms , and ratings of functional disability were assessed at the onset of the treated attack ; at 15 , 30 , 45 , 60 , and 90 minutes after the dose ; and at 2 , 3 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 24 , and 48 hours after the dose .
Chinese: 在接受治疗的发作开始时评估疼痛强度、是否存在相关症状以及功能障碍等级；给药后 15、30、45、60 和 90 分钟；以及给药后 2、3、4、6、8、24 和 48 小时。

English: patients were asked to return to the trial center within 7 days after taking the dose of rimegepant or placebo .
Chinese: 要求患者在服用 rimegepant 或安慰剂后 7 天内返回试验中心。

English: at that visit , trial personnel reviewed adherence to the electronic diary assessments , confirmed that the patient had taken the dose , and monitored safety variables .
Chinese: 在那次访问中，试验人员审查了对电子日记评估的依从性，确认患者服用了剂量，并监测了安全变量。

English: patients who had not had an attack of sufficient severity within 45 days after randomization were withdrawn and were instructed to return the unused trial agent and the electronic diary .
Chinese: 随机分组后 45 天内未发生足够严重程度发作的患者被退出，并被要求归还未使用的试验药物和电子日记。

English: the methods used to measure efficacy end points are described in the Supplementary Appendix , available at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 用于衡量疗效终点的方法在补充附录中进行了描述，补充附录可在 NEJM.org 获取。

English: safety and other assessments included evaluation of adverse events , electrocardiography , vital signs , measurements of height and weight , routine laboratory testing and the Sheehan Suicidality Tracking Scale.19
Chinese: 安全和其他评估包括不良事件评估、心电图、生命体征、身高和体重测量、常规实验室测试和 Sheehan 自杀追踪量表。 19

English: on the basis of the results of the previous phase 2b trial , 16 we estimated that a sample of 550 patients in each group would provide the trial with more than 95 % power to detect a significant difference between the rimegepant group and the placebo group in each of the two primary end points and hence at least 90 % power to detect a significant difference between the groups in both end points jointly .
Chinese: 根据先前 2b 期试验的结果 16 ，我们估计每组 550 名患者的样本将为该试验提供超过 95 % 的功效来检测每组中 rimegepant 组和安慰剂组之间的显着差异。的两个主要终点，因此至少有 90% 的功效可以共同检测两个终点中各组之间的显着差异。

English: the safety analyses were conducted in the safety population , which included all patients who underwent randomization and took a dose of rimegepant or placebo .
Chinese: 安全性分析是在安全性人群中进行的，其中包括接受随机分组并服用了 rimegepant 或安慰剂剂量的所有患者。

English: we specified that rimegepant would be considered to be superior to placebo with respect to the two primary end points ( freedom from pain 2 hours after the dose and freedom from the most bothersome symptom 2 hours after the dose ) if the P value for both comparisons was less than 0.05 .
Chinese: 我们指定，如果两个比较的 P 值为小于 0.05 。

English: patients who used rescue medication were considered to have treatment failure as of the time the medications were used .
Chinese: 使用急救药物的患者被认为在使用药物时治疗失败。

English: we performed sensitivity analyses that took missing data into account ; the results are shown in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 我们进行了考虑缺失数据的敏感性分析；结果见补充附录。

English: to maintain the type I error rate at 0.05 , a prespecified hierarchical gatekeeping procedure was applied in which the secondary end points were tested in the order indicated above and in the protocol .
Chinese: 为了将 I 类错误率保持在 0.05，应用了预先指定的分级把关程序，其中次要终点按照上述和方案中指定的顺序进行测试。

English: a comparison was considered to be significant if that comparison and each of the preceding comparisons showed a significant difference between the treatment groups .
Chinese: 如果该比较和之前的每个比较显示治疗组之间存在显着差异，则该比较被认为是显着的。

English: if a significant difference was not observed for an end point , any subsequent comparisons were reported without P values .
Chinese: 如果在终点没有观察到显着差异，则报告任何后续比较时不包含 P 值。

English: for each time point , the number of patients eligible to become free from pain or free from their most bothersome symptom and the number of patients who reported the first occurrence of the event were used to calculate the probability estimate ( with 95 % confidence intervals ) .
Chinese: 对于每个时间点，有资格摆脱疼痛或摆脱最烦人症状的患者人数以及报告首次发生该事件的患者人数用于计算概率估计值（95% 置信区间）。

English: from July 2017 through January 2018 , a total of 1186 patients participated in the trial at 49 centers in the United States .
Chinese: 从 2017 年 7 月到 2018 年 1 月，共有 1186 名患者在美国的 49 个中心参与了试验。

English: patients were randomly assigned to receive rimegepant ( 594 patients ) or placebo ( 592 patients ) .
Chinese: 患者被随机分配接受 rimegepant（594 名患者）或安慰剂（592 名患者）。

English: a total of 1086 patients received the assigned dose of rimegepant or placebo , and 1080 of these patients ( 99.4 % ) completed the trial ( 538 in the rimegepant group and 542 in the placebo group ) ( Figure 1 ) .
Chinese: 共有 1086 名患者接受了指定剂量的 rimegepant 或安慰剂，其中 1080 名 (99.4%) 完成了试验（rimegepant 组 538 名，安慰剂组 542 名）（图 1）。

English: the demographic and clinical characteristics of the two treatment groups were similar ( Table 1 ) .
Chinese: 两个治疗组的人口统计学和临床特征相似（表 1）。

English: most of the patients ( 88.7 % ) were women , and the mean age of the overall population was 40.6 years .
Chinese: 大多数患者 (88.7%) 为女性，总人口的平均年龄为 40.6 岁。

English: the patients reported a history of 4.6 migraine attacks per month , each of which lasted an average of 32.5 hours if left untreated .
Chinese: 患者报告每月有 4.6 次偏头痛发作，如果不及时治疗，每次平均持续 32.5 小时。

English: the groups were balanced with respect to the distribution of the most bothersome symptom ( Table 1 ) .
Chinese: 这些组在最烦人的症状分布方面是平衡的（表 1）。

English: exploratory analyses of freedom from pain and freedom from the most bothersome symptom during the first 8 hours after the dose of rimegepant or placebo are shown in Figure 2 .
Chinese: 图 2 显示了在服用 rimegepant 或安慰剂后最初 8 小时内没有疼痛和没有最烦人症状的探索性分析。

English: the most common adverse events were nausea ( 1.8 % in the rimegepant group and 1.1 % in the placebo group ) and urinary tract infection ( 1.5 % and 1.1 % , respectively ) .
Chinese: 最常见的不良事件是恶心（rimegepant 组为 1.8%，安慰剂组为 1.1%）和尿路感染（分别为 1.5% 和 1.1%）。

English: serious adverse events were reported in one patient in the rimegepant group ( back pain ) and in two patients in the placebo group ( Table 3 ) .
Chinese: rimegepant 组的一名患者（背痛）和安慰剂组的两名患者报告了严重不良事件（表 3）。

English: no patient in either treatment group had an alanine aminotransferase level or an aspartate aminotransferase level of more than three times the upper limit of the normal range , and no total bilirubin level of more than two times the upper limit of the normal range was observed .
Chinese: 两个治疗组中没有患者的谷丙转氨酶水平或天冬氨酸转氨酶水平超过正常范围上限的三倍，也没有观察到总胆红素水平超过正常范围上限的两倍。

English: the results of the analyses of the secondary end points of freedom from photophobia , freedom from phonophobia , and pain relief , each assessed 2 hours after the dose of rimegepant or placebo , showed the superiority of rimegepant over placebo ; however , rimegepant was not found to be superior to placebo with respect to freedom from nausea .
Chinese: 在 rimegepant 或安慰剂给药后 2 小时评估的次要终点（无畏光、无声音恐惧症和疼痛缓解）的分析结果显示 rimegepant 优于安慰剂；然而，在消除恶心方面，并未发现 rimegepant 优于安慰剂。

English: nausea and urinary tract infection were the only adverse events reported in more than 1 % of the patients in each group .
Chinese: 恶心和尿路感染是在每组中超过 1% 的患者中报告的唯一不良事件。

English: our trial had several limitations .
Chinese: 我们的试验有几个局限性。

English: first , the trial did not include an active comparator to rimegepant .
Chinese: 首先，该试验不包括 rimegepant 的活性对照药。

English: third , although no evidence of adverse cardiac effects was observed , the trial population was not enriched for patients with cardiovascular disease .
Chinese: 第三，虽然没有观察到不良心脏影响的证据，但试验人群并未针对心血管疾病患者进行扩充。

English: this trial showed that among patients with migraine , treatment of an attack with rimegepant , which acts through inhibition of the CGRP receptor , resulted in a moderately higher percentage of patients who were free from pain and free from their most bothersome symptom 2 hours after the dose than placebo .
Chinese: 该试验表明，在偏头痛患者中，使用通过抑制 CGRP 受体起作用的 rimegepant 治疗偏头痛发作，导致在给药后 2 小时没有疼痛和最烦人的症状的患者百分比适度升高。比安慰剂。

English: larger and longer trials are needed to determine the consistency of response and the safety and effectiveness of the drug as compared with other migraine treatments .
Chinese: 与其他偏头痛治疗相比，需要更大规模和更长时间的试验来确定反应的一致性以及该药物的安全性和有效性。

English: highlights of new treatments for myeloma and lymphoma
Chinese: 骨髓瘤和淋巴瘤新疗法的亮点

English: patients were randomized to lenalidomide or observation .
Chinese: 患者被随机分配到来那度胺组或观察组。

English: toxicities were as expected ; 80 % of phase II and 51 % of phase III patients discontinued lenalidomide due to adverse events or patient withdrawal .
Chinese: 毒性符合预期； 80% 的 II 期患者和 51% 的 III 期患者因不良事件或患者退出而停用来那度胺。

English: rates of second primary malignancies with lenalidomide and placebo were 5.2 % and 3.5 % .
Chinese: 来那度胺和安慰剂组的第二原发性恶性肿瘤发生率分别为 5.2% 和 3.5%。

English: however , the relapse rate remains high after autologous SCT .
Chinese: 然而，自体干细胞移植后的复发率仍然很高。

English: autologous SCT remains a standard for PTCL in first remission , thus reserving allogeneic STC for relapsing patients .
Chinese: 自体 SCT 仍然是首次缓解期 PTCL 的标准，因此为复发患者保留同种异体 STC。

English: a second component of the trial randomized 398 patients who achieved complete remission from induction therapy to receive maintenance rituximab or observation .
Chinese: 该试验的第二部分随机分配了 398 名从诱导治疗中获得完全缓解的患者，以接受利妥昔单抗维持治疗或观察治疗。

English: no clinical DLBCL subgroup showed a benefit from maintenance rituximab .
Chinese: 没有临床 DLBCL 亚组显示利妥昔单抗维持治疗有益。

English: WCH and WCE were confirmed by either ambulatory BP monitoring or home BP monitoring .
Chinese: WCH 和 WCE 通过动态血压监测或家庭血压监测确认。

English: WCE did not confer excess risk for adverse CV events , stroke , or early mortality .
Chinese: WCE 不会增加不良 CV 事件、中风或早期死亡的风险。

English: based on data in this analysis , editorialists note that excess risk associated with WCH usually is seen in older patients with high CV risk .
Chinese: 根据该分析中的数据，编辑指出，与 WCH 相关的额外风险通常见于具有高 CV 风险的老年患者。

English: if WCH is suspected in older patients with high risk for adverse CV events , empirical treatment of WCH might be reasonable - but randomized trials to validate this approach would be desirable .
Chinese: 如果疑似 WCH 存在于心血管不良事件高风险的老年患者中，WCH 的经验性治疗可能是合理的，但需要随机试验来验证这种方法。

English: the editors of NEJM Journal Watch Oncology and Hematology were on hand to report highlights of the conference .
Chinese: NEJM Journal Watch Oncology and Hematology 的编辑们在现场报告了会议的亮点。

English: all meeting abstracts can be viewed in the ASCO meeting library .
Chinese: 所有会议摘要都可以在 ASCO 会议图书馆中查看。

English: but whether to give monotherapy or doublet maintenance therapy to patients receiving a triplet combination is unknown .
Chinese: 但对于接受三药联合治疗的患者是给予单药治疗还是双药维持治疗尚不清楚。

English: patients who did not progress were then randomized 1 : 1 : 1 to maintenance therapy with bevacizumab , pemetrexed , or a combination of the two agents .
Chinese: 没有进展的患者随后以 1:1:1 的比例被随机分配到使用贝伐单抗、培美曲塞或两种药物的组合进行维持治疗。

English: however , overall survival ( OS ; the primary endpoint ) was similar between combination maintenance and bevacizumab ( 16.4 and 14.4 months , respectively ) and between combination maintenance and pemetrexed ( 16.4 and 15.9 months ) .
Chinese: 然而，总生存期（OS；主要终点）在联合维持和贝伐单抗之间（分别为 16.4 和 14.4 个月）以及联合维持和培美曲塞之间（16.4 和 15.9 个月）相似。

English: in these patients who are eligible for maintenance therapy , it would be recommended to give them continuation bevacizumab or switch them to pemetrexed maintenance .
Chinese: 在这些符合维持治疗条件的患者中，建议继续给予贝伐珠单抗或换用培美曲塞维持治疗。

English: current trials are ongoing to explore the use of checkpoint inhibitors for various durations of therapy in the metastatic setting .
Chinese: 目前正在进行的试验旨在探索检查点抑制剂在转移性治疗中的不同疗程。

English: Provencio and colleagues report the results of the phase II NADIM trial ( abstract 8509 ) involving 41 patients with resectable stage IIIA NSCLC treated with neoadjuvant nivolumab , paclitaxel , and carboplatin .
Chinese: Provencio 及其同事报告了 II 期 NADIM 试验（摘要 8509）的结果，该试验涉及 41 名可切除的 IIIA 期 NSCLC 患者，这些患者接受了新辅助纳武单抗、紫杉醇和卡铂治疗。

English: after resection ( 90 % lobectomy , 10 % pneumonectomy ) , patients were given adjuvant nivolumab for 1 year .
Chinese: 切除后（90% 肺叶切除术，10% 全肺切除术），患者接受 nivolumab 辅助治疗 1 年。

English: a major pathologic response was seen in 83 % of patients , and a complete pathologic response was see in 71 % .
Chinese: 83%的患者出现主要病理反应，71%的患者出现完全病理反应。

English: downstaging was seen in 90 % of cases .
Chinese: 90% 的病例出现降期。

English: radiographic evaluation by RECIST showed a 71 % partial response and 7 % complete response .
Chinese: RECIST 的影像学评估显示 71% 的部分反应和 7% 的完全反应。

English: this study was important for three main reasons .
Chinese: 这项研究之所以重要，主要有以下三个原因。

English: second , the trial showed that neoadjuvant chemoimmunotherapy did not induce adverse toxicity and did not prevent surgical resections .
Chinese: 其次，该试验表明，新辅助化学免疫疗法不会引起不良毒性，也不会阻止手术切除。

English: third , because this was a multicenter study that was conducted throughout Spain , it showed that this treatment strategy is feasible and can be performed in the community .
Chinese: 第三，因为这是一项在整个西班牙进行的多中心研究，表明这种治疗策略是可行的，可以在社区进行。

English: however , it remains to be seen if these early markers of response will translate into a survival benefit .
Chinese: 然而，这些早期反应标志物是否会转化为生存获益还有待观察。

English: additional survival outcomes should be reported within the next year .
Chinese: 明年应报告更多的生存结果。

English: we hope they will show that the high responses translate into higher cure rates .
Chinese: 我们希望他们将证明高反应转化为更高的治愈率。

English: in NSCLC , RET fusions are identified in 2 % of NSCLC patients .
Chinese: 在 NSCLC 中，RET 融合在 2% 的 NSCLC 患者中被发现。

English: the RET alterations included 44 KIF5B , 16 CCDC6 , and 19 others ; 39 % of patients had baseline brain metastases , and the median number of prior therapies was 2 .
Chinese: RET 改变包括 44 个 KIF5B、16 个 CCDC6 和 19 个其他； 39 % 的患者有基线脑转移，先前治疗的中位数为 2 .

English: in 30 patients who received the recommended phase II dose of 400 mg daily and who had prior platinum chemotherapy , the response rate was 60 % .
Chinese: 在 30 名接受推荐 II 期剂量 400 mg/d 且之前接受过铂类化疗的患者中，反应率为 60%。

English: grade ≥ 3 toxicity ( increased liver function tests , hypertension , fatigue , decreased neutrophils , and constipation ) was seen in 28 % of patients , and 3 % discontinued treatment due to toxicity .
Chinese: 28% 的患者出现 ≥ 3 级毒性（肝功能测试增加、高血压、疲劳、中性粒细胞减少和便秘），3% 的患者因毒性而停止治疗。

English: the toxicity profile is reasonable and manageable , and it is anticipated that once expansion cohort data are complete , registration approval will occur if the response rate holds .
Chinese: 毒性特征是合理且可控的，预计一旦扩展队列数据完成，如果反应率保持不变，就会批准注册。

English: five of 8 patients who had prior immunotherapy had a confirmed response .
Chinese: 先前接受过免疫治疗的 8 名患者中有 5 名确认有反应。

English: the most common adverse effect was myelosuppression ( 22.0 % grade 3 , 23.8 % grade 4 ) ; 3.8 % had grade 3 or 4 febrile neutropenia , and 6.6 % had grade 3 or 4 thrombocytopenia .
Chinese: 最常见的不良反应是骨髓抑制（22.0% 3 级，23.8% 4 级）； 3.8% 有 3 级或 4 级发热性中性粒细胞减少症，6.6% 有 3 级或 4 级血小板减少症。

English: only 3.8 % of patients required treatment discontinuation .
Chinese: 只有 3.8% 的患者需要停止治疗。

English: however , additional studies are needed to better identify which patients would benefit from this agent ; those with sensitive disease appear to have the greatest survival benefit .
Chinese: 然而，需要更多的研究来更好地确定哪些患者会从该药物中获益；那些患有敏感疾病的人似乎有最大的生存益处。

English: what was interesting in this trial was that the cohort of patients who had prior immunotherapy appeared to respond well to lurbinectedin .
Chinese: 该试验的有趣之处在于，先前接受过免疫治疗的患者队列似乎对 lurbinectedin 反应良好。

English: additional studies are ongoing .
Chinese: 更多的研究正在进行中。

English: after adjustment for multiple variables , people in the highest quartile had 25 % , 22 % , and 25 % higher risks for overall CVD , coronary heart disease , and cerebrovascular disease , respectively , than did people in the lowest quartile during a median of 5 years .
Chinese: 对多个变量进行调整后，在中位数 5 年中，处于最高四分位数的人患心血管疾病、冠心病和脑血管疾病的风险分别比处于最低四分位数的人高 25 % 、 22 % 和 25 % 。 .

English: in addition , in a prospective Spanish study , researchers examined 20,000 university graduates ( mean age , 38 ) .
Chinese: 此外，在一项前瞻性西班牙研究中，研究人员对 20,000 名大学毕业生（平均年龄 38 岁）进行了检查。

English: intravenous thrombolysis and mechanical thrombectomy for acute ischemic stroke are largely focused on recanalization , but enhancing collateral blood flow could also improve perfusion and limit infarction .
Chinese: 急性缺血性卒中的静脉溶栓和机械血栓切除术主要集中在再通，但增强侧支血流也可以改善灌注和限制梗死。

English: stimulation of the sphenopalatine ganglion , which is accessible through the nasal mucosa , is thought to increase collateral cerebral blood flow through parasympathetic effects on anterior circulation vasculature and has been proposed as a potential intervention for stroke .
Chinese: 刺激可通过鼻粘膜进入的蝶腭神经节，被认为可通过对前循环血管系统的副交感神经作用增加侧支脑血流量，并已被提议作为中风的潜在干预措施。

English: patients eligible for reperfusion therapy were excluded .
Chinese: 符合再灌注治疗条件的患者被排除在外。

English: at 90 days , the proportion of patients with a lower level of disability than expected was similar in the two groups ( 49 % active vs. 45 % sham ; P = 0.31 ) .
Chinese: 在 90 天时，两组中残疾水平低于预期的患者比例相似（49% 活动组 45% 假组；P = 0.31）。

English: however , among the subset of 520 patients with confirmed cortical involvement and an NIHSS score ≥ 10 , 50 % of the active intervention group had improvement beyond expectation vs. 40 % of sham group ( P = 0.026 ) .
Chinese: 然而，在 520 名确诊皮质受累且 NIHSS 评分≥ 10 的患者子集中，50% 的积极干预组的改善超出预期，而假手术组为 40% (P = 0.026)。

English: serious adverse events and mortality were similar in the two groups .
Chinese: 两组的严重不良事件和死亡率相似。

English: sphenopalatine ganglion stimulation appears to be safe .
Chinese: 刺激蝶腭神经节似乎是安全的。

English: the relationship between outpatient systolic and diastolic blood pressure and cardiovascular outcomes remains unclear and has been complicated by recently revised guidelines with two different thresholds ( ≥ 140 / 90 mm Hg and ≥ 130 / 80 mm Hg ) for treating hypertension .
Chinese: 门诊收缩压和舒张压与心血管结局之间的关系仍不清楚，最近修订的指南中有两个不同的高血压治疗阈值（≥ 140 / 90 毫米汞柱和≥ 130 / 80 毫米汞柱），这一关系变得复杂。

English: using data from 1.3 million adults in a general outpatient population , we performed a multivariable Cox survival analysis to determine the effect of the burden of systolic and diastolic hypertension on a composite outcome of myocardial infarction , ischemic stroke , or hemorrhagic stroke over a period of 8 years .
Chinese: 使用普通门诊患者中 130 万成年人的数据，我们进行了多变量 Cox 生存分析，以确定收缩压和舒张压高血压的负担对心肌梗死、缺血性中风或出血性中风的复合结果的影响，持续时间为 8 年。年 。

English: the analysis controlled for demographic characteristics and coexisting conditions .
Chinese: 该分析控制了人口特征和合并症。

English: the burdens of systolic and diastolic hypertension each independently predicted adverse outcomes .
Chinese: 收缩压和舒张压高血压的负担各自独立预测不良后果。

English: similar results were observed with the lower threshold of hypertension ( ≥ 130 / 80 mm Hg ) and with systolic and diastolic blood pressures used as predictors without hypertension thresholds .
Chinese: 在较低的高血压阈值 (≥ 130 / 80 mm Hg) 以及在没有高血压阈值的情况下将收缩压和舒张压用作预测指标时观察到类似的结果。

English: thresholds for hypertension and prevailing concepts about hypertension have shifted over time .
Chinese: 随着时间的推移，高血压的阈值和关于高血压的流行观念发生了变化。

English: constructs about the consequences of isolated diastolic , isolated systolic , and combined systolic and diastolic hypertension1 evolved in the 1960s , with a prevailing notion that only diastolic hypertension affected outcomes .
Chinese: 关于单纯舒张期高血压、单纯收缩期高血压以及收缩压和舒张期合并高血压 1 的后果的构想在 1960 年代形成，普遍认为只有舒张期高血压会影响结局。

English: despite often assigning little importance to diastolic blood pressure in the management of hypertension , clinicians still record and target values for both systolic and diastolic blood pressures .
Chinese: 尽管在高血压的管理中通常不太重视舒张压，临床医生仍然记录收缩压和舒张压的目标值。

English: we sought to determine whether the burdens of systolic and diastolic hypertension each independently predict the risk of adverse cardiovascular outcomes .
Chinese: 我们试图确定收缩压和舒张压高血压的负担是否各自独立预测不良心血管结局的风险。

English: we performed a retrospective cohort study involving outpatients from Kaiser Permanente Northern California ( KPNC ) , a large integrated health care delivery system with more than 4 million members that reflects the diverse population of Northern California.13
Chinese: 我们进行了一项回顾性队列研究，涉及来自 Kaiser Permanente Northern California (KPNC) 的门诊患者，这是一个大型综合医疗保健服务系统，拥有超过 400 万名成员，反映了北加州多样化的人口。 13

English: KPNC integrates data on outpatient encounters , inpatient care , pharmacy services , and laboratory services into a single electronic medical record.14
Chinese: KPNC 将门诊、住院护理、药房服务和实验室服务的数据整合到一个电子病历中。 14

English: participants were enrolled in KPNC from January 1 , 2007 , through December 31 , 2016 , or until death , with no more than a mean of 31 days of disenrollment per year in the study .
Chinese: 参与者从 2007 年 1 月 1 日到 2016 年 12 月 31 日，或直到死亡，在该研究中每年平均退出时间不超过 31 天。

English: primary PREDICTORS
Chinese: 主要预测因素

English: the primary predictors in our study were the burdens of systolic and diastolic hypertension , which are continuous measures of the degree of hypertension , calculated as follows .
Chinese: 我们研究中的主要预测因子是收缩压和舒张压高血压的负担，它们是高血压程度的连续测量值，计算如下。

English: the weighted average blood pressure was first determined by performing linear interpolation over the days between measurements , including data from both the baseline and observation periods , up to an outcome event , if one occurred .
Chinese: 加权平均血压首先是通过在测量之间的几天内进行线性插值来确定的，包括来自基线和观察期的数据，直到出现结果事件（如果发生的话）。

English: measured values and the interpolated daily values between measurements were then averaged .
Chinese: 然后对测量值和测量之间的内插日值进行平均。

English: all multivariable models ( see below ) controlled for all covariates unless stated otherwise .
Chinese: 除非另有说明，否则所有多变量模型（见下文）均针对所有协变量进行控制。

English: the primary outcome in our study was a composite of the first episode of myocardial infarction , ischemic stroke , or hemorrhagic stroke during the observation period , with an event defined as hospitalization with a discharge diagnosis matching one of the components of the composite primary outcome , as previously validated for this population.15,16
Chinese: 我们研究中的主要结果是观察期间首次心肌梗死、缺血性卒中或出血性卒中的复合事件，事件定义为住院，出院诊断与复合主要结果的一个组成部分相匹配，如之前已针对该人群进行过验证。 15,16

English: death was not part of the primary outcome .
Chinese: 死亡不是主要结果的一部分。

English: all multivariable models in the study controlled for the full set of covariates ( see above ) , with the exception of models specifically addressing the role of confounding by age in producing a J curve in bivariate analysis ( see below ) .
Chinese: 研究中的所有多变量模型都控制了整套协变量（见上文），但在双变量分析中专门解决年龄混淆在产生 J 曲线中的作用的模型除外（见下文）。

English: bivariate analyses were also performed to explore the tabular relationship between quantiles ( cutoff points ) of blood pressures and the risk of a composite outcome event at each quantile .
Chinese: 还进行了双变量分析，以探索血压分位数（截止点）与每个分位数的复合结果事件风险之间的表格关系。

English: to perform similar analyses , but with control for the full list of covariates above , multivariable logistic regression was used to generate a model estimation of event risk , with controls held at means .
Chinese: 为了执行类似的分析，但控制了上述协变量的完整列表，使用多变量逻辑回归来生成事件风险的模型估计，控制保持在均值。

English: the same structure of predictors ( including blood pressures recorded up to the point of an event , if one occurred ) , covariates , and outcomes that were used in Cox regression was used in logistic regression but without the time coding of outcome that was used in the Cox models .
Chinese: Cox 回归中使用的相同预测变量结构（包括事件发生时的血压记录，如果发生的话） 、协变量和结果用于逻辑回归，但没有用于结果的时间编码考克斯模型。

English: study POPULATION , MEASUREMENTS , AND OUTCOMES
Chinese: 研究人口、测量和结果

English: the baseline characteristics of the participants are shown in Table 1 .
Chinese: 参与者的基线特征如表1所示。

English: prevalence OF MEASUREMENTS INDICATING HYPERTENSION
Chinese: 指示高血压的测量值的患病率

English: for the threshold of 140 / 90 mm Hg , 18.9 % of the measurements showed hypertension , whereas for the threshold of 130 / 80 mm Hg , 43.5 % of the measurements showed hypertension .
Chinese: 对于140 / 90 mm Hg 的阈值，18.9% 的测量值显示高血压，而对于130 / 80 mm Hg 的阈值，43.5% 的测量值显示高血压。

English: relationship BETWEEN BLOOD PRESSURE AND CARDIOVASCULAR OUTCOMES
Chinese: 血压与心血管结果之间的关系

English: quantiles of increasing systolic blood pressure were associated with an increased risk of an adverse outcome ( Figure 3A and 3B ) .
Chinese: 收缩压升高的分位数与不良后果风险增加相关（图 3A 和 3B）。

English: age and other covariates appeared to explain at least part of this relationship ( Figure 3D ) .
Chinese: 年龄和其他协变量似乎至少可以部分解释这种关系（图 3D）。

English: stratification of these models according to race or ethnic group or to sex showed similar results across these categories .
Chinese: 根据种族或族裔群体或性别对这些模型进行分层显示，这些类别的结果相似。

English: when we used blood pressures from only the baseline period , similar results were seen for both hypertension thresholds .
Chinese: 当我们仅使用基线期的血压时，两个高血压阈值的结果相似。

English: we also constructed models in which continuous blood pressures were used without the introduction of thresholds .
Chinese: 我们还构建了在不引入阈值的情况下使用连续血压的模型。

English: these relationships also did not differ when we compared participants taking antihypertensive medications throughout the observation period with participants who were not taking antihypertensive medications at any point .
Chinese: 当我们将在整个观察期间服用抗高血压药物的参与者与在任何时候都没有服用抗高血压药物的参与者进行比较时，这些关系也没有差异。

English: the overall pattern of a greater effect of systolic blood pressure on outcomes was observed across age groups , with lower hazard ratios for both systolic and diastolic hypertension burden observed at older ages .
Chinese: 在不同年龄组观察到收缩压对结果影响更大的总体模式，在年龄较大的人群中观察到收缩压和舒张压高血压负担的风险比较低。

English: details are provided in Figure S9 and Tables S4 through S7 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录中的图 S9 和表 S4 至表 S7 提供了详细信息。

English: at both thresholds , the burden of isolated diastolic hypertension was also associated with the composite outcome among participants who did not have a burden of systolic hypertension .
Chinese: 在这两个阈值下，单纯舒张期高血压的负担也与没有收缩期高血压负担的参与者的综合结果相关。

English: systolic hypertension had a greater effect at lower diastolic blood pressures .
Chinese: 收缩压升高在舒张压降低时影响更大。

English: participants with a weighted average systolic blood pressure of approximately 160 mm Hg ( z score , + 3 ) had a predicted risk of a composite outcome event at 8 years of 4.8 % , whereas those with a systolic blood pressure of approximately 136 mm Hg ( z score , + 1 ) had a predicted risk of 1.9 % .
Chinese: 加权平均收缩压约为 160 毫米汞柱（ z 评分， + 3 ）的参与者在 8 年时发生复合结果事件的预测风险为 4.8 % ，而那些收缩压约为 136 毫米汞柱（ z分数, + 1) 的预测风险为 1.9%。

English: participants with a diastolic blood pressure of approximately 96 mm Hg ( z score , + 3 ) had a predicted risk of the composite outcome of 3.6 % , whereas those with a diastolic blood pressure of approximately 81 mm Hg ( z score , + 1 ) had a predicted risk of 1.9 % .
Chinese: 舒张压约为 96 毫米汞柱（ z 分数， + 3 ）的参与者的复合结果的预测风险为 3.6 % ，而舒张压约为 81 毫米汞柱（ z 分数， + 1 ）的参与者有预测风险为 1.9%。

English: we found that systolic and diastolic hypertension independently predicted adverse outcomes , despite a greater effect of systolic hypertension .
Chinese: 我们发现收缩压和舒张压高血压可独立预测不良后果，尽管收缩压高血压的影响更大。

English: we found that the J curve was explained at least in part by the relationship to age and other covariates ; in addition , we found that systolic hypertension had a greater effect in the group of participants with lower diastolic blood pressures , an observation that had been previously reported to explain the J curve.18
Chinese: 我们发现 J 曲线至少部分可以通过与年龄和其他协变量的关系来解释；此外，我们发现收缩压高血压对舒张压较低的参与者组的影响更大，这一观察结果曾被报道用于解释 J 曲线。 18

English: despite this , it has been argued , on the basis of data from the Framingham Heart Study , 2 that treatment for hypertension could improve with measurement of only systolic blood pressure.3
Chinese: 尽管如此，根据 Framingham 心脏研究 2 的数据，有人认为仅通过测量收缩压可以改善高血压的治疗。 3

English: our results show that this would be inappropriate : although systolic blood pressure indeed had a greater effect , systolic and diastolic blood pressures each independently influenced cardiovascular outcomes , and therefore diastolic blood pressure ought not to be ignored .
Chinese: 我们的结果表明这是不恰当的：虽然收缩压确实有更大的影响，但收缩压和舒张压各自独立地影响心血管结果，因此不应忽视舒张压。

English: data were obtained retrospectively from prospectively populated clinical databases .
Chinese: 数据是从前瞻性填充的临床数据库中回顾性获得的。

English: although we included data on antihypertensive treatment , we did not include data on measures such as diet modification .
Chinese: 尽管我们纳入了抗高血压治疗的数据，但并未纳入饮食调整等措施的数据。

English: death was used for censoring purposes , but it was not part of the primary outcome .
Chinese: 死亡被用于审查目的，但它不是主要结果的一部分。

English: we controlled for hypercholesterolemia as part of the medical history , but we did not include measured cholesterol values .
Chinese: 我们控制了作为病史一部分的高胆固醇血症，但我们没有包括测得的胆固醇值。

English: finally , our results from a large , multiethnic , and generally healthy population , across a wide range of ages , may not apply to specific subpopulations .
Chinese: 最后，我们的结果来自大量的、多种族的、普遍健康的人群，跨越广泛的年龄范围，可能不适用于特定的亚人群。

English: our study also has certain strengths .
Chinese: 我们的学习也有一定的优势。

English: because our data came from a comprehensive electronic medical record , 13,14 rather than a billing and administrative database , we used rigorously identified covariates and outcomes .
Chinese: 因为我们的数据来自全面的电子病历 13,14 而不是计费和管理数据库，所以我们使用了严格确定的协变量和结果。

English: in conclusion , both systolic and diastolic hypertension contribute significantly to cardiovascular risk , regardless of the threshold used for hypertension ( ≥ 140 / 90 mm Hg or ≥ 130 / 80 mm Hg ) .
Chinese: 总之，无论用于高血压的阈值（≥ 140 / 90 mm Hg 或≥ 130 / 80 mm Hg）如何，收缩压和舒张压高血压都会显着增加心血管风险。

English: exposure to light affects circadian rhythm by altering melatonin activity and can influence seasonal affective disorder , bipolar depression , and mania .
Chinese: 暴露在光线下会通过改变褪黑激素的活性来影响昼夜节律，并且会影响季节性情感障碍、双相抑郁症和躁狂症。

English: however , do individuals vary in the intensity of light that would suppress melatonin secretion ?
Chinese: 然而，抑制褪黑激素分泌的光照强度是否因人而异？

English: overall , the mean effective dose for 50 % suppression of melatonin ( ED50 ) was 24.6 lux .
Chinese: 总体而言，抑制 50% 褪黑激素 (ED50) 的平均有效剂量为 24.6 lux。

English: greater light intensity was related to delayed melatonin onset .
Chinese: 更强的光照强度与延迟的褪黑激素作用有关。

English: varying light intensity from 10 to 50 lux delayed melatonin onset from 22 to 109 minutes .
Chinese: 从 10 勒克斯到 50 勒克斯不等的光照强度可将褪黑激素的作用延迟 22 到 109 分钟。

English: great interindividual differences were seen , from 6 to 350 lux .
Chinese: 从 6 勒克斯到 350 勒克斯可见很大的个体差异。

English: this variability could affect many neuropsychiatric disorders .
Chinese: 这种变异性可能会影响许多神经精神疾病。

English: for example , our instructions for sleep hygiene often include a directive to avoid bright screens in the evening , but the range of responsivity to dim indoor light ( 50 lux ) is large .
Chinese: 例如，我们的睡眠卫生说明通常包括避免在晚上使用明亮屏幕的指令，但对昏暗室内光线 (50 lux) 的响应范围很大。

English: disorders like circadian rhythm disturbances , daytime fatigue , and mood disorders might involve large interindividual differences for response to light .
Chinese: 昼夜节律紊乱、白天疲劳和情绪障碍等疾病可能涉及对光反应的巨大个体差异。

English: high consumption of red meat is associated with excess risks for cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) , cancer , and death .
Chinese: 大量食用红肉会增加心血管疾病 (CVD)、癌症和死亡的风险。

English: participants were free of CVD and cancer at baseline .
Chinese: 参与者在基线时没有 CVD 和癌症。

English: data were collected from 1986 through 2010 ; diet and lifestyle factors were measured every 4 years .
Chinese: 数据收集自 1986 年至 2010 年；每 4 年测量一次饮食和生活方式因素。

English: more than 14,000 deaths occurred during the studies .
Chinese: 超过 14,000 人在研究期间死亡。

English: reducing red meat intake and replacing it with other sources of protein , whole grains , or vegetables was associated with significantly lower relative risks ( range , 5 % to 26 % lower ) .
Chinese: 减少红肉摄入量并用其他来源的蛋白质、全谷物或蔬菜取而代之与显着降低的相对风险相关（范围，降低 5% 至 26%）。

English: elevated expression of FKBP5 protein promotes inflammation .
Chinese: FKBP5 蛋白表达升高促进炎症。

English: aging , stress ( particularly childhood trauma ) , and depression are associated with elevated risk for cardiovascular disease , but how ?
Chinese: 衰老、压力（尤其是童年创伤）和抑郁与心血管疾病风险增加有关，但如何关联呢？

English: an international consortium studied four large cohorts that involved more than 3000 people and identified one potentially important mechanism .
Chinese: 一个国际财团研究了四个涉及 3000 多人的大型队列，并确定了一个潜在的重要机制。

English: aging , stress , and depression all were correlated not only with the incidence of cardiovascular disease but also with increased production ( expression ) of a protein called FKBP5 .
Chinese: 衰老、压力和抑郁不仅与心血管疾病的发病率有关，而且与一种叫做 FKBP5 的蛋白质的产生（表达）增加有关。

English: diminishing the production of FKBP5 by gene editing , and blocking the action of FKBP5 by pharmacological inhibitors , both greatly diminished the inflammatory response .
Chinese: 通过基因编辑减少 FKBP5 的产生，以及通过药理学抑制剂阻断 FKBP5 的作用，都大大减少了炎症反应。

English: certain inherited alterations in gene structure ( e.g. , mutations in the gene for the LDL cholesterol receptor ) affect cardiovascular risk .
Chinese: 基因结构的某些遗传改变（例如 LDL 胆固醇受体基因突变）会影响心血管风险。

English: however , this study suggests that changing the expression ( not the structure ) of genes is one way that aging , lifestyle , and life events might affect risk .
Chinese: 然而，这项研究表明，改变基因的表达（而不是结构）是衰老、生活方式和生活事件可能影响风险的一种方式。

English: in showing that increased expression of the FKBP5 gene promotes inflammation , which confers vascular disease risk , the investigators also have identified the FKBP5 protein as a potential target for therapeutic intervention .
Chinese: 为了表明 FKBP5 基因表达的增加会促进炎症，从而增加血管疾病的风险，研究人员还将 FKBP5 蛋白确定为治疗干预的潜在目标。

English: a new online tool could allow assessment of risk for myocardial infarction during the ED visit .
Chinese: 一种新的在线工具可以在急诊就诊期间评估心肌梗塞的风险。

English: unfortunately , most prior studies evaluated a specific test ( troponin I or troponin T ) and a specific strategy ( single , early repeated , or delayed repeated measurements ) and are not applicable across all practice environments .
Chinese: 不幸的是，大多数先前的研究评估了特定测试（肌钙蛋白 I 或肌钙蛋白 T）和特定策略（单次、早期重复或延迟重复测量）并且不适用于所有实践环境。

English: among 22,651 patients , MI was diagnosed in 15 % .
Chinese: 在 22,651 名患者中，有 15% 的患者被诊断出心梗。

English: risk for MI increased with higher initial troponin level and with increases on remeasurement .
Chinese: 心肌梗死的风险随着初始肌钙蛋白水平的升高和重新测量的增加而增加。

English: by now , associations between elevated troponins and poor outcomes are not novel ( NEJM JW Emerg Med May 2019 and BMJ 2019 ; 364 : 1729 ) .
Chinese: 到目前为止，肌钙蛋白升高与不良结果之间的关联并不新鲜（NEJM JW Emerg Med 2019 年 5 月和 BMJ 2019；364：1729）。

English: expanding blood pressure treatment , reducing dietary sodium , and eliminating trans fats could dramatically decrease mortality .
Chinese: 扩大血压治疗、减少饮食中的钠含量和消除反式脂肪可以显着降低死亡率。

English: noncommunicable diseases ( NCDs ) are the leading cause of death worldwide and are largely preventable through changes in modifiable risk factors .
Chinese: 非传染性疾病 (NCD) 是全世界死亡的主要原因，并且在很大程度上可以通过改变可改变的风险因素来预防。

English: researchers quantified the global impact of three public health interventions on NCD mortality : increasing the coverage of hypertension treatment to 70 % , reducing dietary sodium by 30 % , and eliminating trans fats .
Chinese: 研究人员量化了三种公共卫生干预措施对非传染性疾病死亡率的全球影响：将高血压治疗的覆盖率提高到 70%，将饮食中的钠含量减少 30%，以及消除反式脂肪。

English: using data from a myriad of sources , including population health surveys and WHO Global Health Estimates , the investigators predicted changes in mortality between 2015 and 2040 .
Chinese: 研究人员使用多种来源的数据，包括人口健康调查和 WHO 全球健康估计，预测了 2015 年至 2040 年间死亡率的变化。

English: according to the analysis , the three interventions could delay 94.3 million deaths during 25 years ( 39.4 million from boosting hypertension treatment , 40.0 million from reducing sodium intake , and 14.8 million from eliminating trans fats ) .
Chinese: 根据分析，这三项干预措施可以在 25 年内延迟 9430 万人的死亡（3940 万人来自加强高血压治疗，4000 万人来自减少钠摄入量，1480 万人来自消除反式脂肪）。

English: the effects were greater for men than women and for older ( age ≥ 70 ) than younger people .
Chinese: 男性的影响大于女性，老年人（≥ 70 岁）的影响大于年轻人。

English: two randomized studies challenge the need for prolonged DAPT .
Chinese: 两项随机研究质疑延长 DAPT 的必要性。

English: two research groups have now examined this recommendation .
Chinese: 两个研究小组现在已经研究了这个建议。

English: the first month in both groups could be prasugrel ( 38 % of patients ) or clopidogrel .
Chinese: 两组的第一个月都可以使用普拉格雷（38% 的患者）或氯吡格雷。

English: this study allowed multiple DES types and other potent thienopyridines ( 23 % ) , not only clopidogrel .
Chinese: 这项研究允许使用多种 DES 类型和其他有效的噻吩并吡啶 (23%)，而不仅仅是氯吡格雷。

English: the rate of all ( but not major ) bleeding was lower with short DAPT .
Chinese: 短期 DAPT 的所有（但不是主要）出血率较低。

English: the findings were similar in ACS and stable CAD subgroups and across types of thienopyridine .
Chinese: 研究结果在 ACS 和稳定的 CAD 亚组以及噻吩并吡啶的不同类型中是相似的。

English: because many monotherapy patients continued aspirin beyond 3 months , study protocol adherence was 79 % in that arm .
Chinese: 由于许多单药治疗患者继续服用阿司匹林超过 3 个月，该组的研究方案依从性为 79%。

English: these trials highlight the bleeding risks associated with DAPT and the low risk of ischemic events , including stent thrombosis , with current DES .
Chinese: 这些试验强调了与 DAPT 相关的出血风险和低风险的缺血事件，包括支架内血栓形成，目前的 DES。

English: however , the current findings suggest that our guidelines should be updated to include shorter duration of DAPT via early discontinuation of aspirin in selected patients .
Chinese: 然而，目前的研究结果表明，我们的指南应该更新，以包括通过在选定患者中提前停用阿司匹林来缩短 DAPT 的持续时间。

English: because type 1 diabetes mellitus ( DM ) is the result of immune destruction of pancreatic islet cells , immunologic interventions have shown promise in delaying its onset .
Chinese: 由于 1 型糖尿病 (DM) 是胰岛细胞免疫破坏的结果，免疫干预已显示出延缓其发病的希望。

English: the median time to diagnosis of clinical DM was 48 months in the teplizumab group compared with 24 months in the placebo group ( P = 0.006 ) .
Chinese: teplizumab 组诊断临床 DM 的中位时间为 48 个月，而安慰剂组为 24 个月 (P = 0.006)。

English: five times more adverse events were reported in the teplizumab group than in the placebo group ( 112 vs. 32 ) ; the most frequent adverse events among teplizumab recipients were transient lymphopenia ( 75 % ) and rash ( 36 % ) .
Chinese: teplizumab 组报告的不良事件是安慰剂组的五倍（112 对 32）； teplizumab 接受者中最常见的不良事件是短暂性淋巴细胞减少 (75%) 和皮疹 (36%)。

English: immune therapy can delay onset of clinical DM in those already in early stages of its natural history .
Chinese: 免疫治疗可以延迟那些已经处于其自然病程早期阶段的临床 DM 的发作。

English: while this is a significant advance , as editorialists state , it is not yet a cure .
Chinese: 虽然这是一个重大进步，正如社论所说，但它还不能治愈。

English: yet these impressive results hold promise for the future .
Chinese: 然而，这些令人印象深刻的结果为未来带来了希望。

English: recombinant human soluble thrombomodulin caused excess bleeding .
Chinese: 重组人可溶性血栓调节蛋白引起出血过多。

English: based on a single 2001 study , the U.S. FDA approved recombinant activated protein C ( drotrecogin alfa ; Xigris ) for patients with severe sepsis ( NEJM JW Gen Med Apr 15 2001 and N Engl J Med 2001 ; 344 : 699 ) .
Chinese: 基于 2001 年的一项研究，美国 FDA 批准重组活化蛋白 C（drotrecogin alfa；Xigris）用于严重败血症患者（NEJM JW Gen Med 2001 年 4 月 15 日和 N Engl J Med 2001；344：699）。

English: investigators randomized 800 patients with sepsis and coagulopathy to receive rhsTM or placebo .
Chinese: 研究人员将 800 名患有脓毒症和凝血病的患者随机分配接受 rhsTM 或安慰剂。

English: three quarters of patients had multiple organ dysfunction , most commonly cardiovascular and respiratory .
Chinese: 四分之三的患者有多器官功能障碍，最常见的是心血管和呼吸系统。

English: patients with sepsis and coagulopathy should not be treated with rhsTM ( which is not available in the U.S. ) .
Chinese: 脓毒症和凝血病患者不应接受 rhsTM（在美国不可用）治疗。

English: we randomly assigned patients to receive either ribociclib or placebo in addition to endocrine therapy ( goserelin and either a nonsteroidal aromatase inhibitor or tamoxifen ) .
Chinese: 除了内分泌治疗（戈舍瑞林和非甾体芳香化酶抑制剂或他莫昔芬）外，我们随机分配患者接受瑞博西尼或安慰剂。

English: there were 83 deaths among 335 patients ( 24.8 % ) in the ribociclib group and 109 deaths among 337 patients ( 32.3 % ) in the placebo group .
Chinese: 瑞博西尼组 335 名患者 (24.8%) 中有 83 人死亡，安慰剂组 337 名患者 (32.3%) 中有 109 人死亡。

English: the addition of ribociclib to endocrine therapy resulted in significantly longer overall survival than endocrine therapy alone .
Chinese: 在内分泌治疗中加入瑞博西尼比单独使用内分泌治疗可显着延长总生存期。

English: the percentage of patients who received subsequent antineoplastic therapy was balanced between the groups ( 68.9 % in the ribociclib group and 73.2 % in the placebo group ) .
Chinese: 接受后续抗肿瘤治疗的患者百分比在各组之间保持平衡（ribociclib 组为 68.9%，安慰剂组为 73.2%）。

English: ovarian suppression induces menopause in premenopausal patients ; however , suppression may not be complete , 7 and breast cancer that develops in premenopausal women may have biologic differences from that which develops in postmenopausal women .
Chinese: 卵巢抑制导致绝经前患者更年期；然而，抑制可能并不完全， 7 绝经前妇女患上的乳腺癌可能与绝经后妇女患上的乳腺癌有生物学上的差异。

English: premenopausal patients tend to be underrepresented in clinical trials of breast cancer .
Chinese: 绝经前患者在乳腺癌临床试验中的代表性往往不足。

English: it has been acknowledged that showing improvements in overall survival in trials involving patients with metastatic breast cancer may be challenging because of potential crossover between treatment groups and subsequent receipt of active treatments , as well as variability in previous treatment exposures between the groups.23,24
Chinese: 人们已经认识到，在涉及转移性乳腺癌患者的试验中显示总生存期的改善可能具有挑战性，因为治疗组之间可能存在交叉，随后接受积极治疗，以及各组之间先前治疗暴露的差异。 23,24

English: patients were randomly assigned , in a 1 : 1 ratio , to receive ribociclib ( at a dose of 600 mg , administered orally once daily for 21 consecutive days , followed by 7 days off , for a complete cycle of 28 days ) or matching placebo .
Chinese: 患者以 1:1 的比例被随机分配接受瑞博西尼（剂量为 600 毫克，每天口服一次，连续 21 天，然后停药 7 天，一个完整的 28 天周期）或匹配的安慰剂。

English: patients also received either a nonsteroidal aromatase inhibitor ( letrozole at a dose of 2.5 mg or anastrozole at a dose of 1 mg ) or tamoxifen ( at a dose of 20 mg ) , administered orally once daily continuously .
Chinese: 患者还接受了非甾体芳香化酶抑制剂（来曲唑剂量为 2.5 毫克或阿那曲唑剂量为 1 毫克）或他莫昔芬（剂量为 20 毫克），每天连续口服一次。

English: crossover between the two groups was not permitted .
Chinese: 两组之间的交叉是不允许的。

English: patients who had received adjuvant or neoadjuvant endocrine therapy were permitted to enroll .
Chinese: 允许接受辅助或新辅助内分泌治疗的患者入组。

English: previous endocrine therapy in the context of advanced disease was not permitted , but patients could have received tamoxifen or an aromatase inhibitor within 14 days before randomization or goserelin within 28 days before randomization for advanced breast cancer ; these patients continued treatment with goserelin plus the same hormone agent .
Chinese: 不允许既往在晚期疾病背景下接受过内分泌治疗，但患者可能在随机分组前 14 天内接受过他莫昔芬或芳香化酶抑制剂治疗，或在随机分组前 28 天内接受过戈舍瑞林治疗晚期乳腺癌；这些患者继续接受戈舍瑞林加同种激素药物的治疗。

English: patients who had received no more than one previous line of chemotherapy for advanced disease were also eligible .
Chinese: 先前因晚期疾病接受过不超过一种化疗的患者也符合条件。

English: previous treatment with a CDK4 / 6 inhibitor was not permitted .
Chinese: 不允许先前使用 CDK4/6 抑制剂进行治疗。

English: randomization was stratified according to the presence or absence of liver or lung metastases , previous chemotherapy for advanced disease ( yes or no ) , and endocrine therapy ( tamoxifen plus goserelin or an aromatase inhibitor plus goserelin ) .
Chinese: 根据是否存在肝或肺转移、既往晚期疾病化疗（是或否）和内分泌治疗（他莫昔芬加戈舍瑞林或芳香化酶抑制剂加戈舍瑞林）对随机化进行分层。

English: all patients as well as all investigators who administered treatment , assessed outcomes , and analyzed data were unaware of the group assignments .
Chinese: 所有患者以及实施治疗、评估结果和分析数据的所有研究人员都不知道分组情况。

English: detailed methods of this trial have been reported previously.17
Chinese: 该试验的详细方法之前已有报道。 17

English: the protocol , along with the statistical analysis plan , is available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 该方案和统计分析计划可与本文全文一起在 NEJM.org 获取。
