English: the time to subsequent chemotherapy was defined as the time from randomization to the beginning of the first chemotherapy after discontinuation of the trial regimen .
Chinese: 至后续化疗的时间定义为从随机化至停用试验方案后开始首次化疗的时间。

English: adverse events were monitored throughout the trial and were graded according to the National Cancer Institute Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events , version 4.03 .
Chinese: 在整个试验过程中监测不良事件，并根据美国国家癌症研究所不良事件通用术语标准 4.03 版进行分级。

English: the trial was funded by Novartis and was conducted in accordance with the provisions of the Declaration of Helsinki and Good Clinical Practice guidelines .
Chinese: 该试验由诺华公司资助，并根据赫尔辛基宣言和良好临床实践指南的规定进行。

English: the trial protocol and all amendments were approved by an independent ethics committee or the institutional review board at each site .
Chinese: 试验方案和所有修正案均由每个研究中心的独立伦理委员会或机构审查委员会批准。

English: a trial steering committee composed of participating international investigators and representatives of the sponsor oversaw the conduct of the trial .
Chinese: 由参与的国际研究人员和申办方代表组成的试验指导委员会监督试验的进行。

English: safety data were assessed by an independent data monitoring committee .
Chinese: 安全数据由一个独立的数据监测委员会评估。

English: all patients provided written informed consent before enrollment .
Chinese: 所有患者在入组前均提供了书面知情同意书。

English: representatives of the sponsor designed the trial , compiled the data , and vouch for the accuracy of the analyses .
Chinese: 申办者的代表设计了试验，整理了数据，并保证分析的准确性。

English: all authors had access to the data and vouch for the accuracy and completeness of the data and for the fidelity of the trial to the protocol .
Chinese: 所有作者都可以访问数据并保证数据的准确性和完整性以及试验对方案的忠实度。

English: all authors were involved in the interpretation of the data , contributed to the writing and review of all drafts of the manuscript , and made the decision to submit the manuscript for publication .
Chinese: 所有作者都参与了数据的解释，参与了所有手稿草稿的撰写和审阅，并做出了投稿发表的决定。

English: two professional medical writers provided editorial support and were paid by the sponsor .
Chinese: 两名专业医学作家提供编辑支持，费用由申办方支付。

English: for the analysis of overall survival , data for patients were censored at the date the patient was last known to be alive .
Chinese: 为了分析总生存期，患者的数据在最后一次知道患者还活着的日期进行了截尾。

English: from December 17 , 2014 , to August 1 , 2016 , a total of 335 patients were randomly assigned to the ribociclib group , and 337 to the placebo group ( Table S1 in the Supplementary Appendix , available at NEJM.org ) .
Chinese: 从 2014 年 12 月 17 日到 2016 年 8 月 1 日，共有 335 名患者被随机分配到瑞博西尼组，337 名患者分配到安慰剂组（补充附录表 S1，可在 NEJM.org 获取）。

English: details regarding patient screening and the population included in the efficacy analysis have been published previously.17
Chinese: 有关患者筛查和功效分析中包含的人群的详细信息先前已发表。 17

English: at the cutoff date for this analysis of overall survival , 173 patients were still receiving trial treatment : 116 of 335 patients ( 34.6 % ) in the ribociclib group and 57 of 337 ( 16.9 % ) in the placebo group .
Chinese: 在该总生存期分析的截止日期，173 名患者仍在接受试验治疗：ribociclib 组 335 名患者中的 116 名 (34.6%) 和安慰剂组 337 名患者中的 57 名 (16.9%)。

English: the median duration of exposure to placebo was approximately 1 year .
Chinese: 接触安慰剂的中位持续时间约为 1 年。

English: overall survival was significantly longer in the ribociclib group than in the placebo group , with a 29 % lower risk of death ( hazard ratio for death , 0.71 ; 95 % CI , 0.54 to 0.95 ) ( Figure 1A ) .
Chinese: ribociclib 组的总生存期明显长于安慰剂组，死亡风险降低 29%（死亡风险比，0.71；95% CI，0.54 至 0.95）（图 1A）。

English: the median overall survival could not be estimated in the ribociclib group and was 40.9 months in the placebo group ( 95 % CI , 37.8 to could not be estimated ) ( Figure 1A ) .
Chinese: ribociclib 组的中位总生存期无法估计，安慰剂组为 40.9 个月（95% CI，37.8 至无法估计）（图 1A）。

English: because the efficacy stopping boundary was crossed , the results reported here showed the superiority of ribociclib to placebo with respect to the key secondary end point of overall survival , and , according to the protocol , are considered final .
Chinese: 由于跨越了疗效终止边界，此处报告的结果表明，在关键的次要终点总生存期方面，ribociclib 优于安慰剂，并且根据方案，该结果被认为是最终结果。

English: prespecified analyses of overall survival were performed in subgroups defined according to the endocrine therapy received .
Chinese: 在根据接受的内分泌治疗定义的亚组中进行了预先指定的总生存期分析。

English: among the 495 patients who received an aromatase inhibitor , 61 of 248 patients ( 24.6 % ) in the ribociclib group and 80 of 247 ( 32.4 % ) in the placebo group died .
Chinese: 在接受芳香化酶抑制剂治疗的 495 名患者中，ribociclib 组 248 名患者中的 61 名 (24.6%) 和安慰剂组 247 名患者中的 80 名 (32.4%) 死亡。

English: estimated overall survival at 42 months among patients who received an aromatase inhibitor was 69.7 % ( 95 % CI , 61.3 to 76.7 ) in the ribociclib group and 43.0 % ( 95 % CI , 25.9 to 59.0 ) in the placebo group , and the hazard ratio for death was 0.70 ( 95 % CI , 0.50 to 0.98 ) ( Figure 1B ) .
Chinese: 瑞博西尼组接受芳香酶抑制剂治疗的患者在 42 个月时的估计总生存率为 69.7 % ( 95 % CI 61.3 至 76.7 ) ，安慰剂组为 43.0 % ( 95 % CI 25.9 至 59.0 ) ，风险比死亡率为 0.70（95% CI，0.50 至 0.98）（图 1B）。

English: among the 177 patients who received tamoxifen , 22 of 87 patients ( 25.3 % ) in the ribociclib group and 29 of 90 ( 32.2 % ) in the placebo group died .
Chinese: 在接受他莫昔芬治疗的 177 名患者中，ribociclib 组 87 名患者中的 22 名 (25.3%) 和安慰剂组 90 名患者中的 29 名 (32.2%) 死亡。

English: estimated overall survival at 42 months among patients who received tamoxifen was 71.2 % ( 95 % CI , 58.0 to 80.9 ) in the ribociclib group and 54.5 % ( 95 % CI , 36.0 to 69.7 ) in the placebo group , and the hazard ratio for death was 0.79 ( 95 % CI , 0.45 to 1.38 ) ( Figure 1C ) .
Chinese: 瑞博西尼组接受他莫昔芬治疗的患者在 42 个月时的总生存率估计为 71.2 % （ 95 % CI 58.0 至 80.9 ） ，安慰剂组为 54.5 % （ 95 % CI 36.0 至 69.7 ） ，死亡风险比为 0.79（95% CI，0.45 至 1.38）（图 1C）。

English: overall survival was also assessed in exploratory subgroups defined according to patient and disease characteristics , previous therapies , and geographic region ( Figure 2 ) .
Chinese: 总生存期也在根据患者和疾病特征、既往治疗和地理区域定义的探索性亚组中进行评估（图 2）。

English: in general , the overall survival benefit with ribociclib in these subgroups was consistent with that in the overall population ; however , the small numbers of patients in some of these subgroups resulted in wide confidence intervals .
Chinese: 总的来说，ribociclib 在这些亚组中的总体生存获益与在总体人群中的获益一致；然而，其中一些亚组中的少数患者导致置信区间较宽。

English: a total of 219 patients in the ribociclib group and 280 patients in the placebo group discontinued the trial regimen .
Chinese: ribociclib 组中共有 219 名患者和安慰剂组中有 280 名患者停止了试验治疗。

English: the percentage of these patients who received subsequent antineoplastic therapies was similar in the two groups : 151 patients ( 68.9 % ) in the ribociclib group and 205 ( 73.2 % ) in the placebo group ( Table 2 ) .
Chinese: 这些患者接受后续抗肿瘤治疗的百分比在两组中相似：ribociclib 组 151 名患者 (68.9%) 和安慰剂组 205 名 (73.2%)（表 2）。

English: chemotherapy alone ( 22.4 % in the ribociclib group and 28.6 % in the placebo group ) and hormone therapy alone ( 22.4 % and 20.4 % , respectively ) were the most common first subsequent antineoplastic therapies .
Chinese: 单纯化疗（ribociclib 组为 22.4%，安慰剂组为 28.6%）和单纯激素治疗（分别为 22.4% 和 20.4%）是最常见的后续抗肿瘤治疗。

English: pyrimidine analogues ( 29.7 % in the ribociclib group and 33.6 % in the placebo group ) and taxanes ( 24.2 % and 26.8 % , respectively ) were the most common chemotherapies in all subsequent lines of therapy .
Chinese: 嘧啶类似物（ribociclib 组为 29.7%，安慰剂组为 33.6%）和紫杉烷类（分别为 24.2% 和 26.8%）是所有后续治疗中最常用的化疗药物。

English: aromatase inhibitors ( 29.2 % in the ribociclib group and 27.5 % in the placebo group ) and antiestrogens ( 23.3 % and 25.4 % , respectively ) were the most common hormone therapies .
Chinese: 芳香化酶抑制剂（ribociclib 组为 29.2%，安慰剂组为 27.5%）和抗雌激素（分别为 23.3% 和 25.4%）是最常见的激素疗法。

English: adverse events in the two groups remained consistent with those in the primary analysis ( Table S3 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 两组的不良事件与主要分析中的一致（补充附录表S3）。

English: key grade 3 or 4 adverse events of special interest were neutropenia ( in 63.5 % of patients in the ribociclib group and 4.5 % in the placebo group ) , hepatobiliary toxic effects ( in 11 % and 6.8 % , respectively ) , and prolonged QT interval ( in 1.8 % and 1.2 % , respectively ) .
Chinese: 特别关注的关键 3 级或 4 级不良事件是中性粒细胞减少症（瑞博西尼组 63.5 % 的患者和安慰剂组 4.5 % 的患者） 、肝胆毒性作用（分别为 11 % 和 6.8 % ）和 QT 间期延长（分别为 1.8% 和 1.2%）。

English: because overall survival and postprogression outcomes are key factors in clinical decision making , the results of adding biologic treatments to endocrine therapies in early lines of therapy are highly relevant in this patient population .
Chinese: 由于总生存期和进展后结果是临床决策制定的关键因素，因此在早期治疗中将生物治疗加入内分泌治疗的结果与该患者群体高度相关。

English: after a median of 2 years of treatment exposure in the ribociclib group , no new safety signals were observed.17
Chinese: ribociclib 组接受治疗的中位数为 2 年之后，没有观察到新的安全信号。 17

English: no instances of symptomatic arrhythmias or torsades de pointes have been observed in this trial .
Chinese: 在该试验中没有观察到有症状的心律失常或尖端扭转型室性心动过速的实例。

English: one possible explanation for this treatment effect of ribociclib could be the premenopausal patient population .
Chinese: 对 ribociclib 的这种治疗效果的一种可能解释可能是绝经前患者群体。

English: alterations in the gene encoding fibroblast growth factor receptor ( FGFR ) are common in urothelial carcinoma and may be associated with lower sensitivity to immune interventions .
Chinese: 编码成纤维细胞生长因子受体 (FGFR) 的基因的改变在尿路上皮癌中很常见，并且可能与免疫干预的敏感性降低有关。

English: all the patients had a history of disease progression during or after at least one course of chemotherapy or within 12 months after neoadjuvant or adjuvant chemotherapy .
Chinese: 所有患者在至少一个疗程的化疗期间或之后或在新辅助或辅助化疗后12个月内均有疾病进展史。

English: prior immunotherapy was allowed .
Chinese: 之前的免疫治疗是允许的。

English: the primary end point was the objective response rate .
Chinese: 主要终点是客观反应率。

English: of these patients , 43 % had received at least two previous courses of treatment , 79 % had visceral metastases , and 53 % had a creatinine clearance of less than 60 ml per minute .
Chinese: 在这些患者中，43% 之前至少接受过两个疗程，79% 有内脏转移，53% 的肌酐清除率低于每分钟 60 毫升。

English: the rate of confirmed response to erdafitinib therapy was 40 % ( 3 % with a complete response and 37 % with a partial response ) .
Chinese: 对厄达替尼治疗的确认反应率为 40%（3% 完全反应，37% 部分反应）。

English: among the 22 patients who had undergone previous immunotherapy , the confirmed response rate was 59 % .
Chinese: 在既往接受过免疫治疗的 22 名患者中，确诊反应率为 59%。

English: the use of erdafitinib was associated with an objective tumor response in 40 % of previously treated patients who had locally advanced and unresectable or metastatic urothelial carcinoma with FGFR alterations .
Chinese: erdafitinib 的使用与 40% 的先前接受过治疗的局部晚期和不可切除或转移性尿路上皮癌伴 FGFR 改变的患者的客观肿瘤反应相关。

English: FGFRs induce signaling through networks that regulate cell proliferation , survival , migration , and differentiation.15
Chinese: FGFRs 通过调节细胞增殖、存活、迁移和分化的网络诱导信号传导。 15

English: mutations and fusions in FGFR2 / 3 are common in patients with urothelial carcinoma , particularly in the luminal I subtype , and can cause constitutive FGFR signaling that may contribute to carcinogenesis.15
Chinese: FGFR2 / 3 的突变和融合在尿路上皮癌患者中很常见，特别是在 luminal I 亚型中，并且可以引起可能导致癌变的组成型 FGFR 信号。 15

English: as many as 20 % of patients with advanced urothelial carcinoma have FGFR alterations , 16 and such mutations are even more frequent ( 37 % ) in patients with upper tract urothelial carcinoma.17
Chinese: 多达 20 % 的晚期尿路上皮癌患者有 FGFR 改变 16 ，这种突变在上尿路尿路上皮癌患者中更为常见 ( 37 % ) 17

English: thus , FGFR inhibition may be particularly appropriate in patients with luminal I subtype disease , in which immunotherapeutic approaches may be less effective .
Chinese: 因此，FGFR 抑制可能特别适用于 luminal I 亚型疾病患者，在这些患者中免疫治疗方法可能效果较差。

English: this ongoing study that included 126 sites in 14 countries was designed by the sponsor , Janssen Research and Development , with input from the first and last authors .
Chinese: 这项正在进行的研究包括 14 个国家的 126 个地点，由赞助商 Janssen Research and Development 设计，第一作者和最后一位作者提供了意见。

English: all the patients have provided written informed consent .
Chinese: 所有患者均提供了书面知情同意书。

English: a data review committee was commissioned by the sponsor to conduct interim analyses , monitor safety , review efficacy , and make recommendations regarding study conduct .
Chinese: 赞助商委托数据审查委员会进行中期分析、监测安全性、审查疗效并就研究实施提出建议。

English: all the authors assume responsibility for the completeness and accuracy of the data and for the fidelity of the study to the protocol ( available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org ) .
Chinese: 所有作者均对数据的完整性和准确性以及研究对方案（与本文全文可在 NEJM.org 获取）的忠实度负责。

English: the first and last authors developed the first draft of the manuscript with editorial assistance funded by the sponsor .
Chinese: 第一作者和最后一位作者在赞助商资助的编辑协助下起草了手稿的初稿。

English: all the authors had full access to and participated in the interpretation of the data and reviewed and approved the manuscript before submission for publication .
Chinese: 所有作者都可以完全访问并参与数据的解释，并在投稿前审阅并批准了手稿。

English: there was no specific selection of patients with any particular fusion or mutation on the list .
Chinese: 没有具体选择名单上有任何特定融合或突变的患者。

English: patients were also required to have a history of disease progression during or after at least one course of previous systemic chemotherapy or within 12 months after receiving neoadjuvant or adjuvant chemotherapy .
Chinese: 还要求患者在先前至少一个全身化疗期间或之后，或在接受新辅助或辅助化疗后 12 个月内有疾病进展史。

English: there was no limit on the number of previous courses of treatment or on the previous receipt of immunotherapy ( e.g. , treatment with an immune checkpoint inhibitor ) .
Chinese: 对既往疗程或既往接受免疫治疗（例如，免疫检查点抑制剂治疗）的次数没有限制。

English: patients were required to have adequate bone marrow , liver , and kidney function ( creatinine clearance , ≥ 40 ml per minute ) .
Chinese: 要求患者具有足够的骨髓、肝和肾功能（肌酐清除率，≥ 40 毫升/分钟）。

English: patients with phosphate levels persistently above the upper limit of the normal range despite medical management , uncontrolled cardiovascular disease , brain metastases , known hepatitis B or C infection , or known infection with the human immunodeficiency virus were excluded .
Chinese: 尽管进行了医疗管理，但磷酸盐水平持续高于正常范围上限的患者、未控制的心血管疾病、脑转移、已知的乙型或丙型肝炎感染或已知的人类免疫缺陷病毒感染被排除在外。

English: a planned interim analysis of safety and efficacy was performed in June and July 2016 .
Chinese: 计划于 2016 年 6 月和 2016 年 7 月进行安全性和有效性中期分析。

English: the amendment further specified that on day 14 , in patients with no adverse events that were considered by the investigator to be related to treatment , the daily dose of erdafitinib could be escalated to 9 mg with the use of a pharmacodynamically guided approach if the patients had not reached the target phosphate level of 5.5 mg per deciliter ( 1.8 mmol per liter ) , a level that had been associated with an improved response rate in the phase 1 study ( see the Background section in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 该修正案进一步规定，在第14天，如果患者没有发生研究者认为与治疗相关的不良事件，则可以使用药效学指导方法将厄达替尼的日剂量增加至9 mg ，如果患者有未达到 5.5 毫克/分升（1.8 毫摩尔/升）的目标磷酸盐水平，该水平在 1 期研究中与改善的反应率相关（见补充附录的背景部分）。

English: the patients continued to receive 8 mg once daily if their serum phosphate levels on day 14 were within the target range of 5.5 to less than 7.0 mg per deciliter ( 2.3 mmol per liter ) .
Chinese: 如果患者在第 14 天的血清磷酸盐水平在 5.5 至低于 7.0 毫克/分升（2.3 毫摩尔/升）的目标范围内，则他们继续接受 8 毫克每天一次的治疗。

English: the treatment with erdafitinib continued until disease progression or unacceptable adverse events , as determined by the investigator .
Chinese: erdafitinib 治疗一直持续到研究者确定出现疾病进展或不可接受的不良事件。

English: prophylactic measures to prevent adverse events are described in the Methods section in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录的方法部分描述了预防不良事件的预防措施。

English: we used RECIST to assess patients for efficacy using computed tomography or magnetic resonance imaging of the chest , abdomen , and pelvis once every 6 weeks for the first 3 months , once every 12 weeks for the next 9 months , and then once every 4 to 6 months until disease progression .
Chinese: 我们使用 RECIST 评估患者的疗效，使用胸部、腹部和骨盆的计算机断层扫描或磁共振成像，前 3 个月每 6 周一次，接下来的 9 个月每 12 周一次，然后每 4 至 6 个月一次月直至病情进展。

English: all objective responses required confirmation by an additional scan within 4 to 6 weeks after the first assessment .
Chinese: 所有客观反应都需要在第一次评估后 4 至 6 周内通过额外扫描进行确认。

English: patients were contacted every 12 weeks for survival assessment .
Chinese: 每 12 周联系患者进行生存评估。

English: we evaluated safety using the results of clinical laboratory testing , physical examination , electrocardiography , and ophthalmologic examination .
Chinese: 我们使用临床实验室测试、身体检查、心电图和眼科检查的结果评估了安全性。

English: adverse events and abnormalities were assessed by the investigators and graded according to the National Cancer Institute criteria .
Chinese: 不良事件和异常由研究者评估，并根据美国国家癌症研究所的标准进行分级。

English: the primary end point was the confirmed response rate among patients treated with the selected regimen .
Chinese: 主要终点是接受所选方案治疗的患者中确认的反应率。

English: the primary hypothesis was that the objective response rate to a daily regimen of 8 mg or 9 mg of erdafitinib would be more than 25 % .
Chinese: 主要假设是，每天服用 8 毫克或 9 毫克厄达替尼的客观反应率将超过 25%。

English: efficacy end points were analyzed at the cutoff date for the primary analysis .
Chinese: 在主要分析的截止日期分析疗效终点。

English: of 210 eligible patients , 33 were randomly assigned to the intermittent regimen and 78 to the continuous regimen .
Chinese: 在 210 名符合条件的患者中，33 名被随机分配到间歇性治疗方案，78 名患者被随机分配到连续性治疗方案。

English: the median number of monthly cycles of erdafitinib was 5 ( range , 1 to 18 ) ; the median treatment duration was 5.3 months .
Chinese: erdafitinib 的月周期中位数为 5（范围，1 至 18）；中位治疗持续时间为 5.3 个月。

English: of the 99 patients , 41 had an escalation in the daily dose of erdafitinib to 9 mg ; 13 patients continued treatment for at least 4 weeks after disease progression , according to the protocol .
Chinese: 在 99 名患者中，41 名将厄达替尼的日剂量增加至 9 毫克；根据方案，13 名患者在疾病进展后继续治疗至少 4 周。

English: the baseline characteristics of the patients who were treated during the randomized phase of the study are listed in Table S2 and the Results section in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 在研究的随机阶段接受治疗的患者的基线特征列于表 S2 和补充附录的结果部分。

English: because the lower boundary of the confidence interval was more than 25 % , the primary end point was achieved .
Chinese: 因为置信区间的下限超过 25%，所以达到了主要终点。

English: two patients did not undergo any disease evaluation after baseline .
Chinese: 两名患者在基线后未进行任何疾病评估。

English: response rates were similar regardless of previous chemotherapy , the number of previous courses of treatment , the presence of visceral metastasis , or baseline characteristics such as age , sex , hemoglobin level , or renal function ( Table 2 and Figure 1A ) .
Chinese: 无论既往化疗、既往疗程数、是否存在内脏转移或年龄、性别、血红蛋白水平或肾功能等基线特征如何，反应率都相似（表 2 和图 1A）。

English: the response rate according to independent radiologic review was 34 % ( 95 % CI , 25 to 44 ) , which resulted in a relative discordance rate of 16 % in the primary efficacy population .
Chinese: 根据独立放射学审查的反应率为 34%（95% CI，25 至 44），这导致主要疗效人群的相对不一致率为 16%。

English: response rates among the patients who received the randomized intermittent and continuous regimens are listed in Table S3 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录表 S3 列出了接受随机间歇和连续治疗方案的患者的缓解率。

English: an additional 26 patients with FGFR mutations had stable disease for a median of 3.7 months ( range , 0 to 13.6 ) .
Chinese: 另外 26 名 FGFR 突变患者的疾病稳定期中位数为 3.7 个月（范围，0 至 13.6）。

English: responses were not affected by the presence of a particular mutation .
Chinese: 反应不受特定突变的影响。

English: among the 25 patients with FGFR fusions , the response rate was 16 % .
Chinese: 在 25 名 FGFR 融合患者中，缓解率为 16%。

English: the most common fusion was FGFR3 : TACC3v1 , which was found in 11 patients ( Table S1 in the Supplementary Appendix ) ; of these patients , 4 ( 36 % ) had a response to treatment .
Chinese: 最常见的融合是 FGFR3:TACC3v1，在 11 名患者中发现（补充附录表 S1）；在这些患者中，有 4 名 (36%) 对治疗有反应。

English: approximately 30 % of these responses were maintained for more than 12 months ( Figure 1B ) .
Chinese: 这些反应中约有 30% 维持了 12 个月以上（图 1B）。

English: at the time of data cutoff , 21 % of the patients were continuing to receive erdafitinib .
Chinese: 在数据截止时，21% 的患者继续接受厄达替尼治疗。

English: at 12 months , the rate of overall survival was 55 % ( 95 % CI , 43 to 66 ) .

subsequent therapy was administered to 34 patients , of whom 25 % received one subsequent course of treatment and 9 % received two subsequent courses ; 19 patients received chemotherapy , and 15 received immunotherapy as a first subsequent therapy .
Chinese: 34例患者接受了后续治疗，其中25%接受了1个后续疗程，9%接受了2个后续疗程。 19 名患者接受了化疗，15 名患者接受了免疫治疗作为第一种后续治疗。

English: no patient had an objective response to the first subsequent course of chemotherapy ; 1 patient had a partial response to the first subsequent course of immunotherapy .
Chinese: 没有患者对第一个后续化疗疗程有客观反应； 1 名患者对随后的第一个免疫治疗疗程有部分反应。

English: a total of 67 % of such events were of grade 3 or 4 ; 46 % of the patients reported having an adverse event of grade 3 or higher that was considered by investigators to be related to treatment ( Table S6 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 总共 67% 的此类事件属于 3 级或 4 级； 46% 的患者报告有 3 级或更高级别的不良事件，研究人员认为这些不良事件与治疗相关（补充附录表 S6）。

English: common adverse events of grade 3 or higher were hyponatremia ( 11 % ) , stomatitis ( 10 % ) , and asthenia ( 7 % ) .
Chinese: 3 级或更高级别的常见不良事件是低钠血症 (11%)、口腔炎 (10%) 和乏力 (7%)。

English: serious adverse events were reported in 39 patients ( Table S4 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 39 名患者报告了严重不良事件（补充附录表 S4）。

English: a dose reduction was required in 55 patients .
Chinese: 55 名患者需要减少剂量。

English: the most common adverse events leading to a dose reduction were stomatitis in 16 patients and hyperphosphatemia in 9 patients .
Chinese: 导致剂量减少的最常见不良事件是 16 名患者的口腔炎和 9 名患者的高磷血症。

English: among the 41 patients who had a dose escalation to 9 mg of erdafitinib per day , 24 ( 59 % ) required at least one dose reduction .
Chinese: 在剂量增加到每天 9 mg erdafitinib 的 41 名患者中，24 名 (59%) 需要至少减少一次剂量。

English: common adverse events were similar among all the regimens ( Tables S5 , S6 , and S7 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 所有方案的常见不良事件相似（补充附录表 S5、S6 和 S7）。

English: one patient died from a myocardial infarction that was considered to be unrelated to treatment .
Chinese: 一名患者死于被认为与治疗无关的心肌梗塞。

English: adverse events of special interest or clinical importance and their management are presented in Table S8 and the Results section in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 具有特殊意义或临床重要性的不良事件及其处理见表 S8 和补充附录的结果部分。

English: among the patients with central serous retinopathy events , 76 % of the events resolved with a dose interruption or reduction or with the administration of a concomitant medication ; all unresolved events were of grade 1 or 2 .
Chinese: 在发生中心性浆液性视网膜病变事件的患者中，76% 的事件通过中断或减少剂量或同时服用药物而得到解决；所有未解决的事件均为 1 级或 2 级。

English: this study met its primary objective , with a 40 % confirmed response rate after continuous daily treatment with 8 mg or 9 mg of oral erdafitinib .
Chinese: 这项研究达到了其主要目标，在连续每天口服 8 毫克或 9 毫克厄达替尼治疗后，确认的缓解率为 40%。

English: these findings showed that among patients with locally advanced and unresectable or metastatic urothelial carcinoma with certain FGFR alterations , erdafitinib had promising antitumor activity .
Chinese: 这些发现表明，在具有某些 FGFR 改变的局部晚期和不可切除或转移性尿路上皮癌患者中，erdafitinib 具有令人鼓舞的抗肿瘤活性。

English: the response to erdafitinib was rapid and independent of the number of previous courses and types of therapy , the presence of visceral metastasis , or tumor location .
Chinese: 对 erdafitinib 的反应非常迅速，并且与之前的疗程数和治疗类型、是否存在内脏转移或肿瘤位置无关。

English: included in this analysis were patients with visceral metastasis and poor kidney function in whom multiple courses of therapy had failed .
Chinese: 纳入该分析的是患有内脏转移和肾功能不佳且多个疗程均失败的患者。

English: as allowed in the protocol , 13 patients continued to receive treatment after disease progression , which included limited progression in a target lesion or the appearance of a small new lesion while the patient was assessed as having ongoing clinical benefit .
Chinese: 按照方案的规定，13 名患者在疾病进展后继续接受治疗，包括目标病灶进展有限或出现新的小病灶，同时患者被评估为具有持续的临床获益。

English: the safety profile allowed for the continuous daily administration of 8 mg of erdafitinib , with a dose escalation to 9 mg daily guided by the serum phosphate level .
Chinese: 安全性允许每天连续服用 8 mg erdafitinib，并根据血清磷酸盐水平将剂量增加到每天 9 mg。

English: such dose escalation did not increase the severity of adverse events , with a similar percentage of events of grade 3 or higher in the two dose groups .
Chinese: 这种剂量增加并没有增加不良事件的严重程度，两个剂量组中 3 级或更高级别事件的百分比相似。

English: hyperphosphatemia , a known class effect of FGFR inhibitors , 24 was reported in 77 % of the patients .
Chinese: 高磷酸盐血症是 FGFR 抑制剂的一种已知类效应，24 据报道 77% 的患者发生。

English: although ocular adverse events were common with erdafitinib treatment , the events were mostly mild to moderate and resolved with dose interruption or reduction .
Chinese: 尽管眼部不良事件在厄达替尼治疗中很常见，但这些事件大多为轻度至中度，并可通过中断或减少剂量来解决。

English: patients with FGFR mutations or fusions may be less likely to have a response to immunotherapy than are those without such alterations .
Chinese: 与没有此类改变的患者相比，具有 FGFR 突变或融合的患者对免疫疗法产生反应的可能性更小。

English: in our study , only 1 of 22 patients ( 5 % ) had a history of response to previous immunotherapy ; of these patients , 59 % had a response to erdafitinib after failure of immunotherapy .
Chinese: 在我们的研究中，22 名患者中只有 1 名 (5%) 对既往免疫疗法有反应；在这些患者中，59% 在免疫治疗失败后对 erdafitinib 有反应。

English: this observation was also noted in a study of rogaratinib involving 10 patients , in whom 90 % had a history of disease progression while receiving immunotherapy , whereas 30 % had a response to rogaratinib.27
Chinese: 一项涉及 10 名患者的 rogaratinib 研究也注意到了这一观察结果，其中 90 % 在接受免疫治疗时有疾病进展史，而 30 % 对 rogaratinib 有反应。 27

English: patients with a germline BRCA1 or BRCA2 mutation make up a small subgroup of those with metastatic pancreatic cancer .
Chinese: 具有种系 BRCA1 或 BRCA2 突变的患者构成了转移性胰腺癌患者的一小部分。

English: patients were randomly assigned , in a 3 : 2 ratio , to receive maintenance olaparib tablets ( 300 mg twice daily ) or placebo .
Chinese: 患者以 3:2 的比例被随机分配接受奥拉帕尼维持药片（300 毫克，每天两次）或安慰剂。

English: of the 3315 patients who underwent screening , 154 underwent randomization and were assigned to a trial intervention ( 92 to receive olaparib and 62 to receive placebo ) .
Chinese: 在接受筛查的 3315 名患者中，有 154 名接受了随机分组并被分配到试验干预组（92 名接受奥拉帕尼，62 名接受安慰剂）。

English: an interim analysis of overall survival , at a data maturity of 46 % , showed no difference between the olaparib and placebo groups ( median , 18.9 months vs. 18.1 months ; hazard ratio for death , 0.91 ; 95 % CI , 0.56 to 1.46 ; P = 0.68 ) .
Chinese: 在数据成熟度为 46 % 时对总生存期进行的中期分析显示，奥拉帕尼组和安慰剂组之间没有差异（中位数，18.9 个月对 18.1 个月；死亡风险比，0.91；95 % CI，0.56 至 1.46；P = 0.68）。

English: metastatic pancreatic cancer is particularly refractory to treatment.1
Chinese: 转移性胰腺癌尤其难治。 1

English: the PARP inhibitor olaparib has been shown to have clinical efficacy in patients with a germline BRCA mutation and ovarian or breast cancer , 11,12 and in a phase 2 trial , olaparib had antitumor activity in heavily pretreated patients with a germline BRCA mutation and metastatic pancreatic cancer.13
Chinese: PARP 抑制剂奥拉帕尼已被证明对患有胚系 BRCA 突变和卵巢癌或乳腺癌的患者具有临床疗效， 11,12 并且在一项 2 期试验中，奥拉帕尼在经过大量预处理的患有胚系 BRCA 突变和转移性胰腺癌的患者中具有抗肿瘤活性。癌症.13

English: maintenance treatment is a new concept in pancreatic cancer , although early studies of maintenance sunitinib and fluorouracil have shown promising results.18,19
Chinese: 维持治疗是胰腺癌的一个新概念，尽管舒尼替尼和氟尿嘧啶维持治疗的早期研究已经显示出可喜的结果。 18,19

English: patients were eligible if they were 18 years of age or older and had histologically or cytologically confirmed pancreatic adenocarcinoma and a documented deleterious or suspected deleterious germline mutation in BRCA1 or BRCA2 .
Chinese: 如果患者年满 18 岁，并且经组织学或细胞学证实为胰腺癌，并且有记录的 BRCA1 或 BRCA2 有害或疑似有害种系突变，则患者符合条件。

English: eligibility was based on detection of a germline BRCA mutation by central testing with the use of the BRACAnalysis CDx test ( Myriad Genetic Laboratories ) or by local testing with subsequent confirmation with the use of the BRACAnalysis CDx test after randomization .
Chinese: 合格性基于通过使用 BRACAnalysis CDx 测试（Myriad Genetic Laboratories）进行中央测试或通过在随机化后使用 BRACAnalysis CDx 测试进行后续确认的本地测试来检测种系 BRCA 突变。

English: the platinum component of chemotherapy could have been discontinued because of toxic effects at any time after 16 weeks .
Chinese: 由于 16 周后的任何时间的毒性作用，化疗的铂成分可能已经停止。

English: eligible patients had normal organ and acceptable bone marrow function .
Chinese: 符合条件的患者具有正常的器官和可接受的骨髓功能。

English: full eligibility criteria are provided in the trial protocol , available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 试验方案中提供了完整的资格标准，试验方案与本文全文可在 NEJM.org 上获取。

English: with the use of a central interactive voice or Web response system that incorporated a block randomization scheme , patients were randomly assigned , in a 3 : 2 ratio , to receive maintenance olaparib tablets ( 300 mg twice daily ) or matching placebo .
Chinese: 通过使用包含块随机化方案的中央交互式语音或网络响应系统，患者被随机分配，以 3:2 的比例接受奥拉帕尼维持药片（300 毫克，每天两次）或匹配的安慰剂。

English: no stratification factors were used .
Chinese: 没有使用分层因素。

English: crossover to olaparib was not permitted during this trial .
Chinese: 在此试验期间不允许交叉使用奥拉帕尼。

English: computed tomography or magnetic resonance imaging of the chest , abdomen , and pelvis were performed at baseline , every 8 weeks for 40 weeks , and then every 12 weeks until disease progression .
Chinese: 胸部、腹部和骨盆的计算机断层扫描或磁共振成像在基线时进行，每 8 周一次，持续 40 周，然后每 12 周一次，直至疾病进展。

English: survival , second progression , and subsequent treatments for cancer were assessed every 8 weeks after progression .
Chinese: 在进展后每 8 周评估一次生存、二次进展和随后的癌症治疗。

English: adverse events were graded according to the NCI CTCAE , version 4.0 .
Chinese: 不良事件根据 NCI CTCAE 4.0 版进行分级。

English: this trial was performed in accordance with the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki , Good Clinical Practice guidelines , and the AstraZeneca policy of bioethics.22
Chinese: 该试验是根据赫尔辛基宣言、良好临床实践指南和阿斯利康生物伦理学政策的原则进行的。 22

English: the trial was designed by the first and last authors in collaboration with AstraZeneca .
Chinese: 该试验由第一作者和最后一名作者与阿斯利康合作设计。

English: AstraZeneca was responsible for overseeing the collection , analysis , and interpretation of the data .
Chinese: 阿斯利康负责监督数据的收集、分析和解释。

English: the manuscript was written with medical writing assistance funded by AstraZeneca and MSD , with critical review and input by the authors .
Chinese: 该手稿是在阿斯利康和默沙东资助的医学写作协助下撰写的，作者进行了严格的审查和输入。

English: the authors attest to the accuracy and completeness of the data and the fidelity of the trial to the protocol .
Chinese: 作者证明数据的准确性和完整性以及试验对方案的忠实度。

English: data on patients who had not had disease progression and who had not died at the time of the primary analysis , or who had progression or had died after two or more missed visits , were censored at the date of the last tumor assessment for which data could be evaluated .
Chinese: 未出现疾病进展且在主要分析时未死亡，或出现疾病进展或在两次或两次以上错过就诊后死亡的患者的数据在最后一次肿瘤评估日期截尾，其数据可能得到评价。

English: a change of 10 points in either direction was considered to be a clinically significant difference .
Chinese: 任一方向 10 个点的变化被认为是临床显着差异。

English: the final overall survival analysis is planned after 106 deaths .
Chinese: 最终的总体生存分析计划在 106 人死亡后进行。

English: the statistical analysis plan is available with the protocol at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 统计分析计划可与方案一起在 NEJM.org 上获得。

English: a total of 3315 patients were screened for trial entry ; 247 ( 7.5 % ) of these patients had a germline BRCA mutation .
Chinese: 共有 3315 名患者接受了试验筛选；这些患者中有 247 名 (7.5%) 有种系 BRCA 突变。

English: between January 2015 and January 2019 , a total of 154 patients underwent randomization ( Table S1 in the Supplementary Appendix ) , and 90 of 92 patients who were assigned to olaparib and 61 of 62 patients who were assigned to placebo received the trial intervention ( Figure 1 ) .
Chinese: 2015 年 1 月至 2019 年 1 月期间，共有 154 名患者接受了随机分组（补充附录表 S1） ，分配至奥拉帕尼组的 92 名患者中有 90 名和分配至安慰剂组的 62 名患者中有 61 名接受了试验干预（图 1 ) 。

English: at the time of data cutoff for this analysis ( January 15 , 2019 ) , 30 patients were still receiving olaparib and 8 were still receiving placebo .
Chinese: 在该分析的数据截止时（2019 年 1 月 15 日），30 名患者仍在接受奥拉帕尼治疗，8 名患者仍在接受安慰剂治疗。

English: the baseline characteristics of the patients are listed in Table 1 , and in Table S2 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 表 1 和补充附录表 S2 列出了患者的基线特征。

English: the analysis of the primary end point was performed after 104 of 154 patients had had disease progression ( assessed by blinded independent central review ) or had died ( data maturity , 68 % ) .
Chinese: 主要终点分析是在 154 名患者中有 104 名出现疾病进展（通过盲法独立中央审查评估）或死亡（数据成熟度为 68%）后进行的。

English: a multivariate Cox regression analysis showed that the treatment effect was not affected by imbalances in baseline factors between the trial groups ( Table S6 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 多变量 Cox 回归分析表明，治疗效果不受试验组之间基线因素不平衡的影响（补充附录表 S6）。

English: at the primary data cutoff date , 41 patients in the olaparib group and 30 patients in the placebo group had died .
Chinese: 在主要数据截止日期，奥拉帕尼组中有 41 名患者死亡，安慰剂组中有 30 名患者死亡。

English: a planned interim analysis of overall survival that took place at a data maturity of 46 % showed no evidence of a difference in overall survival between the groups ( median , 18.9 months in the olaparib group and 18.1 months in the placebo group ; hazard ratio for death , 0.91 ; 95 % CI , 0.56 to 1.46 ; P = 0.68 ) ( Figure 2B ) .
Chinese: 计划在数据成熟度为 46 % 时进行的总生存期中期分析显示，没有证据表明两组之间的总生存期存在差异（奥拉帕利组中位数为 18.9 个月，安慰剂组为 18.1 个月；死亡风险比, 0.91；95% CI，0.56 至 1.46；P = 0.68)（图 2B）。

English: a primary analysis of overall survival was planned after 106 events ( data maturity , 69 % ) .
Chinese: 计划在发生 106 次事件（数据成熟度为 69%）后对总生存期进行初步分析。

English: one patient in the olaparib group and 9 patients in the placebo group received treatment with a PARP inhibitor after discontinuation of the trial intervention ( Table S7 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 奥拉帕利组的 1 名患者和安慰剂组的 9 名患者在试验干预停止后接受了 PARP 抑制剂治疗（补充附录表 S7）。

English: overall , 18 patients in the olaparib group ( 20 % ) and 6 patients in the placebo group ( 10 % ) had a response .
Chinese: 总的来说，奥拉帕尼组有 18 名患者 (20%) 和安慰剂组有 6 名患者 (10%) 有反应。

English: among patients with measurable disease at baseline , the response rate as assessed by blinded independent central review was 23 % in the olaparib group ( 18 of 78 patients ) and 12 % in the placebo group ( 6 of 52 patients ) ( odds ratio , 2.30 ; 95 % CI , 0.89 to 6.76 ) .
Chinese: 在基线时患有可测量疾病的患者中，奥拉帕利组（78 名患者中的 18 名）和安慰剂组（52 名患者中的 6 名）的反应率为 23%（优势比 2.30； 95% CI，0.89 至 6.76）。

English: two patients , both in the olaparib group , had a complete response ; both complete responses were ongoing at the time of data cutoff .
Chinese: 奥拉帕尼组中的两名患者获得了完全缓解；在数据截止时，两种完整的反应都在进行中。

English: the median duration of response was 24.9 months ( 95 % CI , 14.8 to could not be calculated ) and 3.7 months ( 95 % CI , 2.1 to could not be calculated ) and the median time to response was 5.4 months and 3.6 months in the olaparib and placebo groups , respectively .
Chinese: 中位反应持续时间为 24.9 个月（ 95 % CI ， 14.8 至无法计算）和 3.7 个月（ 95 % CI ， 2.1 至无法计算），中位反应时间在奥拉帕尼组中分别为 5.4 个月和 3.6 个月和安慰剂组，分别。

English: in the 151 patients who received a trial agent , the total median duration of treatment was 6.0 months ( range , 0.8 to 45.3 ) in the olaparib group and 3.7 months ( range , 0.1 to 30.1 ) in the placebo group ( related data on dose intensity are provided in the Results section in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 在接受试验药物治疗的 151 名患者中，奥拉帕利组的总中位治疗持续时间为 6.0 个月（范围 0.8 至 45.3 ） ，安慰剂组为 3.7 个月（范围 0.1 至 30.1 ）（有关剂量强度的相关数据）补充附录的结果部分提供）。

English: Table 2 shows the most common adverse events in the trial groups .
Chinese: 表 2 显示了试验组中最常见的不良事件。

English: serious adverse events occurred in 24 % of the patients who received olaparib and in 15 % of the patients who received placebo .
Chinese: 严重不良事件发生在 24% 接受奥拉帕尼的患者和 15% 接受安慰剂的患者中。

English: no adverse events that occurred during the trial intervention resulted in death .
Chinese: 试验干预期间没有发生导致死亡的不良事件。

English: no cases of myelodysplastic syndrome or acute myeloid leukemia were reported in either group .
Chinese: 两组均未报告骨髓增生异常综合征或急性髓性白血病病例。

English: in two patients who received placebo , new primary cancers developed more than 30 days after the end of the trial intervention ( one patient had rectal cancer , and the other had a possible ovarian cancer , which resulted in death ) .
Chinese: 在接受安慰剂的两名患者中，试验干预结束后 30 多天后出现了新的原发性癌症（一名患者患有直肠癌，另一名患者可能患有卵巢癌，最终导致死亡）。

English: one diagnosis of grade 1 pneumonitis in a patient in the olaparib group was not considered by the investigators to be causally related to the trial intervention ( see the Results section in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 研究人员认为，奥拉帕利组患者的 1 级肺炎诊断与试验干预没有因果关系（见补充附录中的结果部分）。

English: the adjusted mean ( ± SE ) change from baseline across all time points was − 1.20 ± 1.42 ( 95 % CI , − 4.01 to 1.62 ) in 84 patients in the olaparib group and 1.27 ± 1.95 ( 95 % CI , − 2.58 to 5.12 ) in 54 patients in the placebo group .
Chinese: 在奥拉帕利组的 84 名患者中，所有时间点相对于基线的调整平均 (± SE) 变化为 − 1.20 ± 1.42（ 95 % CI ， − 4.01 至 1.62）和 1.27 ± 1.95 （ 95 % CI ， − 2.58 至 5.12）在安慰剂组的 54 名患者中。

English: overall survival data from an interim analysis at a data maturity of 46 % ( the final analysis was planned at a data maturity of 69 % ) show no significant difference in survival between the trial groups .
Chinese: 在数据成熟度为 46% 时（最终分析计划在数据成熟度为 69% 时）来自中期分析的总生存数据显示试验组之间的生存率没有显着差异。

English: overall survival may be confounded by subsequent therapies , including that of nine patients in the placebo group ( 15 % ) who went on to receive a PARP inhibitor after disease progression during the trial intervention ( Table S7 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .13
Chinese: 总生存期可能会受到后续治疗的影响，包括安慰剂组中的 9 名患者 (15%)，他们在试验干预期间疾病进展后继续接受 PARP 抑制剂治疗（补充附录表 S7）。13

English: an analysis of the time to second disease progression suggested a trend toward benefit from maintenance olaparib through the next treatment .
Chinese: 对第二次疾病进展时间的分析表明，在下一次治疗中有从维持奥拉帕尼获益的趋势。

English: although there is no precedent in pancreatic cancer , this end point has been assessed in studies of other tumor types and has been interpreted as a possible indicator of treatment benefit beyond disease progression.12
Chinese: 尽管在胰腺癌中没有先例，但这一终点已在其他肿瘤类型的研究中得到评估，并被解释为超越疾病进展的治疗获益的可能指标。 12

English: of 3315 patients screened for entry in the POLO trial , 7.5 % had a germline BRCA mutation .
Chinese: 在接受 POLO 试验筛选的 3315 名患者中，7.5% 的患者有种系 BRCA 突变。

English: in this trial , dual selection criteria were used to identify patients who would be likely to benefit from PARP inhibition .
Chinese: 在该试验中，使用双重选择标准来确定可能受益于 PARP 抑制的患者。

English: in an unselected population with metastatic pancreatic cancer , it is expected that approximately 30 % of patients will have disease progression during their first 4 months of treatment with FOLFIRINOX.2
Chinese: 在未经选择的转移性胰腺癌人群中，预计大约 30 % 的患者在接受 FOLFIRINOX 治疗的前 4 个月内会出现疾病进展。2

English: British analysis suggests a preference for mornings can lower risk for breast cancer .
Chinese: 英国的分析表明，偏爱早晨可以降低患乳腺癌的风险。

English: mendelian randomization uses genetic variants highly associated with chronotype , sleep duration , and insomnia symptoms to help clarify this association .
Chinese: 孟德尔随机化使用与时间型、睡眠持续时间和失眠症状高度相关的遗传变异来帮助阐明这种关联。

English: among women with a preference for morning compared with evening , fully adjusted regression analysis showed a hazard ratio of 0.95 ( P = 0.002 ) for breast cancer .
Chinese: 在与晚上相比更喜欢早上的女性中，完全调整的回归分析显示乳腺癌的风险比为 0.95 (P = 0.002)。

English: mendelian analysis also found that morning preference was associated with lower risk for breast cancer ( HR , 0.85 ) ; however , this association did not achieve statistical significance .
Chinese: 孟德尔分析还发现，早起偏好与较低的乳腺癌风险相关（HR，0.85）；然而，这种关联并没有达到统计显着性。

English: neither analysis showed significant associations between breast cancer risk and sleep duration or insomnia .
Chinese: 两项分析均未显示乳腺癌风险与睡眠时间或失眠之间存在显着关联。

English: six behaviors in kindergarten are linked to annual income 30 years later .
Chinese: 幼儿园的六种行为与30年后的年收入挂钩。

English: it seems obvious that childhood behaviors predict adult outcomes , but demonstrating how this occurs is not easy .
Chinese: 童年行为预示着成年后的结果似乎很明显，但要证明这是如何发生的并不容易。

English: inattention , hyperactivity , physical aggression , oppositional behavior , and anxiety , as well as family adversity , were significantly correlated negatively with earnings in adulthood , whereas prosocial behavior and higher IQ were correlated positively with earnings .
Chinese: 注意力不集中、多动、身体攻击、对立行为、焦虑以及家庭逆境与成年后的收入呈显着负相关，而亲社会行为和较高的智商与收入呈正相关。

English: although theoretically desirable , eliminating adversity and improving IQ are not practical goals , but increasing resilience is - if interventions occur early in life .
Chinese: 尽管从理论上讲是可取的，但消除逆境和提高智商并不是切实可行的目标，但如果在生命早期进行干预，则提高复原力是可行的。

English: such interventions could mitigate the adverse impacts of economic and social deprivation and enhance later adjustment and productivity .
Chinese: 这种干预措施可以减轻经济和社会剥夺的不利影响，并加强后期调整和生产力。

English: the answer : worrisome .
Chinese: 答案：令人担忧。

English: perioperative atrial fibrillation ( AF ) occurs in 15 % to 40 % of patients undergoing cardiac surgery and a smaller proportion of patients with noncardiac surgery .
Chinese: 围手术期心房颤动 (AF) 发生在 15% 到 40% 的心脏手术患者和较小比例的非心脏手术患者中。

English: studies that included patients with prior AF were excluded .
Chinese: 包括既往房颤患者的研究被排除在外。

English: the authors found 35 studies for inclusion with a total of 2,458,000 patients .
Chinese: 作者找到了 35 项研究，共纳入 2,458,000 名患者。

English: all but 3 of the studies had a preponderance of men , and 29 studies centered on patients undergoing cardiac surgery .
Chinese: 除 3 项研究外，所有研究均以男性为主，29 项研究以接受心脏手术的患者为中心。

English: the magnitude of the increased stroke risk was higher with noncardiac surgery ( hazard ratio , 2.0 ) than with cardiac surgery ( HR , 1.20 ) .
Chinese: 非心脏手术（风险比，2.0）的卒中风险增加幅度高于心脏手术（HR，1.20）。

English: these findings highlight that perioperative AF is not benign .
Chinese: 这些发现强调围手术期 AF 不是良性的。

English: surgical procedures probably serve as a stress test for individuals who are sicker and more vulnerable to AF development .
Chinese: 外科手术可能是对病情较重和更易患 AF 的人的压力测试。

English: of the 741 patients treated , the median age was 65 , most had undifferentiated tumors ( 65 % ) and two or more sites of metastasis ( 58 % ) , and a minority had prior gastrectomy ( 21 % ) or had received prior adjuvant chemotherapy ( about 10 % ) .
Chinese: 在接受治疗的 741 名患者中，中位年龄为 65 岁，大多数患有未分化肿瘤 ( 65 % ) 和两个或多个转移部位 ( 58 % ) ，少数曾接受过胃切除术 ( 21 % ) 或接受过辅助化疗 ( 约10%）。

English: patients were randomized to oral semaglutide or placebo .
Chinese: 患者被随机分配至口服 semaglutide 或安慰剂组。

English: HbA1c fell by 1.0 and 0.3 percentage points in the semaglutide and placebo groups , respectively ; weight reduction was also greater with semaglutide ( 4.2 vs. 0.8 kg ) .
Chinese: semaglutide 组和安慰剂组的 HbA1c 分别下降了 1.0 和 0.3 个百分点； semaglutide 的体重减轻也更大（4.2 公斤与 0.8 公斤）。

English: patients were more likely to stop semaglutide than placebo because of gastrointestinal side effects .
Chinese: 由于胃肠道副作用，患者比安慰剂更有可能停用 semaglutide。

English: men who consumed at least two servings per week had decreased risk for adenomas .
Chinese: 每周至少食用两份的男性患腺瘤的风险降低。

English: yogurt consumption has been associated with lower colorectal cancer ( CRC ) risk , but its relation to polyp risk is unknown .
Chinese: 酸奶消费与较低的结直肠癌 (CRC) 风险有关，但它与息肉风险的关系尚不清楚。

English: the analyses were adjusted for demographic and lifestyle factors , and dietary information was updated every 4 years .
Chinese: 这些分析根据人口统计和生活方式因素进行了调整，并且每 4 年更新一次饮食信息。

English: men who consumed ≥ 2 yogurt servings / week had significantly lower risk for conventional adenomas compared with nonconsumers ( adjusted odds ratio , 0.81 ) .
Chinese: 与不喝酸奶的人相比，每周喝 ≥ 2 份酸奶的男性患传统腺瘤的风险显着降低（调整后的比值比为 0.81）。

English: no association was seen for serrated lesions , except for large ( ≥ 1 cm ) lesions ( aOR , 0.48 ) .
Chinese: 除了大的（≥ 1 厘米）病变 (aOR，0.48) 外，锯齿状病变没有相关性。

English: in women , there were no associations between yogurt consumption and either conventional adenomas or serrated lesions .
Chinese: 在女性中，酸奶消费与传统腺瘤或锯齿状病变之间没有关联。

English: yogurt may exert its beneficial effects in CRC prevention by a variety of mechanisms , including favorable microbiome alterations .
Chinese: 酸奶可以通过多种机制发挥其预防 CRC 的有益作用，包括有益的微生物组改变。

English: regular consumption of yogurt may be a marker of other healthy lifestyle factors that decrease the risk for CRC and its precursor lesions .
Chinese: 经常饮用酸奶可能是其他健康生活方式因素的标志，这些因素可降低 CRC 及其前期病变的风险。

English: the lack of benefits observed in women , however , is not clear .
Chinese: 然而，在女性身上观察到的益处不足尚不清楚。

English: in any case , the regular consumption of yogurt is a reasonable recommendation to help decrease CRC risk , in addition to healthy eating habits , exercise , and avoidance of smoking .
Chinese: 无论如何，除了健康的饮食习惯、锻炼和避免吸烟之外，定期饮用酸奶是有助于降低 CRC 风险的合理建议。

English: a new scoring system uses readily available demographic and laboratory data to identify patients with higher risk for advanced fibrosis .
Chinese: 一个新的评分系统使用现成的人口统计和实验室数据来识别晚期纤维化风险较高的患者。

English: these authors devised the Hepamet Fibrosis scoring system , a noninvasive system using readily available standard variables .
Chinese: 这些作者设计了 Hepamet Fibrosis 评分系统，这是一种使用现成标准变量的无创系统。

English: in univariate analysis , they identified variables independently associated with advanced fibrosis and then employed multivariate analysis to develop their system that includes gender , age , homeostatic model assessment score , presence of diabetes , AST , albumin , and platelet count .
Chinese: 在单变量分析中，他们确定了与晚期纤维化独立相关的变量，然后采用多变量分析来开发他们的系统，其中包括性别、年龄、稳态模型评估分数、是否患有糖尿病、AST、白蛋白和血小板计数。

English: this large study identified readily available demographic and laboratory data that allow primary care clinicians to identify patients with higher risk for advanced fibrosis .
Chinese: 这项大型研究确定了现成的人口统计和实验室数据，使初级保健临床医生能够识别晚期纤维化风险较高的患者。

English: previous treatment for localized disease and previous docetaxel therapy were allowed .
Chinese: 允许既往接受过局部疾病治疗和既往接受过多西紫杉醇治疗。

English: a total of 525 patients were assigned to receive apalutamide plus ADT and 527 to receive placebo plus ADT .
Chinese: 共有 525 名患者被分配接受阿帕他胺加 ADT，527 名患者接受安慰剂加 ADT。

English: the median age was 68 years .
Chinese: 中位年龄为 68 岁。

English: overall survival at 24 months was also greater with apalutamide than with placebo ( 82.4 % in the apalutamide group vs. 73.5 % in the placebo group ; hazard ratio for death , 0.67 ; 95 % CI , 0.51 to 0.89 ; P = 0.005 ) .
Chinese: 24 个月时，apalutamide 的总生存率也高于安慰剂组（apalutamide 组为 82.4% vs. 安慰剂组为 73.5%；死亡风险比为 0.67；95% CI，0.51 至 0.89；P = 0.005）。

English: the frequency of grade 3 or 4 adverse events was 42.2 % in the apalutamide group and 40.8 % in the placebo group ; rash was more common in the apalutamide group .
Chinese: 3 级或 4 级不良事件的频率在阿帕鲁胺组为 42.2%，在安慰剂组为 40.8%；皮疹在阿帕他胺组更常见。

English: however , patient age , coexisting conditions , extent of disease , and preferences may affect decisions to initiate chemotherapy such as docetaxel.8,9
Chinese: 然而，患者年龄、合并症、疾病程度和偏好可能会影响开始化疗（如多西紫杉醇）的决定。 8,9

English: treatment with abiraterone acetate requires coadministration of prednisone to prevent increases in corticotropin and may cause adverse events related to mineralocorticoid excess and liver toxicity .
Chinese: 用醋酸阿比特龙治疗需要同时给予泼尼松以防止促肾上腺皮质激素增加，并可能导致与盐皮质激素过量和肝毒性相关的不良事件。

English: direct inhibition of the androgen receptor in addition to ADT may provide more a complete blockade of androgen signaling than ADT alone , leading to improved patient outcomes .
Chinese: 除了 ADT 外，直接抑制雄激素受体可能比单独使用 ADT 更能完全阻断雄激素信号，从而改善患者的预后。

English: trial DESIGN AND CONDUCT
Chinese: 试验设计和实施

English: the protocol and the statistical analysis plan are available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 该方案和统计分析计划与本文全文可在 NEJM.org 上获取。

English: review boards at all participating institutions approved the trial , which was conducted in accordance with current International Conference on Harmonisation guidelines for Good Clinical Practice and according to Declaration of Helsinki principles .
Chinese: 所有参与机构的审查委员会都批准了该试验，该试验是根据当前国际协调会议良好临床实践指南和赫尔辛基宣言原则进行的。

English: patients underwent randomization between December 15 , 2015 , and July 25 , 2017 .
Chinese: 患者在 2015 年 12 月 15 日至 2017 年 7 月 25 日期间被随机分组。

English: all the authors assume responsibility for the completeness and accuracy of the data and analyses and for the fidelity of the trial to the protocol .
Chinese: 所有作者均对数据和分析的完整性和准确性以及试验对方案的忠实度负责。

English: the first author developed the first draft of the manuscript with editorial assistance funded by Janssen Research and Development .
Chinese: 第一作者在 Janssen Research and Development 资助的编辑协助下起草了手稿的初稿。

English: all the authors had full access to the data , participated in data interpretation , and reviewed and approved the manuscript before submission .
Chinese: 所有作者都可以完全访问数据，参与数据解释，并在投稿前审阅并批准了手稿。

English: patients were castration sensitive ( i.e. , patients were not receiving ADT at the time of disease progression11,12 ) .
Chinese: 患者对去势敏感（即患者在疾病进展时未接受 ADT11,12）。

English: antiandrogen therapy must have been discontinued before randomization .
Chinese: 随机分组前必须停止抗雄激素治疗。

English: patients with severe angina , myocardial infarction , congestive heart failure , arterial or venous thromboembolic events , a history of or predisposition to seizure , or recent ventricular arrhythmias were excluded .
Chinese: 患有严重心绞痛、心肌梗塞、充血性心力衰竭、动脉或静脉血栓栓塞事件、癫痫病史或癫痫倾向或近期室性心律失常的患者被排除在外。

English: patients were randomly assigned in a 1 : 1 ratio to receive apalutamide ( 240 mg ) or matched placebo administered orally once daily , in addition to continuous ADT .
Chinese: 患者以 1:1 的比例被随机分配，除连续 ADT 外，每天口服一次阿帕他胺 (240 mg) 或匹配的安慰剂。

English: overall survival was defined as the time from randomization to the date of death from any cause .
Chinese: 总生存期定义为从随机分组到因任何原因死亡的时间。

English: definitions of secondary and exploratory end points are provided in the Methods section in the Supplementary Appendix , available at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 补充附录的方法部分提供了次要终点和探索性终点的定义，补充附录可在 NEJM.org 获取。

English: patients were assessed for efficacy according to modified Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors , version 1.1 , with the use of CT or MRI of the chest , abdomen , and pelvis during screening ( ≤ 6 weeks before randomization ) and according to Prostate Cancer Working Group 2 criteria18 ( see the Methods section in the Supplementary Appendix ) with the use of bone scanning during cycles 3 and 5 and every fourth cycle thereafter .
Chinese: 根据修改后的实体瘤反应评估标准 1.1 版，在筛查期间（随机分组前 ≤ 6 周）使用胸部、腹部和骨盆的 CT 或 MRI 并根据前列腺癌工作组 2 评估患者的疗效标准 18（见补充附录中的方法部分）在第 3 和第 5 周期以及此后每四个周期使用骨扫描。

English: events of progression were assessed by the investigator .
Chinese: 进展事件由研究者评估。

English: scans from approximately 60 % of the patients were randomly selected for independent central review .
Chinese: 随机选择大约 60% 患者的扫描进行独立集中审查。

English: adverse events were assessed monthly and graded according to National Cancer Institute Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events , version 4.0.3 .
Chinese: 不良事件每月评估一次，并根据美国国家癌症研究所不良事件通用术语标准 4.0.3 版进行分级。

English: the TITAN trial was designed to enroll approximately 1000 patients .
Chinese: TITAN 试验旨在招募大约 1000 名患者。

English: if the difference between the apalutamide group and the placebo group was considered to be statistically significant , the alpha was recycled to overall survival on the basis of the fallback method.19
Chinese: 如果apalutamide组和安慰剂组之间的差异被认为具有统计学显着性，则在回退方法的基础上将alpha循环到总生存期。 19

English: an overall type I error of 5 % was planned .
Chinese: 计划的总体 I 类错误为 5%。

English: two interim analyses were planned for overall survival .
Chinese: 计划对总生存期进行两项中期分析。

English: subgroup analyses were prespecified to assess consistency of treatment effect .
Chinese: 预先指定亚组分析以评估治疗效果的一致性。

English: demographic and clinical characteristics at baseline were summarized with the use of descriptive statistics .
Chinese: 使用描述性统计总结了基线时的人口统计学和临床特征。

English: the median number of cycles received was 23 for apalutamide and 19 for placebo ( range , 1 to 37 in each group ) .
Chinese: apalutamide 接受的周期中位数为 23，安慰剂为 19（范围，每组 1 至 37）。

English: the median duration of the trial intervention was 20.5 months for apalutamide and 18.3 months for placebo .
Chinese: 试验干预的中位持续时间对于 apalutamide 为 20.5 个月，对于安慰剂为 18.3 个月。

English: a total of 66.2 % of the patients in the apalutamide group and 46.1 % of those in the placebo group were receiving the trial intervention at the clinical cutoff date .
Chinese: 共有 66.2% 的阿帕他胺组患者和 46.1% 的安慰剂组患者在临床截止日期接受了试验干预。

English: these patients were followed for survival and secondary end points , so their data were not missing .
Chinese: 对这些患者的生存期和次要终点进行了随访，因此他们的数据没有丢失。

English: demographic and clinical characteristics at baseline were well balanced ( Table 1 , and Table S1 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 基线时的人口统计学和临床特征得到很好的平衡（表 1 和补充附录中的表 S1）。

English: the median age of the patients across both groups was 68 years .
Chinese: 两组患者的中位年龄为 68 岁。

English: previous therapies for prostate cancer are listed in Table S2 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 既往的前列腺癌治疗见补充附录表 S2。

English: a total of 365 events of radiographic progression were observed ( 134 in the apalutamide group and 231 in the placebo group ) .
Chinese: 总共观察到 365 起影像学进展事件（apalutamide 组 134 起，安慰剂组 231 起）。

English: blinded independent central imaging review confirmed investigator assessment of radiographic progression ( concordance , 84.5 % ) .
Chinese: 盲法独立中央影像审查证实了研究者对影像学进展的评估（一致性，84.5%）。

English: overall Survival
Chinese: 总生存期

English: the first interim analysis for overall survival occurred after 200 deaths were observed ( 83 in the apalutamide group and 117 in the placebo group ) .
Chinese: 在观察到 200 例死亡（apalutamide 组 83 例，安慰剂组 117 例）后，对总生存期进行了首次中期分析。

English: the overall survival percentage at 24 months was 82.4 % in the apalutamide group and 73.5 % in the placebo group ( hazard ratio for death , 0.67 ; 95 % CI , 0.51 to 0.89 ; P = 0.005 ) , and there was a 33 % lower risk of death in the apalutamide group ( Figure 2A ) .
Chinese: 24个月的总生存率在apalutamide组和安慰剂组分别为82.4 %和73.5 %（死亡风险比，0.67；95 % CI，0.51至0.89；P = 0.005），风险降低33 %阿帕他胺组的死亡人数（图 2A）。

English: the treatment effect on overall survival consistently favored apalutamide over placebo , with no significant difference in the effect of apalutamide according to disease volume ( Figure 2B ) .
Chinese: 对总生存期的治疗效果始终优于安慰剂，阿帕他胺的效果根据疾病体积没有显着差异（图 2B）。

English: other CLINICALLY RELEVANT END POINTS
Chinese: 其他临床相关终点

English: a total of 87 patients in the apalutamide group and 190 in the placebo group received subsequent treatment for prostate cancer ( first subsequent therapies are shown in Table S3 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 共有 87 名阿帕他胺组患者和 190 名安慰剂组患者接受了前列腺癌的后续治疗（首次后续治疗见补充附录表 S3）。

English: there were few events of symptomatic local progression and no substantial difference between the two groups in the time to symptomatic local progression ( Table 2 ) .
Chinese: 有症状的局部进展事件很少，两组之间在有症状的局部进展的时间上没有实质性差异（表 2）。

English: Table 3 presents a summary of adverse events , and Table 4 shows the most common adverse events of any cause that occurred from the time of the first dose of the trial intervention through 30 days after the last dose .
Chinese: 表 3 总结了不良事件，表 4 显示了从第一次试验干预开始到最后一次给药后 30 天发生的最常见的任何原因的不良事件。

English: frequencies of grade 3 or 4 events ( 42.2 % in the apalutamide group and 40.8 % in the placebo group ) and of serious adverse events ( 19.8 % in the apalutamide group and 20.3 % in the placebo group ) did not differ substantially between the two groups .
Chinese: 3级或4级事件（apalutamide组为42.2 %，安慰剂组为40.8 %）和严重不良事件（apalutamide组为19.8 %，安慰剂组为20.3 %）的频率在两组之间没有显着差异。 .

English: adverse events led to discontinuation in 42 patients ( 8.0 % ) in the apalutamide group and 28 ( 5.3 % ) in the placebo group ( Table S4 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 不良事件导致阿帕他胺组 42 名患者 (8.0%) 和安慰剂组 28 名 (5.3%) 患者停药（补充附录表 S4）。

English: a total of 10 patients ( 1.9 % ) in the apalutamide group and 16 ( 3.0 % ) in the placebo group died as the result of an adverse event ( Table S5 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 阿帕他胺组共有 10 名患者 (1.9%) 和安慰剂组有 16 名 (3.0%) 患者死于不良事件（补充附录表 S5）。

English: rash of any grade was more common among patients who received apalutamide than among those who received placebo ( 27.1 % vs. 8.5 % ) ( Table 4 ) , and the most common adverse event of grade 3 or higher that was considered by the investigator to be related to apalutamide was rash of any type ( 6.3 % ) .
Chinese: 任何级别的皮疹在接受阿帕他胺的患者中比接受安慰剂的患者更常见（ 27.1 % 对 8.5 % ）（表 4） ，并且研究者认为最常见的 3 级或更高级别的不良事件是与 apalutamide 相关的是任何类型的皮疹 (6.3%)。

English: hypothyroidism was reported by 6.5 % of the patients in the apalutamide group and 1.1 % of those in the placebo group ( Table 4 ) ; all events were grade 1 or 2 .
Chinese: 阿帕他胺组 6.5% 的患者和安慰剂组 1.1% 的患者报告了甲状腺功能减退症（表 4）；所有事件均为 1 级或 2 级。

English: ischemic heart disease was reported in 4.4 % of the patients in the apalutamide group and 1.5 % of those in the placebo group ; ischemic events led to death in two patients in each group .
Chinese: 阿帕鲁胺组 4.4% 的患者和安慰剂组 1.5% 的患者报告了缺血性心脏病；每组中有两名患者因缺血事件而死亡。

English: a post hoc analysis that accounted for the competing risk of death further supported the preplanned analyses presented in this article ( Table S6 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 考虑了死亡竞争风险的事后分析进一步支持了本文中提出的预先计划的分析（补充附录表 S6）。

English: apalutamide plus ADT also resulted in a higher percentage of patients in whom undetectable PSA levels were achieved and a longer time to PSA progression than placebo plus ADT .
Chinese: 与安慰剂加 ADT 相比，apalutamide 加 ADT 还导致更高百分比的患者达到无法检测的 PSA 水平和更长的 PSA 进展时间。

English: for example , although all the patients acknowledged the survival benefit of docetaxel during informed consent , only 10.7 % had received previous docetaxel therapy before trial enrollment .
Chinese: 例如，尽管所有患者在知情同意期间都承认多西紫杉醇的生存获益，但只有 10.7% 的患者在入组试验前曾接受过多西紫杉醇治疗。

English: this probably reflects perceived patient fitness for docetaxel and differences in patient choice or care approaches .
Chinese: 这可能反映了患者对多西紫杉醇的适应度以及患者选择或护理方法的差异。

English: however , the consistency of clinical benefit of apalutamide across all subgroups is reassuring .
Chinese: 然而，apalutamide 在所有亚组中的临床获益的一致性令人安心。

English: adverse events were generally consistent with the known safety profile of apalutamide .
Chinese: 不良事件与阿帕鲁胺已知的安全性基本一致。

English: rash that was related to treatment with apalutamide was common and was typically managed with antihistamines and topical glucocorticoids , dose interruption , and dose reduction ( see the Results section in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 与阿帕鲁胺治疗相关的皮疹很常见，通常使用抗组胺药和局部糖皮质激素、中断剂量和减少剂量来控制（见补充附录中的结果部分）。

English: hypothyroidism was mild to moderate ; the condition was monitored according to thyrotropin level and managed with levothyroxine .
Chinese: 甲状腺功能减退症为轻度至中度；根据促甲状腺激素水平监测病情，并用左旋甲状腺素进行管理。

English: the differences in the incidence of falls and fractures between the apalutamide group and the placebo group were smaller in the TITAN trial than in the SPARTAN trial.20
Chinese: 在 TITAN 试验中，apalutamide 组和安慰剂组之间跌倒和骨折发生率的差异小于 SPARTAN 试验。 20

English: as brain stimulation devices and procedures proliferate on the market and enter popular discourse , patients are likely to ask clinicians about using these for clinical treatments and even cognitive enhancement .
Chinese: 随着大脑刺激设备和程序在市场上激增并进入流行话题，患者很可能会询问临床医生有关使用这些设备进行临床治疗甚至认知增强的信息。

English: how these procedures might increase creativity is uncertain .
Chinese: 这些程序如何提高创造力尚不确定。

English: competing hypotheses favor heightened activity in left prefrontal and anterior cingulate cortices .
Chinese: 相互竞争的假设支持左前额叶和前扣带皮层的活动增强。

English: the reverse pattern of anodal vs. cathodal stimulation ( L + R- )
Chinese: 阳极与阴极刺激的相反模式 ( L + R- )

English: sham stimulation
Chinese: 假刺激

English: participants were unable to distinguish active from sham stimulation .
Chinese: 参与者无法区分主动刺激和假刺激。

English: these intriguing findings bear replication .
Chinese: 这些有趣的发现值得重复。

English: stay tuned .
Chinese: 敬请关注 。

English: a large observational study suggests exposure to artificial light at night while sleeping raises risk for obesity .
Chinese: 一项大型观察性研究表明，夜间睡觉时接触人造光会增加肥胖风险。

English: animal and limited human data indicate that exposure to artificial light at night ( ALAN ) contributes to obesity .
Chinese: 动物和有限的人类数据表明，夜间暴露于人造光 (ALAN) 会导致肥胖。

English: baseline mean BMI progressively increased with ALAN exposure , from 27.0 kg / m2 ( C1 and C2 ) to 29.2 ( C4 ) .
Chinese: 基线平均 BMI 随着 ALAN 暴露逐渐增加，从 27.0 kg/m2（C1 和 C2）到 29.2（C4）。

English: in analysis adjusted for several covariables , having any ALAN exposure was associated with higher prevalence of obesity at baseline ( prevalence ratio , 1.03 ) .
Chinese: 在针对多个协变量进行调整后的分析中，任何 ALAN 暴露都与基线时较高的肥胖患病率相关（患病率 1.03）。

English: exposure to ALAN may suppress melatonin production , disrupting circadian rhythms .
Chinese: 接触 ALAN 可能会抑制褪黑激素的产生，扰乱昼夜节律。

English: in prediabetic adults with mostly normal vitamin D levels , supplementation did not affect rates of progression to diabetes .
Chinese: 在大多数维生素 D 水平正常的糖尿病前期成人中，补充剂不会影响进展为糖尿病的速度。

English: low vitamin D levels have been associated with excess risk for developing type 2 diabetes , but proof of a causal relation is lacking .
Chinese: 低维生素 D 水平与患 2 型糖尿病的风险过高有关，但缺乏因果关系的证据。

English: now , in the largest randomized trial to date , about 2400 U.S. adults with prediabetes received 4000 IU of vitamin D3 or placebo daily .
Chinese: 现在，在迄今为止规模最大的随机试验中，大约 2400 名患有糖尿病前期的美国成年人每天接受 4000 IU 的维生素 D3 或安慰剂。

English: mean 25 ( OH ) D level increased to ≈ 50 ng / mL in the supplemented group and was unchanged in the placebo group .
Chinese: 补充剂组的平均 25 (OH) D 水平增加至 ≈ 50 ng/mL，而安慰剂组则没有变化。

English: we still have no compelling evidence that vitamin D supplementation will prevent type 2 diabetes ; thus , supplements should not be recommended for this purpose in prediabetic patients with normal vitamin D levels .
Chinese: 我们仍然没有令人信服的证据表明补充维生素 D 可以预防 2 型糖尿病；因此，不应推荐维生素 D 水平正常的糖尿病前期患者为此目的服用补充剂。

English: the protocol was modified after enrollment of 88 patients to allow patients to have previously received docetaxel for HSMPC .
Chinese: 该方案在 88 名患者入组后进行了修改，以允许患者之前接受过用于 HSMPC 的多西紫杉醇。

English: these results were not affected by volume of disease or prior use of docetaxel .
Chinese: 这些结果不受疾病体积或先前使用多西紫杉醇的影响。

English: at 3 years , the percentage of patients still receiving a trial regimen was 62 % in the enzalutamide group and 34 % in the control group .
Chinese: 3 年时，恩杂鲁胺组仍在接受试验治疗的患者百分比为 62%，对照组为 34%。

English: fatigue and seizures were more common with enzalutamide .
Chinese: 恩杂鲁胺导致疲劳和癫痫发作更常见。

English: the authors note that the effect of enzalutamide on OS appeared smaller in the subgroup receiving prior docetaxel , but that the study was not powered to address this issue .
Chinese: 作者指出，enzalutamide 对 OS 的影响在既往接受过多西紫杉醇的亚组中似乎较小，但该研究无法解决这个问题。

English: there is a therapy burden associated with enzalutamide that must be considered by clinicians and patients as they review the evolving treatment options in this clinical space .
Chinese: 临床医生和患者在审查该临床领域不断发展的治疗方案时必须考虑到与恩杂鲁胺相关的治疗负担。

English: among more than 20,000 patients with cerebral ischemic events , presence of microbleeds increased risks for both future ischemic events and intracerebral hemorrhages .
Chinese: 在超过 20,000 名患有脑缺血事件的患者中，微出血的存在增加了未来发生缺血事件和脑出血的风险。

English: should treatment change for these patients ?
Chinese: 这些患者的治疗应该改变吗？

English: subcortical CMs may be a marker of small vessel vasculopathy ; lobar CMs may indicate cerebral amyloid angiopathy ( CAA ) .
Chinese: 皮层下 CM 可能是小血管病变的标志；大叶 CM 可能表明脑淀粉样血管病 (CAA)。

English: the primary outcome was any symptomatic ICH or ischemic stroke .
Chinese: 主要结果是任何有症状的 ICH 或缺血性卒中。

English: of the full group , CMs were present in 28 % , close to half ( 43 % ) of whom had only one documented microbleed .
Chinese: 在整个组中，CM 占 28%，其中将近一半 (43%) 只有一次微出血记录。

English: the adjusted hazard ratio was higher for symptomatic hemorrhagic stroke than for symptomatic ischemic stroke ( 2.45 for ICH , 1.23 for ischemic stroke ) .
Chinese: 症状性出血性卒中的校正风险比高于症状性缺血性卒中（ICH 为 2.45，缺血性卒中为 1.23）。

English: risk for hemorrhagic stroke increased with a higher CM burden ( adjusted HR , 4.55 with five or more CMs vs. no COMs ) .
Chinese: 出血性中风的风险随着 CM 负担的增加而增加（调整后的 HR，5 个或更多 CM 为 4.55 与没有 COM 相比）。

English: however , regardless of CM location or burden , the absolute risk for ischemic stroke was higher than the risk for ICH .
Chinese: 然而，无论 CM 位置或负担如何，缺血性卒中的绝对风险高于 ICH 的风险。

English: Impressively , the authors collected data on more than 20,000 patients from multiple cohorts .
Chinese: 令人印象深刻的是，作者收集了来自多个队列的 20,000 多名患者的数据。

English: the results reveal that presence of cerebral microbleeds suggests an increased risk for future vascular events .
Chinese: 结果表明，脑微出血的存在表明未来血管事件的风险增加。

English: although the presence of CMs affects prognosis , whether detection of CMs should alter treatment is unclear .
Chinese: 尽管 CM 的存在会影响预后，但尚不清楚 CM 的检测是否应改变治疗。

English: because the rate of ischemic stroke outweighs the rate of ICH in patients with CMs , antiplatelet therapy could have some benefit in these patients .
Chinese: 由于 CM 患者的缺血性卒中发生率超过 ICH 发生率，因此抗血小板治疗可能对这些患者有一定益处。

English: a large randomized trial is needed to provide definitive guidance on this issue .
Chinese: 需要一项大型随机试验来为这个问题提供明确的指导。

English: additional sedative agents were required for most intensive care patients to achieve targeted sedation .
Chinese: 大多数重症监护患者需要额外的镇静剂才能达到有针对性的镇静效果。

English: in previous trials , requisite doses of benzodiazepines and propofol were lower among patients who received dexmedetomidine , and it is associated with lower rates of delirium ( e.g. , NEJM JW Gen Med Oct 15 2016 and Lancet 2016 ; 388 : 1893 ) .
Chinese: 在之前的试验中，接受右美托咪定的患者所需的苯二氮卓类药物和异丙酚剂量较低，并且与较低的谵妄发生率相关（例如，NEJM JW Gen Med 2016 年 10 月 15 日和柳叶刀 2016 年；388：1893）。

English: as use of dexmedetomidine has grown , clinicians have been wondering whether it could be used as the sole sedating agent for critically ill patients .
Chinese: 随着右美托咪定的使用越来越多，临床医生一直在想它是否可以用作危重病人的唯一镇静剂。

English: investigators in eight countries randomized 4000 patients who were receiving mechanical ventilation either to dexmedetomidine as primary sedation or to usual care .
Chinese: 八个国家的研究人员将 4000 名接受机械通气的患者随机分为右美托咪定作为主要镇静剂或常规护理。

English: most enrolled patients were receiving ventilation for respiratory disorders ; a quarter were postoperative patients .
Chinese: 大多数入组患者因呼吸系统疾病接受通气；四分之一是术后患者。

English: although most patients were deeply sedated when they were enrolled in the trial , the goal was light sedation unless contraindicated .
Chinese: 尽管大多数患者在参加试验时都处于深度镇静状态，但目标是轻度镇静，除非有禁忌症。

English: light sedation was slightly more likely to be achieved with dexmedetomidine ; however , three quarters of dexmedetomidine patients required addition of propofol , midazolam , or both .
Chinese: 右美托咪定更可能实现轻度镇静；然而，四分之三的右美托咪定患者需要加用异丙酚、咪达唑仑或两者。

English: adverse events , most commonly bradycardia and hypotension , were more common in the dexmedetomidine group .
Chinese: 不良事件，最常见的是心动过缓和低血压，在右美托咪定组中更为常见。

English: as seen in previous studies , it did spare use of other agents , which might help avoid deeper sedation and delirium .
Chinese: 正如在之前的研究中所看到的，它确实没有使用其他药物，这可能有助于避免更深的镇静和精神错乱。

English: it makes sense to use dexmedetomidine as an adjunctive agent , but caution should be exercised in patients who already are hypotensive or bradycardic .
Chinese: 使用右美托咪定作为辅助药物是有意义的，但对于已经出现低血压或心动过缓的患者应谨慎使用。

English: recurrent ICH was less common with than without antiplatelet therapy .
Chinese: 与未进行抗血小板治疗相比，复发性脑出血较少见。

English: intracerebral hemorrhage ( ICH ) is associated with high levels of morbidity and mortality .
Chinese: 脑出血 (ICH) 与高发病率和死亡率有关。

English: patients with a previous ICH are also sometimes advised to avoid antithrombotic therapy .
Chinese: 有时也建议既往有 ICH 史的患者避免抗血栓治疗。

English: the RESTART Collaboration studied the effect of starting antiplatelet therapy or avoiding antiplatelet therapy in 537 survivors of a recent ICH ( 68 % male ; median age , 77 years ; 62 % lobar ICH ) recruited from multiple centers in the United Kingdom .
Chinese: RESTART 协作研究了从英国多个中心招募的 537 名近期 ICH 幸存者（68% 男性；中位年龄 77 岁；62% 脑叶 ICH）开始抗血小板治疗或避免抗血小板治疗的效果。

English: patients were randomly assigned to start antiplatelet therapy ( START group ) or avoid antiplatelet therapy ( AVOID group ) .
Chinese: 患者被随机分配到开始抗血小板治疗（START 组）或避免抗血小板治疗（AVOID 组）。

English: patients were enrolled a median of 76 days after the ICH .
Chinese: 患者在 ICH 后的中位时间为 76 天。

English: the primary endpoint was recurrent , symptomatic ICH .
Chinese: 主要终点是复发性、有症状的 ICH。

English: secondary outcomes included all major hemorrhages ( both intracranial and extracranial ) and occlusive vascular events ( e.g. , ischemic stroke or myocardial infarction ) .
Chinese: 次要结果包括所有大出血（颅内和颅外）和闭塞性血管事件（例如，缺血性中风或心肌梗塞）。

English: the authors do not provide data on other relevant variables , such as blood pressure control .
Chinese: 作者没有提供其他相关变量的数据，例如血压控制。

English: nevertheless , if a clinician judges that a patient with a recent ICH needs antiplatelet therapy , these findings provide reassurance that the practice appears to be safe .
Chinese: 然而，如果临床医生判断近期发生 ICH 的患者需要抗血小板治疗，这些发现可以确保这种做法似乎是安全的。

English: stage III or IVA endometrial cancer carries a significant risk of systemic and locoregional recurrence .
Chinese: III 期或 IVA 期子宫内膜癌具有显着的全身和局部复发风险。

English: secondary end points included overall survival , acute and chronic toxic effects , and quality of life .
Chinese: 次要终点包括总生存期、急性和慢性毒性作用以及生活质量。

English: pelvic or whole abdominal radiotherapy has traditionally followed surgical resection.6,8
Chinese: 盆腔或全腹放疗传统上是在手术切除后进行的。6,8

English: in a randomized trial conducted by the Gynecologic Oncology Group ( GOG ) , GOG 122 , chemotherapy was found to be superior to radiotherapy in treating locally advanced disease , and it thus became part of the standard treatment.9
Chinese: 在妇科肿瘤组 ( GOG ) 进行的一项随机试验中， GOG 122 发现化疗在治疗局部晚期疾病方面优于放疗，因此成为标准治疗的一部分。 9

English: however , if chemotherapy is given alone , the incidence of locoregional recurrence approaches 20 % , 9 heralding subsequent distant metastasis and death .
Chinese: 然而，如果单独给予化疗，局部区域复发的发生率接近 20%，9 预示着随后的远处转移和死亡。

English: therefore , it was logical to hypothesize that an approach that combined the methods of treatment would improve outcomes by preventing local ( pelvic ) and distant recurrences .
Chinese: 因此，可以合理地假设一种结合治疗方法的方法将通过预防局部（骨盆）和远处复发来改善结果。

English: this combined approach has been studied , but its efficacy relative to that of chemotherapy alone is not known .
Chinese: 这种联合治疗方法已经过研究，但其相对于单独化疗的疗效尚不清楚。

English: these results supported the feasibility and efficacy of a combined treatment strategy .
Chinese: 这些结果支持了联合治疗策略的可行性和有效性。

English: patients AND TRIAL OVERSIGHT
Chinese: 患者和试验监督

English: no single residual tumor mass could be larger than 2 cm in greatest dimension .
Chinese: 单个残留肿瘤块的最大尺寸不能大于 2 厘米。

English: normal organ function and a GOG performance status score of 2 or lower were required ( scores range from 0 to 5 , with higher scores reflecting greater disability ) .
Chinese: 要求器官功能正常且 GOG 体能状态评分为 2 分或更低（评分范围为 0 至 5，评分越高表示残疾越严重）。

English: patients with carcinosarcoma or recurrent endometrial carcinoma were excluded .
Chinese: 排除癌肉瘤或复发性子宫内膜癌患者。

English: the trial was conducted in accordance with applicable regulatory requirements and the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki .
Chinese: 该试验是根据适用的监管要求和赫尔辛基宣言的原则进行的。

English: patients provided written informed consent before enrollment .
Chinese: 患者在入组前提供了书面知情同意书。

English: trial DESIGN AND END POINTS
Chinese: 试验设计和终点

English: this randomized , multicenter , phase 3 trial was designed with input from the Gynecologic Oncology Group .
Chinese: 这项随机、多中心、3 期试验的设计参考了妇科肿瘤组的意见。

English: the authors vouch for the accuracy and completeness of the data and for the fidelity of the trial to the protocol , available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 作者保证数据的准确性和完整性以及试验对方案的忠实度，方案与本文全文可在 NEJM.org 获取。

English: the trial treatments were paid for by medical insurance , and the trial was supported by the National Cancer Institute .
Chinese: 试验治疗由医疗保险支付，试验得到美国国家癌症研究所的支持。

English: all the patients were registered through the National Cancer Institute Oncology Patient Enrollment Network .
Chinese: 所有患者均通过国家癌症研究所肿瘤患者登记网络登记。

English: treatment was randomly assigned at the GOG Statistical and Data Center and was concealed until registration with verification of eligibility .
Chinese: 治疗是在 GOG 统计和数据中心随机分配的，并且在通过资格验证进行注册之前是隐藏的。

English: randomization was stratified according to age and the presence or absence of gross residual disease .
Chinese: 根据年龄和是否存在大体残留病灶对随机化进行分层。

English: treatment AND ASSESSMENTS
Chinese: 治疗和评估

English: the two treatment regimens were randomly assigned in a 1 : 1 ratio within permuted blocks .
Chinese: 两种治疗方案在排列区内以 1:1 的比例随机分配。

English: the planned total dose was 4500 cGy in 25 fractions at 180 cGy per fraction .
Chinese: 计划总剂量为 4500 cGy，分 25 次，每次 180 cGy。

English: disease assessments included computed tomography ( CT ) of the abdomen and pelvis and chest radiography at baseline , the end of treatment , every 6 months for the first 2 years , and then annually up to 5 years .
Chinese: 疾病评估包括腹部和骨盆的计算机断层扫描 (CT)，以及基线时的胸片、治疗结束时、前 2 年每 6 个月一次，然后每年一次，最多 5 年。

English: safety assessments included recording of adverse events and concomitant medications , physical examination , and hematologic and chemical testing on the same schedule .
Chinese: 安全性评估包括记录不良事件和合并用药、体格检查以及按同一时间表进行的血液学和化学测试。

English: adverse events were graded with the use of the Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events ( CTCAE ) , version 3.0 .
Chinese: 使用不良事件通用术语标准 (CTCAE) 3.0 版对不良事件进行分级。

English: a higher Trial Outcome Index , NTX , or gastrointestinal score suggests better quality of life or fewer symptoms .
Chinese: 较高的试验结果指数、NTX 或胃肠道评分表明生活质量较好或症状较少。

English: assessments were completed before treatment ( at baseline ) , 1 week after completing radiation therapy or before cycle 3 of chemotherapy , and 18 and 70 weeks after the start of treatment .
Chinese: 评估在治疗前（基线时）、完成放疗后 1 周或化疗第 3 周期前以及治疗开始后 18 周和 70 周完成。

English: quality ASSURANCE
Chinese: 质量保证

English: the trial was open to enrollment between June 29 , 2009 , and July 28 , 2014 , and the data cutoff for analysis was March 9 , 2017 .
Chinese: 该试验于 2009 年 6 月 29 日至 2014 年 7 月 28 日期间开放注册，分析的数据截止日期为 2017 年 3 月 9 日。

English: the GOG Pathology Committee verified histologic subtypes , grades , and stages for all patients .
Chinese: GOG 病理学委员会验证了所有患者的组织学亚型、等级和分期。

English: eligibility , surgery , and radiation plans were reviewed centrally .
Chinese: 对资格、手术和放疗计划进行集中审查。

English: the trial chairs monitored eligibility , chemotherapy delivery and modifications , adverse events , and radiographic assessments .
Chinese: 试验主席监测了资格、化疗的实施和修改、不良事件和影像学评估。

English: under the assumption of a decrease in the hazard of recurrence or death over time , a sample size of 804 was targeted .
Chinese: 假设随着时间的推移复发或死亡的风险降低，目标样本量为 804。

English: two interim analyses were planned when 42 % ( 105 ) and 83 % ( 210 ) of the expected number of recurrences or deaths had been reported .
Chinese: 当报告的复发或死亡人数达到预期的 42% (105) 和 83% (210) 时，计划进行两次中期分析。

English: these were reported to the data and safety monitoring board in September 2013 and January 2016 .
Chinese: 这些已于 2013 年 9 月和 2016 年 1 月报告给数据和安全监测委员会。

English: no action was taken to alter the conduct of the trial on the basis of those interim analyses .
Chinese: 没有采取任何行动来根据这些临时分析改变试验的进行。

English: enrollment concluded with 813 patients ; 77 were deemed ineligible , most commonly because of an inappropriate cancer stage or a lack of pathological documentation .
Chinese: 入组结束时有 813 名患者； 77 人被认为不合格，最常见的原因是癌症分期不当或缺乏病理文件。

English: in addition , 29 eligible patients were never treated , with 24 of those having been assigned to the chemoradiotherapy group .
Chinese: 此外，29 名符合条件的患者从未接受过治疗，其中 24 名患者被分配到放化疗组。

English: the safety analysis included all eligible and treated patients , whereas the efficacy analysis included all eligible patients , regardless of whether they received treatment .
Chinese: 安全性分析包括所有符合条件和接受治疗的患者，而疗效分析包括所有符合条件的患者，无论他们是否接受治疗。

English: characteristics of the patient and the tumors are shown in Table 1 .
Chinese: 患者和肿瘤的特征如表1所示。

English: the performance status score was 0 for 74 % of enrolled patients , and the endometrioid histologic type was predominant .
Chinese: 74% 的登记患者的体能状态评分为 0，并且子宫内膜样组织学类型占主导地位。

English: stratification factors were balanced between the treatment groups , with nearly 98 % of patients having no gross residual disease .
Chinese: 治疗组之间的分层因素是平衡的，近 98% 的患者没有大体残留病灶。

English: surgery to remove lymph nodes was reported in more than 94 % of patients , with a median number of 13 pelvic nodes and 3 paraaortic nodes removed .
Chinese: 据报道，超过 94% 的患者接受了淋巴结切除手术，切除的中位数为 13 个盆腔淋巴结和 3 个主动脉旁淋巴结。

English: overall , 75 % of patients completed all prescribed chemoradiotherapy in a median period of 21 weeks .
Chinese: 总体而言，75% 的患者在中位 21 周的时间内完成了所有规定的化放疗。

English: two cycles of cisplatin were coadministered with radiation to more than 85 % of patients in the chemoradiotherapy group , and 75 % of the patients in that group received all four planned cycles of carboplatin and paclitaxel .
Chinese: 放化疗组中超过 85% 的患者同时接受了两个周期的顺铂和放疗，并且该组中 75% 的患者接受了所有四个计划周期的卡铂和紫杉醇。

English: between 8 and 10 % of patients discontinued treatment due to adverse events .
Chinese: 8% 到 10% 的患者因不良事件而停止治疗。

English: toxicity
Chinese: 毒性

English: Table 2 shows acute adverse events , regardless of attribution to the trial intervention , in the 707 eligible participants who initiated treatment .
Chinese: 表 2 显示了 707 名开始治疗的合格参与者的急性不良事件，无论归因于试验干预。

English: constitutional symptoms , fatigue , gastrointestinal events , renal or genitourinary events , and musculoskeletal events were significantly more frequent per grade in the chemoradiotherapy group .
Chinese: 全身症状、疲劳、胃肠道事件、肾脏或泌尿生殖系统事件以及肌肉骨骼事件在化放疗组中每个年级的发生率明显更高。

English: late toxic effects are summarized in Table S2 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录表 S2 总结了晚期毒性作用。

English: the results with regard to the primary end point did not reach significance .
Chinese: 关于主要终点的结果没有达到显着性。

English: a sensitivity analysis indicated that the results observed in the eligible treated population were consistent with the results among all eligible patients .
Chinese: 敏感性分析表明，在符合条件的治疗人群中观察到的结果与在所有符合条件的患者中观察到的结果一致。

English: of those deaths , 73 % and 81 % , respectively , were due to endometrial cancer progression .
Chinese: 在这些死亡中，分别有 73% 和 81% 是由于子宫内膜癌的进展。

English: the data on overall survival are not sufficiently mature to allow comparison between the groups .
Chinese: 总生存期的数据不够成熟，无法进行组间比较。

English: this was shown in both the Post Operative Radiation Therapy in Endometrial Carcinoma ( PORTEC ) 1 trial and the GOG 99 trial , 17,19 and its use in this context remains tailored to women who are considered to be at high risk for relapse.20
Chinese: 这在子宫内膜癌术后放射治疗 (PORTEC) 1 试验和 GOG 99 试验 17,19 中均有体现，其在这种情况下的使用仍然针对被认为具有高复发风险的女性。 20

English: however , given the competing risk of distant metastasis , which has led to the implementation of chemotherapy as the standard of care , 9 the role of radiotherapy remains uncertain .
Chinese: 然而，考虑到远处转移的竞争风险，导致化疗成为标准治疗的实施，9 放疗的作用仍不确定。

English: this trial prospectively evaluated the effect of combined chemotherapy plus radiotherapy in patients with stage III or IVA endometrial carcinoma as compared with the effect of chemotherapy alone .
Chinese: 该试验前瞻性地评估了联合化疗加放疗对 III 期或 IVA 期子宫内膜癌患者的疗效，并与单独化疗的疗效进行了比较。

English: with the revision of the FIGO staging system in 2009,23 the trial was amended to exclude patients with peritoneal washings that were positive for cancer cells but with no evidence of extrauterine endometrioid tumor , because such patients have better outcomes than other patients with stage III disease.24,25
