Chinese: 随着 2009 年 FIGO 分期系统的修订，23 对试验进行了修订，排除了腹膜冲洗液为癌细胞阳性但没有宫外子宫内膜样肿瘤证据的患者，因为这些患者的预后优于其他 III 期疾病患者.24,25

English: although surgical staging was not mandated , the majority of patients underwent full staging procedures .
Chinese: 尽管未强制要求进行手术分期，但大多数患者都接受了完整的分期程序。

English: in the GOG 122 trial , overall survival at 60 months was 10 percentage points higher among patients who received doxorubicin and platinum than among those treated with whole abdominal radiotherapy.9
Chinese: 在 GOG 122 试验中，接受多柔比星和铂类治疗的患者的 60 个月总生存期比接受全腹部放疗的患者高 10 个百分点。 9

English: full delivery of chemotherapy was diminished by the addition of radiotherapy , with only 75 % of women completing the four planned courses in the chemoradiotherapy group .
Chinese: 放疗的加入减少了化疗的完全实施，放化疗组只有 75% 的女性完成了四个计划疗程。

English: because these results have not been validated prospectively , they should not be adopted without further study .
Chinese: 由于这些结果尚未得到前瞻性验证，因此不应在没有进一步研究的情况下采用。

English: late second cancers are also a risk .
Chinese: 晚期第二种癌症也是一种风险。

English: our data are compatible with the hypothesis from previous studies that completion of chemotherapy is important for the prevention of distant relapse .
Chinese: 我们的数据与之前研究的假设相符，即完成化疗对于预防远处复发很重要。

English: patients were randomly assigned in a 3 : 1 ratio to receive HTTRx or placebo as a bolus intrathecal administration every 4 weeks for four doses .
Chinese: 患者以 3:1 的比例随机分配接受 HTTRx 或安慰剂作为鞘内推注给药，每 4 周一次，共 4 个剂量。

English: dose selection was guided by a preclinical model in mice and nonhuman primates that related dose level to reduction in the concentration of huntingtin .
Chinese: 剂量选择由小鼠和非人灵长类动物的临床前模型指导，该模型将剂量水平与亨廷顿蛋白浓度的降低相关联。

English: the primary end point was safety .
Chinese: 主要终点是安全性。

English: the secondary end point was HTTRx pharmacokinetics in cerebrospinal fluid ( CSF ) .
Chinese: 次要终点是 HTTRx 在脑脊液 (CSF) 中的药代动力学。

English: prespecified exploratory end points included the concentration of mutant huntingtin in CSF .
Chinese: 预先指定的探索性终点包括脑脊液中突变亨廷顿蛋白的浓度。

English: of the 46 patients who were enrolled in the trial , 34 were randomly assigned to receive HTTRx ( at ascending dose levels of 10 to 120 mg ) and 12 were randomly assigned to receive placebo .
Chinese: 在参加该试验的 46 名患者中，34 名被随机分配接受 HTTRx（递增剂量水平为 10 至 120 毫克），12 名被随机分配接受安慰剂。

English: each patient received all four doses and completed the trial .
Chinese: 每位患者都接受了所有四种剂量并完成了试验。

English: adverse events , all of grade 1 or 2 , were reported in 98 % of the patients .
Chinese: 98% 的患者报告了所有 1 级或 2 级的不良事件。

English: there were no clinically relevant adverse changes in laboratory variables .
Chinese: 实验室变量没有临床相关的不良变化。

English: predose ( trough ) concentrations of HTTRx in CSF showed dose dependence up to doses of 60 mg .
Chinese: CSF 中 HTTRx 的给药前（谷值）浓度在高达 60 mg 的剂量下表现出剂量依赖性。

English: the trial was conducted in accordance with the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki .
Chinese: 审判是按照赫尔辛基宣言的原则进行的。

English: the trial protocol ( available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org ) and all documentation were approved by the institutional review board or independent ethics committee at each investigational site .
Chinese: 试验方案（与本文全文可在 NEJM.org 上获取）和所有文件均由每个研究中心的机构审查委员会或独立伦理委员会批准。

English: the trial was sponsored by Ionis Pharmaceuticals , which provided the trial agents ( HTTRx and placebo ) .
Chinese: 该试验由 Ionis Pharmaceuticals 赞助，该公司提供了试验药物（HTTRx 和安慰剂）。

English: an independent data and safety monitoring board authorized each dose escalation after unblinded review of safety data and consultation with the sponsor , Ionis Pharmaceuticals .
Chinese: 一个独立的数据和安全监测委员会在对安全数据进行非盲审查并与赞助商 Ionis Pharmaceuticals 协商后批准了每次剂量升级。

English: the investigators collected the data , which were held and maintained by the sponsor .
Chinese: 调查人员收集了数据，这些数据由申办方持有和维护。

English: data were analyzed by personnel from the sponsor and were interpreted by all the authors .
Chinese: 数据由申办方的人员进行分析，并由所有作者进行解读。

English: the investigators vouch for the fidelity of the trial to the protocol and protocol amendments .
Chinese: 研究者保证试验忠实于方案和方案修正案。

English: the authors vouch for the completeness and accuracy of the data .
Chinese: 作者保证数据的完整性和准确性。

English: the authors and sponsor made the decision to submit the manuscript for publication .
Chinese: 作者和赞助商决定投稿发表。

English: further details of the inclusion and exclusion criteria are provided in the Supplementary Appendix , available at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 补充附录中提供了纳入和排除标准的更多详细信息，补充附录可在 NEJM.org 获取。

English: the trial was performed at nine centers in the United Kingdom , Germany , and Canada from August 2015 through November 2017 .
Chinese: 该试验于 2015 年 8 月至 2017 年 11 月在英国、德国和加拿大的九个中心进行。

English: a cerebrospinal fluid ( CSF ) sample was obtained before each administration of HTTRx or placebo and either 4 or 8 weeks after the last dose was administered ( Figure 1 ) .
Chinese: 在每次 HTTRx 或安慰剂给药前以及最后一次给药后 4 或 8 周采集脑脊液 (CSF) 样本（图 1）。

English: the primary end point was the safety of HTTRx treatment .
Chinese: 主要终点是 HTTRx 治疗的安全性。

English: safety evaluations included physical examination , neurologic examination , the Columbia Suicide Severity Rating Scale , laboratory assessments , vital signs , electrocardiograms , and safety neuroimaging sequences .
Chinese: 安全评估包括身体检查、神经系统检查、哥伦比亚自杀严重程度评定量表、实验室评估、生命体征、心电图和安全神经影像序列。

English: the secondary end point was the characterization of the pharmacokinetics of HTTRx in CSF .
Chinese: 次要终点是 HTTRx 在 CSF 中的药代动力学特征。

English: measurement OF CEREBRAL VOLUME
Chinese: 脑容量测量

English: the primary objective of the trial was the evaluation of the safety of HTTRx treatment ( primary end point ) .
Chinese: 该试验的主要目的是评估 HTTRx 治疗的安全性（主要终点）。

English: adverse events and serious adverse events during the trial , laboratory tests ( in blood and CSF ) , vital signs , electrocardiographic measures , and observations from the Columbia Suicide Severity Rating Scale were summarized according to trial group .
Chinese: 根据试验组对试验期间的不良事件和严重不良事件、实验室检查（血液和脑脊液）、生命体征、心电图测量和哥伦比亚自杀严重程度评定量表的观察结果进行了总结。

English: where possible , pharmacokinetic variables were assessed for HTTRx in CSF ( secondary end point ) and plasma ( exploratory end point ) .
Chinese: 在可能的情况下，评估 CSF（次要终点）和血浆（探索性终点）中 HTTRx 的药代动力学变量。

English: because of the exploratory nature of this trial , adjustments for multiplicity of testing were not used .
Chinese: 由于该试验的探索性，未使用多重测试调整。

English: from August 2015 through April 2017 , a total of 52 patients were screened for eligibility , and 46 patients underwent randomization according to the protocol .
Chinese: 从 2015 年 8 月到 2017 年 4 月，共有 52 名患者接受了资格筛选，46 名患者根据方案进行了随机分组。

English: all the patients received all scheduled doses of the assigned trial agent ( HTTRx or placebo ) , and all the patients who had undergone randomization completed the trial according to the protocol . ( a diagram of the flow of patients through the trial is provided in Fig .
Chinese: 所有患者均接受了所有预定剂量的指定试验药物（HTTRx 或安慰剂），所有接受随机分组的患者均根据方案完成了试验。 （图 1 中提供了患者通过试验的流程图。

English: primary END POINT OF SAFETY
Chinese: 主要安全终点

English: the incidence of adverse events was similar among patients receiving HTTRx and those receiving placebo ( Table 2 ) .
Chinese: 接受 HTTRx 的患者和接受安慰剂的患者的不良事件发生率相似（表 2）。

English: adverse events were reported in 98 % of the patients ; all events were mild ( 83 % ) or moderate ( 17 % ) in severity .
Chinese: 98% 的患者报告了不良事件；所有事件的严重程度均为轻度 (83%) 或中度 (17%)。

English: neither suicidal behavior nor serious suicidal ideation emerged in any patient during the trial .
Chinese: 在试验期间，任何患者均未出现自杀行为或严重的自杀意念。

English: secondary END POINT
Chinese: 次要终点

English: HTTRx was measurable in the CSF of most patients who received doses of 30 mg or more .
Chinese: 大多数接受 30 mg 或更多剂量的患者的 CSF 中可测量 HTTRx。

English: no accumulation of HTTRx in CSF was observed over time .
Chinese: 随着时间的推移，未观察到 CSF 中 HTTRx 的积累。

English: exploratory END POINTS
Chinese: 探索性终点

English: plasma Concentrations of HTTRx
Chinese: HTTRx 的血浆浓度

English: the median peak plasma concentrations of HTTRx were reached within 4 hours after the bolus intrathecal administration and declined to less than 30 % of the peak concentration by 24 hours after administration .
Chinese: HTTRx 的中位血浆峰浓度在鞘内推注给药后 4 小时内达到，给药后 24 小时降至峰浓度的 30% 以下。

English: the concentration of HTTRx in plasma increased approximately proportionally to the dose over the explored dose range ( Figure 2B ) .
Chinese: 在探索的剂量范围内，血浆中 HTTRx 的浓度与剂量大致成正比增加（图 2B）。

English: concentrations of Mutant HTT in CSF
Chinese: CSF中突变体HTT的浓度

English: in patients who received placebo , the mean percentage change from baseline was an increase of 10 % in the concentration of mutant HTT in CSF ( Figure 3A and 3B , and Table S1 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 在接受安慰剂的患者中，CSF 中突变 HTT 浓度相对于基线的平均百分比变化增加了 10%（图 3A 和 3B，以及补充附录中的表 S1）。

English: additional Exploratory Outcomes
Chinese: 额外的探索性结果

English: by the start of the extension study ( 7 to 27 months after the final doses were administered in this trial ) , the concentrations of neurofilament light protein in the CSF had generally returned to pretrial concentrations .
Chinese: 到扩展研究开始时（在该试验中最后一次给药后 7 至 27 个月），CSF 中神经丝轻链蛋白的浓度通常已恢复到试验前的浓度。

English: during the extension study , the concentrations rose with a time course and magnitude that were similar to those observed in this trial and then decreased at later time points despite continued treatment ( unpublished data ) .
Chinese: 在扩展研究期间，浓度随着时间进程和幅度上升，与本试验中观察到的相似，然后尽管继续治疗（未发表的数据），但在后来的时间点下降。

English: these correlations should be interpreted with caution , because the tests were not prespecified and the coefficients of correlation were not adjusted for multiple testing .
Chinese: 应该谨慎解释这些相关性，因为测试没有预先指定，相关系数也没有针对多重测试进行调整。

English: given the results of only this trial , we do not know whether this reduction reflects a reduction in the concentration of mutant HTT in the central nervous system , although preclinical studies support the hypothesis that concentrations of mutant HTT in the CSF reflect the concentrations of mutant HTT in central nervous system tissue ( see the Supplementary Appendix , as well as Southwell et al.15 ) .
Chinese: 鉴于仅此试验的结果，我们不知道这种减少是否反映了中枢神经系统中突变 HTT 浓度的降低，尽管临床前研究支持 CSF 中突变 HTT 浓度反映突变 HTT 浓度的假设。在中枢神经系统组织中（见补充附录，以及 Southwell 等人 15）。

English: prespecified secondary outcomes were tested hierarchically .
Chinese: 预先指定的次要结果进行了分层测试。

English: the trial was stopped early after a planned interim analysis on the recommendation of the data and safety monitoring committee .
Chinese: 在根据数据和安全监测委员会的建议进行计划中的中期分析后，该试验提前终止。

English: there were no significant differences in rates of amputation or fracture .
Chinese: 截肢率或骨折率没有显着差异。

English: we designed the CREDENCE ( Canagliflozin and Renal Events in Diabetes with Established Nephropathy Clinical Evaluation ) trial to assess the effects of the SGLT2 inhibitor canagliflozin on renal outcomes in patients with type 2 diabetes and albuminuric chronic kidney disease .
Chinese: 我们设计了 CREDENCE（Canagliflozin 和糖尿病肾病临床评估中的肾脏事件）试验，以评估 SGLT2 抑制剂 canagliflozin 对 2 型糖尿病和白蛋白尿慢性肾病患者肾脏结局的影响。

English: the protocol ( available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org ) was reviewed by relevant regulatory authorities and ethics committees responsible for each trial site .
Chinese: 该方案（与本文全文可在 NEJM.org 上获取）由负责每个试验中心的相关监管机构和伦理委员会审查。

English: technical editorial assistance provided by MedErgy was funded by the sponsor .
Chinese: MedErgy 提供的技术编辑协助由申办方资助。

English: members of the steering committee designed the trial , supervised its conduct , and were responsible for reporting the results .
Chinese: 指导委员会成员设计了试验，监督其实施，并负责报告结果。

English: analyses were performed by the sponsor and independently confirmed at George Clinical with the use of original data .
Chinese: 分析由申办方进行，并由 George Clinical 使用原始数据独立确认。

English: the first and last authors drafted the first version of the manuscript , and all the authors contributed to revisions .
Chinese: 第一作者和最后作者起草了手稿的第一版，所有作者都参与了修订。

English: the decision to submit the manuscript for publication was made jointly by all the authors , who vouch for the completeness and accuracy of the data and for the fidelity of the trial to the protocol .
Chinese: 投稿发表的决定由所有作者共同做出，他们保证数据的完整性和准确性以及试验对方案的忠实度。

English: patients were eligible if they were at least 30 years of age and had type 2 diabetes , with a glycated hemoglobin level of 6.5 to 12.0 % ( 6.5 to 10.5 % in Germany , according to a country amendment ) .
Chinese: 符合条件的患者年龄至少为 30 岁，患有 2 型糖尿病，糖化血红蛋白水平为 6.5% 至 12.0%（根据国家修正案，德国为 6.5% 至 10.5%）。

English: patients who had suspected nondiabetic kidney disease or type 1 diabetes , had been treated with immunosuppression for kidney disease , or had a history of dialysis or kidney transplantation were excluded .
Chinese: 疑似非糖尿病肾病或 1 型糖尿病、接受过肾病免疫抑制治疗或有透析或肾移植病史的患者被排除在外。

English: full inclusion and exclusion criteria are described in the Supplementary Appendix , available at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 补充附录中描述了完整的纳入和排除标准，补充附录可在 NEJM.org 获取。

English: the administration of canagliflozin or placebo was to be continued until trial completion , initiation of dialysis , kidney transplantation , occurrence of diabetic ketoacidosis , pregnancy , or receipt of a disallowed therapy .
Chinese: canagliflozin 或安慰剂的给药将持续到试验完成、开始透析、肾移植、发生糖尿病酮症酸中毒、怀孕或接受不允许的治疗。

English: additional testing of blood at either the central or local laboratory and safety assessments were permitted at any time at the discretion of the investigators .
Chinese: 研究人员可随时酌情允许在中央或地方实验室进行额外的血液检测和安全性评估。

English: the use of other background therapy for glycemic management and control of cardiovascular risk factors was recommended in accordance with local guidelines .
Chinese: 根据当地指南，建议使用其他背景疗法来管理血糖和控制心血管危险因素。

English: during the trial , an increased risk of lower limb amputation was identified in another trial of canagliflozin.5
Chinese: 在试验期间，另一项卡格列净试验发现下肢截肢风险增加。 5

English: all other efficacy outcomes were exploratory .
Chinese: 所有其他疗效结果都是探索性的。

English: safety evaluations included laboratory testing and assessments of adverse events .
Chinese: 安全评估包括实验室测试和不良事件评估。

English: a single interim analysis was to be conducted by an independent data monitoring committee after the primary outcome had occurred in 405 patients .
Chinese: 在 405 名患者发生主要结果后，独立数据监测委员会将进行一次中期分析。

English: all available measurements were used with no distinction made for missing outcomes for patients who were alive and outcomes that were not observed because of death .
Chinese: 使用了所有可用的测量值，但未区分存活患者的缺失结果和因死亡而未观察到的结果。

English: slope analyses regarding the estimated GFR for the acute phase ( baseline to week 3 ) , chronic phase ( week 3 to end of treatment ) , and total slope through week 130 are described in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 关于急性期（基线至第 3 周）、慢性期（第 3 周至治疗结束）的估计 GFR 的斜率分析，以及至第 130 周的总斜率在补充附录中进行了描述。

English: the baseline characteristics of the patients were similar in the two groups ( Table 1 , and Tables S1 and S2 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .10
Chinese: 两组患者的基线特征相似（表 1 以及补充附录中的表 S1 和 S2）。10

English: the mean age was 63 years , and 33.9 % of the patients were women .
Chinese: 平均年龄为 63 岁，33.9% 的患者为女性。

English: the requisite number of primary outcome events to trigger the interim analysis were accrued by July 2018 .
Chinese: 到 2018 年 7 月，已收集到触发中期分析所需的主要结果事件数量。

English: the data monitoring committee advised the steering committee members that the prespecified efficacy criteria for early cessation had been achieved and recommended that the trial be stopped .
Chinese: 数据监测委员会告知指导委员会成员，预先设定的提前停止疗效标准已经达到，并建议停止试验。

English: the trial leadership accepted this recommendation , the patients were recalled for final visits , and the trial was concluded .
Chinese: 试验领导层接受了这一建议，患者被召回进行最后一次就诊，试验结束。

English: effect ON THE PRIMARY OUTCOME AND RENAL COMPONENTS
Chinese: 对主要结果和肾脏成分的影响

English: nearly identical results were shown in sensitivity analyses that included imputation of missing data ( hazard ratio , 0.69 ; 95 % CI , 0.59 to 0.82 ) or that were adjusted for competing risks ( hazard ratio , 0.70 ; 95 % CI , 0.59 to 0.82 ) .
Chinese: 敏感性分析显示几乎相同的结果，包括缺失数据的填补（风险比，0.69；95% CI，0.59 至 0.82）或针对竞争风险进行调整（风险比，0.70；95% CI，0.59 至 0.82）。

English: the hazard ratio for death from any cause was 0.83 ( 95 % CI , 0.68 to 1.02 ) ( Table 2 and Figure 1F ) ; for the composite of cardiovascular death , myocardial infarction , stroke , or hospitalization for heart failure or unstable angina , the hazard ratio was 0.74 ( 95 % CI , 0.63 to 0.86 ) ( Table 2 ) .
Chinese: 全因死亡的风险比为 0.83（95% CI，0.68 至 1.02）（表 2 和图 1F）；对于心血管死亡、心肌梗死、卒中或因心力衰竭或不稳定型心绞痛住院的复合事件，风险比为 0.74（95% CI，0.63 至 0.86）（表 2）。

English: effects ON SAFETY OUTCOMES
Chinese: 对安全结果的影响

English: rates of adverse events and serious adverse events were similar overall in the canagliflozin group and the placebo group ( Table 2 , and Tables S4 and S5 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 总体而言，卡格列净组和安慰剂组的不良事件和严重不良事件发生率相似（表 2 以及补充附录表 S4 和表 S5）。

English: rates of fracture were also similar in the two groups ( hazard ratio , 0.98 ; 95 % CI , 0.70 to 1.37 ) .
Chinese: 两组的骨折率也相似（风险比，0.98；95% CI，0.70 至 1.37）。

English: effect ON INTERMEDIATE OUTCOMES
Chinese: 对中期结果的影响

English: on average , levels were lower in the canagliflozin group for systolic blood pressure ( by 3.30 mm Hg ; 95 % CI , 2.73 to 3.87 ) , diastolic blood pressure ( by 0.95 mm Hg ; 95 % CI , 0.61 to 1.28 ) , and body weight ( by 0.80 kg ; 95 % CI , 0.69 to 0.92 ) .
Chinese: 平均而言，卡格列净组的收缩压（降低 3.30 mm Hg ； 95 % CI ， 2.73 至 3.87 ） 、舒张压（降低 0.95 mm Hg ； 95 % CI ， 0.61 至 1.28 ）和体重水平较低（减少 0.80 公斤；95% CI，0.69 至 0.92）。

English: thereafter , the decline in the estimated GFR was slower in the canagliflozin group than in the placebo group ( -1.85 ± 0.13 vs. -4.59 ± 0.14 ml per minute per 1.73 m2 per year ) , for a difference of 2.74 ml per minute per 1.73 m2 per year ( 95 % CI , 2.37 to 3.11 ) .
Chinese: 此后，卡格列净组估计的 GFR 下降速度比安慰剂组慢（-1.85 ± 0.13 vs. -4.59 ± 0.14 毫升每分钟每 1.73 平方米每年） ，差异为每分钟每 1.73 平方米 2.74 毫升每年平方米（95% CI，2.37 至 3.11）。

English: projected ESTIMATED EFFECTS
Chinese: 预计 估计效果

English: canagliflozin treatment would also prevent 22 hospitalizations for heart failure ( NNT , 46 ; 95 % CI , 29 to 124 ) and 25 composite events of cardiovascular death , myocardial infarction , or stroke ( NNT , 40 ; 95 % CI , 23 to 165 ) .
Chinese: canagliflozin 治疗还可预防 22 例因心力衰竭住院（NNT，46；95% CI，29 至 124）和 25 例心血管死亡、心肌梗塞或中风的复合事件（NNT，40；95% CI，23 至 165）。

English: these results indicate that canagliflozin may be an effective treatment option for renal and cardiovascular protection in patients with type 2 diabetes with chronic kidney disease .
Chinese: 这些结果表明，canagliflozin 可能是 2 型糖尿病伴慢性肾脏病患者肾脏和心血管保护的有效治疗选择。

English: the significantly lower rates of cardiovascular outcomes , including the composite of cardiovascular death , myocardial infarction , or stroke , in the canagliflozin group in our trial are consistent with those observed with canagliflozin in the CANVAS ( Canagliflozin Cardiovascular Assessment Study ) Program , 5 despite the smaller differences in glycemic control .
Chinese: 在我们的试验中，卡格列净组的心血管结局（包括心血管死亡、心肌梗死或卒中的复合事件）发生率显着降低，这与 CANVAS（卡格列净心血管评估研究）计划中观察到的卡格列净结果一致， 5 尽管规模较小血糖控制的差异。

English: the similar rates of amputation and fracture that we observed with canagliflozin and placebo are reassuring and consistent with trials of other SGLT2 inhibitors6,7,20 but differ from the CANVAS Program findings.5
Chinese: 我们观察到卡格列净和安慰剂的截肢率和骨折率相似，这令人安心，并且与其他 SGLT2 抑制剂的试验6、7、20 一致，但与 CANVAS 计划的结果不同。 5

English: whether the increased risk of lower limb amputation in the CANVAS Program was due to differing trial populations or protocols or to chance remains unclear .
Chinese: CANVAS 计划中下肢截肢风险的增加是由于不同的试验人群或方案还是偶然性仍不清楚。

English: the overall safety profile in our trial is otherwise consistent with the known adverse effects associated with canagliflozin .
Chinese: 在我们的试验中，总体安全性与卡格列净相关的已知不良反应在其他方面是一致的。

English: this trial has certain limitations .
Chinese: 本试验具有一定的局限性。

English: first , the trial was stopped early at a planned interim analysis , which may have limited the power for some secondary outcomes and may increase the risk of overestimating effect sizes.21
Chinese: 首先，试验在计划的中期分析中提前停止，这可能限制了一些次要结果的功效，并可能增加高估效应量的风险。 21

English: however , the precision of the effect and the consistency with the findings of previous large trials of SGLT2 inhibitors suggest that this limitation is unlikely to have a major effect on our findings .
Chinese: 然而，效果的精确性以及与之前 SGLT2 抑制剂大型试验结果的一致性表明，这种局限性不太可能对我们的研究结果产生重大影响。

English: retrospective cohort data from Korea support H. pylori eradication for cancer prevention .
Chinese: 来自韩国的回顾性队列数据支持根除幽门螺杆菌以预防癌症。

English: although Helicobacter pylori is a known risk factor for the development of gastric cancer , cohort studies and randomized , controlled trials have failed to show a significantly reduced risk for de novo gastric cancer with H. pylori eradication .
Chinese: 尽管幽门螺杆菌是胃癌发展的已知危险因素，但队列研究和随机对照试验未能显示根除幽门螺杆菌后新发胃癌的风险显着降低。

English: 31 de novo gastric cancers were detected : 4 among 200 patients with successful H. pylori eradication ( 0.2 % ) , 6 among 5000 patients without H. pylori ( 0.1 % ) , and 21 among 3500 patients without eradication ( 0.6 % ) .
Chinese: 共检出31例新发胃癌：200例成功根除H. pylori的患者中有4例（0.2%），5000例未成功根除H. pylori的患者中有6例（0.1%），3500例未根除的患者中有21例（0.6%）。

English: eradication of H. pylori was associated with a 70 % reduced risk for de novo gastric cancer compared with no eradication ( hazard ratio , 0.3 ) .
Chinese: 与未根除相比，根除幽门螺杆菌可将原发性胃癌的风险降低 70%（风险比 0.3）。

English: in an adjusted analysis , de novo gastric cancer was also associated with older age , presence of atrophic gastritis , and a family history of gastric cancer .
Chinese: 在调整后的分析中，新发胃癌还与年龄较大、萎缩性胃炎的存在以及胃癌家族史有关。

English: this large study supports eradication of H. pylori detected on upper endoscopy for prevention of future gastric cancer .
Chinese: 这项大型研究支持根除上消化道内窥镜检测到的幽门螺杆菌，以预防未来的胃癌。

English: the clinical significance of the observed association between low serum HDL level and de novo gastric cancer is uncertain .
Chinese: 所观察到的低血清 HDL 水平与新发胃癌之间关联的临床意义尚不确定。

English: the U.S. FDA approved Dengvaxia , a dengue vaccine , for use in a restricted population .
Chinese: 美国 FDA 批准登革热疫苗 Dengvaxia 用于受限人群。

English: development of a vaccine has been challenging because of wide circulation of four antigenically distinct dengue virus serotypes : dengue 1 , 2 , 3 , and 4 .
Chinese: 由于四种抗原性不同的登革热病毒血清型（登革热 1、2、3 和 4）的广泛传播，疫苗的开发一直具有挑战性。

English: the vaccine is given as three subcutaneous injections at 0 , 6 , and 12 months .
Chinese: 疫苗在 0、6 和 12 个月分 3 次皮下注射。

English: it is contraindicated in individuals with severe immunodeficiency or immunosuppression .
Chinese: 严重免疫缺陷或免疫抑制患者禁用。

English: safety in pregnancy has not been established .
Chinese: 怀孕期间的安全性尚未确定。

English: the vaccine also prevents asymptomatic infection ( NEJM JW Infect Dis Dec 2016 and J Infect Dis 2016 Oct 1 ; 214 : 994 ) .
Chinese: 该疫苗还可以预防无症状感染（NEJM JW Infect Dis 2016 年 12 月和 J Infect Dis 2016 年 10 月 1 日；214：994）。

English: adverse effects : the most commonly reported side effects were headache , injection site pain , malaise , asthenia , and myalgia .
Chinese: 副作用：最常报告的副作用是头痛、注射部位疼痛、不适、乏力和肌痛。

English: individuals with a severe allergic reaction to Dengvaxia should not receive additional doses .
Chinese: 对 Dengvaxia 有严重过敏反应的个人不应接受额外剂量。

English: persons with no previous dengue infection are at increased risk for severe disease after Dengvaxia vaccination if they are subsequently infected with any dengue serotype .
Chinese: 以前没有感染登革热的人如果随后感染任何登革热血清型，在接种登革热疫苗后患重病的风险就会增加。

English: Dengvaxia may cause temporary depression of sensitivity to tuberculin purified protein derivative ( PPD ) .
Chinese: Dengvaxia 可能会暂时抑制对结核菌素纯化蛋白衍生物 (PPD) 的敏感性。

English: although the dengue vaccine has been approved 19 countries and the European Union , its use in some countries has sparked controversy because of its initial administration without screening for evidence of previous dengue infection .
Chinese: 尽管登革热疫苗已获得 19 个国家和欧盟的批准，但它在一些国家的使用引发了争议，因为它在最初接种时没有筛查以前是否感染过登革热的证据。

English: most countries have approved its use up to age 45 years .
Chinese: 大多数国家都批准其使用至 45 岁。

English: more than 13,000 participants ( mean age , 64 ; 70 % overweight or obese ; 50 % current or former smokers ) , without baseline CHD , stroke history , or type 2 diabetes , were assessed .
Chinese: 超过 13,000 名参与者（平均年龄 64 岁；70% 超重或肥胖；50% 现在或以前吸烟）没有基线 CHD、中风史或 2 型糖尿病，接受了评估。

English: the authors conducted a wide range of analyses in which they adjusted for many sociodemographic , behavioral , and dietary risk factors .
Chinese: 作者进行了广泛的分析，其中他们针对许多社会人口学、行为和饮食风险因素进行了调整。

English: one possible reason is that their similar sugar content has the same adverse metabolic effects on lipids and central fat deposition .
Chinese: 一个可能的原因是它们相似的糖含量对脂质和中心脂肪沉积具有相同的不利代谢作用。

English: another explanation is that sugary beverages , including fruit juice , could replace calories from foods with higher nutritional value .
Chinese: 另一种解释是，包括果汁在内的含糖饮料可以替代营养价值更高的食物中的卡路里。

English: new data confirm elevation of cholesterol but show no increase in cardiovascular events .
Chinese: 新数据证实胆固醇升高，但心血管事件并未增加。

English: a known side effect of this drug class is an elevation in lipid levels .
Chinese: 此类药物的一个已知副作用是血脂水平升高。

English: it is unclear whether this elevation is seen in patients taking tofacitinib for ulcerative colitis and , if so , whether it has any clinical consequence .
Chinese: 目前尚不清楚服用托法替尼治疗溃疡性结肠炎的患者是否会出现这种升高情况，如果出现这种情况，是否会产生任何临床后果。

English: over 1000 patients with tofacitinib exposure of up to 61 weeks were included .
Chinese: 超过 1000 名接受托法替布暴露长达 61 周的患者被纳入。

English: after 8 weeks of treatment , there was greater increase from baseline in total cholesterol , HDL , and LDL levels in patients on tofacitinib versus placebo , and these levels remained elevated through week 61 .
Chinese: 治疗 8 周后，与安慰剂组相比，托法替尼组患者的总胆固醇、HDL 和 LDL 水平较基线增加更多，并且这些水平在第 61 周内一直保持升高。

English: the mean change in total cholesterol was approximately 35 mg / dL at week 8 .
Chinese: 第 8 周总胆固醇的平均变化约为 35 mg/dL。

English: the safety profile of any new medication is always of great interest to clinicians and patients .
Chinese: 临床医生和患者总是对任何新药的安全性非常感兴趣。

English: this large observational review of registration trial data does show that there is a sustained increase in all components of lipids .
Chinese: 这项对注册试验数据的大型观察性审查确实表明，脂质的所有成分都在持续增加。

English: also , the majority of major adverse cardiovascular events occurred in those with multiple risk factors .
Chinese: 此外，大多数主要不良心血管事件发生在具有多种危险因素的人群中。

English: it remains to be seen who the ideal patient is for this type of therapy .
Chinese: 谁是这种疗法的理想患者还有待观察。

English: neither was more effective than placebo .
Chinese: 两者都不比安慰剂更有效。

English: a composite asthma score ( which encompassed lung function and symptoms ) , was similar in all three groups among patients without eosinophilia .
Chinese: 没有嗜酸性粒细胞增多症的所有三组患者的综合哮喘评分（包括肺功能和症状）相似。

English: as expected , patients with sputum eosinophilia of ≥ 2 % improved while using mometasone but not while using tiotropium or placebo .
Chinese: 正如预期的那样，痰嗜酸性粒细胞增多 ≥ 2% 的患者在使用 mometasone 时有所改善，但在使用 tiotropium 或安慰剂时没有改善。

English: soon , we might be checking eosinophil counts in our mild asthmatic patients to see if they will be responsive to ICS .
Chinese: 很快，我们可能会检查轻度哮喘患者的嗜酸性粒细胞计数，看他们是否对 ICS 有反应。

English: dosages in the studies ranged from 300 to 3600 mg daily .
Chinese: 研究中的剂量范围为每天 300 至 3600 毫克。

English: also in this trial , no serious adverse events were associated with gabapentin , but in the metanalysis , the rate of adverse events was 10 % higher with gabapentin than placebo .
Chinese: 同样在该试验中，没有严重的不良事件与加巴喷丁相关，但在荟萃分析中，加巴喷丁的不良事件发生率比安慰剂高 10%。

English: whether the level of clinical risk of breast cancer recurrence adds prognostic information to the recurrence score is not known .
Chinese: 乳腺癌复发的临床风险水平是否为复发评分增加了预后信息尚不清楚。

English: the initial endocrine therapy was tamoxifen alone in the majority of the premenopausal women who were 50 years of age or younger .
Chinese: 大多数 50 岁或以下的绝经前妇女的初始内分泌治疗是他莫昔芬单独治疗。

English: among women who were 50 years of age or younger who had received endocrine therapy alone , the estimated ( ± SE ) rate of distant recurrence at 9 years was less than 5 % ( ≤ 1.8 ± 0.9 % ) with a low recurrence score ( a score of 0 to 10 ) , irrespective of clinical risk , and 4.7 ± 1.0 % with an intermediate recurrence score and low clinical risk .
Chinese: 在 50 岁或以下仅接受内分泌治疗的女性中，9 年时远处复发的估计 ( ± SE ) 率低于 5 % ( ≤ 1.8 ± 0.9 % )，且复发评分较低（评分0 至 10)，不考虑临床风险，以及 4.7 ± 1.0% 的中等复发评分和低临床风险。

English: in this age group , the estimated distant recurrence at 9 years exceeded 10 % among women with a high clinical risk and an intermediate recurrence score who received endocrine therapy alone ( 12.3 ± 2.4 % ) and among those with a high recurrence score who received chemoendocrine therapy ( 15.2 ± 3.3 % ) .
Chinese: 在这个年龄组中，在具有高临床风险和中度复发评分且仅接受内分泌治疗的女性（ 12.3 ± 2.4 % ）和接受化学内分泌治疗的高复发评分女性中，估计的 9 年远处复发率超过 10 % 。 (15.2±3.3%)。

English: a high score has been defined as 31 or higher on the basis of the prospective validation National Surgical Adjuvant Breast and Bowel Project ( NSABP ) B20 and Southwest Oncology Group S8814 trial cohorts3,4 or 26 or higher on the basis of the NSABP B20 trial cohort.5,6
Chinese: 根据国家外科辅助乳腺和肠道项目 (NSABP) B20 和西南肿瘤组 S8814 试验队列 3,4 的前瞻性验证，高分被定义为 31 分或更高；或者根据 NSABP B20 试验队列，高分被定义为 26 分或更高.5,6

English: an exploratory analysis indicated some benefit of chemotherapy in women 50 years of age or younger who had a recurrence score of 16 to 25 .
Chinese: 一项探索性分析表明，化疗对复发评分为 16 至 25 分的 50 岁或以下女性有一定益处。

English: the trial also showed a low percentage of women with distant recurrence ( 3 % ) at 9 years with endocrine therapy alone if the recurrence score was 0 to 15 , irrespective of age.7,8
Chinese: 该试验还显示，如果复发评分为 0 至 15 分，无论年龄大小，仅接受内分泌治疗 9 年时远处复发率较低 ( 3 % )。 7,8

English: we further examined the relationship between age and the absolute chemotherapy benefit in women who were 50 years of age or younger and had a recurrence score of 16 to 25 .
Chinese: 我们进一步检查了 50 岁或以下且复发评分为 16 至 25 分的女性的年龄与绝对化疗获益之间的关系。

English: objective AND DEFINITION OF CLINICAL RISK
Chinese: 临床风险的目的和定义

English: a prespecified secondary trial objective was to determine whether clinical risk , as assessed with the use of the Adjuvant ! algorithm , added information regarding prognosis for recurrence and prediction of chemotherapy benefit to that projected by the Oncotype DX test.7
Chinese: 预先指定的次要试验目的是确定临床风险是否与使用 Adjuvant! 时评估的一样。算法，在 Oncotype DX 测试预测的结果中添加了有关复发预后和化疗获益预测的信息。 7

English: classic pathologic information and outcome results were also used to refine models based on classic information and genomic tests .
Chinese: 经典病理信息和结果结果也用于改进基于经典信息和基因组测试的模型。

English: the statistical analysis was performed by the second author , the manuscript was written by the first author , and a final version of the manuscript , incorporating changes recommended by the coauthors , was reviewed and approved by all the authors , who vouch for the accuracy and completeness of the data and the adherence of the trial to the protocol ( available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org ) .
Chinese: 统计分析由第二作者完成，手稿由第一作者撰写，手稿的最终版本合并了合著者建议的修改，并得到所有作者的审阅和批准，他们保证准确性和完整性。数据和试验对试验方案的依从性（与本文全文可在 NEJM.org 获取）。

English: no one who is not an author contributed to the manuscript .
Chinese: 没有作者以外的人对手稿做出贡献。

English: no corrections for multiple comparisons were made .
Chinese: 没有对多重比较进行更正。

English: the trial was conducted from April 2006 to October 2010 .
Chinese: 该试验于 2006 年 4 月至 2010 年 10 月进行。

English: the recurrence score was high ( a score of 26 to 100 ) in 589 patients ( 8.9 % ) with low clinical risk and in 770 patients ( 27.4 % ) with high clinical risk ; these distributions were also similar according to age .
Chinese: 589 名低临床风险患者 (8.9%) 和 770 名 (27.4%) 高临床风险患者的复发评分较高（评分为 26 至 100）；根据年龄，这些分布也相似。

English: weaker associations between clinical risk and distant recurrence were observed in older women who had a low recurrence score ( a score of 0 to 10 ) than among those who had a higher recurrence score , and no association was observed in younger women with a low recurrence score , which may be explained at least partly by the lower event rate among younger women and the smaller sample size .
Chinese: 与复发评分较高的女性相比，复发评分较低（评分为0至10）的老年女性临床风险与远处复发之间的关联较弱，而复发评分较低的年轻女性则未观察到相关性。 ，这至少可以部分解释为年轻女性的事件发生率较低和样本量较小。

English: estimated treatment hazard ratios for 6496 women with an intermediate recurrence score who were randomly assigned to endocrine or chemoendocrine therapy are shown in Figure 2 .
Chinese: 图 2 显示了 6496 名具有中间复发评分的女性被随机分配到内分泌或化学内分泌治疗的估计治疗风险比。

English: an estimated hazard ratio of greater than 1 indicates a higher recurrence rate with endocrine therapy alone than with chemoendocrine therapy .
Chinese: 估计的风险比大于 1 表明单独内分泌治疗的复发率高于化学内分泌治疗。

English: the level of clinical risk was not predictive of chemotherapy benefit in women who had an intermediate recurrence score in the entire population , nor in the 4353 women who were older than 50 years of age or the 2143 women who were 50 years of age or younger ( Figure 2A ) .
Chinese: 临床风险水平不能预测整个人群中复发评分为中等的女性的化疗获益，也不能预测 4353 名 50 岁以上的女性或 2143 名 50 岁或以下的女性（图 2A)。

English: trends suggested a chemotherapy benefit in 476 women who were younger than 50 years of age and had a recurrence score of 21 to 25 , but these trends did not vary according to clinical risk ( Figure 2B ) .
Chinese: 趋势表明化疗对 476 名年龄小于 50 岁且复发评分为 21 至 25 的女性有益，但这些趋势并未因临床风险而异（图 2B）。

English: age AND CHEMOTHERAPY BENEFIT
Chinese: 年龄和化疗获益

English: we further evaluated chemotherapy benefit as a function of age and menopausal status in 4338 women with a recurrence score of 16 to 25 ( Figure 3 ) .
Chinese: 我们进一步评估了 4338 名复发评分为 16 至 25 分的女性的化疗获益作为年龄和绝经状态的函数（图 3）。

English: event RATES AT 9 YEARS , STRATIFIED ACCORDING TO AGE
Chinese: 9 岁时的事件发生率，根据年龄分层

English: in 6469 women who were older than 50 years of age ( two thirds of the trial population ) , the mean ( ± SE ) distant recurrence rate at 9 years was similar , irrespective of use or nonuse of chemotherapy , in the cohort with an intermediate recurrence score , regardless of whether the clinical risk was low ( 4.0 ± 0.7 % vs. 3.5 ± 0.6 % ) or high ( 8.3 ± 1.5 % vs. 9.3 ± 1.9 % ) .
Chinese: 在6469名50岁以上的女性中（试验人群的三分之二） ，9年时的平均（ ± SE ）远处复发率在中间复发队列中相似，无论是否使用化疗。评分，无论临床风险是低（4.0 ± 0.7% 对 3.5 ± 0.6%）还是高（8.3 ± 1.5% 对 9.3 ± 1.9%）。

English: the level of clinical risk also added prognostic information with regard to distant recurrence in the 1359 women ( both younger and older women ) with a high recurrence score who received chemoendocrine therapy .
Chinese: 临床风险水平还增加了关于 1359 名接受化学内分泌治疗且复发评分高的女性（包括年轻和年长女性）远处复发的预后信息。

English: distant recurrence rates were also low among 589 women with a high recurrence score and low clinical risk who received chemotherapy ( 7.0 ± 2.4 % among older women and 6.2 ± 2.5 % among younger women ) and were similar to those among older women with a low recurrence score and high clinical risk ( 7.4 ± 3.4 % ) who received endocrine therapy alone .
Chinese: 在接受化疗的 589 名复发评分高、临床风险低的女性中，远处复发率也很低（老年女性为 7.0 ± 2.4 % ，年轻女性为 6.2 ± 2.5 % ），与复发率低的老年女性相似单独接受内分泌治疗的评分和高临床风险 (7.4 ± 3.4%)。

English: in contrast , among 770 women with a high recurrence score and high clinical risk , distant recurrence rates were high among both older and younger women despite the use of chemotherapy ( 19.8 ± 3.9 % and 15.2 ± 3.3 % , respectively ) .
Chinese: 相比之下，在 770 名具有高复发评分和高临床风险的女性中，尽管使用了化疗，但老年和年轻女性的远处复发率都很高（分别为 19.8 ± 3.9% 和 15.2 ± 3.3%）。

English: estimation OF CHEMOTHERAPY BENEFIT IN REDUCING DISTANT RECURRENCE AT 9 YEARS
Chinese: 9 年时化疗在减少远距离复发方面的获益评估

English: in 476 women with a recurrence score of 21 to 25 , the absolute chemotherapy benefit in the subgroup with low clinical risk ( 6.4 ± 4.9 percentage points ) was similar to that in the subgroup with high clinical risk ( 8.7 ± 6.2 percentage points ) .
Chinese: 在 476 名复发评分为 21 至 25 的女性中，低临床风险亚组的绝对化疗获益 (6.4 ± 4.9 个百分点) 与高临床风险亚组 (8.7 ± 6.2 个百分点) 相似。

English: in the 886 women with a recurrence score of 16 to 20 , there was an estimated chemotherapy benefit with high clinical risk ( 6.5 ± 4.9 % ) but not with low clinical risk ( − 0.2 ± 2.1 % ) .
Chinese: 在复发评分为 16 至 20 的 886 名女性中，估计化疗获益具有高临床风险 (6.5 ± 4.9%)，但并非具有低临床风险 (-0.2 ± 2.1%)。

English: the sample size was small in some of the subgroups examined ; this contributed to higher standard errors than estimates for the entire cohort with a recurrence score of 11 to 25 .
Chinese: 在一些被检查的子组中，样本量很小；这导致标准误差高于复发评分为 11 至 25 的整个队列的估计值。

English: prognosis IN WOMEN 50 YEARS OF AGE OR YOUNGER
Chinese: 50 岁或以下女性的预后

English: among women who were 50 years of age or younger , most of whom were premenopausal and treated with tamoxifen alone or followed sequentially with an aromatase inhibitor , the distant recurrence rate at 9 years was less than 5 % ( ≤ 1.8 ± 0.9 % ) among those with a low recurrence score , irrespective of clinical risk , and an intermediate recurrence score with low clinical risk ( 4.7 ± 1.0 % ) ( Table 1 ) .
Chinese: 在年龄在 50 岁或以下的女性中，其中大多数是绝经前且仅接受他莫昔芬治疗或后续接受芳香化酶抑制剂治疗的女性，9 年时的远处复发率低于 5 % ( ≤ 1.8 ± 0.9 % ) 。低复发评分，无论临床风险如何，中等复发评分，低临床风险 (4.7 ± 1.0%)（表 1）。

English: in contrast , the rate of distant recurrence at 9 years exceeded 10 % among women with high clinical risk and an intermediate recurrence score who received endocrine therapy alone ( 12.3 ± 2.4 % ) and in those with a high recurrence score who received chemoendocrine therapy ( 15.2 ± 3.3 % ) .
Chinese: 相比之下，9 年时远处复发率超过 10 %，在具有高临床风险和中度复发评分且仅接受内分泌治疗的女性 ( 12.3 ± 2.4 % ) 和具有高复发评分且接受化学内分泌治疗的女性 ( 15.2 ) 中± 3.3%）。

English: the integration of genomic and clinical information may provide a more accurate estimation of prognosis for individual patients than could be provided by either the genomic or clinical information alone.16
Chinese: 基因组和临床信息的整合可能比基因组或临床信息单独提供更准确的个体患者预后估计。 16

English: although TAILORx showed that endocrine therapy was noninferior to chemoendocrine therapy in women with an intermediate recurrence score ( a score of 11 to 25 ) , 7 we performed an exploratory analysis in accordance with recommended guidelines in order to determine whether any subgroup might derive some benefit from adjuvant chemotherapy.17
Chinese: 尽管 TAILORx 显示内分泌治疗在中度复发评分（评分为 11 至 25）的女性中不劣于化学内分泌治疗 7 ，但我们还是根据推荐的指南进行了探索性分析，以确定是否有任何亚组可能从中获益。辅助化疗。 17

English: the interaction among age , recurrence score , and chemotherapy benefit observed in TAILORx is therefore consistent with the greater treatment effect of adjuvant chemotherapy in younger women .
Chinese: 因此，在 TAILORx 中观察到的年龄、复发评分和化疗获益之间的相互作用与辅助化疗对年轻女性的更大治疗效果一致。

English: given the incremental benefits observed with ovarian suppression plus tamoxifen or an aromatase inhibitor as compared with tamoxifen alone in premenopausal women21,22 and the low percentage of premenopausal women who received ovarian suppression in TAILORx , it is possible that similar incremental benefits observed in younger women who received chemotherapy and had a recurrence score of 16 to 25 could be achieved with ovarian suppression and an aromatase inhibitor , as observed in other trials.21,22
Chinese: 鉴于在绝经前女性 21,22 中观察到卵巢抑制加他莫昔芬或芳香化酶抑制剂与单用他莫昔芬相比的增量获益，以及在 TAILORx 中接受卵巢抑制的绝经前女性所占比例较低，有可能在接受卵巢抑制的年轻女性中观察到类似的增量获益接受化疗并且复发评分为 16 到 25 可以通过卵巢抑制和芳香化酶抑制剂实现，正如在其他试验中观察到的那样。 21,22

English: estimation of an absolute chemotherapy benefit requires tools to estimate the underlying risk of recurrence and the treatment effect of chemotherapy , which may vary in magnitude according to tumor biologic features .
Chinese: 评估化疗的绝对获益需要工具来评估复发的潜在风险和化疗的治疗效果，这可能会根据肿瘤生物学特征的不同而有所不同。

English: when the recurrence score was further stratified according to clinical risk among TAILORx patients as described here , there was no evidence of chemotherapy benefit at 9 years in the subgroup with a low clinical risk and a recurrence score of 16 to 20 , whereas the addition of chemotherapy was associated with lower rates of distant recurrence ranging from approximately 6 to 8 percentage points among women with a recurrence score of 21 to 25 , irrespective of clinical risk , and a recurrence score of 16 to 20 with high clinical risk .
Chinese: 如本文所述，当根据 TAILORx 患者的临床风险对复发评分进一步分层时，没有证据表明临床风险低且复发评分为 16 至 20 的亚组在 9 年时化疗获益，而加入化疗在复发评分为 21 至 25 分的女性（无论临床风险如何）和复发评分为 16 至 20 分的高临床风险女性中，远处复发率降低约 6 至 8 个百分点。

English: the level of clinical risk also added prognostic information for women with a high recurrence score who were receiving chemoendocrine therapy , irrespective of age , and thus could be used to identify patients with very high risk for whom testing of new therapeutic approaches in clinical trials is warranted .
Chinese: 临床风险水平还为接受化学内分泌治疗的复发评分高的女性增加了预后信息，无论年龄大小，因此可用于识别需要在临床试验中测试新治疗方法的高风险患者。 .

English: the addition of this information enabled more precise identification of subgroups of younger women who may derive some benefit from more effective antiestrogen therapy than a course of tamoxifen .
Chinese: 添加此信息可以更准确地识别年轻女性亚群，她们可能会从比他莫昔芬疗程更有效的抗雌激素治疗中获益。

English: the noninferiority margin was a risk difference of 6 percentage points .
Chinese: 非劣效性界值是 6 个百分点的风险差异。

English: in symptomatic patients with risk factors for coronary artery disease , two strategies are predominantly used to establish the diagnosis and guide management of care .
Chinese: 在有冠状动脉疾病危险因素的有症状患者中，主要使用两种策略来确定诊断和指导护理管理。

English: the first uses invasive angiography visualizing the presence and distribution of coronary artery disease , supported by assessment of fractional flow reserve ( FFR ) to guide the need for subsequent revascularization.3,4
Chinese: 第一种方法是使用侵入性血管造影术可视化冠状动脉疾病的存在和分布，并通过评估血流储备分数 ( FFR ) 来指导后续血运重建的需要。 3,4

English: the second uses noninvasive functional stress testing , followed by invasive angiography and revascularization in patients with a positive test .
Chinese: 第二种采用无创功能压力测试，随后对测试呈阳性的患者进行有创血管造影和血运重建。

English: international guidelines differ in their recommendations for noninvasive testing.1,2
Chinese: 国际指南对无创检测的建议各不相同。 1,2

English: however , there is consensus that revascularization should be guided by ischemia testing5 unless the left main coronary artery is involved.6
Chinese: 然而，一致认为血运重建应以缺血检测为指导 5 ，除非左主干冠状动脉受累 6 。

English: cardiovascular MRI has been associated with a lower incidence of invasive angiography than testing based on clinical risk assessment.10
Chinese: 心血管 MRI 与基于临床风险评估的测试相比，侵入性血管造影的发生率较低。 10

English: the trial design and methods have been published previously.11
Chinese: 试验设计和方法之前已发表。 11

English: the trial was approved by the United Kingdom National Research Ethics Service and local institutional review boards .
Chinese: 该试验得到了英国国家研究伦理服务局和当地机构审查委员会的批准。

English: trial investigators and committees are presented in the Supplementary Appendix , available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 试验研究者和委员会在补充附录中介绍，补充附录与本文全文可在 NEJM.org 获取。

English: an independent data and safety monitoring board monitored the progress of all aspects of the trial .
Chinese: 一个独立的数据和安全监督委员会监督了试验各个方面的进展。

English: after database closure , an independent trial statistician analyzed the data .
Chinese: 数据库关闭后，一位独立的试验统计学家分析了数据。

English: all procedures were carried out in accordance with Good Clinical Practice guidelines and the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki .
Chinese: 所有程序均按照良好临床实践指南和赫尔辛基宣言的原则进行。

English: funders had no role in the design of the trial ; the collection , analysis or interpretation of the data ; or the writing and review of the manuscript .
Chinese: 资助者在试验设计中没有任何作用；数据的收集、分析或解释；或稿件的撰写和审阅。

English: the authors vouch for the completeness and accuracy of the data and for the fidelity of the trial to the protocol ( available at NEJM.org ) .
Chinese: 作者保证数据的完整性和准确性，以及试验对方案（可在 NEJM.org 获取）的忠实度。

English: patients were enrolled at 16 sites in the United Kingdom , Portugal , Germany , and Australia ( Table S1 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 患者在英国、葡萄牙、德国和澳大利亚的 16 个地点入组（补充附录表 S1）。

English: no systematic effort was made to maximize medical therapy for angina before screening for enrollment .
Chinese: 在入组筛选之前，没有系统地努力最大限度地对心绞痛进行药物治疗。

English: management STRATEGY
Chinese: 管理策略

English: randomization was performed with fixed block sizes , stratified according to center and sex within center .
Chinese: 随机化以固定的区组大小进行，根据中心和中心内的性别分层。

English: all the randomly assigned diagnostic tests were performed and interpreted by senior local physicians , who made all subsequent clinical management decisions .
Chinese: 所有随机分配的诊断测试均由当地高级医师进行和解释，他们做出所有后续的临床管理决定。

English: patients assigned to the FFR group underwent invasive coronary angiography and FFR testing in all coronary arteries with a caliber of 2.5 mm or more and a stenosis severity of 40 % or more , if technically feasible .
Chinese: 如果技术可行，分配到 FFR 组的患者在所有直径为 2.5 毫米或以上且狭窄严重程度为 40% 或以上的冠状动脉中接受侵入性冠状动脉造影和 FFR 测试。

English: details of the FFR procedure have been described previously.11
Chinese: FFR 程序的细节已在前面描述过。 11

English: revascularization was recommended in all vessels with an FFR of 0.8 or less .
Chinese: 建议对 FFR 为 0.8 或更低的所有血管进行血运重建。

English: the decision to proceed to PCI or CABG was made in line with practice guidelines.1
Chinese: 进行 PCI 或 CABG 的决定是根据实践指南做出的。 1

English: patients in this group also underwent a cardiovascular MRI study ( including assessment of myocardial perfusion ) before the invasive study .
Chinese: 该组患者在侵入性研究之前还接受了心血管 MRI 检查（包括心肌灌注评估）。

English: this scan was not reported , and all results were blinded .
Chinese: 这次扫描没有被报告，所有的结果都是盲目的。

English: the cardiovascular MRI protocol has been described previously.11
Chinese: 之前已经描述了心血管 MRI 方案。 11

English: in brief , myocardial perfusion was assessed with the first pass of gadobutrol ( in the form of Gadovist , from Bayer , Leverkusen , Germany ) at a dose of 0.075 mmol per kilogram of body weight during adenosine infusion at a rate of 140 to 210 μg per kilogram per minute for up to 6 minutes , followed by assessment of resting perfusion after 10 minutes and scar imaging .
Chinese: 简而言之，在腺苷输注期间，以每千克体重 140 至 210 微克的速率，首次通过钆布醇（以 Gadovist 的形式，来自德国勒沃库森拜耳公司）来评估心肌灌注。公斤每分钟最多 6 分钟，然后在 10 分钟和疤痕成像后评估静息灌注。

English: clinically significant inducible ischemia was defined as involving any of the following : two or more neighboring segments , two adjacent slices , or a single transmural segment ( approximately 6 % of the myocardium ) .11
Chinese: 具有临床意义的可诱导缺血被定义为涉及以下任何一项：两个或多个相邻节段、两个相邻切片或单个透壁节段（大约 6 % 的心肌） .11

English: ischemic burden was calculated semiquantitatively , as described in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 如补充附录中所述，以半定量方式计算缺血负荷。

English: patients with clinically significant inducible ischemia underwent invasive angiography , and revascularization was recommended , guided by the localization of the ischemic territory .
Chinese: 具有临床显着可诱导缺血的患者接受了侵入性血管造影，并建议在缺血区域定位的指导下进行血运重建。

English: the final decision on need for and type of revascularization and the target vessel or vessels was left to the performing interventional cardiologist .
Chinese: 关于血运重建的需要和类型以及目标血管的最终决定留给了介入心脏病专家。

English: FFR was not permitted in this group .
Chinese: 该组不允许 FFR。

English: all the patients undergoing coronary revascularization received dual antiplatelet therapy .
Chinese: 所有接受冠状动脉血运重建的患者均接受双重抗血小板治疗。

English: in the case of persistent chest pain , antianginal therapy was increased .
Chinese: 在持续性胸痛的情况下，增加抗心绞痛治疗。

English: subsequent invasive angiography was performed at the discretion of the responsible physician for patients with refractory symptoms .
Chinese: 随后的有创血管造影术由负责医师酌情对难治性症状患者进行。

English: the quality and completeness of data entry were monitored with a combination of site visits and remote monitoring .
Chinese: 数据输入的质量和完整性通过现场访问和远程监控相结合的方式进行监控。

English: clinical OUTCOME
Chinese: 临床结果

English: each component of the primary outcome was analyzed separately as a secondary outcome .
Chinese: 主要结局的每个组成部分作为次要结局单独分析。

English: the frequency of invasive coronary angiography that was not performed according to the protocol was assessed .
Chinese: 评估了未根据方案进行的有创冠状动脉造影的频率。

English: definitions of outcomes are provided in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录中提供了结局的定义。

English: a 10 % incidence in the FFR group and a noninferiority margin of 6 percentage points were assumed on the basis of the Fractional Flow Reserve versus Angiography for Multivessel Evaluation ( FAME ) trial.4
Chinese: FFR 组的发生率为 10%，非劣效性界限为 6 个百分点，这是基于分数流量储备与血管造影多血管评估 (FAME) 试验的结果。 4

English: with allowance for 10 % of the patients withdrawing , a sample size of 918 patients was chosen .
Chinese: 考虑到 10% 的患者退出，选择了 918 名患者的样本量。

English: no interim analyses were performed .
Chinese: 没有进行中期分析。

English: no other imputation was performed .
Chinese: 没有进行其他插补。

English: the primary and all secondary efficacy variables were analyzed descriptively .
Chinese: 对主要和所有次要功效变量进行了描述性分析。

English: for the primary outcome , differences in proportions and asymptotic 95 % confidence intervals were calculated to test for noninferiority .
Chinese: 对于主要结果，计算比例差异和渐近 95% 置信区间以检验非劣效性。

English: the pretest likelihood of coronary artery disease was calculated according to a modified Diamond and Forrester score.12
Chinese: 根据修改后的 Diamond 和 Forrester 评分计算冠状动脉疾病的预测试可能性。 12

English: all analyses were performed with the use of SAS software , version 9.4 ( SAS Institute ) .
Chinese: 所有分析均使用 SAS 软件 9.4 版（SAS Institute）进行。

English: baseline CHARACTERISTICS , DIAGNOSTIC PROCEDURES , AND THERAPY
Chinese: 基线特征、诊断程序和治疗

English: a total of 16,620 patients were assessed for eligibility between December 2 , 2010 , and August 8 , 2015 ; of these , 918 were deemed to be eligible and enrolled in the trial .
Chinese: 2010 年 12 月 2 日至 2015 年 8 月 8 日期间，共有 16,620 名患者接受了资格评估；其中，918 人被认为符合条件并参加了试验。

English: recruitment numbers according to center are presented in Table S1 in the Supplementary Appendix ; reasons for the exclusion of ineligible patients are shown in Figure S1 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录表 S1 中列出了各中心的招募人数；排除不合格患者的原因见补充附录图 S1。

English: patient characteristics are summarized in Table 1 .
Chinese: 表 1 总结了患者特征。

English: baseline medications and risk factors also did not differ significantly between the two groups ( Table S2 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 基线用药和危险因素在两组之间也没有显着差异（补充附录表 S2）。

English: the results of the diagnostic tests as well as the subsequent management strategies are shown in Figure 1 .
Chinese: 诊断测试的结果以及随后的管理策略如图 1 所示。

English: secondary AND EXPLORATORY OUTCOMES
Chinese: 次要和探索性结果

English: the secondary outcomes for each component of the primary outcome are summarized in Table 2 , with a detailed description of the patients who died provided in Table S4 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 表 2 总结了主要结局的每个组成部分的次要结局，补充附录表 S4 中提供了死亡患者的详细描述。

English: the occurrence of events according to the results of the index test and the performance of revascularization is shown in Figure 3 .
Chinese: 根据指标测试结果的事件发生情况和血运重建的表现如图3所示。

English: there was a significant reduction in the average CCS class in both groups from baseline to 1 year ( Table S5 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 从基线到 1 年，两组的平均 CCS 等级均显着降低（补充附录表 S5）。

English: serious adverse events , which occurred in similar numbers of patients in each group , are presented in Table S7 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录表 S7 列出了每组中发生类似数量患者的严重不良事件。

English: the use of cardiovascular MRI was associated with a significantly lower incidence of invasive coronary angiography and coronary revascularization than was the use of FFR .
Chinese: 与使用 FFR 相比，使用心血管 MRI 可显着降低侵入性冠状动脉造影和冠状动脉血运重建的发生率。

English: current guidelines on the management of the care of patients with suspected coronary artery disease separate diagnostic strategies from therapeutic strategies owing to a lack of evidence comparing combined diagnostic and therapeutic pathways.13
Chinese: 由于缺乏比较综合诊断和治疗途径的证据，目前关于疑似冠状动脉疾病患者护理管理的指南将诊断策略与治疗策略分开。 13

English: it is notable that three of four deaths from cardiac causes in the current trial occurred in patients with severe ischemia on the index examination while on the waiting list for bypass surgery , with one death from cardiac causes occurring in a patient who had a myocardial infarction before index angiography .
Chinese: 值得注意的是，在目前的试验中，四分之三的心脏原因死亡发生在在旁路手术等候名单上进行指标检查时出现严重缺血的患者，其中一名心脏原因死亡发生在之前有过心肌梗塞的患者中。指数血管造影。

English: the most important limitation of the trial is that the incidences of outcome events at 1 year were lower than expected on the basis of data from the FAME trial ( which enrolled only patients with documented multivessel disease ) .4
Chinese: 该试验最重要的局限性是 1 年时结果事件的发生率低于根据 FAME 试验（该试验仅纳入有记录的多支血管疾病的患者）的数据预期的结果 .4

English: as a result , the noninferiority margin was large relative to the incidence of major adverse cardiac events .
Chinese: 因此，相对于主要不良心脏事件的发生率，非劣效性界值较大。

English: thus , noninferiority of cardiovascular MRI would have been shown even if the incidence was twice as high as that in the FFR group .
Chinese: 因此，即使发生率是 FFR 组的两倍，心血管 MRI 的非劣效性也会被证明。

English: the actual incidences in the two groups , however , were similar .
Chinese: 然而，两组的实际发生率相似。

English: this may have caused some bias since interventional cardiologists may have had greater confidence in one index examination over the other .
Chinese: 这可能会造成一些偏差，因为介入心脏病专家可能对一项指标检查比另一项指标更有信心。

English: similarly , a bias toward revascularization in the FFR group cannot be fully ruled out , since conversion from a diagnostic to a therapeutic procedure was easier in this group .
Chinese: 同样，不能完全排除 FFR 组偏向血运重建的可能性，因为在该组中从诊断性操作转变为治疗性操作更容易。

English: additional limitations should also be considered .
Chinese: 还应考虑额外的限制。

English: systematic maximization of antianginal therapy was not performed before screening for enrollment , so patients who might have been asymptomatic after medication adjustment may have been enrolled in the trial .
Chinese: 在入组筛选前未进行系统的最大程度抗心绞痛治疗，因此药物调整后可能无症状的患者可能已入组试验。

English: the patient population was primarily male and white .
Chinese: 患者群体主要是男性和白人。

English: an Anticoagulation Forum guideline provides recommendations on the use of DOAC reversal agents .
Chinese: 抗凝论坛指南提供了有关使用 DOAC 逆转剂的建议。

English: sponsoring Organization : the Anticoagulation Forum
Chinese: 主办机构：抗凝论坛

English: previously , some physicians and patients were reluctant to use DOACs because of the unavailability of an antidote .
Chinese: 以前，由于无法获得解毒剂，一些医生和患者不愿使用 DOAC。

English: however , idarucizumab has recently been approved as a reversal agent for the DOAC dabigatran , and andexanet alfa has been approved as a reversal agent for the DOACs rivaroxaban and apixaban .
Chinese: 然而，idarucizumab 最近已被批准作为 DOAC 达比加群的逆转剂，andexanet alfa 已被批准作为 DOAC 利伐沙班和阿哌沙班的逆转剂。

English: now , members of the Anticoagulation Forum have provided indications for proper use of these reversing agents .
Chinese: 现在，抗凝论坛的成员已经提供了正确使用这些逆转剂的适应症。

English: reversing agents are not indicated in patients with DOAC overdose without bleeding or in those presenting with trauma without bleeding .
Chinese: 逆转剂不适用于 DOAC 过量但未出血的患者或出现外伤但未出血的患者。

English: although it is reassuring that DOAC reversal agents are now available , guidance on their rational use is needed , given their cost , limited availability , and associated risk for thrombosis .
Chinese: 尽管现在可以使用 DOAC 逆转剂令人欣慰，但考虑到它们的成本、可用性有限和相关的血栓形成风险，仍需要对其合理使用的指导。

English: the authors suggest a need for multidisciplinary stewardship programs to assist with proper use of reversing agents .
Chinese: 作者建议需要多学科管理计划来协助正确使用逆转剂。

English: ideally , hospital systems will help with the evolution of the Coumadin clinic toward broader anticoagulation monitoring services that support patients treated with DOACs .
Chinese: 理想情况下，医院系统将帮助 Coumadin 诊所向更广泛的抗凝监测服务方向发展，以支持接受 DOAC 治疗的患者。

English: although laboratory monitoring is seldom needed , patients treated with DOACs still require careful monitoring and guidance with difficult decisions , including regarding the need for urgent reversal .
Chinese: 虽然很少需要实验室监测，但接受 DOAC 治疗的患者仍需要仔细监测和指导，并做出艰难的决定，包括是否需要紧急逆转。

English: numerous nonclinical factors are associated with excess risk .
Chinese: 许多非临床因素与过度风险有关。

English: eleven social and behavioral risk factors were evaluated , including race , financial worry , intimate partner violence , neighborhood poverty , and depressive symptoms .
Chinese: 评估了 11 个社会和行为风险因素，包括种族、经济担忧、亲密伴侣暴力、邻里贫困和抑郁症状。

English: patients who were widowed had 38 % higher risk for developing hypertension than did married patients .
Chinese: 丧偶患者患高血压的风险比已婚患者高 38%。

English: studies assessing the clinical effect of social and behavioral interventions would be appropriate .
Chinese: 评估社会和行为干预的临床效果的研究是适当的。

English: ongoing surveillance for tickborne disease has identified a previously unknown segmented RNA virus in northern China .
Chinese: 对蜱传疾病的持续监测在中国北方发现了一种以前不为人知的分段 RNA 病毒。

English: the relatively recent recognition of tickborne infection due to Borrelia miyamotoi , Borrelia mayonii , and Powassan virus have highlighted the limits of our understanding of the breadth of pathogens that can be transmitted by ticks .
Chinese: 最近对宫本疏螺旋体、马约氏疏螺旋体和 Powassan 病毒引起的蜱传感染的认识凸显了我们对可通过蜱传播的病原体范围的了解的局限性。

English: ongoing surveillance for tickborne infections in China has now identified yet another previously unidentified RNA virus as a cause of acute human febrile illness .
Chinese: 中国对蜱传感染的持续监测现已确定另一种以前未发现的 RNA 病毒是引起人类急性发热性疾病的原因。

English: the index case was a female farmer from the town of Alongshan who presented in April 2017 to a hospital in Inner Mongolia with fever , headache , and a history of tick bites .
Chinese: 指示病例是阿龙山镇的一名女农民，她于 2017 年 4 月因发烧、头痛和被蜱叮咬病史到内蒙古一家医院就诊。

English: when initial testing did not identify a known cause of infection , further workup was undertaken , including viral culture , electron microscopy , and subsequent genetic and serologic analyses .
Chinese: 当最初的测试没有确定感染的已知原因时，进行了进一步的检查，包括病毒培养、电子显微镜检查以及随后的遗传和血清学分析。

English: the clinical symptoms of infection were nonspecific but most commonly included headache , fever , and fatigue .
Chinese: 感染的临床症状是非特异性的，但最常见的包括头痛、发烧和疲劳。

English: a minority of patients had coma , nausea , myalgia , arthralgia , rash , petechiae , or other symptoms .
Chinese: 少数患者有昏迷、恶心、肌痛、关节痛、皮疹、瘀点或其他症状。

English: the incubation period was generally 3 to 7 days .
Chinese: 潜伏期一般为3～7天。

English: all patients were treated empirically with intravenous ribavirin and intramuscular benzylpenicillin ; the duration of illness with treatment was approximately 6 to 8 days , and all patients had complete recovery .
Chinese: 所有患者均接受静脉利巴韦林和肌肉注射苄青霉素的经验性治疗；病程约6～8天，全部痊愈。

English: the authors note that I. persulcatus is widely distributed in Asia and eastern Europe and most mammals are common hosts , so ALSV may have a relatively wide distribution in Asia .
Chinese: 作者指出，I. persulcatus广泛分布于亚洲和东欧，大多数哺乳动物是共同宿主，因此ALSV可能在亚洲有相对广泛的分布。

English: using sitting devices for routine sleep puts infants at risk .
Chinese: 使用坐姿装置进行常规睡眠会使婴儿处于危险之中。

English: in 2016 the American Academy of Pediatrics updated its recommendations for creating a safe infant sleep environment .
Chinese: 2016 年，美国儿科学会更新了其关于创造安全婴儿睡眠环境的建议。

English: using data from the National Center for Fatality Review and Prevention from 2004 to 2014 , researchers studied the circumstances associated with infant death in sitting devices .
Chinese: 研究人员使用国家死亡审查和预防中心 2004 年至 2014 年的数据，研究了坐式装置导致婴儿死亡的相关情况。

English: of these , 63 % occurred in car seats , 35 % in bouncers , swings , and other sitting devices , and 2 % in strollers .
Chinese: 其中，63% 发生在汽车座椅中，35% 发生在摇椅、秋千和其他坐姿装置中，2% 发生在婴儿车中。

English: fewer than 10 % of deaths in car seats occurred in infants being properly transported .
Chinese: 不到 10% 的汽车安全座椅死亡发生在婴儿被正确运输的情况下。

English: at least one risk factor was identified in 82 % of the deaths .
Chinese: 在 82% 的死亡病例中至少确定了一个危险因素。

English: the most common risk factor was the supervising person being asleep .
Chinese: 最常见的风险因素是监督人睡着了。

English: after adjusting for age , sex , and race / ethnicity , deaths in sitting devices were twice as likely to occur during nonparental than parental supervision .
Chinese: 在针对年龄、性别和种族/族裔进行调整后，在没有父母监督的情况下，坐姿死亡的可能性是父母监督期间的两倍。

English: most infants ( 64 % ) died in their homes .
Chinese: 大多数婴儿 (64%) 死于家中。

English: this study shows that most infants who died in car safety seats were not being transported .
Chinese: 这项研究表明，大多数死于汽车安全座椅的婴儿并不是在运输过程中。

English: we should advise parents that car seats are safe and should be used for travel but are not safe and should not be used for infant sleeping .
Chinese: 我们应该告诉父母，汽车安全座椅是安全的，应该用于旅行，但不安全，不应该用于婴儿睡觉。

English: the incidence of colorectal cancer in individuals younger than 50 is rising in several developed countries .
Chinese: 在一些发达国家，50 岁以下人群的结直肠癌发病率正在上升。

English: epidemiologic data from the United States show rising colorectal cancer ( CRC ) incidence in individuals younger than 50 .
Chinese: 来自美国的流行病学数据显示，50 岁以下人群的结直肠癌 (CRC) 发病率呈上升趋势。

English: in one study , investigators assessed CRC incidence and mortality in about 144 million people aged 20 to 49 years from 20 European countries .
Chinese: 在一项研究中，研究人员评估了 20 个欧洲国家约 1.44 亿 20 至 49 岁人群的 CRC 发病率和死亡率。

English: in individuals aged 20 to 29 , CRC incidence increased from 0.8 to 2.3 cases per 100,000 persons between 1990 and 2016 .
Chinese: 在 20 至 29 岁的人群中，CRC 发病率在 1990 年至 2016 年间从每 100,000 人 0.8 例增加到 2.3 例。

English: overall , colon cancer incidence rose more than rectal cancer incidence .
Chinese: 总体而言，结肠癌发病率上升幅度超过直肠癌发病率。

English: the CRC incidence increases in the 30 to 39 and 40 to 49 age groups started 10 to 20 years after incidence rose in the 20 to 29 group , consistent with a birth cohort effect .
Chinese: 在 20 至 29 岁年龄组的发病率上升 10 至 20 年后，30 至 39 岁和 40 至 49 岁年龄组的 CRC 发病率开始上升，这与出生队列效应一致。

English: while the mechanisms driving these trends remain unclear , there are several likely contributing and interrelated factors , such as overweight , red and processed meat consumption , smoking , lack of physical activity , gut microbiome alterations , and environmental factors .
Chinese: 虽然驱动这些趋势的机制仍不清楚，但有几个可能的促成因素和相互关联的因素，例如超重、食用红肉和加工肉类、吸烟、缺乏体力活动、肠道微生物组改变和环境因素。

English: the epidemiologic trends do not support universal CRC screening in younger persons , because the absolute rates remain significantly lower than in those 50 and older , although some argue that decreasing the screening start age is an inevitability in the long run .
Chinese: 流行病学趋势不支持对年轻人进行普遍的 CRC 筛查，因为绝对率仍然明显低于 50 岁及以上的人群，尽管一些人认为从长远来看，降低筛查开始年龄是不可避免的。

English: COPD exacerbations occurred at similar rates in all groups , despite marked reductions in median blood and sputum eosinophil levels in the benralizumab groups .
Chinese: 尽管贝那利珠单抗组的血液和痰嗜酸性粒细胞水平中值显着降低，但所有组的 COPD 恶化发生率相似。

English: the current investigators speculate that more patients in that study had concomitant asthma .
Chinese: 目前的研究人员推测，该研究中更多的患者伴有哮喘。

English: prophylactic antibiotics can prevent infections after cesarean delivery , but whether antibiotics should be administered for operative vaginal delivery ( i.e. , forceps or vacuum ) is not known .
Chinese: 预防性使用抗生素可以预防剖宫产后的感染，但对于手术阴道分娩（即产钳或真空吸引）是否应该使用抗生素尚不清楚。

English: endpoints included new prescription of antibiotics for documented systemic infection , endometritis , or perineal wound infection .
Chinese: 终点包括为记录的全身感染、子宫内膜炎或会阴伤口感染开出新的抗生素处方。

English: in the antibiotic group , significantly fewer women reported perineal pain , use of pain medication , perineal discomfort leading to difficulty with infant feeding ; fewer healthcare provider visits were also reported .
Chinese: 在抗生素组中，报告会阴疼痛、使用止痛药、会阴不适导致婴儿喂养困难的女性明显减少；还报告了更少的医疗保健提供者访问。

English: in this large trial , maternal infections after operative delivery were more common than anticipated ; nonetheless , antibiotics ( even after delivery ) significantly reduced risk for perineal or systemic infection .
Chinese: 在这项大型试验中，手术分娩后的母体感染比预期更常见；尽管如此，抗生素（甚至在分娩后）显着降低了会阴部或全身感染的风险。

English: dexmedetomidine produces sedation while maintaining a degree of arousability and may reduce the duration of mechanical ventilation and delirium among patients in the intensive care unit ( ICU ) .
Chinese: 右美托咪定产生镇静作用，同时保持一定程度的唤醒能力，并可能减少重症监护病房 (ICU) 患者机械通气和谵妄的持续时间。

English: the use of dexmedetomidine as the sole or primary sedative agent in patients undergoing mechanical ventilation has not been extensively studied .
Chinese: 尚未对接受机械通气的患者使用右美托咪定作为唯一或主要镇静剂进行广泛研究。

English: the primary outcome was the rate of death from any cause at 90 days .
Chinese: 主要结果是 90 天时全因死亡率。

English: we enrolled 4000 patients at a median interval of 4.6 hours between eligibility and randomization .
Chinese: 我们招募了 4000 名患者，从合格到随机化的中位间隔时间为 4.6 小时。

English: bradycardia and hypotension were more common in the dexmedetomidine group .
Chinese: 心动过缓和低血压在右美托咪定组更常见。

English: sedation is a component of the care of critically ill patients who are undergoing mechanical ventilation , 1,2 but the appropriate choice of a primary sedative agent remains uncertain .
Chinese: sedation is a component of the care of critically ill patients who are undergoing mechanical ventilation , 1,2 but the appropriate choice of a primary sedative agent remains uncertain .

English: hypotension and bradycardia are common side effects.5,6
Chinese: 低血压和心动过缓是常见的副作用。 5,6

English: the trial was conducted in 74 ICUs in eight countries ( Australia , Ireland , Italy , Malaysia , New Zealand , Saudi Arabia , Switzerland , and the United Kingdom ) .
Chinese: 该试验在 8 个国家（澳大利亚、爱尔兰、意大利、马来西亚、新西兰、沙特阿拉伯、瑞士和英国）的 74 个 ICU 进行。

English: a complete list of trial sites is provided in the Supplementary Appendix , available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 补充附录中提供了试验地点的完整列表，补充附录与本文全文可在 NEJM.org 上获取。

English: the protocol and statistical analysis plan , also available at NEJM.org , have been published previously.19
Chinese: 方案和统计分析计划也可在 NEJM.org 上获得，之前已发表。 19

English: the trial was designed by the authors , who wrote the manuscript and attest to the accuracy and completeness of the data , the statistical analyses , adherence to the protocol , and complete reporting of adverse events .
Chinese: 该试验由作者设计，他们撰写了手稿并证明数据的准确性和完整性、统计分析、对方案的遵守以及不良事件的完整报告。

English: approval was obtained from the institutional review board at each participating institution .
Chinese: 每个参与机构都获得了机构审查委员会的批准。

English: prior informed consent or consent to continue to participate in the trial was obtained from all patients or their proxies , according to local regulatory requirements .
Chinese: 根据当地监管要求，已获得所有患者或其代理人的事先知情同意或继续参与试验的同意。

English: an independent data and safety monitoring committee provided oversight of the trial .
Chinese: 一个独立的数据和安全监督委员会对试验进行了监督。

English: a single interim analysis was planned and performed after 2000 patients had been evaluated for the primary outcome , as described in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 如补充附录所述，在对 2000 名患者的主要结局进行评估后，计划并进行了一次中期分析。

English: the National Health and Medical Research Council of Australia , the Health Research Council of New Zealand , and the Institut Jantung Negara Foundation of Malaysia funded the trial .
Chinese: 澳大利亚国家卫生与医学研究委员会、新西兰卫生研究委员会和马来西亚国家卫生研究院基金会资助了该试验。

English: Pfizer and Orion Pharma supplied dexmedetomidine but had no role in the design or conduct of the trial , analysis of the data , or writing or review of the manuscript .
Chinese: 辉瑞和 Orion Pharma 提供了右美托咪定，但没有参与试验的设计或实施、数据分析或手稿的撰写或审阅。

English: patients were eligible for inclusion if they were receiving mechanical ventilation through an endotracheal tube , were expected to continue to receive ventilatory support beyond the next full calendar day , and were receiving sedatives for safety and comfort .
Chinese: 如果患者正在通过气管插管接受机械通气，预计将在下一个完整日历日之后继续接受通气支持，并且正在接受镇静剂以确保安全和舒适，则他们符合入选条件。

English: key exclusion criteria were an age under 18 years , invasive ventilation in the ICU for longer than 12 hours before enrollment , and suspected or proven acute primary brain injury ( Table S1 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 关键的排除标准是年龄在 18 岁以下、入组前在 ICU 中有创通气时间超过 12 小时，以及疑似或证实为急性原发性脑损伤（补充附录表 S1）。

English: the patients were randomly assigned in a 1 : 1 ratio to receive dexmedetomidine or usual care , as described below .
Chinese: 患者按 1:1 的比例随机分配接受右美托咪定或常规治疗，如下所述。

English: randomization was stratified according to trial site and the presence or absence of suspected or proven sepsis , 20 as determined by the treating clinician .
Chinese: 随机分组根据试验地点和是否存在疑似或证实的脓毒症 20 由治疗临床医生确定。

English: trial INTERVENTIONS AND MEASUREMENTS
Chinese: 试验干预和测量

English: sedation Goals
Chinese: 镇静目标

English: patients received adequate analgesia as determined by the treating clinician according to the results of pain assessments performed at least every 4 hours with the use of validated scales.21
Chinese: 根据至少每 4 小时使用经过验证的量表进行的疼痛评估结果，患者接受了足够的镇痛。 21

English: the sedation target was light sedation , unless it was deemed to be unsafe or contraindicated by the treating clinician , as defined by the Richmond Agitation and Sedation Scale ( RASS ) , which ranges from − 5 ( unresponsive ) to + 4 ( combative ) .
Chinese: 镇静目标是轻度镇静，除非治疗的临床医生认为它不安全或禁忌，如里士满激越和镇静量表 (RASS) 所定义，范围从 - 5（无反应）到 + 4（好斗）。

English: the sedation goal was a RASS score of − 2 ( lightly sedated ) to + 1 ( restless ) , as assessed at least every 4 hours.22
Chinese: 镇静目标是 RASS 评分为 − 2（轻度镇静）至 + 1（不安），至少每 4 小时评估一次。 22

English: the presence or absence of delirium was assessed daily with the use of the Confusion Assessment Method for the Intensive Care Unit ( positive or negative ) 23 when the RASS score was − 2 or higher .
Chinese: 当 RASS 评分为 - 2 或更高时，每天使用重症监护病房的意识模糊评估方法（阳性或阴性）23 评估是否存在谵妄。

English: weaning of sedation and ventilation was conducted according to local clinical practices .
Chinese: 根据当地临床实践进行镇静和通气的撤除。

English: dexmedetomidine
Chinese: 右美托咪定

English: in the dexmedetomidine group , the goal was to administer dexmedetomidine as the primary sedating agent or , once the sedation target was achieved , the sole sedating agent .
Chinese: 在右美托咪定组中，目标是将右美托咪定作为主要镇静剂给药，或者在达到镇静目标后，作为唯一的镇静剂给药。

English: intravenous dexmedetomidine was started at a dose of 1 μg per kilogram of body weight per hour without a loading dose and adjusted ( maximum dose , 1.5 μg per kilogram per hour ) to achieve a RASS score in the target range .
Chinese: 静脉注射右美托咪定起始剂量为每小时每公斤体重 1 微克，无负荷剂量，并调整（最大剂量，每小时每公斤体重 1.5 微克）以达到目标范围内的 RASS 评分。

English: previous data had suggested that dexmedetomidine as the sole agent might not achieve the target sedation in all patients or in all clinical situations , particularly when deep sedation ( RASS score of − 3 or less ) was indicated.9,12
Chinese: 以前的数据表明，右美托咪定作为唯一药物可能无法在所有患者或所有临床情况下实现目标镇静，特别是在需要深度镇静（RASS 评分为 − 3 或更低）时。 9,12

English: thus , the use of propofol at the lowest possible dose was allowed when the maximum dose of dexmedetomidine was insufficient and during the initial adjustment of the dexmedetomidine dose .
Chinese: 因此，当右美托咪定的最大剂量不足时和右美托咪定剂量的初始调整期间，允许以尽可能低的剂量使用异丙酚。

English: the use of benzodiazepines was discouraged , although administration was permitted for specific indications of uncontrolled agitation or delirium , seizures , palliative comfort , and procedural sedation or if concomitant neuromuscular blockade was used .
Chinese: 不鼓励使用苯二氮卓类药物，但允许对不受控制的激越或谵妄、癫痫发作、姑息性安慰和程序性镇静等特定指征进行给药，或者如果同时使用神经肌肉阻滞剂。

English: usual Care
Chinese: 日常护理

English: patients who were assigned to receive usual care were given propofol , midazolam , or other sedatives , as directed by the treating physician , and with the intention of excluding dexmedetomidine .
Chinese: 被分配接受常规治疗的患者按照主治医师的指示给予异丙酚、咪达唑仑或其他镇静剂，并打算排除右美托咪定。

English: rescue dexmedetomidine was permitted for uncontrolled agitation after failure of initial conventional therapies .
Chinese: 在初始常规治疗失败后，允许使用右美托咪定来治疗无法控制的躁动。

English: intravenous clonidine and remifentanil were prohibited in both groups .
Chinese: 两组均禁用静脉可乐定和瑞芬太尼。

English: antipsychotic drugs , including haloperidol and quetiapine , were allowed for the treatment of agitated delirium if the currently administered sedative agents were not sufficient to achieve the target levels of sedation in either group .
Chinese: 如果当前使用的镇静剂不足以达到任一组的目标镇静水平，则允许使用包括氟哌啶醇和喹硫平在内的抗精神病药来治疗躁动性谵妄。

English: other aspects of care , including mobilization and nonpharmacologic interventions to promote comfort , reduce anxiety , and facilitate sleep , were prescribed by the treating clinician in both groups .
Chinese: 其他方面的护理，包括促进舒适、减少焦虑和促进睡眠的动员和非药物干预，由两组的治疗临床医生规定。

English: the primary outcome was the rate of death from any cause at 90 days after randomization .
Chinese: 主要结果是随机化后 90 天的全因死亡率。

English: adverse events and serious adverse events were reported by site investigators and were not collected systematically or adjudicated independently .
Chinese: 不良事件和严重不良事件由研究中心调查员报告，未系统收集或独立裁定。

English: the stopping rules for an interim analysis are provided in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录中提供了期中分析的停止规则。

English: details regarding the post hoc sensitivity analysis with respect to missing data and truncation due to death are provided in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录中提供了关于缺失数据和因死亡截断的事后敏感性分析的详细信息。

English: we conducted prespecified subgroup analyses of the primary outcome for six baseline variables : clinically suspected or proven sepsis , geographic region , surgical versus medical admission , an age that was older or younger than the median , a score on the APACHE ( Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation ) II that was higher or lower than the median , 27 and the ratio of the partial pressure of arterial oxygen to the fraction of inspired oxygen .
Chinese: 我们对六个基线变量的主要结果进行了预先指定的亚组分析：临床怀疑或证实败血症、地理区域、手术入院与药物入院、年龄大于或小于中位数、APACHE（急性生理学和慢性健康）评分评价) II 即高于或低于中位数、27 和动脉血氧分压与吸入氧分压之比。

English: risk differences for subgroups were determined with the use of binomial identity regression , and potential heterogeneity was determined with the use of logistic regression , with the fitting of main effects for sepsis , trial group , subgroup , and an interaction between trial group and subgroup .
Chinese: 使用二项式恒等回归确定亚组的风险差异，并使用逻辑回归确定潜在异质性，拟合脓毒症、试验组、亚组的主效应以及试验组和亚组之间的交互作用。

English: on each day , the RASS score was determined in one of three categories : − 3 to − 5 , target sedation ( − 2 to + 1 ) , or more than + 1 .
Chinese: 在每一天，RASS 评分被确定为三个类别之一：- 3 至- 5，目标镇静（- 2 至+ 1），或超过+ 1。

English: comparisons were performed with the use of multinomial logistic regression with robust sandwich errors clustered at an individual patient level .
Chinese: 比较是通过使用多项逻辑回归进行的，其中稳健的三明治误差聚集在个体患者水平。

English: all statistical analyses were performed with the use of SAS software , version 9.4 ( SAS Institute ) .
Chinese: 所有统计分析均使用 SAS 软件 9.4 版（SAS Institute）进行。

English: from November 2013 through February 2018 , we screened 29,502 patients who were being treated in the ICU and randomly assigned 4000 patients to receive either dexmedetomidine ( 2001 patients ) or usual care ( 1999 patients ) ( Table S2 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 从 2013 年 11 月到 2018 年 2 月，我们筛选了 29,502 名在 ICU 接受治疗的患者，并随机分配 4000 名患者接受右美托咪定（2001 名患者）或常规治疗（1999 名患者）（补充附录表 S2）。

English: the median time from eligibility to randomization was 4.6 hours ( interquartile range , 1.8 to 8.7 ) .
Chinese: 从合格到随机分组的中位时间为 4.6 小时（四分位数范围，1.8 至 8.7）。

English: this result did not change after adjustment for baseline covariates or in a sensitivity analysis that accounted for missing data ( see the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 在对基线协变量进行调整后或在对缺失数据进行解释的敏感性分析中（见补充附录），该结果没有改变。

English: there was no significant difference in the primary outcome between the subgroup of patients with suspected or proven sepsis at randomization and those without sepsis ( risk difference favoring the dexmedetomidine group , 1.1 percentage points ; 95 % CI , − 2.6 to 4.8 ) .
Chinese: 随机分组时疑似或确诊脓毒症患者亚组与无脓毒症患者亚组的主要结局无显着差异（右美托咪定组的风险差异为 1.1 个百分点；95% CI，- 2.6 至 4.8）。

English: tertiary outcomes including tracheostomy , reintubation , use of restraints , unplanned extubation , and lengths of stay in both the ICU and hospital are shown in Table S7 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录表 S7 显示了包括气管切开术、再插管、约束使用、计划外拔管以及 ICU 和医院住院时间在内的三级结局。

English: sedation LEVELS
Chinese: 镇静水平

English: the percentage of patients who had an indication for deep sedation as determined by the treating clinician is shown in Figure 1B .
Chinese: 图 1B 显示了由主治临床医生确定的具有深度镇静指征的患者百分比。

English: use OF ADDITIONAL SEDATIVES
Chinese: 使用额外的镇静剂

English: overall , 1910 of 1954 patients ( 97.7 % ) in the dexmedetomidine group received the trial agent for a median duration of 2.56 days ( interquartile range , 1.10 to 5.23 ) .
Chinese: 总体而言，右美托咪定组 1954 名患者中有 1910 名 (97.7%) 接受了试验药物治疗，中位持续时间为 2.56 天（四分位距，1.10 至 5.23）。

English: among the 1931 patients who received usual care , 1161 ( 60.1 % ) received propofol , 230 ( 11.9 % ) received midazolam , and 386 ( 20.0 % ) received both as primary sedatives .
Chinese: 在接受常规治疗的 1931 名患者中，1161 名 (60.1%) 接受异丙酚，230 名 (11.9%) 接受咪达唑仑，386 名 (20.0%) 接受两种主要镇静剂。

English: analyses were performed in six prespecified subgroups ( Figure 3 ) .
Chinese: 分析在六个预先指定的亚组中进行（图 3）。

English: episodes of sinus arrest led to the administration of atropine or epinephrine or cardiac massage ( in seven events ) or resolved spontaneously ( Table S9 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 窦性停搏发作导致给予阿托品或肾上腺素或心脏按摩（在 7 起事件中）或自行缓解（补充附录表 S9）。

English: early in the course of the critical illness , most patients who were treated with dexmedetomidine received supplemental sedatives .
Chinese: 在危重病程早期，大多数接受右美托咪定治疗的患者接受补充镇静剂。

English: although the target level of light sedation was observed more frequently in the dexmedetomidine group , deep sedation was frequently reported in the two groups .
Chinese: 尽管在右美托咪定组中更频繁地观察到达到目标水平的轻度镇静，但两组中都经常报告深度镇静。

English: adverse and serious adverse events , mainly bradycardia and hypotension , some of which led to cardiac massage , were reported more frequently during dexmedetomidine sedation than during usual care .
Chinese: 不良和严重不良事件，主要是心动过缓和低血压，其中一些导致心脏按摩，在右美托咪定镇静期间比在常规护理期间更频繁地报告。

English: these trials , however , had several limitations , including delayed intervention ( up to 96 hours ) , 12 an unspecified target sedation level , 11 targeting deeper levels of sedation ( RASS score of − 3 to 0 ) than currently recommended , 13 a relatively short duration of treatment , and lack of daily data on sedation levels.11,13
Chinese: 然而，这些试验有一些局限性，包括延迟干预（最多 96 小时） 12 未指定目标镇静水平 11 目标镇静水平比目前推荐的更深（ RASS 评分为 - 3 至 0） 13 持续时间相对较短的治疗，并且缺乏关于镇静水平的日常数据。 11,13

English: the biologic rationale for a potential benefit of dexmedetomidine is based on experimental evidence of protective effects against neuronal , myocardial , and renal injury , 28,29 along with a reduction in inflammatory mediators after cardiopulmonary bypass30 and reduced mortality in animal models.31
Chinese: 右美托咪定潜在益处的生物学原理基于对神经元、心肌和肾损伤的保护作用 28,29 以及体外循环后炎症介质减少 30 和动物模型死亡率降低的实验证据。 31

English: several studies and trials have shown lower mortality associated with dexmedetomidine than with other agents in patients with sepsis17,18 along with lower rates and shorter durations of coma and delirium , 12,16,17 both of which are associated with increased mortality.32,33
Chinese: 几项研究和试验表明，与其他药物相比，右美托咪定在脓毒症患者中的死亡率较低17,18，昏迷和谵妄的发生率较低且持续时间较短，12,16,17 这两者都与死亡率增加有关。32,33

English: however , in our trial , we found no difference in overall mortality with the use of dexmedetomidine as compared with usual care .
Chinese: 然而，在我们的试验中，我们发现使用右美托咪定与常规治疗相比，总死亡率没有差异。

English: there was heterogeneity with respect to the treatment effect on mortality for an age above or below the median of 63.7 years , with lower mortality in older patients and higher mortality in younger patients , but the significance of the difference could not be determined .
Chinese: 对于高于或低于 63.7 岁中位数的死亡率，治疗效果存在异质性，老年患者死亡率较低，年轻患者死亡率较高，但无法确定差异的显着性。

English: patients who were treated with dexmedetomidine received additional drugs to achieve the target level of sedation .
Chinese: 接受右美托咪定治疗的患者接受了额外的药物以达到目标镇静水平。

English: the use of multiple agents , however , was common in both groups .
Chinese: 然而，使用多种药物在这两个群体中都很常见。

English: this may reflect sedation requirements during the acute phase of a critical illness .
Chinese: 这可能反映了危重疾病急性期的镇静需求。
