English: the administration of medications in our trial was unblinded .
Chinese: 在我们的试验中，药物管理是公开的。

English: we did not exclude patients who required deep sedation , a factor that might have influenced the overall RASS scores and the need for sedative agents administered after randomization .
Chinese: 我们没有排除需要深度镇静的患者，该因素可能会影响总体 RASS 评分以及随机化后对镇静剂的需求。

English: we did not mandate a daily interruption in sedation or adherence to a particular strategy for managing sedation or delirium in the ICU ( e.g. , the ABCDEF bundle ) .39,40
Chinese: 我们没有强制每天中断镇静或坚持在 ICU 中管理镇静或谵妄的特定策略（例如 ABCDEF 集束化）.39,40

English: dexmedetomidine was insufficient alone or as the primary agent to achieve clinically desired target sedation levels and was associated with more reported adverse events than usual care .
Chinese: 右美托咪定单独使用或作为主要药物不足以达到临床所需的目标镇静水平，并且与常规治疗相比报告的不良事件更多。

English: brain activation in response to spoken motor commands can be detected by electroencephalography ( EEG ) in clinically unresponsive patients .
Chinese: 在临床反应迟钝的患者中，可以通过脑电图 (EEG) 检测对口头运动命令做出反应的大脑激活。

English: the prevalence and prognostic importance of a dissociation between commanded motor behavior and brain activation in the first few days after brain injury are not well understood .
Chinese: 在脑损伤后的头几天，指令性运动行为与大脑激活之间的分离的普遍性和预后重要性尚不清楚。

English: we studied a prospective , consecutive series of patients in a single intensive care unit who had acute brain injury from a variety of causes and who were unresponsive to spoken commands , including some patients with the ability to localize painful stimuli or to fixate on or track visual stimuli .
Chinese: 我们在一个重症监护室研究了一系列前瞻性、连续的患者，这些患者因各种原因患有急性脑损伤并且对口头命令没有反应，包括一些能够定位疼痛刺激或注视或跟踪视觉的患者。刺激。

English: machine learning was applied to EEG recordings to detect brain activation in response to commands that patients move their hands .
Chinese: 机器学习被应用于脑电图记录，以检测响应患者移动双手命令的大脑活动。

English: a total of 16 of 104 unresponsive patients ( 15 % ) had brain activation detected by EEG at a median of 4 days after injury .
Chinese: 在 104 名无反应的患者中，共有 16 名 (15%) 在受伤后中位数 4 天时通过 EEG 检测到大脑激活。

English: the condition in 8 of these 16 patients ( 50 % ) and in 23 of 88 patients ( 26 % ) without brain activation improved such that they were able to follow commands before discharge .
Chinese: 这 16 名患者中的 8 名 (50%) 和 88 名患者中的 23 名 (26%) 的情况在没有大脑激活的情况下有所改善，以至于他们能够在出院前遵循命令。

English: a dissociation between the absence of behavioral responses to motor commands and the evidence of brain activation in response to these commands in EEG recordings was found in 15 % of patients in a consecutive series of patients with acute brain injury . ( supported by the Dana Foundation and the James S. McDonnell Foundation . )
Chinese: 在一系列连续的急性脑损伤患者中，15% 的患者发现在 EEG 记录中，对运动命令缺乏行为反应与大脑对这些命令作出反应的证据之间存在分离。 （由 Dana 基金会和 James S. McDonnell 基金会支持。）

English: however , the prevalence and prognostic relevance of this dissociation , if detected in the days soon after brain injury , are not well understood .
Chinese: 然而，如果在脑损伤后不久检测到这种分离的发生率和预后相关性，则尚不清楚。

English: we studied the prevalence and prognostic importance of brain activation detected by EEG in response to spoken commands to perform a motor task .
Chinese: 我们研究了脑电图检测到的大脑激活的普遍性和预后重要性，以响应执行运动任务的口头命令。

English: from July 2014 through September 2017 , we prospectively screened all patients who were admitted with acute brain injury to the neuroscience ICU of our hospital ; screening was performed within 3 days after admission .
Chinese: 2014年7月至2017年9月，我们前瞻性筛查了所有入住我院神经科学ICU的急性脑损伤患者；入院后3天内进行筛查。

English: in keeping with our routine practice and in accordance with guidelines regarding EEG monitoring of patients in the ICU , 9 unresponsive patients either were monitored by continuous EEG or were anticipated to be connected to monitoring within 12 hours after screening , unless imminent death was expected .
Chinese: 按照我们的常规做法并根据关于 ICU 患者脑电图监测的指南，9 名无反应的患者要么接受连续脑电图监测，要么预计在筛查后 12 小时内连接到监测，除非预计即将死亡。

English: the exclusion criteria were an age of less than 18 years , a preexisting disorder of consciousness before the onset of the acute brain injury that resulted in the current admission , pregnancy , deafness before the acute brain injury , clinical recovery of the ability to follow commands before enrollment , patients or families who did not want to participate in the study , or logistic reasons ( details are provided in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 排除标准是年龄小于 18 岁，导致当前入院的急性脑损伤发作前存在意识障碍，怀孕，急性脑损伤前耳聋，临床恢复之前的命令能力。入组、不想参加研究的患者或家属，或后勤原因（详细信息在补充附录中提供）。

English: patients , families , and treating physicians were unaware of the results of the EEG recordings , and these results were not made available to treating clinicians in relation to decisions regarding the withdrawal of care .
Chinese: 患者、家属和主治医生都不知道脑电图记录的结果，并且这些结果也不会提供给主治医生以决定是否停止治疗。

English: demographic data and data on complications that occurred during the hospital stay and on outcomes were prospectively collected .
Chinese: 前瞻性收集了人口统计数据和住院期间发生的并发症以及结果的数据。

English: in addition , we recorded EEGs from 10 healthy volunteers with a mean age of 31 years , using the same EEG protocol as in the patients ( see the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 此外，我们还记录了 10 名平均年龄为 31 岁的健康志愿者的脑电图，使用与患者相同的脑电图方案（见补充附录）。

English: the study was approved for patients and healthy volunteers by the local institutional review board .
Chinese: 该研究得到了当地机构审查委员会的批准，适用于患者和健康志愿者。

English: the first and last authors are responsible for the study design and drafting of the manuscript .
Chinese: 第一和最后一位作者负责研究设计和文稿起草。

English: there was no industry involvement in or support for the study .
Chinese: 没有工业界参与或支持这项研究。

English: the authors vouch for the accuracy and completeness of the data and for the fidelity of the trial to the protocol , available at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 作者保证数据的准确性和完整性，以及试验对试验方案的忠实度，试验方案可在 NEJM.org 获取。

English: the results are reported in accordance with the Strengthening the Reporting of Observational Studies in Epidemiology ( STROBE ) guidelines for reporting observational studies.11
Chinese: 结果是根据加强流行病学观察研究报告 (STROBE) 观察研究报告指南报告的。 11

English: study PROCEDURES
Chinese: 研究程序

English: for the daily neurologic assessment , sedated patients underwent interruption or reduction of sedation if it was deemed safe by the attending physician during rounds.15
Chinese: 对于每日神经系统评估，如果主治医师在查房期间认为镇静是安全的，镇静患者会中断或减少镇静。 15

English: both the behavioral and the EEG assessments were performed during interruption of sedation whenever possible .
Chinese: 行为和脑电图评估都尽可能在镇静中断期间进行。

English: motor COMMAND PROTOCOL
Chinese: 电机命令协议

English: the total duration of the motor command session was approximately 25 minutes .
Chinese: 运动命令会话的总持续时间约为 25 分钟。

English: EEG ACQUISITION AND PROCESSING
Chinese: 脑电图采集和处理

English: statistical analyses were performed with R statistical software , version 3.4.1 ( R Project for Statistical Computing ) .24
Chinese: 使用 R 统计软件 3.4.1 版（R 统计计算项目）.24 进行统计分析

English: patients AND VOLUNTEERS
Chinese: 患者和志愿者

English: a total of 401 unresponsive patients with acute brain injury were screened , and 104 met the criteria for inclusion and were enrolled ( Table 1 and Figure 2 ) .
Chinese: 共筛选了 401 名无反应的急性脑损伤患者，其中 104 名符合纳入标准并入组（表 1 和图 2）。

English: enrolled patients were similar to those who were not enrolled with respect to age , sex , and admission Glasgow Coma Scale score ( Table S1 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 入组患者与未入组患者在年龄、性别和入院格拉斯哥昏迷量表评分方面相似（补充附录表 S1）。

English: the healthy volunteers all had EEG evidence of brain activation in response to motor commands .
Chinese: 健康的志愿者都有脑电图显示大脑响应运动命令而激活的证据。

English: we obtained a total of 240 EEG recordings from the 104 patients ( median number of recordings per patient , 2 ; interquartile range , 1 to 3 ) a median of 6 days ( interquartile range , 3 to 10 ) after the injury .
Chinese: 我们从 104 名患者中获得了总共 240 次脑电图记录（每位患者记录的中位数为 2；四分位间距为 1 至 3），中位时间为受伤后 6 天（四分位间距为 3 至 10）。

English: this dissociation was detected at a median of 4.0 days ( interquartile range , 2.0 to 5.3 ) after admission to the ICU .
Chinese: 在入住 ICU 后的中位数 4.0 天（四分位距，2.0 至 5.3）检测到这种分离。

English: among these 16 patients , the causes of the acute brain injury were subarachnoid hemorrhage ( 5 patients ) , traumatic brain injury ( 3 ) , intracerebral hemorrhage ( 4 ) , cardiac arrest ( 2 ) , neurosarcoidosis ( 1 ) , and bupropion overdose ( 1 ) ( Table 2 ) .
Chinese: 这16例患者中，急性脑损伤的原因为蛛网膜下腔出血（5例） 、颅脑外伤（3例） 、脑出血（4例） 、心脏骤停（2例） 、神经结节病（1例） 、安非他酮过量（ 1例） 。 （表2）。

English: we found that 15 % of patients in a consecutive series of patients with acute brain injury who were clinically unresponsive - some of whom had motor localization to pain stimuli , visual fixation , or visual tracking - had evidence of brain activation in response to spoken motor commands , as determined on the basis of EEG activity .
Chinese: 我们发现，在一系列临床上无反应的急性脑损伤患者中，有 15 % 的患者有对疼痛刺激、视觉固定或视觉追踪的运动定位 - 有大脑激活对口头运动命令做出反应的证据，根据 EEG 活动确定。

English: our findings support those of previous studies that have shown that EEG or functional MRI can in some cases reflect activation of parts of the brain in response to spoken commands in unresponsive patients , 1,4,26 but whether the detected signal represents recognition or comprehension of commands is uncertain .
Chinese: 我们的研究结果支持之前的研究，这些研究表明 EEG 或功能性 MRI 在某些情况下可以反映无反应患者响应口头命令时大脑部分的激活， 1,4,26 但检测到的信号是否代表识别或理解命令不确定。

English: patients who had an EEG response to spoken commands more often had later recovery than those who did not have this pattern .
Chinese: 与没有这种模式的患者相比，对口头命令有脑电图反应的患者恢复得更晚。

English: limitations of our study include the varied causes of brain injuries among the patients .
Chinese: 我们研究的局限性包括患者脑损伤的不同原因。

English: sedation is a potential confounder in the classification of patients as being in a comatose , vegetative , or minimally conscious state ; however , we were able to detect brain activation in response to motor commands in some lightly sedated patients .
Chinese: 在将患者分类为处于昏迷、植物人或最低意识状态时，镇静是一个潜在的混杂因素；然而，我们能够检测到一些轻度镇静患者的大脑对运动指令的反应。

English: in conclusion , early after brain injury , 15 % of clinically unresponsive patients who did not follow commands had EEG evidence of brain activation in response to spoken motor commands recorded at the bedside in the ICU .
Chinese: 总之，在脑损伤后早期，15% 的临床反应迟钝且不服从指令的患者在 ICU 床边记录到脑电图显示大脑对口头运动指令有反应。

English: among 22,651 patients ( 9604 in the derivation data set and 13,047 in the validation data set ) , the prevalence of myocardial infarction was 15.3 % .
Chinese: 在 22,651 名患者（推导数据集中 9604 名和验证数据集中 13,047 名）中，心肌梗死的患病率为 15.3%。

English: these findings were confirmed in an external validation data set .
Chinese: 这些发现在外部验证数据集中得到了证实。

English: chest pain suggestive of myocardial infarction is a leading cause of presentation to the emergency department worldwide.1
Chinese: 提示心肌梗死的胸痛是全球急诊科就诊的主要原因。 1

English: however , some challenges remain .
Chinese: 然而，一些挑战仍然存在。

English: second , although it is generally accepted that the initial blood sample for troponin measurement should be obtained immediately on presentation , the appropriate timing of obtaining the second blood sample is a matter of debate , and recommendations vary between 1 hour and 6 hours.2,4,9,11,13,16
Chinese: 其次，虽然人们普遍认为应在就诊时立即获取用于肌钙蛋白测量的初始血样，但获取第二份血样的适当时间仍有争议，建议在 1 小时到 6 小时之间变化。 2,4 ,9,11,13,16

English: comparing outcomes in such patients with those in the general population may increase the understanding of individual risk.17
Chinese: 将此类患者的结果与一般人群的结果进行比较可能会增加对个体风险的理解。 17

English: the authors vouch for the accuracy and completeness of the data and all analyses and for the fidelity of the study to the protocol , which is available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 作者保证数据和所有分析的准确性和完整性，以及研究对方案的忠实度，该方案与本文全文可在 NEJM.org 获取。

English: the Standards for Reporting of Diagnostic Accuracy ( STARD ) checklist for this study is provided in Table S1 in Supplementary Appendix 1 , available at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 本研究的诊断准确性报告标准 (STARD) 检查表见补充附录 1 中的表 S1，补充附录 1 可在 NEJM.org 获取。

English: study POPULATION WITH SUSPECTED ACUTE MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION
Chinese: 疑似急性心肌梗死的研究人群

English: patients who presented to the emergency department with acute symptoms suggestive of myocardial infarction were considered the acute study population .
Chinese: 因急性症状提示心肌梗死而到急诊室就诊的患者被认为是急性研究人群。

English: patients 18 years of age or older were recruited in 13 countries in three geographic regions ( Europe , North America , and Australasia ) .
Chinese: 在三个地理区域（欧洲、北美和澳大拉西亚）的 13 个国家/地区招募了 18 岁或以上的患者。

English: all the participating studies were approved by local ethics committees and complied with the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki .
Chinese: 所有参与研究均获得当地伦理委员会的批准，并符合赫尔辛基宣言的原则。

English: the diagnosis of myocardial infarction that was originally assigned to each study patient in each cohort was used as the basis for assigning the diagnosis for our study ( that is , the diagnosis was not reassessed as part of our analysis ) .
Chinese: 最初分配给每个队列中每个研究患者的心肌梗死诊断被用作分配我们研究诊断的基础（也就是说，诊断没有作为我们分析的一部分重新评估）。

English: additional information regarding the troponin assays and the diagnosis of myocardial infarction in the acute study population is provided in Supplementary Appendix 1 .
Chinese: 补充附录 1 中提供了有关急性研究人群中肌钙蛋白检测和心肌梗死诊断的更多信息。

English: evaluation OF DIAGNOSTIC PERFORMANCE IN THE ACUTE STUDY POPULATION
Chinese: 评估急性研究人群的诊断性能

English: the selected cutoff concentrations were chosen to represent a wide range of diagnostic performances.9,11,12,14,22
Chinese: 选定的截止浓度代表广泛的诊断性能。 9,11,12,14,22

English: to identify patients at low risk for myocardial infarction , the negative predictive value and the sensitivity for myocardial infarction , as well as the proportion of patients with troponin levels below the selected cutoff level , were calculated .
Chinese: 为识别心肌梗死低风险患者，计算了心肌梗死的阴性预测值和敏感性，以及肌钙蛋白水平低于选定临界值的患者比例。

English: a patient was deemed to be at low risk when both C1 and C2 were below the selected cutoff concentrations .
Chinese: 当 C1 和 C2 均低于选定的截止浓度时，患者被视为低风险。

English: to identify patients at high risk for myocardial infarction , the positive predictive value and the specificity for myocardial infarction , as well as the proportion of patients with troponin levels greater than or equal to the selected cutoff concentration , were calculated .
Chinese: 为识别心肌梗死高危患者，计算了心肌梗死的阳性预测值和特异性，以及肌钙蛋白水平大于或等于所选截止浓度的患者比例。

English: a patient was deemed to be at high risk when either C1 or C2 was greater than or equal to the selected cutoff concentration .
Chinese: 当 C1 或 C2 大于或等于选定的截止浓度时，患者被视为高风险。

English: in the APACE , BACC , Heidelberg , ProsPECTUS ( Prospektive Kohortenstudie zur Evaluation der Diagnostik und der therapeutischen Strategien in der Chest Pain Unit ) , and stenoCardia studies , patients were followed for 2 years .
Chinese: 在 APACE、BACC、海德堡、ProsPECTUS（Prospektive Kohortenstudie zur Evaluation der Diagnostik und der therapeutischen Strategien in der Chest Pain Unit）和 stenoCardia 研究中，对患者进行了为期 2 年的随访。

English: general POPULATION STUDIES
Chinese: 一般人口研究

English: details of the included studies are provided in Supplementary Appendix 1 .
Chinese: 补充附录 1 中提供了纳入研究的详细信息。

English: details of the risk prediction and the methods for matching are provided in Supplementary Appendix 1 .
Chinese: 补充附录 1 中提供了风险预测和匹配方法的详细信息。

English: the characteristics of the patients were described according to quartiles for continuous variables and according to absolute and relative frequencies for binary variables .
Chinese: 连续变量按四分位数描述患者特征，二元变量按绝对频率和相对频率描述患者特征。

English: for the evaluation of diagnostic performance , the negative predictive value , sensitivity , positive predictive value , and specificity were calculated for multiple combinations of initial troponin concentrations and serial changes in troponin concentrations ( C1 and C2 , as described above ) .
Chinese: 为了评估诊断性能，计算了初始肌钙蛋白浓度和肌钙蛋白浓度连续变化（C1 和 C2，如上所述）的多种组合的阴性预测值、敏感性、阳性预测值和特异性。

English: to examine the generalizability of our findings , the diagnostic performance of these combinations was assessed in a derivation data set and confirmed in a validation data set .
Chinese: 为了检查我们研究结果的普遍性，这些组合的诊断性能在推导数据集中进行了评估，并在验证数据集中进行了确认。

English: no adjustment for multiple testing was performed .
Chinese: 没有对多重测试进行调整。

English: all statistical methods were implemented in R statistical software , version 3.5.0 .
Chinese: 所有统计方法均在 R 统计软件 3.5.0 版中实施。

English: details of the statistical methods are provided in Supplementary Appendix 1 .
Chinese: 补充附录 1 中提供了统计方法的详细信息。

English: study POPULATION WITH SUSPECTED MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION
Chinese: 疑似心肌梗死的研究人群

English: evaluation of diagnostic performance was performed in 9604 patients and validated in 13,047 patients .
Chinese: 对 9604 名患者进行了诊断性能评估，并在 13,047 名患者中进行了验证。

English: the characteristics of the patients at baseline are presented in Table 1 for all patients , and in Table S2 in Supplementary Appendix 1 for each contributing study separately .
Chinese: 所有患者的基线患者特征见表 1，每项参与研究分别见补充附录 1 的表 S2。

English: the final diagnosis of myocardial infarction was adjudicated in 3455 of 22,651 patients ( 15.3 % ) .
Chinese: 22,651 名患者中有 3455 名 (15.3%) 最终被诊断为心肌梗死。

English: patients AT LOW RISK FOR MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION
Chinese: 心肌梗死低风险患者

English: in addition , these patients were at very low risk for myocardial infarction or death from any cause at 30 days .
Chinese: 此外，这些患者在 30 天时发生心肌梗塞或全因死亡的风险非常低。

English: patients AT HIGH RISK FOR MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION
Chinese: 心肌梗死高危患者

English: prognosis IN PERSONS WITHOUT MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION
Chinese: 无心肌梗死患者的预后

English: however , owing to the higher analytic sensitivity of these assays , clinical management decisions have become more challenging .
Chinese: 然而，由于这些检测的分析灵敏度更高，临床管理决策变得更具挑战性。

English: consequently , algorithms have been developed to triage patients with suspected myocardial infarction efficiently .
Chinese: 因此，已经开发出算法来有效地对疑似心肌梗塞的患者进行分类。

English: these algorithms have inflexible rules for the timing of troponin resampling and cutoff levels for the diagnosis of myocardial infarction .
Chinese: 这些算法对肌钙蛋白重采样的时间和诊断心肌梗死的截止水平有不灵活的规则。

English: therefore , the majority of these patients are candidates for early invasive strategies .
Chinese: 因此，这些患者中的大多数是早期侵入性策略的候选者。

English: to estimate risk among such persons , we compared the incidence of myocardial infarction or death in the acute study population of patients in whom myocardial infarction had been ruled out with the incidence in the matched general population .
Chinese: 为了估计这些人的风险，我们比较了已排除心肌梗死的急性研究人群与匹配的一般人群的心肌梗死或死亡发生率。

English: some limitations of the study merit consideration .
Chinese: 该研究的一些局限性值得考虑。

English: the diagnosis of myocardial infarction , which was based on adjudication within each cohort , did not involve a harmonized standard operating procedure .
Chinese: 心肌梗死的诊断基于每个队列的判断，不涉及统一的标准操作程序。

English: in addition , our analyses included study populations that had different pretest probabilities of myocardial infarction .
Chinese: 此外，我们的分析包括了具有不同心肌梗塞预测概率的研究人群。

English: this might lead to overestimation or underestimation of diagnostic probabilities in different scenarios .
Chinese: 这可能会导致高估或低估不同情况下的诊断概率。

English: minimally invasive surgery may reduce operative morbidity , recovery time , and length of hospital stay .
Chinese: 微创手术可以减少手术并发症、恢复时间和住院时间。

English: of the 1056 patients randomized , the median age was 56 , the majority were male , and half had clinical node positive disease .
Chinese: 在随机分配的 1056 名患者中，中位年龄为 56 岁，大多数为男性，其中一半患有临床淋巴结阳性疾病。

English: at surgery tumors were downstaged to T1 in 22.4 % in the laparoscopic group and in 25.4 % in the open distal gastrectomy group .
Chinese: 在手术中，腹腔镜组和开腹远端胃切除术组分别有 22.4% 和 25.4% 的肿瘤降期至 T1。

English: however , adjusting for age , tumor size , pathologic T stage , N stage , and adjuvant chemotherapy supported noninferiority of laparoscopic distal gastrectomy ( hazard ratio , of 1.1 ( P = 0.49 ) .
Chinese: 然而，调整年龄、肿瘤大小、病理 T 分期、N 分期和辅助化疗支持腹腔镜远端胃切除术的非劣效性（风险比为 1.1 (P = 0.49)）。

English: this approach is increasingly being used as the primary surgical approach for resectable gastric cancer .
Chinese: 这种方法越来越多地被用作可切除胃癌的主要手术方法。

English: a systematic review shows no obvious benefit of treatment .
Chinese: 系统评价显示治疗没有明显的好处。

English: for this guideline , researchers reviewed 21 randomized controlled trials that involved more than 2000 adults with subclinical hypothyroidism who received thyroid hormone treatment or placebo .
Chinese: 对于该指南，研究人员回顾了 21 项随机对照试验，这些试验涉及 2000 多名接受甲状腺激素治疗或安慰剂治疗的亚临床甲状腺功能减退症成人。

English: many adults with subclinical hypothyroidism do not benefit from thyroid hormone treatment .
Chinese: 许多患有亚临床甲状腺功能减退症的成年人无法从甲状腺激素治疗中获益。

English: notably , about 60 % of adults with subclinical hypothyroidism and TSH levels between 4 and 10 mIU / L experience spontaneous normalization of TSH levels within 5 years .
Chinese: 值得注意的是，大约 60% 的患有亚临床甲状腺功能减退症且 TSH 水平在 4 到 10 mIU/L 之间的成年人在 5 年内经历了 TSH 水平的自发正常化。

English: in contrast , those with higher TSH levels or antibodies to thyroid peroxidase have elevated risk for developing overt hypothyroidism .
Chinese: 相比之下，TSH 水平较高或甲状腺过氧化物酶抗体较高的人患明显甲状腺功能减退症的风险较高。

English: intensive glycemic control did not result in persistent cardiovascular benefit .
Chinese: 强化血糖控制不会导致持久的心血管益处。

English: the VA Diabetes Trial was one of three randomized trials published in 2008 and 2009 in which intensive glycemic control did not significantly lower the incidence of major adverse cardiovascular ( CV ) events in older patients with longstanding type 2 diabetes ( NEJM JW Gen Med Jan 15 2009 and N Engl J Med 2009 ; 360 : 129 ) .
Chinese: VA 糖尿病试验是 2008 年和 2009 年发表的三项随机试验之一，在这些试验中，强化血糖控制并未显着降低患有长期 2 型糖尿病的老年患者主要不良心血管 (CV) 事件的发生率（NEJM JW Gen Med 2009 年 1 月 15 日和 N Engl J Med 2009；360：129）。

English: now , the researchers provide additional data .
Chinese: 现在，研究人员提供了额外的数据。

English: during these 5 latest years , HbA1c levels were the same in the two groups .
Chinese: 最近5年，两组HbA1c水平相同。

English: nearly 500 such patients were randomized to a daily dose of dapagliflozin ( 10 mg ) plus saxagliptin ( 2.5 mg ) , dapagliflozin alone ( 10 mg ) , or placebo .
Chinese: 将近 500 名此类患者随机接受每日剂量的达格列净 (10 mg) 加沙克列汀 (2.5 mg)、单独达格列净 (10 mg) 或安慰剂。

English: at 24 weeks , outcomes with active treatment , compared with placebo , were as follows :
Chinese: 在 24 周时，与安慰剂相比，积极治疗的结果如下：

English: mean UACR decreased significantly , by 21 % with dapagliflozin alone and by 38 % with combined therapy ( from a baseline of about 250 mg / g ) .
Chinese: 平均 UACR 显着下降，单独使用达格列净降低 21%，联合治疗降低 38%（从基线约 250 mg/g）。

English: mean GFR fell significantly , by 2.4 mL / minute / 1.73 m2 in both active treatment groups ( from a baseline of about 50 mL / minute / 1.73 m2 ) .
Chinese: 两个积极治疗组的平均 GFR 显着下降 2.4 mL/minute/1.73 m2（基线值约为 50 mL/minute/1.73 m2）。

English: mean HbA1c decreased significantly ( from a baseline of about 8.4 % ) by 0.6 % with combined therapy but not with dapagliflozin alone .
Chinese: 平均 HbA1c 显着（从约 8.4% 的基线）下降 0.6% 联合治疗，但不是单独使用达格列净。

English: UACR and GFR returned to baseline by 3 weeks after the trial was completed .
Chinese: 试验结束后 3 周 UACR 和 GFR 恢复到基线水平。

English: in this brief study , dapagliflozin - both as monotherapy and when combined with saxagliptin - reduced albuminuria in diabetic patients with chronic kidney disease .
Chinese: 在这项简短的研究中，dapagliflozin - 无论是作为单一疗法还是与沙格列汀联合使用，都可以减少伴有慢性肾病的糖尿病患者的白蛋白尿。

English: its cash price is roughly US $ 7000 annually .
Chinese: 其现金价格约为每年 7000 美元。

English: participants had ≥ 3 traditional risk factors for cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) .
Chinese: 参与者有 ≥ 3 个传统的心血管疾病 (CVD) 危险因素。

English: median fasting and nonfasting levels were similar for total cholesterol ( 215 mg / dL ) and LDL cholesterol ( 132 mg / dL ) ; the median nonfasting triglyceride level was significantly higher than the median fasting level ( 159 mg / dL vs. 124 mg / dL ) .
Chinese: 总胆固醇 (215 mg/dL) 和 LDL 胆固醇 (132 mg/dL) 的中位空腹和非空腹水平相似；中位非空腹甘油三酯水平显着高于中位空腹水平（159 mg/dL 对 124 mg/dL）。

English: in analyses adjusted for traditional CVD risk factors , hazard ratios for the association of various lipid components with incident CVD events were nearly identical for fasting and nonfasting measurements .
Chinese: 在针对传统 CVD 危险因素进行调整的分析中，各种脂质成分与 CVD 事件关联的风险比对于空腹和非空腹测量几乎相同。

English: for example , adjusted HRs for each 40 mg / dL LDL cholesterol increase were about 1.3 for both fasting and nonfasting measurements .
Chinese: 例如，对于空腹和非空腹测量，LDL 胆固醇每升高 40 mg/dL 的调整后 HR 约为 1.3。

English: this study suggests that nonfasting lipid levels are comparable to fasting lipid levels in predicting CVD events .
Chinese: 这项研究表明，非空腹血脂水平在预测 CVD 事件方面与空腹血脂水平相当。

English: adherence to lipid screening is improved when patients can have blood drawn at the time of their office visits , without an overnight fast .
Chinese: 如果患者可以在就诊时抽血，而无需隔夜禁食，则患者对血脂筛查的依从性会有所提高。

English: even 4000 to 5000 steps were associated with benefit , with no evidence of benefit for more than 7500 steps daily .
Chinese: 即使是 4000 到 5000 步也有益处，但没有证据显示每天 7500 步以上有益处。

English: the public widely believes that 10,000 steps daily are necessary to achieve health benefits .
Chinese: 公众普遍认为每天需要走 10,000 步才能获得健康益处。

English: to explore the optimal number of daily steps and stepping intensity required to promote health , researchers conducted an observational study of 16,700 women ( mean age , 72 ) who used accelerometers for at least 10 hours daily and for at least 4 days at study entry .
Chinese: 为了探索促进健康所需的最佳每日步数和步进强度，研究人员对 16,700 名女性（平均年龄 72 岁）进行了一项观察性研究，她们每天至少使用加速度计 10 小时，并且在研究开始时使用加速度计至少 4 天。

English: participants were categorized into quartiles and assessed annually for a wide range of clinical and sociodemographic variables .
Chinese: 参与者被分为四分位数，并每年根据广泛的临床和社会人口统计学变量进行评估。

English: in adjusted analyses , mortality correlated inversely with number of daily steps ( median steps / day , 5500 ) .
Chinese: 在调整后的分析中，死亡率与每日步数呈负相关（平均步数/天，5500）。

English: mortality and walking speed were not correlated .
Chinese: 死亡率和步行速度没有相关性。

English: patients might walk more or less than these levels for many reasons , but these results give clinicians a more empirical foundation for providing basic exercise advice .
Chinese: 出于多种原因，患者步行可能会多于或少于这些水平，但这些结果为临床医生提供基本锻炼建议提供了更多的经验基础。

English: ticagrelor is a reversible inhibitor of platelet aggregation via antagonism of adenosine diphosphate receptor type P2Y12 .
Chinese: 替格瑞洛是一种可逆的血小板聚集抑制剂，通过拮抗腺苷二磷酸受体 P2Y12 型来抑制。

English: it is used to prevent thrombotic events in patients with acute coronary syndromes .
Chinese: 它用于预防急性冠脉综合征患者的血栓事件。

English: ticagrelor was also assayed for its ability to inhibit biofilm formation in vitro and in vivo .
Chinese: 还检测了替格瑞洛在体外和体内抑制生物膜形成的能力。

English: ticagrelor increased the bactericidal activities of vancomycin , rifampin , and ciprofloxacin .
Chinese: 替格瑞洛增加万古霉素、利福平和环丙沙星的杀菌活性。

English: giving mice the standard oral antiplatelet dosage of ticagrelor inhibited S. aureus growth on and local tissue dissemination from preinfected implants .
Chinese: 给予小鼠标准口服抗血小板剂量的替格瑞洛可抑制金黄色葡萄球菌在预感染植入物上的生长和局部组织传播。

English: future clinical studies investigating the use of ticagrelor in endovascular infections would be of interest .
Chinese: 将来调查替格瑞洛在血管内感染中使用的临床研究会很有趣。

English: if ongoing studies provide an affirmative answer , it will be difficult to justify BMS for any patients undergoing PCI .
Chinese: 如果正在进行的研究提供肯定的答案，则很难证明 BMS 对任何接受 PCI 的患者都是合理的。

English: the BCL2 inhibitor venetoclax has shown activity in patients with chronic lymphocytic leukemia ( CLL ) , but its efficacy in combination with other agents in patients with CLL and coexisting conditions is not known .
Chinese: BCL2 抑制剂 venetoclax 在慢性淋巴细胞白血病 (CLL) 患者中显示出活性，但其与其他药物联合治疗 CLL 和合并症的疗效尚不清楚。

English: the safety of each regimen was also evaluated .
Chinese: 还评估了每种方案的安全性。

English: in total , 432 patients ( median age , 72 years ; median Cumulative Illness Rating Scale score , 8 ; median creatinine clearance , 66.4 ml per minute ) underwent randomization , with 216 assigned to each group .
Chinese: 总共有 432 名患者（中位年龄 72 岁；中位累积疾病评定量表评分 8 分；中位肌酐清除率 66.4 毫升/分钟）接受随机分组，每组 216 人。

English: these differences were not significant .
Chinese: 这些差异并不显着。

English: most patients with chronic lymphocytic leukemia ( CLL ) are older than 70 years of age and have clinically relevant coexisting conditions.1
Chinese: 大多数慢性淋巴细胞白血病 ( CLL ) 患者的年龄超过 70 岁，并且有临床相关的合并症。 1

English: such patients require more effective but less toxic regimens.2
Chinese: 此类患者需要更有效但毒性更小的治疗方案。 2

English: venetoclax is an orally administered , BCL2 homology domain 3 ( BH3 ) -mimetic compound that disrupts antiapoptotic signaling through BCL2 , thereby inducing programmed cell death of CLL cells.8
Chinese: venetoclax 是一种口服给药的 BCL2 同源结构域 3 ( BH3 ) 模拟化合物，可通过 BCL2 破坏抗凋亡信号，从而诱导 CLL 细胞的程序性细胞死亡。 8

English: a notification letter to all the investigators about the enrollment of such patients is shown in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录中显示了致所有研究者的关于此类患者入组的通知函。

English: additional eligibility criteria are summarized in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录总结了额外的资格标准。

English: the trial was approved by the institutional review board or independent health authorities at each participating institution and was conducted in accordance with the Declaration of Helsinki and International Conference on Harmonisation Guidelines for Good Clinical Practice .
Chinese: 该试验由各参与机构的机构审查委员会或独立卫生当局批准，并根据赫尔辛基宣言和国际临床试验协调指南会议进行。

English: the authors collected the data during the trial , with oversight by an independent data and safety monitoring committee .
Chinese: 作者在试验期间收集数据，并由独立的数据和安全监测委员会监督。

English: the sponsors and the German CLL Study Group analyzed the data .
Chinese: 主办方和德国 CLL 研究小组对数据进行了分析。

English: all the authors had access to the data and vouch for the completeness and accuracy of the data and for the adherence of the trial to the protocol , available at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 所有作者都可以访问数据并保证数据的完整性和准确性，并保证试验遵守试验方案，试验方案可在 NEJM.org 获取。

English: the manuscript was written by four of the academic authors and was reviewed critically and revised by all the authors .
Chinese: 手稿由四位学术作者撰写，并由所有作者进行了严格审查和修改。

English: all the authors contributed to the writing and critical revision of the manuscript for intellectual content .
Chinese: 所有作者都为手稿的知识内容的撰写和重要修订做出了贡献。

English: the trial was conducted in 21 countries at 196 sites .
Chinese: 该试验在 21 个国家/地区的 196 个地点进行。

English: a block size of six was used to balance the randomization .
Chinese: 使用块大小为 6 来平衡随机化。

English: patients were stratified according to Binet stage and geographic region .
Chinese: 根据 Binet 分期和地理区域对患者进行分层。

English: the treatment duration in both groups consisted of 12 cycles lasting 28 days each ; no crossover was allowed .
Chinese: 两组的治疗时间均为12个周期，每个周期持续28天；不允许交叉。

English: obinutuzumab was administered intravenously for 6 cycles starting with 100 mg on day 1 and 900 mg on day 2 ( or 1000 mg on day 1 ) , 1000 mg on day 8 and 1000 mg on day 15 of cycle 1 , and subsequently 1000 mg on day 1 of cycles 2 through 6 .
Chinese: obinutuzumab 静脉给药 6 个周期，第 1 天 100 mg 和第 2 天 900 mg（或第 1 天 1000 mg） ，第 1 周期第 8 天 1000 mg 和第 15 天 1000 mg ，随后第 1 天 1000 mg第 2 至 6 周期中的第 1 个。

English: chlorambucil was administered orally at 0.5 mg per kilogram of body weight on days 1 and 15 of each cycle until completion of 12 cycles .
Chinese: 苯丁酸氮芥在每个周期的第 1 天和第 15 天以每公斤体重 0.5 mg 的剂量口服给药，直至完成 12 个周期。

English: disease was assessed in all patients at baseline and at similar time points in both treatment groups during the trial , including an assessment of the response to therapy 3 months after the completion of treatment , with complete and partial response defined in accordance with International Workshop on CLL guidelines as of 2008 ( see the Supplementary Appendix ) .12
Chinese: 在试验期间，在两个治疗组的基线和相似时间点对所有患者的疾病进行了评估，包括在治疗完成后 3 个月评估对治疗的反应，根据 CLL 国际研讨会定义的完全和部分反应截至 2008 年的指南（见补充附录）.12

English: after the completion of treatment , patients were followed for progression and safety every 3 months for 2 years , and then every 6 months .
Chinese: 治疗完成后，每 3 个月随访一次患者的进展和安全性，持续 2 年，然后每 6 个月随访一次。

English: in patients with a treatment response , minimal residual disease in bone marrow was assessed at cycle 9 and 3 months after completion of treatment .
Chinese: 在治疗有反应的患者中，在第 9 个周期和治疗完成后 3 个月评估骨髓中的微小残留病灶。

English: an independent data and safety monitoring committee reviewed safety regularly ( see the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 一个独立的数据和安全监测委员会定期审查安全性（见补充附录）。

English: an interim analysis was planned to be performed after 110 of 170 events ( 65 % ) had occurred .
Chinese: 计划在 170 起事件中的 110 起 (65%) 发生后进行中期分析。

English: therefore , the independent data and safety monitoring committee recommended conducting the primary analysis of the primary and secondary end points .
Chinese: 因此，独立数据和安全监测委员会建议对主要和次要终点进行初步分析。

English: in the analysis of minimal residual disease negativity and response to treatment , patients without a sample or response assessment that could be evaluated were counted as not being negative for residual disease or as not having a response , respectively .
Chinese: 在微小残留病阴性和对治疗反应的分析中，没有可评估样本或反应评估的患者分别被计为残留病阴性或无反应。

English: the demographic and disease characteristics were well balanced between the two treatment groups ( Table 1 , and Table S1 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 两个治疗组之间的人口统计学和疾病特征得到很好的平衡（表 1 和补充附录中的表 S1）。

English: the median age of the patients was 72 years ( range , 41 to 89 ) , the median Cumulative Illness Rating Scale score was 8 ( range , 0 to 28 ) ( Table S2 in the Supplementary Appendix ) , and the median creatinine clearance was 66.4 ml per minute ( range , 0.1 to 3670.0 ) .
Chinese: 患者的中位年龄为 72 岁（范围，41 至 89 岁），中位累积疾病评定量表评分为 8（范围，0 至 28 分）（补充附录表 S2），中位肌酐清除率为 66.4 ml每分钟（范围，0.1 至 3670.0）。

English: altogether , 13.8 % of the patients had TP53 deletion , mutation , or both and 59.8 % had unmutated IGHV .
Chinese: 总共有 13.8% 的患者有 TP53 缺失、突变或两者都有，59.8% 有未突变的 IGHV。

English: the safety population included 426 patients ( Figure 1 ) .
Chinese: 安全人群包括 426 名患者（图 1）。

English: the median relative dose intensity was 95.1 % ( range , 21 to 100 ) for venetoclax , 95.4 % ( range , 4 to 111 ) for chlorambucil , and 100 % ( range , 0 to 111 ) for obinutuzumab , with dose modifications in 43.3 % , 26.9 % , and 38.3 % of patients , respectively .
Chinese: 维奈托克的中位相对剂量强度为 95.1 %（范围，21 至 100 ），苯丁酸氮芥为 95.4 %（范围，4 至 111 ），奥比妥珠单抗为 100 %（范围，0 至 111 ），剂量调整为 43.3 % ，分别为 26.9% 和 38.3% 的患者。

English: the results for all key secondary end points in accordance with the hierarchical testing procedure are summarized in Table S5 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 根据分层测试程序，所有关键次要终点的结果总结在补充附录的表 S5 中。

English: the most common grade 3 or 4 adverse event was neutropenia ( Table 2 ) .
Chinese: 最常见的 3 级或 4 级不良事件是中性粒细胞减少症（表 2）。

English: none of these events met the Howard criteria for clinical tumor lysis syndrome ( i.e. , the presence of specific electrolyte changes and clinical manifestations ; see the Supplementary Appendix ) .19
Chinese: 这些事件均不符合临床肿瘤溶解综合征的霍华德标准（即存在特定的电解质变化和临床表现；见补充附录）19

English: a summary of the serious adverse events is provided in Table S7 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录表 S7 中提供了严重不良事件的总结。

English: with a median age of 72 years and a median Cumulative Illness Rating Scale score of 8 , the trial population was representative of most patients with CLL.20
Chinese: 中位年龄为 72 岁，中位累积疾病评定量表得分为 8，试验人群代表了大多数 CLL 患者。 20

English: however , these percentages were observed in smaller numbers of patients and in patients with fewer coexisting conditions .
Chinese: 然而，这些百分比是在少数患者和合并症较少的患者中观察到的。

English: the safety profile of both treatments in this trial showed no new safety signals or higher incidences of known toxic effects .
Chinese: 该试验中两种治疗的安全性概况均未显示出新的安全信号或已知毒性作用的发生率更高。

English: the toxic effects in the two treatment groups were similar in severity , and significant differences were detected only in the incidence of metabolism disorders and gastrointestinal disorders .
Chinese: 两个治疗组的毒性反应严重程度相似，仅在代谢紊乱和胃肠道紊乱的发生率上有显着差异。

English: although the difference did not reach significance , it bears monitoring going forward ; the overall percentage of patients with fatal adverse events was similar to those in the CLL11 trial ( 4 to 9 % ) .3
Chinese: 差异虽未达到显着性，但值得进一步观察；发生致命不良事件的患者的总体百分比与 CLL11 试验中的相似（4% 至 9%）.3

English: we observationally followed enrolled participants ( complete cohort ) after the conclusion of the original clinical trial by using central databases to identify cardiovascular events , hospitalizations , and deaths .
Chinese: 在最初的临床试验结束后，我们通过使用中央数据库来识别心血管事件、住院和死亡，对登记的参与者（完整队列）进行了观察性跟踪。

English: participants were asked whether they would be willing to provide additional data by means of surveys and chart reviews ( survey cohort ) .
Chinese: 参与者被问及他们是否愿意通过调查和图表审查（调查队列）的方式提供额外的数据。

English: the prespecified primary outcome was a composite of major cardiovascular events , including nonfatal myocardial infarction , nonfatal stroke , new or worsening congestive heart failure , amputation for ischemic gangrene , and death from cardiovascular causes .
Chinese: 预设的主要结局是主要心血管事件的复合，包括非致死性心肌梗死、非致死性中风、新发或恶化的充血性心力衰竭、因缺血性坏疽截肢以及心血管原因死亡。

English: death from any cause was a prespecified secondary outcome .
Chinese: 全因死亡是预先指定的次要结局。

English: there were 1655 participants in the complete cohort and 1391 in the survey cohort .
Chinese: 完整队列中有 1655 名参与者，调查队列中有 1391 名参与者。

English: the risk of major cardiovascular disease outcomes was reduced , however , during an extended interval of separation of the glycated hemoglobin curves ( hazard ratio , 0.83 ; 95 % CI , 0.70 to 0.99 ) , but this benefit did not continue after equalization of the glycated hemoglobin levels ( hazard ratio , 1.26 ; 95 % CI , 0.90 to 1.75 ) .
Chinese: 然而，在糖化血红蛋白曲线分离的延长间隔期间，主要心血管疾病结局的风险降低（风险比，0.83 ； 95 % CI，0.70 至 0.99 ） ，但在糖化血红蛋白均衡后，这种益处并未持续水平（风险比，1.26；95% CI，0.90 至 1.75）。

English: participants with type 2 diabetes who had been randomly assigned to intensive glucose control for 5.6 years had a lower risk of cardiovascular events than those who received standard therapy only during the prolonged period in which the glycated hemoglobin curves were separated .
Chinese: 被随机分配到强化血糖控制组 5.6 年的 2 型糖尿病参与者发生心血管事件的风险低于仅在糖化血红蛋白曲线分离的长时间内接受标准治疗的参与者。

English: there was no evidence of a legacy effect or a mortality benefit with intensive glucose control . ( Funded by the VA Cooperative Studies Program ; VADT ClinicalTrials.gov number , NCT00032487 . )
Chinese: 没有证据表明强化血糖控制会产生遗留效应或降低死亡率。 （由 VA 合作研究计划资助；VADT ClinicalTrials.gov 编号，NCT00032487。）

English: in brief , the original trial included 1791 military veterans with type 2 diabetes who were randomly assigned to receive either intensive or standard glucose control .
Chinese: 简而言之，最初的试验包括 1791 名患有 2 型糖尿病的退伍军人，他们被随机分配接受强化或标准血糖控制。

English: detailed descriptions of these cohorts and assessments , as previously reported , 13,16 are provided in Methods Sections A through I in the Supplementary Appendix ( available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org ) .
Chinese: 这些队列和评估的详细描述，如先前报道，13,16 在补充附录的方法部分 A 至 I 中提供（与本文全文可在 NEJM.org 获取）。

English: two authors who are statisticians vouch for the completeness and accuracy of the data and analyses .
Chinese: 两位统计学家作者保证数据和分析的完整性和准确性。

English: the authors vouch for the fidelity of the study to the protocol ( available at NEJM.org ) .
Chinese: 作者保证该研究忠实于方案（可在 NEJM.org 获取）。

English: the first author wrote the manuscript , with all the coauthors approving the final version for submission .
Chinese: 第一作者撰写了手稿，所有合著者都同意提交最终版本。

English: the statistical analysis plan was prespecified by the lead investigators before data access or knowledge of results .
Chinese: 统计分析计划由主要研究人员在访问数据或了解结果之前预先确定。

English: the protocol was approved by the Hines and Ann Arbor Veterans Affairs ( VA ) health system institutional review boards and was reviewed annually by a data and safety monitoring committee .
Chinese: 该协议得到海因斯和安阿伯退伍军人事务部 (VA) 卫生系统机构审查委员会的批准，并每年由数据和安全监督委员会审查。

English: as previously described , 16 four national data registries - the central VA medical files , the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services ( CMS ) claims files , the VA death files , and the National Death Index ( NDI ) - were used to collect data and information about outcomes .
Chinese: 如前所述，16 四个国家数据登记处——中央 VA 医疗档案、医疗保险和医疗补助服务中心 ( CMS ) 索赔档案、 VA 死亡档案和国家死亡指数 ( NDI ) - 被用来收集数据和信息。关于结果。

English: medical records were reviewed and adjudicated as previously described16 ( see the Methods Sections and Table S1 in the Supplementary Appendix ) for participants younger than 65 years of age ( CMS ineligible ) reporting an event outside the VA system .
Chinese: 对于 65 岁以下（不符合 CMS 资格）报告 VA 系统外事件的参与者，如前所述16（见补充附录中的方法部分和表 S1）审查和裁定医疗记录。

English: models examined the effect of treatment group ( intensive therapy or standard therapy ) on the primary outcome in an unadjusted analysis ( model 1 ) or while accounting for baseline , most recent , or cumulative mean glycated hemoglobin level ( models 2 , 3 , and 4 , respectively ) .
Chinese: 模型检查治疗组（强化治疗或标准治疗）对未经调整的分析（模型 1 ）中的主要结果的影响，或在考虑基线、最近或累积平均糖化血红蛋白水平时（模型 2 、 3 和 4 ，分别 ） 。

English: the last observation of the glycated hemoglobin level was carried forward in these analyses owing to slow changes in glycated hemoglobin values over time and the low frequency of missing data .
Chinese: 由于糖化血红蛋白值随时间变化缓慢且缺失数据的频率较低，因此在这些分析中延续了对糖化血红蛋白水平的最后一次观察。

English: proportionality assumptions held for 10 years but not thereafter , but relaxing the assumptions did not substantially affect any results .
Chinese: 比例假设保持 10 年但此后不再保持，但放宽假设不会对任何结果产生实质性影响。

English: we estimated that data collection in the larger , complete cohort missed less than 6 % of the outcomes owing to delays in the availability of CMS and NDI data ( see Methods Section B in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 我们估计，由于 CMS 和 NDI 数据的可用性延迟，更大的完整队列中的数据收集遗漏了不到 6% 的结果（参见补充附录中的方法部分 B）。

English: characteristics OF THE PARTICIPANTS AT BASELINE
Chinese: 基线参与者的特征

English: according to the baseline characteristics , most of the participants were men , were overweight or obese , and had a mean duration of diabetes of approximately 12 years ( Table 1 ) .
Chinese: 根据基线特征，大多数参与者为男性，超重或肥胖，糖尿病平均病程约为 12 年（表 1）。

English: no meaningful differences were observed between the baseline characteristics of the complete and survey cohorts or between the treatment groups ( Table S2 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 在完整队列和调查队列或治疗组之间的基线特征之间未观察到有意义的差异（补充附录表 S2）。

English: the separation of the glycated hemoglobin curves gradually diminished to 0.2 to 0.3 % in the 3 years after trial completion , and the glycated hemoglobin levels subsequently stabilized at a median of approximately 8 % in both groups .
Chinese: 糖化血红蛋白曲线的分离在试验完成后的 3 年内逐渐减小至 0.2 至 0.3%，随后两组的糖化血红蛋白水平稳定在约 8% 的中位数。

English: results for the individual components of the above composite outcomes are provided in Tables S7 through S9 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录表 S7 至表 S9 中提供了上述综合结局的各个组成部分的结果。

English: to examine the robustness of these findings , we repeated analyses for the primary outcome using the larger , complete cohort and found similar results ( hazard ratio , 0.95 ; 95 % CI , 0.83 to 1.09 ) .
Chinese: 为了检查这些发现的稳健性，我们使用更大的完整队列对主要结果进行了重复分析，并发现了相似的结果（风险比，0.95；95% CI，0.83 至 1.09）。

English: we found no evidence that treatment effects varied across our three prespecified risk factors of duration of diabetes , history of cardiovascular disease , or cardiovascular disease risk ( Table S10 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 我们没有发现任何证据表明治疗效果因糖尿病持续时间、心血管疾病史或心血管疾病风险这三个预先指定的风险因素而异（补充附录表 S10）。

English: glucose CONTROL AS A MEDIATOR OF RISK AND A LEGACY EFFECT
Chinese: 血糖控制作为风险和遗留效应的中介

English: we first compared the event rates of major outcomes during and after the VADT ( Table S12 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 我们首先比较了 VADT 期间和之后主要结局的事件发生率（补充附录表 S12）。

English: we then evaluated the treatment effect in the period before and after glycemic control nearly equalized in the two groups .
Chinese: 然后我们评估了两组血糖控制接近均衡前后的治疗效果。

English: in a sensitivity analysis that used the larger , complete cohort , similar results were seen .
Chinese: 在使用更大的完整队列的敏感性分析中，我们看到了类似的结果。

English: this finding highlighted the importance of overall differences in glucose control between groups in mediating this outcome .
Chinese: 这一发现强调了各组之间血糖控制总体差异在调节这一结果中的重要性。

English: these results did not vary according to baseline cardiovascular disease risk .
Chinese: 这些结果不会因基线心血管疾病风险而有所不同。

English: in contrast , there was no continued benefit with regard to the risk of cardiovascular disease after glycated hemoglobin levels equalized in the treatment groups .
Chinese: 相比之下，在糖化血红蛋白水平在治疗组中保持平衡后，心血管疾病风险方面没有持续获益。

English: in fact , there was a decline in benefit with regard to the risk of cardiovascular disease that coincided with equalization of glucose control within treatment groups and this continued during the 5 ( or more ) years of equal glycemic control that followed .
Chinese: 事实上，在心血管疾病风险方面的获益下降与治疗组内血糖控制的均衡同时发生，并且在随后的 5 年（或更长时间）血糖控制均等期间持续存在。

English: in addition , almost all the association between glucose control and major cardiovascular events was explained by the mean glycated hemoglobin level in the 3 most recent years , with no evidence that earlier years of glucose control had a carryover effect .
Chinese: 此外，几乎所有血糖控制与主要心血管事件之间的关联都可以用最近 3 年的平均糖化血红蛋白水平来解释，没有证据表明早年的血糖控制有遗留效应。

English: several sensitivity analyses showed no evidence that 5.6 years of tight glucose control resulted in a legacy effect in our study population .
Chinese: 几项敏感性分析表明，没有证据表明 5.6 年的严格血糖控制对我们的研究人群产生了遗留效应。

English: however , these benefits must be weighed against adverse effects such as hypoglycemia and weight gain .
Chinese: 然而，必须权衡这些好处和副作用，如低血糖和体重增加。

English: it is possible that underlying atherosclerosis and cardiovascular injury were too advanced in these participants to be effectively altered by glucose lowering .
Chinese: 这些参与者的潜在动脉粥样硬化和心血管损伤可能已经发展到无法通过降低葡萄糖有效改变的程度。

English: it is plausible that the cardiovascular protective effects of tight glycemic control have diminishing returns once other cardiovascular disease risk factors are well controlled by medications that may also have vasoactive properties .
Chinese: 一旦其他心血管疾病危险因素被可能也具有血管活性的药物很好地控制，严格血糖控制的心血管保护作用的回报递减似乎是合理的。

English: there are several limitations to the current study .
Chinese: 目前的研究有几个局限性。

English: the cohort in our original trial consisted largely of older men .
Chinese: 我们最初试验中的队列主要由老年男性组成。

English: however , patterns of outcomes between treatment groups did not vary notably during the transition from the active trial phase to the observation period , which suggests that these constraints did not alter the results .
Chinese: 然而，在从积极试验阶段到观察阶段的过渡期间，治疗组之间的结果模式没有显着差异，这表明这些限制并没有改变结果。

English: although there was a significantly lower risk of major cardiovascular events during the 7.1 years of separation of the glycated hemoglobin curves ( during the trial and observation periods ) , there was no evidence of a beneficial legacy effect after this period of improved glucose control .
Chinese: 尽管在糖化血红蛋白曲线分离的 7.1 年期间（在试验和观察期间），主要心血管事件的风险显着降低，但没有证据表明在改善血糖控制的这段时间后有有益的遗留效应。

English: patients presenting 4.5 to about 9 hours after stroke onset had better functional outcomes but more symptomatic intracranial hemorrhage with alteplase than placebo .
Chinese: 卒中发作后 4.5 至约 9 小时就诊的患者与安慰剂相比，使用阿替普酶后功能结果更好，但症状性颅内出血更多。

English: current guidelines recommend that intravenous ( IV ) alteplase should only be administered for patients with acute stroke who meet criteria and can be treated within 4.5 hours .
Chinese: 目前的指南建议静脉内 (IV) 阿替普酶只能用于符合标准且可在 4.5 小时内治疗的急性卒中患者。

English: however , some patients with salvageable brain tissue beyond the current time window might benefit from IV alteplase .
Chinese: 然而，一些脑组织可挽救超过当前时间窗的患者可能受益于静脉注射阿替普酶。

English: of those who underwent advanced brain imaging , 225 had a proven disparity between the infarct core and volume of hypoperfused tissue ( radiologic mismatch ) .
Chinese: 在接受高级脑成像的患者中，有 225 名患者的梗塞核心和低灌注组织体积之间存在已证实的差异（放射学不匹配）。

English: stroke with unknown onset time occurred in 65 % .
Chinese: 65% 的中风发生时间不详。

English: large vessel occlusion was present in 69 % of alteplase and 72 % of placebo patients .
Chinese: 69% 的阿替普酶患者和 72% 的安慰剂患者存在大血管闭塞。

English: after adjustment for baseline imbalances , an excellent outcome was observed in 35.4 % of alteplase patients and 29.5 % of placebo patients , a significant difference .
Chinese: 调整基线失衡后，35.4% 的阿替普酶患者和 29.5% 的安慰剂患者观察到良好结果，差异显着。

English: reperfusion of at least 50 % of the hypoperfused territory occurred in 72 % of alteplase and 52 % of placebo recipients .
Chinese: 72% 的阿替普酶接受者和 52% 的安慰剂接受者发生了至少 50% 的低灌注区域的再灌注。

English: symptomatic intracranial hemorrhage was more common with alteplase than with placebo ( 6.2 % vs. 0.9 % ) .
Chinese: 有症状的颅内出血在阿替普酶组比安慰剂组更常见（6.2% 对 0.9%）。

English: mortality did not differ between the two groups .
Chinese: 死亡率在两组之间没有差异。

English: given the increased rate of hemorrhage , many of the patients who met study criteria are likely to be better off with mechanical thrombectomy only .
Chinese: 鉴于出血率增加，许多符合研究标准的患者可能仅接受机械血栓切除术效果会更好。

English: in a trial that involved older black women , supplementation did not improve any measure of physical conditioning .
Chinese: 在一项涉及年长黑人女性的试验中，补充剂并未改善任何身体调节措施。

English: at 3 years , bone density had not improved with supplementation compared with placebo , even though the mean 25 ( OH ) D level had increased to 47 ng / mL in the vitamin D group and was unchanged in the placebo group ( NEJM JW Gen Med Mar 1 2019 and J Bone Miner Res 2018 ; 33 : 1916 , and J Am Geriatr Soc 2019 ; 67 : 81 ) .
Chinese: 在 3 年时，与安慰剂相比，骨密度没有因补充剂而改善，即使维生素 D 组的平均 25 ( OH ) D 水平增加到 47 ng / mL 而安慰剂组没有变化（ NEJM JW Gen Med Mar 1 2019 和 J Bone Miner Res 2018；33：1916，以及 J Am Geriatr Soc 2019；67：81)。

English: now , these researchers report the effect of vitamin D supplementation on physical performance in this study .
Chinese: 现在，这些研究人员在这项研究中报告了补充维生素 D 对身体表现的影响。

English: at 3 years , investigators noted no differences between the vitamin D and placebo groups for any of these outcomes .
Chinese: 在 3 年时，研究人员注意到维生素 D 组和安慰剂组之间的任何这些结果都没有差异。

English: in recent years , experts have disagreed on whether the target for vitamin D supplementation should be a serum 25 ( OH ) D level of 20 ng / mL or 30 ng / mL .
Chinese: 近年来，对于补充维生素D的目标应该是血清25(OH)D水平为20 ng/mL还是30 ng/mL，专家们意见不一。

English: this study suggests that targeting the higher level confers no advantage - at least in terms of improving bone density and physical performance .
Chinese: 这项研究表明，以更高的水平为目标并没有任何优势——至少在提高骨密度和身体机能方面是这样。

English: although the study was conducted exclusively in older black women , it seems unlikely that results would be different in other populations .
Chinese: 尽管这项研究专门针对年长的黑人女性进行，但其他人群的结果似乎不太可能有所不同。

English: the latest observational study showed no excess risk .
Chinese: 最新的观察性研究表明没有额外的风险。

English: some - but not all - observational studies have suggested an association between statins and polyneuropathy .
Chinese: 一些（但不是全部）观察性研究表明他汀类药物与多发性神经病之间存在关联。

English: these cases were compared with 283 healthy controls who had neither polyneuropathy nor its common risk factors ( e.g. , diabetes , excessive alcohol use ) .
Chinese: 这些病例与 283 名既没有多发性神经病也没有其常见危险因素（例如糖尿病、过度饮酒）的健康对照者进行了比较。

English: statin use prior to onset of symptoms was noted in 13 % of cases and in 21 % of controls .
Chinese: 13% 的病例和 21% 的对照组注意到在症状出现前使用他汀类药物。

English: in analyses adjusted for numerous potentially confounding variables , statin use was not associated with excess risk for polyneuropathy .
Chinese: 在针对许多潜在混杂变量进行调整后的分析中，他汀类药物的使用与多发性神经病的过度风险无关。

English: in a recent American Heart Association scientific statement on adverse effects of statins , the authors noted that an association between statins and neuropathy had been noted in some observational studies but not in randomized trials ( NEJM JW Gen Med Mar 1 2019 and Arterioscler Thromb Vasc Biol 2019 ; 39 : 38 ) .
Chinese: 在美国心脏协会最近关于他汀类药物不良反应的科学声明中，作者指出，他汀类药物与神经病变之间的关联已在一些观察性研究中被注意到，但在随机试验中并未被注意到（NEJM JW Gen Med 2019 年 3 月 1 日和 Arterioscler Thromb Vasc Biol 2019 ；39：38）。

English: this new study tilts the scale further against a causal association .
Chinese: 这项新研究使比例进一步向因果关系倾斜。

English: women who took high doses of both B6 and B12 had 50 % higher risk than those who had low intake .
Chinese: 服用高剂量维生素 B6 和维生素 B12 的女性比摄入量低的女性患病风险高 50%。

English: in prior studies of B6 and B12 supplementation , researchers reported excess hip fracture risk among supplement users .
Chinese: 在之前对维生素 B6 和维生素 B12 补充剂的研究中，研究人员报告说补充剂使用者的髋部骨折风险过高。

English: median intakes ( dietary plus supplements ) of vitamins B6 and B12 were 3.6 mg / day and 12.1 µg / day , respectively .
Chinese: 维生素 B6 和 B12 的中位数摄入量（膳食加补充剂）分别为 3.6 毫克/天和 12.1 微克/天。

English: about 9 % of the population had high intake of B6 ( ≥ 35 mg / day ) and about 24 % had high intake of B12 ( ≥ 20 µg / day ) .
Chinese: 大约 9% 的人群摄入大量 B6（≥ 35 毫克/天），约 24% 的人群摄入大量维生素 B12（≥ 20 微克/天）。

English: Nonpathological hip fractures occurred in 2300 participants .
Chinese: 2300 名参与者发生了非病理性髋部骨折。

English: however , nutritional supplements do not seem to benefit people without diagnosed nutritional deficiencies , and excessive intake of some vitamins and minerals can be harmful .
Chinese: 然而，营养补充剂似乎对未诊断出营养缺乏症的人没有任何好处，而且某些维生素和矿物质的过量摄入可能有害。

English: therefore , this study reminds us to question patients explicitly about nutritional supplement use and counsel them accordingly .
Chinese: 因此，这项研究提醒我们要明确询问患者有关营养补充剂使用的问题，并相应地向他们提供建议。

English: Fournier gangrene ( FG ) is a rare necrotizing fasciitis of the perineal soft tissue and organs with high rates of complications ( e.g. , fecal diversion ) and death and prolonged recovery times .
Chinese: Fournier 坏疽 (FG) 是一种罕见的会阴软组织和器官坏死性筋膜炎，并发症（例如粪便改道）和死亡发生率高，恢复时间长。

English: although approximately half of cases are in patients with diabetes , specific triggers of this disease are not identifiable .
Chinese: 虽然大约一半的病例是糖尿病患者，但无法确定该病的具体诱因。

English: median time to onset of FG after SGLT2 initiation was 4.5 months ( range , 5 days to 4 years ) .
Chinese: SGLT2 启动后至 FG 发作的中位时间为 4.5 个月（范围，5 天至 4 年）。

English: approximately two thirds of cases were in men .
Chinese: 大约三分之二的病例发生在男性身上。

English: the recent FDA warning about FG in this drug class should lead clinicians to discuss this risk with patients .
Chinese: 最近 FDA 对这类药物中 FG 的警告应该引导临床医生与患者讨论这种风险。

English: in vitro and mouse studies show that triclosan , an antibacterial compound used in consumer products , protects bacteria from antibiotics at typically used concentrations .
Chinese: 体外和小鼠研究表明，三氯生是一种用于消费品的抗菌化合物，可以保护细菌免受通常使用浓度的抗生素的侵害。

English: compounds with antimicrobial activity in consumer goods have increasingly been recognized to impose selective pressure on bacteria in the environment , influencing the activity of antimicrobial therapeutics .
Chinese: 人们越来越多地认识到消费品中具有抗菌活性的化合物会对环境中的细菌施加选择压力，从而影响抗菌疗法的活性。

English: triclosan , a polychlorinated aromatic compound that targets fatty acid synthesis , is one such compound that is found in common household items , such as toothpaste , shaving cream , and deodorants .
Chinese: 三氯生是一种以脂肪酸合成为目标的多氯芳香族化合物，常见于牙膏、剃须膏和除臭剂等日常用品中。

English: microbiologically relevant concentrations of triclosan are found in the urine of at least 10 % of people in the U.S .
Chinese: 在美国至少 10% 的人的尿液中发现了微生物相关浓度的三氯生。

English: researchers now describe experiments demonstrating that triclosan induces significant antibiotic tolerance in Escherichia coli and Staphylococcus aureus .
Chinese: 研究人员现在描述的实验证明三氯生在大肠杆菌和金黄色葡萄球菌中诱导显着的抗生素耐受性。

English: this survival was dependent on induction of persister cells via the induction of synthesis of the alarmone guanosine tetraphosphate .
Chinese: 这种存活依赖于通过诱导四磷酸鸟苷酮的合成来诱导持久细胞。

English: although the U.S. FDA has banned triclosan in household soap , that is not the case worldwide , and triclosan remains in many products that we use daily .
Chinese: 尽管美国 FDA 已禁止在家用肥皂中使用三氯生，但世界范围内并非如此，我们日常使用的许多产品中仍然存在三氯生。

English: tyrosine kinase inhibitors ( TKIs ) such as sunitinib that target vascular endothelial growth factor ( VEGF ) are widely used and are frequently active in patients with advanced renal cancer .
Chinese: 靶向血管内皮生长因子 (VEGF) 的酪氨酸激酶抑制剂 (TKI)，例如舒尼替尼，被广泛使用，并且经常在晚期肾癌患者中发挥作用。

English: however , these agents do not result in cure and have substantial toxicity burdens for patients .
Chinese: 然而，这些药物不能治愈并且对患者有很大的毒性负担。

English: the rate of grade 3 or 4 adverse events was lower among patients receiving combination therapy ( 40 % vs. 54 % ) , as was the rate of treatment discontinuation ( 5 % vs. 8 % ) .
Chinese: 接受联合治疗的患者中 3 级或 4 级不良事件的发生率较低（40% 对 54%），停止治疗的发生率也较低（5% 对 8%）。

English: editorialists note that it is increasingly important that studies lead to improvements in achieving a durable complete response .
Chinese: 编辑指出，越来越重要的是，研究会导致改善实现持久的完全缓解。

English: both the treatment and toxicity burden for patients as well as the economic costs to the health system mandate that we raise the bar of expectations for future progress in this disease .
Chinese: 患者的治疗和毒性负担以及卫生系统的经济成本要求我们提高对该疾病未来进展的预期标准。

English: aclidinium did not worsen cardiovascular outcomes in patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease .
Chinese: 阿地溴铵不会使慢性阻塞性肺病患者的心血管结局恶化。

English: researchers examined the LAMA aclidinium ( Pressair ) and its effect on major adverse cardiovascular events ( MACE ) , as well its efficacy in preventing moderate to severe COPD exacerbations .
Chinese: 研究人员检查了 LAMA aclidinium (Pressair) 及其对主要不良心血管事件 (MACE) 的影响，以及它在预防中度至重度 COPD 恶化方面的功效。

English: during 3 years , MACE rates were similar in the two groups .
Chinese: 3 年期间，两组的 MACE 发生率相似。

English: coupled with results from the UPLIFT trial of tiotropium ( Spiriva ; NEJM JW Gen Med Nov 1 2008 and N Engl J Med 2008 ; 359 : 1543 ) , these findings increase our confidence that LAMAs do not confer risk for cardiovascular disease in patients with COPD .
Chinese: 结合噻托溴铵的 UPLIFT 试验（Spiriva；NEJM JW Gen Med 2008 年 11 月 1 日和 N Engl J Med 2008 年；359:1543），这些发现增强了我们的信心，即 LAMA 不会给 COPD 患者带来心血管疾病的风险。

English: bleeding in early pregnancy is strongly associated with pregnancy loss .
Chinese: 早孕出血与流产密切相关。

English: progesterone is essential for the maintenance of pregnancy .
Chinese: 黄体酮对于维持妊娠至关重要。

English: several small trials have suggested that progesterone therapy may improve pregnancy outcomes in women who have bleeding in early pregnancy .
Chinese: 几项小型试验表明，黄体酮治疗可以改善早孕出血妇女的妊娠结局。

English: women were randomly assigned to receive vaginal suppositories containing either 400 mg of progesterone or matching placebo twice daily , from the time at which they presented with bleeding through 16 weeks of gestation .
Chinese: 妇女被随机分配接受含有 400 毫克黄体酮或匹配安慰剂的阴道栓剂，每天两次，从她们出现出血的时间到妊娠 16 周。

English: the primary analysis was performed in all participants for whom data on the primary outcome were available .
Chinese: 主要分析是在所有可获得主要结果数据的参与者中进行的。

English: a sensitivity analysis of the primary outcome that included all the participants was performed with the use of multiple imputation to account for missing data .
Chinese: 对包括所有参与者在内的主要结果进行了敏感性分析，并使用多重插补来解释缺失数据。

English: a total of 4153 women , recruited at 48 hospitals in the United Kingdom , were randomly assigned to receive progesterone ( 2079 women ) or placebo ( 2074 women ) .
Chinese: 在英国 48 家医院招募的总共 4153 名女性被随机分配接受黄体酮（2079 名女性）或安慰剂（2074 名女性）。

English: the percentage of women with available data for the primary outcome was 97 % ( 4038 of 4153 women ) .
Chinese: 具有主要结果可用数据的女性百分比为 97%（4153 名女性中的 4038 名）。

English: the sensitivity analysis , in which missing primary outcome data were imputed , resulted in a similar finding ( relative rate , 1.03 ; 95 % CI , 1.00 to 1.07 ; P = 0.08 ) .
Chinese: 对缺失的主要结果数据进行估算的敏感性分析得出了类似的结果（相对率，1.03；95% CI，1.00 至 1.07；P = 0.08）。

English: the incidence of adverse events did not differ significantly between the groups .
Chinese: 不良事件的发生率在各组之间没有显着差异。

English: among women with bleeding in early pregnancy , progesterone therapy administered during the first trimester did not result in a significantly higher incidence of live births than placebo . ( Funded by the United Kingdom National Institute for Health Research Health Technology Assessment program ; PRISM Current Controlled Trials number , ISRCTN14163439 . )
Chinese: 在早孕出血的妇女中，在妊娠早期给予黄体酮治疗并没有导致比安慰剂显着更高的活产率。 （由英国国家卫生研究所卫生技术评估计划资助；PRISM 当前对照试验编号，ISRCTN14163439。）

English: miscarriage affects one in five pregnancies.1
Chinese: 流产影响五分之一的怀孕。 1

English: progesterone , which is produced by the corpus luteum in the ovary , is necessary to prepare the endometrium for implantation of the embryo and thus is an essential hormone for a successful pregnancy .
Chinese: 黄体酮由卵巢中的黄体产生，是子宫内膜为胚胎着床做准备所必需的，因此是成功怀孕的必需激素。

English: additional progesterone is produced when an embryo implants in the endometrium and during early placental development .
Chinese: 当胚胎植入子宫内膜和早期胎盘发育过程中会产生额外的黄体酮。

English: subsequently , beginning at approximately 12 weeks of pregnancy , the placenta becomes the dominant source of progesterone.5
Chinese: 随后，从大约怀孕 12 周开始，胎盘成为黄体酮的主要来源。 5

English: the physiological importance of progesterone has prompted researchers , physicians , and patients to consider progesterone supplementation during early pregnancy to prevent miscarriages .
Chinese: 黄体酮的生理重要性促使研究人员、医生和患者考虑在早孕期间补充黄体酮以防止流产。

English: progesterone supplementation in early pregnancy has been attempted in two contexts : the first is to prevent miscarriages in asymptomatic women who have a history of recurrent miscarriages , and the second is to rescue a pregnancy in women who have started to bleed during early pregnancy.6
Chinese: 曾在两种情况下尝试过在早孕期间补充黄体酮：第一种是防止有反复流产史的无症状妇女流产，第二种是挽救在早孕期间开始流血的妇女的妊娠。 6

English: we addressed the first scenario in a previous issue of the Journal7 and found no beneficial effect of progesterone in women with a history of unexplained recurrent miscarriages .
Chinese: 我们在上一期《期刊》7 中讨论了第一种情况，发现黄体酮对有不明原因反复流产史的女性没有任何有益作用。

English: the current trial focuses on women with vaginal bleeding in early pregnancy .
Chinese: 目前的试验主要针对妊娠早期阴道流血的妇女。

English: the PRISM trial was approved by the United Kingdom Medicines and Healthcare Products Regulatory Agency , the United Kingdom National Research Ethics Service Committee ( South Central Oxford ) , and the National Health Service research and development department at each participating hospital .
Chinese: PRISM 试验获得了英国药品和保健品监管机构、英国国家研究伦理服务委员会（牛津中南部）以及各参与医院的国家卫生服务研发部门的批准。

English: progesterone and placebo were purchased from Besins Healthcare .
Chinese: 黄体酮和安慰剂购自 Besins Healthcare。

English: this company had no role in the design of the trial ; in the collection , analysis , or interpretation of the data ; or in the preparation of the manuscript .
Chinese: 该公司未参与试验设计；在数据的收集、分析或解释中；或在准备手稿。

English: trial oversight and monitoring were provided by a trial steering committee and by an independent data and safety monitoring committee .
Chinese: 试验监督和监测由一个试验指导委员会和一个独立的数据和安全监测委员会提供。

English: the first , second , and last authors vouch for the accuracy and completeness of the data and analyses and for the fidelity of the trial to the protocol , available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 第一、第二和最后一位作者保证数据和分析的准确性和完整性，以及试验对方案的忠实度，方案与本文全文可在 NEJM.org 获取。

English: the participants in the PRISM trial were recruited at 48 hospitals in the United Kingdom .
Chinese: PRISM 试验的参与者是在英国的 48 家医院招募的。

English: women were eligible for enrollment in the trial if they were 16 to 39 years of age , if they had completed less than 12 weeks of pregnancy , if they presented with vaginal bleeding , and if they had an intrauterine gestational sac that was visible on ultrasonography .
Chinese: 如果女性年龄在 16 至 39 岁之间，如果她们完成的妊娠不足 12 周，如果她们出现阴道流血，并且如果她们有超声检查可见的宫内孕囊，则她们有资格参加试验。

English: the upper threshold of 39 years for maternal age was chosen because the probability of miscarriages due to chromosomal abnormalities increases with advancing age , 10 and progesterone treatment could not be expected to prevent such miscarriages .
Chinese: 之所以选择 39 岁作为产妇年龄的上限，是因为染色体异常导致的流产概率会随着年龄的增长而增加， 10 而黄体酮治疗无法预防此类流产。

English: trial ASSIGNMENTS
Chinese: 试用作业

English: participants were randomly assigned , in a 1 : 1 ratio , to administer to themselves vaginal suppositories containing either 400 mg of micronized progesterone ( Utrogestan , Besins Healthcare ) or matching placebo twice daily , from the time of randomization through 16 completed weeks of gestation ( or earlier if pregnancy ended before 16 weeks ) .
Chinese: 参与者被随机分配，以 1 ： 1 的比例，从随机化时间到 16 个完整的妊娠周（或如果妊娠在 16 周之前结束，则更早）。

English: if vaginal administration was not preferred , participants could administer the suppositories rectally .
Chinese: 如果阴道给药不是首选，参与者可以直肠给药栓剂。

English: the appearance , route , and timing of administration of progesterone and placebo were identical .
Chinese: 黄体酮和安慰剂给药的外观、途径和时间是相同的。

English: secondary outcomes included the time from conception to the end date of pregnancy , ongoing pregnancy at 12 weeks of gestation , miscarriage ( defined as loss of pregnancy before 24 weeks of gestation ) , live birth before 34 weeks of gestation , ectopic pregnancy , stillbirth ( defined as intrauterine death after at least 24 weeks of gestation ) , termination of pregnancy , the week of gestation at delivery , birth weight , size ( small or large ) for gestational age , preeclampsia , Apgar scores , survival at 28 days of neonatal life , and congenital abnormalities , as well as other antenatal , intrapartum , postpartum , and neonatal outcomes .
Chinese: 次要结果包括从受孕到妊娠结束日期的时间、妊娠 12 周时的持续妊娠、流产（定义为妊娠 24 周前流产） 、妊娠 34 周前活产、异位妊娠、死产（定义妊娠至少 24 周后宫内死亡） 、终止妊娠、分娩时的妊娠周数、出生体重、胎龄大小（小或大）、先兆子痫、Apgar 评分、新生儿 28 天时的存活率，以及先天性异常，以及其他产前、产时、产后和新生儿结果。

English: a detailed list of all secondary outcomes is provided in the Supplementary Appendix , available at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 补充附录中提供了所有次要结局的详细列表，补充附录可在 NEJM.org 获取。

English: this minimally important difference was chosen on the basis of a national survey of clinical practitioners in the United Kingdom .
Chinese: 这一最低限度的重要差异是根据对英国临床从业者的全国调查选择的。

English: this method has been shown to be appropriate and to be less prone to convergence issues than other similar methods.13
Chinese: 这种方法已被证明是合适的，并且比其他类似方法更不容易出现收敛问题。 13

English: the statistical analysis plan did not include a provision for correction for multiplicity when the analyses of the secondary outcomes were performed .
Chinese: 统计分析计划不包括在对次要结果进行分析时对多重性进行校正的规定。

English: therefore , the results are reported as point estimates and 95 % confidence intervals , without P values .
Chinese: 因此，结果报告为点估计值和 95% 置信区间，没有 P 值。

English: for continuous outcomes , a linear regression model was used to estimate mean differences , with the same adjustment that was used in the analysis of the primary outcome .
Chinese: 对于连续结果，使用线性回归模型估计平均差异，并使用与主要结果分析相同的调整。

English: the widths of the confidence intervals were not adjusted for multiplicity , so the intervals should not be used to infer definitive treatment effects .
Chinese: 置信区间的宽度未针对多重性进行调整，因此不应使用区间来推断明确的治疗效果。

English: interim analyses of principal safety and effectiveness outcomes were performed on behalf of the data and safety monitoring committee by the trial statistician ( who remained unaware of the treatment assignments ) on two occasions .
Chinese: 主要安全性和有效性结果的期中分析由试验统计学家（他们仍然不知道治疗分配）代表数据和安全监测委员会进行了两次。

English: because these analyses were performed with the use of the Peto principle , 14 no adjustment was made in the final P values to determine significance .
Chinese: 由于这些分析是根据 Peto 原理进行的，14 因此未对最终 P 值进行调整以确定显着性。

English: from May 19 , 2015 , through July 27 , 2017 , a total of 12,862 women were identified as being eligible for the PRISM trial ; of these women , 4153 were randomly assigned to receive either progesterone ( 2079 women ) or placebo ( 2074 women ) ( Figure 1 ) .
Chinese: 从 2015 年 5 月 19 日到 2017 年 7 月 27 日，共有 12,862 名女性被确定为符合 PRISM 试验的资格；在这些女性中，有 4153 人被随机分配接受黄体酮（2079 名女性）或安慰剂（2074 名女性）（图 1）。

English: demographic and baseline characteristics were similar in the two trial groups ( Table 1 , and Table S1 in the Supplementary Appendix ) .
Chinese: 两个试验组的人口统计学和基线特征相似（表 1 和补充附录中的表 S1）。

English: information on the route of administration was available for 88 % ( 3662 of 4153 ) of the women : 99 % ( 3611 of 3662 women ) administered the suppositories vaginally and 1 % ( 51 of 3662 women ) administered them rectally .
Chinese: 88%（4153 名女性中的 3662 名）的女性可以获得有关给药途径的信息：99%（3662 名女性中的 3611 名）阴道给予栓剂，1%（3662 名女性中的 51 名）直肠给予栓剂。

English: the incidence of live births after at least 34 weeks of gestation was 75 % ( 1513 of 2025 women ) in the progesterone group and 72 % ( 1459 of 2013 women ) in the placebo group ( relative rate , 1.03 ; 95 % CI , 1.00 to 1.07 ; P = 0.08 ) .
Chinese: 妊娠至少 34 周后活产的发生率在黄体酮组为 75%（2025 名女性中的 1513 名），在安慰剂组为 72%（2013 名女性中的 1459 名）（相对率 1.03 ； 95% CI 1.00 至1.07；P=0.08）。

English: the sensitivity analysis , in which multiple imputation was used for missing data , did not change the findings ( relative rate , 1.03 ; 95 % CI , 1.00 to 1.07 ; P = 0.08 ) .
Chinese: 对缺失数据使用多重插补的敏感性分析没有改变结果（相对率，1.03；95% CI，1.00 至 1.07；P = 0.08）。

English: the incidence of ongoing pregnancy at 12 weeks was 83 % ( 1672 of 2025 women ) in the progesterone group and 80 % ( 1602 of 2013 women ) in the placebo group ( relative rate , 1.04 ; 95 % CI , 1.01 to 1.07 ) .
Chinese: 孕酮组 12 周继续妊娠的发生率为 83%（2025 名女性中的 1672 名），安慰剂组为 80%（2013 名女性中的 1602 名）（相对率，1.04；95% CI，1.01 至 1.07）。

English: the incidence of miscarriage was 20 % ( 410 of 2025 women ) in the progesterone group and 22 % ( 451 of 2013 women ) in the placebo group ( relative rate , 0.91 ; 95 % CI , 0.81 to 1.01 ) .
Chinese: 黄体酮组的流产发生率为 20%（2025 名女性中的 410 名），安慰剂组为 22%（2013 名女性中的 451 名）（相对率，0.91；95% CI，0.81 至 1.01）。

English: the results of all the other secondary outcomes are presented in Table 2 , and in Table S2 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 所有其他次要结局的结果列于表 2 和补充附录的表 S2 中。

English: a significant subgroup effect was identified for only 1 of the 10 prespecified subgroups - the subgroup of participants defined according to the number of previous miscarriages .
Chinese: 仅在 10 个预先指定的亚组中的一个亚组中发现了显着的亚组效应——参与者亚组是根据先前的流产次数定义的。

English: the incidence of live births in the subgroup of women who had no previous miscarriages was 74 % in the progesterone group and 75 % in the placebo group ( relative rate , 0.99 ; 95 % CI , 0.95 to 1.04 ) ; the incidence among women who had one or two previous miscarriages was 76 % and 72 % , respectively ( relative rate 1.05 ; 95 % CI , 1.00 to 1.12 ) ; and the incidence among women who had three or more previous miscarriages was 72 % and 57 % , respectively ( relative rate , 1.28 ; 95 % CI , 1.08 to 1.51 ) ( P = 0.007 for the interaction between trial group and the number of miscarriages ) ( Figure 2 ) .
Chinese: 在没有流产史的女性亚组中，活产率在黄体酮组为 74%，在安慰剂组为 75%（相对率，0.99；95% CI，0.95 至 1.04）；有过一次或两次流产史的女性的发生率分别为 76% 和 72%（相对率 1.05；95% CI，1.00 至 1.12）；有过三次或以上流产史的女性的发生率分别为 72 % 和 57 % （相对率 1.28 ； 95 % CI 1.08 至 1.51 ）（试验组与流产次数之间的交互作用 P = 0.007 ） （图2）。

English: the results of two post hoc subgroup analyses in which we categorized the number of previous miscarriages differently from the subgroup analysis described here are provided in Figure S1 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录图 S1 中提供了两项事后亚组分析的结果，在这些分析中，我们对既往流产次数进行了不同于此处描述的亚组分析的分类。

English: a summary of serious adverse events is provided in Table S3 in the Supplementary Appendix .
Chinese: 补充附录表 S3 中提供了严重不良事件的总结。

English: there was also no significant difference between the groups in the incidence of miscarriage or stillbirth .
Chinese: 流产或死产的发生率在两组之间也没有显着差异。

English: although there appeared to be slightly more ongoing pregnancies at 12 weeks in the progesterone group than in the placebo group , an inference of benefit cannot be drawn because the confidence interval for the relative rate was not adjusted for multiplicity of testing .
Chinese: 尽管孕酮组在 12 周时继续怀孕的人数似乎略高于安慰剂组，但无法推断出获益，因为相对率的置信区间未针对多重测试进行调整。

English: the large sample size in our trial allowed investigation of the primary outcome in prespecified subgroups .
Chinese: 我们试验中的大样本量允许在预先指定的亚组中调查主要结果。

English: among the 10 subgroup analyses , 1 showed differential effects of progesterone : the effect of progesterone in women with bleeding in early pregnancy differed according to the number of previous miscarriages , with a suggestion of benefit among women who had had three or more previous miscarriages .
Chinese: 在 10 项亚组分析中，1 项显示了黄体酮的不同影响：黄体酮对早孕出血妇女的影响因既往流产次数的不同而不同，这表明有 3 次或以上流产经历的妇女受益。

English: previous reports have indicated a steep and proportionate increase in the loss of chromosomally normal pregnancies ( i.e. , euploid miscarriages ) with increasing number of previous miscarriages.15
Chinese: 先前的报告表明，随着先前流产次数的增加，染色体正常妊娠（即整倍体流产）的流失率急剧增加并成比例增加。 15

English: given that the potential benefit of progesterone therapy would be expected to be specific to euploid pregnancies , an increasing level of benefit in women with increasing number of previous miscarriages is consistent with our understanding of the biologic factors associated with risk of miscarriage .
Chinese: 考虑到黄体酮治疗的潜在益处预计对整倍体妊娠具有特异性，因此随着先前流产次数的增加，女性的益处水平增加与我们对与流产风险相关的生物学因素的理解是一致的。

English: however , we did not identify this subgroup as one of special interest a priori in our statistical analysis plan , 17 and multiple comparisons were performed ( without adjustment for multiplicity ) ; thus , this observation requires validation .
Chinese: 然而，在我们的统计分析计划中，我们并没有先验地将这个亚组确定为特别感兴趣的亚组，17 并进行了多重比较（没有针对多重性进行调整）；因此，这一观察需要验证。

English: some limitations of our trial should be considered .
Chinese: 应考虑我们试验的一些局限性。

English: first , we studied a vaginal preparation of progesterone , at a dose of 400 mg twice daily , and it is possible that the results observed with this regimen are not generalizable to women receiving other doses and preparations by other routes .
Chinese: 首先，我们研究了一种孕酮阴道制剂，剂量为 400 毫克，每天两次，使用该方案观察到的结果可能无法推广到通过其他途径接受其他剂量和制剂的女性。

English: micronized vaginal progesterone has an identical molecular structure to natural progesterone , whereas other formulations of progestational agents have a different molecular structure and therefore potentially different mechanisms of action and pharmacologic features .
Chinese: 微粉化阴道黄体酮与天然黄体酮具有相同的分子结构，而其他促孕剂制剂具有不同的分子结构，因此可能具有不同的作用机制和药理学特征。

English: furthermore , trials that have evaluated vaginal progesterone in the prevention of preterm birth have shown its effectiveness when administered by this route.21,22
Chinese: 此外，评估阴道黄体酮预防早产的试验表明，通过这种途径给药时其有效性。 21,22

English: second , we started progesterone treatment only in women who had an intrauterine sac ; therefore , our trial cannot provide evidence on the effects of earlier use of progesterone , before a pregnancy sac is visible on an ultrasound examination .
Chinese: 其次，我们只对有宫内囊的女性开始黄体酮治疗；因此，我们的试验无法提供证据证明在超声检查可见妊娠囊之前早期使用黄体酮的效果。

English: third , the participants discontinued progesterone at 16 weeks of gestation ; however , we consider it to be unlikely that therapy beyond this time would have affected the outcomes related to miscarriage .
Chinese: 第三，参与者在妊娠16周时停用黄体酮；但是，我们认为超过此时间的治疗不太可能影响与流产相关的结果。

English: finally , although we found no increase in the risk of congenital abnormalities among babies of women treated with progesterone , the trial was not powered for such rare outcomes .
Chinese: 最后，虽然我们发现接受黄体酮治疗的妇女所生婴儿的先天性畸形风险没有增加，但该试验的功效不足以证明这种罕见的结果。

English: in conclusion , treatment with progesterone did not result in significant improvement in the incidence of live births among women with vaginal bleeding during the first 12 weeks of pregnancy .
Chinese: 总之，孕酮治疗并未显着改善妊娠前 12 周阴道出血妇女的活产率。

English: the time to initiate intravenous thrombolysis for acute ischemic stroke is generally limited to within 4.5 hours after the onset of symptoms .
Chinese: 急性缺血性脑卒中开始静脉溶栓的时间一般限制在症状出现后4.5小时内。

English: some trials have suggested that the treatment window may be extended in patients who are shown to have ischemic but not yet infarcted brain tissue on imaging .
Chinese: 一些试验表明，在成像显示脑组织缺血但尚未梗塞的患者中，治疗窗口可能会延长。

English: the patients were randomly assigned to receive intravenous alteplase or placebo between 4.5 and 9.0 hours after the onset of stroke or on awakening with stroke ( if within 9 hours from the midpoint of sleep ) .
Chinese: 患者被随机分配到中风发作后 4.5 至 9.0 小时或因中风醒来时（如果在睡眠中点后 9 小时内）接受静脉内阿替普酶或安慰剂。

English: the primary outcome was a score of 0 or 1 on the modified Rankin scale , on which scores range from 0 ( no symptoms ) to 6 ( death ) , at 90 days .
Chinese: 主要结果是 90 天时，改良 Rankin 量表的评分为 0 分或 1 分，评分范围为 0（无症状）至 6（死亡）。

English: the risk ratio for the primary outcome was adjusted for age and clinical severity at baseline .
Chinese: 主要结果的风险比根据基线时的年龄和临床严重程度进行了调整。

English: after 225 of the planned 310 patients had been enrolled , the trial was terminated because of a loss of equipoise after the publication of positive results from a previous trial .
Chinese: 在计划招募 310 名患者中的 225 名患者后，该试验因先前试验的阳性结果公布后失去平衡而终止。

English: a total of 113 patients were randomly assigned to the alteplase group and 112 to the placebo group .
Chinese: 共有 113 名患者被随机分配到阿替普酶组，112 名患者被随机分配到安慰剂组。

English: symptomatic intracerebral hemorrhage occurred in 7 patients ( 6.2 % ) in the alteplase group and in 1 patient ( 0.9 % ) in the placebo group ( adjusted risk ratio , 7.22 ; 95 % CI , 0.97 to 53.5 ; P = 0.05 ) .
Chinese: 阿替普酶组 7 例患者 (6.2%) 和安慰剂组 1 例患者 (0.9%) 发生有症状的脑内出血（调整后的风险比，7.22；95% CI，0.97 至 53.5；P = 0.05）。

English: among the patients in this trial who had ischemic stroke and salvageable brain tissue , the use of alteplase between 4.5 and 9.0 hours after stroke onset or at the time the patient awoke with stroke symptoms resulted in a higher percentage of patients with no or minor neurologic deficits than the use of placebo .
Chinese: 在本试验中患有缺血性中风且脑组织可挽救的患者中，在中风发作后 4.5 至 9.0 小时或患者因中风症状醒来时使用阿替普酶可导致更高比例的患者没有神经功能缺损或有轻微神经功能缺损。比使用安慰剂。

English: there were more cases of symptomatic cerebral hemorrhage in the alteplase group than in the placebo group . ( Funded by the Australian National Health and Medical Research Council and others ; EXTEND ClinicalTrials.gov numbers , NCT00887328and NCT01580839 . )
Chinese: 阿替普酶组中有症状的脑出血病例多于安慰剂组。 （由澳大利亚国家健康与医学研究委员会和其他机构资助；扩展 ClinicalTrials.gov 编号，NCT00887328 和 NCT01580839。）

English: current guidelines for ischemic stroke limit the time to initiate intravenous thrombolytic therapy to within 4.5 hours after the onset of stroke.1,2
Chinese: 目前的缺血性中风指南将开始静脉溶栓治疗的时间限制在中风发作后 4.5 小时内。 1,2

English: the selection of patients for reperfusion therapies on the basis of tissue viability rather than the time from the onset of stroke has also resulted in better outcomes than medical therapy in trials of thrombectomy.9,10
Chinese: 在血栓切除术试验中，根据组织活力而不是中风发作时间来选择再灌注治疗患者也比药物治疗取得了更好的结果。 9,10

English: the benefit of endovascular thrombectomy in patients with imaging evidence of salvageable brain tissue up to 24 hours after stroke onset has resulted in a disparity between the time windows used for thrombolytic therapy and thrombectomy.1,2
Chinese: 血管内血栓切除术对脑卒中发作后 24 小时内有可挽救脑组织影像学证据的患者的益处导致了用于溶栓治疗和血栓切除术的时间窗之间的差异。 1,2

English: we tested the hypothesis that intravenous thrombolysis with alteplase initiated between 4.5 and 9.0 hours after stroke onset or on awakening with stroke symptoms ( for which the time of onset was not known ) would provide a benefit in patients who had a small core volume of cerebral infarction that was disproportionate to a larger area of hypoperfusion.11
Chinese: 我们检验了以下假设：在卒中发作后 4.5 至 9.0 小时或醒来时出现卒中症状（发作时间未知）时开始静脉溶栓阿替普酶对小体积脑梗塞患者有益。这与更大面积的低灌注不成比例。 11

English: the trial methods have been published previously , 11 and the protocol is available with the full text of this article at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 试验方法之前已发表，11 实验方案与本文全文可在 NEJM.org 上获取。

English: the design of the trial , the analysis and collection of the data , and the writing of the manuscript were performed by the members of the executive committee and by the investigators at the trial sites listed in the Supplementary Appendix , available at NEJM.org .
Chinese: 试验的设计、数据的分析和收集以及手稿的撰写由执行委员会成员和补充附录所列试验地点的研究人员完成，补充附录可在 NEJM.org 获取。
